quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: My attitude is that if you push me towards something that you think is a weakness, then I will turn that perceived weakness into a strength.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Nothing can stop the man with the right mental attitude from achieving his goal; nothing on earth can help the man with the wrong mental attitude.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: Attitude is a little thing that makes a big difference.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Weakness of attitude becomes weakness of character.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A positive attitude causes a chain reaction of positive thoughts, events and outcomes. It is a catalyst and it sparks extraordinary results.
author: Wade Boggs

quote: It is not the body's posture, but the heart's attitude that counts when we pray.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Our attitude towards others determines their attitude towards us.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: People may hear your words, but they feel your attitude.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Adopting the right attitude can convert a negative stress into a positive one.
author: Hans Selye

quote: Take the attitude of a student, never be too big to ask questions, never know too much to learn something new.
author: Og Mandino

quote: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: Morality is simply the attitude we adopt towards people whom we personally dislike.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: But the attitude of faith is to let go, and become open to truth, whatever it might turn out to be.
author: Alan Watts

quote: My attitude is, if someone's going to criticize me, tell me to my face.
author: Simon Cowell

quote: It is our attitude at the beginning of a difficult task which, more than anything else, will affect its successful outcome.
author: William James

quote: My general attitude to life is to enjoy every minute of every day. I never do anything with a feeling of, 'Oh God, I've got to do this today.'
author: Richard Branson

quote: Having a positive mental attitude is asking how something can be done rather than saying it can't be done.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: A complainer is like a Death Eater because there's a suction of negative energy. You can catch a great attitude from great people.
author: Barbara Corcoran

quote: When you pray for anyone you tend to modify your personal attitude toward him.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Pink isn't just a color, it's an attitude!
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: Cock your hat - angles are attitudes.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
author: David Bailey

quote: Character is the result of two things: mental attitude and the way we spend our time.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I think it's my adventure, my trip, my journey, and I guess my attitude is, let the chips fall where they may.
author: Leonard Nimoy

quote: The remarkable thing is, we have a choice everyday regarding the attitude we will embrace for that day.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: The reactionary is always willing to take a progressive attitude on any issue that is dead.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Bad attitudes will ruin your team.
author: Terry Bradshaw

quote: Happiness is an attitude of mind, born of the simple determination to be happy under all outward circumstances.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: Attitude is everything.
author: Diane von Furstenberg

quote: Civilization is a method of living, an attitude of equal respect for all men.
author: Jane Addams

quote: Great effort springs naturally from great attitude.
author: Pat Riley

quote: But my attitude about it is I have miles to go before I sleep.
author: Peabo Bryson

quote: Attitude determines the altitude of life.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: The attitude is very important. Because, your behavior radiates how you feel.
author: Lou Ferrigno

quote: When you ain't got no money, you gotta get an attitude.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: Attitudes are more important than facts.
author: George MacDonald

quote: When you are thwarted, it is your own attitude that is out of order.
author: Meister Eckhart

quote: Most of us start out with a positive attitude and a plan to do our best.
author: Marilu Henner

quote: Our attitude toward life determines life's attitude towards us.
author: John N. Mitchell

quote: Good humor is one of the best articles of dress one can wear in society.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: For success, attitude is equally as important as ability.
author: Walter Scott

quote: The biggest challenge is how to affect public attitudes and make people care.
author: Jim Fowler

quote: There are no menial jobs, only menial attitudes.
author: William J. Brennan, Jr.

quote: Funny is an attitude.
author: Flip Wilson

quote: The greatest discovery of my generation is that man can alter his life simply by altering his attitude of mind.
author: James Truslow Adams

quote: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: Excellence is not a skill. It is an attitude.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: A healthy attitude is contagious but don't wait to catch it from others. Be a carrier.
author: Tom Stoppard

quote: The greatest discovery of all time is that a person can change his future by merely changing his attitude.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Spend some time this weekend on home improvement; improve your attitude toward your family.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Being black is not a matter of pigmentation - being black is a reflection of a mental attitude.
author: Steven Biko

quote: A strong positive mental attitude will create more miracles than any wonder drug.
author: Patricia Neal

quote: Leadership is practiced not so much in words as in attitude and in actions.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: The last of human freedoms - the ability to chose one's attitude in a given set of circumstances.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Fairness is not an attitude. It's a professional skill that must be developed and exercised.
author: Brit Hume

quote: Black Consciousness is an attitude of the mind and a way of life, the most positive call to emanate from the black world for a long time.
author: Steven Biko

quote: If a person gets his attitude toward money straight, it will help straighten out almost every other area in his life.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Certain thoughts are prayers. There are moments when, whatever be the attitude of the body, the soul is on its knees.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Be sure what you want and be sure about yourself. Fashion is not just beauty, it's about good attitude. You have to believe in yourself and be strong.
author: Adriana Lima

quote: I was looking for something a lot heavier, yet melodic at the same time. Something different from heavy metal, a different attitude.
author: Kurt Cobain

quote: I think whether you're having setbacks or not, the role of a leader is to always display a winning attitude.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Always keep that happy attitude. Pretend that you are holding a beautiful fragrant bouquet.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Being a sex symbol has to do with an attitude, not looks. Most men think it's looks, most women know otherwise.
author: Kathleen Turner

quote: Our lives are not determined by what happens to us but how we react to what happens, not by what life brings us but the attitude we bring to life.
author: Wade Boggs

quote: Stiletto, I look at it more as an attitude as opposed to a high-heeled shoe.
author: Lita Ford

quote: I hope the millions of people I've touched have the optimism and desire to share their goals and hard work and persevere with a positive attitude.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Sales are contingent upon the attitude of the salesman - not the attitude of the prospect.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Success or failure in business is caused more by the mental attitude even than by mental capacities.
author: Walter Scott

quote: No rational argument will have a rational effect on a man who does not want to adopt a rational attitude.
author: Karl Popper

quote: I think a lot of times we don't pay enough attention to people with a positive attitude because we assume they are naive or stupid or unschooled.
author: Amy Adams

quote: And the attitude of faith is the very opposite of clinging to belief, of holding on.
author: Alan Watts

quote: There's always the motivation of wanting to win. Everybody has that. But a champion needs, in his attitude, a motivation above and beyond winning.
author: Pat Riley

quote: People in tough times - it doesn't mean they don't have a great attitude.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: We submit to the majority because we have to. But we are not compelled to call our attitude of subjection a posture of respect.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Solidarity is an attitude of resistance, I suppose, or it should be.
author: Christopher Hitchens

quote: Our judgments judge us, and nothing reveals us, exposes our weaknesses, more ingeniously than the attitude of pronouncing upon our fellows.
author: Paul Valery

quote: I was kicked out of school because of my attitude. I was not assimilating. So I went to work, taking any jobs I could get.
author: Richard Pryor

quote: You can't study comedy; it's within you. It's a personality. My humor is an attitude.
author: Don Rickles

quote: We awaken in others the same attitude of mind we hold toward them.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I look at Jagger and the like and if I see a good attitude I'll admire it but I wouldn't copy their style.
author: Michael Hutchence

quote: Prayer is talking with God. God knows your heart and is not so concerned with your words as He is with the attitude of your heart.
author: Josh McDowell

quote: Punk was defined by an attitude rather than a musical style.
author: David Byrne

quote: Today's youth are told to get rich or die trying and they really shouldn't take that attitude forward with them.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: My attitude is, do as much as I can while I'm free. And if I'm arrested I'll still do as much as I can.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: My attitude toward men who mess around is simple: If you find 'em, kill 'em.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: My attitude is never to be satisfied, never enough, never.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: Surfers have the most attitude.
author: Shaun White

quote: Stop this attitude that older people ain't any good anymore! We're as good as we ever were - if we ever were any good.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: I was impressed by Hendrix. His attitude was brilliant. Even the way he walked was amazing.
author: Ritchie Blackmore

quote: What was past was past. I suppose that was the general attitude.
author: V. S. Naipaul

quote: All we need, really, is a change from a near frigid to a tropical attitude of mind.
author: Marjory Stoneman Douglas

quote: I don't mean this in a stuck-up way, but I needed an attitude song.
author: Gwen Stefani

quote: Could we change our attitude, we should not only see life differently, but life itself would come to be different.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Being a part of SKECHERS is exciting. It is such a hip company with a great attitude and image.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: Attitude is attitude, whether you're a West Coast gangster or East Coast gangster, you know?
author: Paul Walker

quote: Design is about point of view, and there should be some sort of woman or lifestyle or attitude in one's head as a designer.
author: Vera Wang

quote: You may not be able to change a situation, but with humor you can change your attitude about it.
author: Allen Klein

quote: In the late '70s, maybe just before I started, there was still an attitude that if you did film you didn't do TV and vice versa, but that's gone now.
author: Robert Carlyle

quote: Part of our western outlook stems from the scientific attitude and its method of isolating the parts of a phenomenon in order to analyze them.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: There is a single thread of attitude, a single direction of flow, that joins our present time to its early burgeoning in Mediterranean civilization.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: I don't think it's a good attitude in your life to feel that you have to be rich to have self-esteem.
author: Tom Petty

quote: So long as you've got your friends about you, and a good positive attitude, you don't really have to care what everyone else thinks.
author: Gail Porter

quote: Just as the left has to be more willing to question 'Government knows best,' the right has to rethink its laissez-faire attitude toward government.
author: Jack Kemp

quote: I've always considered myself to be fiercely patriotic. I love Britain - its history and the down-to-earth attitude people have.
author: Gary Numan

quote: I was impressed by Hendrix. Not so much by his playing, as his attitude - he wasn't a great player, but everything else about him was brilliant.
author: Ritchie Blackmore

quote: Today, I think the attitude is that governing is not necessarily good politics, and the result is that it's much more partisan and much more divided.
author: Leon Panetta

quote: My father instilled in me the attitude of prevailing. If there's a challenge, go for it. If there's a wall to break down, break it down.
author: Donny Osmond

quote: An aristocratic culture does not advertise its emotions. In its forms of expression it is sober and reserved. Its general attitude is stoic.
author: Johan Huizinga

quote: How do you nurture a positive attitude when all the statistics say you're a dead man? You go to work.
author: Patrick Swayze

quote: I will keep smiling, be positive and never give up! I will give 100 percent each time I play. These are always my goals and my attitude.
author: Yani Tseng

quote: I love everybody. One of the great things about me is that I have a very positive attitude.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: What reader wants to be told what attitude to strike?
author: Ian Mcewan

quote: The purely agitational attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: The ideal attitude is to be physically loose and mentally tight.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: My attitude is always one of sensuality, aggressive enthusiasm and a kind of outrageousness in my expression.
author: Sally Kirkland

quote: I went to the Performing Arts School and studied classical ballet. That attitude is something that's put into your head. You are never thin enough.
author: Carmen Electra

quote: I was bringing my attitude as a regular person 'cause this is my attitude.
author: Glenn Danzig

quote: When you have vision it affects your attitude. Your attitude is optimistic rather than pessimistic.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: Even as a little child, I've always had that comedian kind of attitude.
author: Etta James

quote: When you retire, it's a place in life, a part of the journey. You just don't quit work; you develop an attitude where you can do what you please.
author: Tom T. Hall

quote: The attitude of insolent haughtiness is characteristic of the relationships Americans form with what is alien to them, with others.
author: Jose Saramago

quote: I'm taking a bit of a wait-and-see attitude towards 3D.
author: Christopher Nolan

quote: You call to a dog and a dog will break its neck to get to you. Dogs just want to please. Call to a cat and its attitude is, 'What's in it for me?'
author: Lewis Grizzard

quote: I've never been out with any of the cast of Coronation Street. We're all very close friends so it's very much a professional attitude.
author: Richard Fleeshman

quote: It's not the style that motivates me, as much as an attitude of openness that I have when I go into a project.
author: Herbie Hancock

quote: I love her attitude, but as much as I'd like to bring my medals to a speech or appearance, I never do.
author: Mary Lou Retton

quote: If a person can be said to have the wrong attitude, there is no need to pay attention to his arguments.
author: John McCarthy

quote: Style is a reflection of your attitude and your personality.
author: Shawn Ashmore

quote: You know what's funny to me? Attitude.
author: Don Rickles

quote: The characteristic political attitude of today is not one of positive belief, but of despair.
author: Herbert Read

quote: I was always the guy getting kicked out of my classes at school for having an attitude problem.
author: Chevy Chase

quote: Iraq is just a symbol of the attitude of western democracies to the rest of the world.
author: Harold Pinter

quote: My dad instilled in me a great sense of humor. I wasn't bullied at school because my outward attitude was confident, and that helps.
author: Warwick Davis

quote: But Jesus changes your attitude towards yourself and towards other people.
author: Cliff Richard

quote: People have often asked if I'm gay because I don't go out of my way to spit and scratch and give people attitude.
author: Jason Bateman

quote: Pessimism only describes an attitude, and not facts, and hence is entirely subjective.
author: Francis Parker Yockey

quote: I need that aggressive attitude to play my music and more men have that attitude than women.
author: Lita Ford

quote: Art is the child of Nature; yes, her darling child, in whom we trace the features of the mother's face, her aspect and her attitude.
author: Beck

quote: But I think bands that rolled in with a big attitude, like they were some big deal, I just found that very strange.
author: Rob Zombie

quote: I think my attitude to human beings has changed since leaving prison.
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote: If you can kill animals, the same attitude can kill human beings. The mentality is the same which exploits nature and which creates wars.
author: Satish Kumar

quote: If you get a diagnosis, get on a therapy, keep a good attitude and keep your sense of humor.
author: Teri Garr

quote: The problem was just a mean attitude that festers and has to be challenged.
author: Major Owens

quote: The pool is terrible, but that doesn't have much to do with my record swims. That's all mental attitude.
author: Mark Spitz

quote: I have always detested any departure from reality, an attitude which I relate to my mother's poor mental health.
author: Jean Piaget

quote: Bob Altman had this relaxed but serious attitude. Everybody loved him. I wanted him to adopt me.
author: Steve Buscemi

quote: The place of chess in the society is closely related to the attitude of young people towards our game.
author: Boris Spassky

quote: I really believe you can predict when someone has a great attitude, a real well of talent.
author: Taylor Hackford

quote: The time I spent thinking about how I was better than somebody else or worrying about somebody else's attitude was time I could put to better use.
author: Charley Pride

quote: If you're looking for can-do, earthy-crunchy attitude then you've got to go to Wisconsin.
author: Dar Williams

quote: But having said that, there's also a sea change in attitude towards media.
author: Robert McChesney

quote: When a parent shows up with an attitude of entitlement, understand that under it is a boatload of anxiety.
author: Robert Evans

quote: It's not too good to have this attitude in F1. It could be a disadvantage.
author: Alain Prost

quote: Mainly what I learned from Buddy... was an attitude. He loved music, and he taught me that it shouldn't have any barriers to it.
author: Waylon Jennings

quote: You don't have to have an attitude if you're famous.
author: Adriana Lima

quote: There is definitely something sexy about a girl with an attitude and a pair of leather pants.
author: Eliza Dushku

quote: I'm not a music lover in the sense that I look for something to have on. I've never had that attitude to music.
author: Harrison Birtwistle

quote: I have played on many teams throughout my career, and I know when a team has the tools, and the right positive attitude towards winning.
author: Boomer Esiason

quote: You can measure a programmer's perspective by noting his attitude on the continuing vitality of FORTRAN.
author: Alan Perlis

quote: I just want to go in with the right attitude and from Day 1 make a difference.
author: Freddy Adu

quote: Our attitude is that we want to cross over. You can't go on making records just for your own hometown.
author: Cheryl James

quote: I do not share the half-in, half-out attitude to the EU of some in Britain. Britain's place is in Europe.
author: Peter Mandelson

quote: I kind of resent this attitude of men that we somehow must always look good.
author: Sharon Gless

quote: Only one thing can conquer war - that attitude of mind which can see nothing in war but destruction and annihilation.
author: Ludwig von Mises

quote: Bambi can't act. Bambi had major attitude.
author: Treat Williams

quote: It's better for me to play with guys because Rock 'n' Roll has such an aggressive attitude.
author: Lita Ford

quote: To so enter into it in nature and art that the enjoyed meanings of life may become a part of living is the attitude of aesthetic appreciation.
author: George H. Mead

quote: Lead singers not only do the majority of the work, but their personalities are singled out and taken as the general attitude of the unit.
author: Martha Reeves

quote: What a stupid attitude we have in this country to personal stories.
author: Amanda Burton

quote: When a woman puts on a heel, she has a different posture, a different attitude. She really stands up and has a consciousness of her body.
author: Christian Louboutin

quote: At home in Ireland, there's a habit of avoidance, an ironical attitude towards the authority figure.
author: Seamus Heaney

quote: Time plays a role in almost every decision. And some decisions define your attitude about time.
author: John Cale

quote: The war changed everybody's attitude. We became international almost overnight.
author: W. Averell Harriman

quote: I like actors that are good with pantomime and that can transmit a lot by their presence and attitude more than through their dialogue.
author: Guillermo del Toro

quote: The purely agitation attitude is not good enough for a detailed consideration of a subject.
author: Michael Korda

quote: Too many people say to their brokers, I can't deal with this. Take my money. Do what you want. That's the worst attitude you can have.
author: Maria Bartiromo

quote: I always had the attitude that I wanted to throw a no-hitter every game.
author: Dennis Eckersley

quote: For a writer only one form of patriotism exists: his attitude toward language.
author: Joseph Brodsky

quote: Epic poetry exhibits life in some great symbolic attitude. It cannot strictly be said to symbolize life itself, but always some manner of life.
author: Lascelles Abercrombie

quote: Whenever I'm having a bad day and have an attitude, I stay home. I keep it at home.
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

quote: Tommie Aaron taught me how to have a good attitude, to be easy going and not get uptight.
author: Dale Murphy

quote: Yes, we're still five little people with a noisy attitude.
author: Angus Young

quote: But I do think that we approach music, in of itself, with a religious attitude.
author: Jon Fishman

quote: Listen, whatever makes the movie better. That's the attitude you have to have.
author: Joseph Kosinski

quote: I am shocked by the easy attitude of many in the media towards disclosing our Nation's secrets.
author: Todd Tiahrt

quote: What sculptors do is represent the essence of gesture. What is important in mime is attitude.
author: Marcel Marceau

quote: Elvis Costello had a brand new bag. He was a musician, but he knew all about the attitude part of it.
author: Nick Lowe

quote: Hollywood's a very weird place. I think there's less of everything except for attitude.
author: Dean Cain

quote: Before 'Gangnam Style' I was not a good attitude artist.
author: PSY

quote: In aid, the proper attitude is one omitting gratitude.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: With my talent, I can make people laugh and give them another attitude about life. What a blessing that is for me.
author: Doris Roberts

quote: I still have a young attitude.
author: Pat Morita

quote: When you are facing the wilderness on your own, you have a totally different attitude to someone who works in government or who has a monthly cheque.
author: Rick Santelli

quote: Acting is magical. Change your look and your attitude, and you can be anyone.
author: Alicia Witt

quote: Abhorrence of apartheid is a moral attitude, not a policy.
author: Edward Heath

quote: Every baseball crowd, like every theatre audience, has its own distinctive attitude and atmosphere.
author: Bill Veeck

quote: If a site is done with pleasure and a fun attitude, it's a great way to communicate with your fans.
author: Christopher Lambert

quote: My grandmother is this amazingly theatrical woman. She acted like a movie star, as far as looks and attitude, kind of like Susan Hayward.
author: Parker Posey

quote: That attitude toward women as objects may have worked for the late Sixties, but it doesn't do so now.
author: John Schlesinger

quote: The attitude we have towards our personal pets as opposed to the animals that suffer under the factory farm is hypocritical and delusional.
author: James Cromwell

quote: The Dolls were an attitude. If nothing else they were a great attitude.
author: Johnny Thunders

quote: All ideas come about through some sort of observation. It sparks an attitude; some object or emotion causes a reaction in the other person.
author: Graham Chapman

quote: A positive attitude is something everyone can work on, and everyone can learn how to employ it.
author: Joan Lunden

quote: It got very tedious saying the same jokes in the same way with the same attitude.
author: Norm MacDonald

quote: I will not get very far with this attitude.
author: Nancy Cartwright

quote: After the first miscarriage, I tried to take the attitude that it was my body's way of telling me that this pregnancy wasn't meant to be.
author: Christie Brinkley

quote: There is no planning. On the night it is really great, it's euphoria and if it is not so great there is always tomorrow night. That was his attitude.
author: Ed McMahon

quote: I just really think every job I do, I get this gypsy attitude to money.
author: Jessica Brown Findlay

quote: I don't think people are fools, and I think they deserve a good attitude and smart entertainment.
author: Tatyana Tolstaya

quote: You can have a laugh in Los Angeles, or you can weep in Los Angeles, depending on your attitude towards it.
author: Miranda Richardson

quote: Our spiritual attitude is determined by our conception of our relation to infinite spirit.
author: Paul Twitchell

quote: Nobody minded what you did in bed or what you said about God, a very civilized attitude in 1948.
author: Simon Raven

quote: My opponents attitude is, 'If it moves, tax it, if it keeps moving, regulate it and when it stops, subsidize it.
author: Rob Simmons

quote: Its attitude, which it has preached and practiced, is skepticism. Now, it finds, the public is applying that skepticism to the press.
author: Thomas Griffith

quote: Attitude is your acceptance of the natural laws, or your rejection of the natural laws.
author: Stuart Chase

quote: I try and have a relaxed attitude and stay quite switched off until about an hour before kick-off.
author: Roy Keane

quote: Athletic competition clearly defines the unique power of our attitude.
author: Bart Starr

quote: The artist is not responsible to any one. His social role is asocial... his only responsibility consists in an attitude to the work he does.
author: Georg Baselitz

quote: Our new attitude is how can we put you in front of our customer.
author: Terry Semel

quote: There has been a change in attitude, though.
author: Daniel Petrie

quote: Bader's philosophy was my philosophy. His whole attitude to life was mine.
author: Kenneth More

quote: Patton was living in the Dark Ages. Soldiers were peasants to him. I didn't like that attitude.
author: Bill Mauldin

quote: I also had a mistaken attitude towards certain comrades.
author: Bela Kun

quote: I have a political attitude, but I'm certainly not a politician.
author: Kgalema Motlanthe

quote: My deepest impulses are optimistic, an attitude that seems to me as spiritually necessary and proper as it is intellectually suspect.
author: Ellen Willis

quote: Muslims have a very bad attitude to homosexuality, they're very intolerant.
author: Pim Fortuyn

quote: If you can't change your fate, change your attitude.
author: Charles Revson

quote: Mental attitude and concentration are the keys to pitching.
author: Ferguson Jenkins

quote: My first feeling about the paper and the attitude is that it is absurd.
author: Arthur Holly Compton

quote: I'm not going to take this defeatist attitude and listen to all this crap any more from all these people who have nothing except doomsday to predict.
author: Carroll Shelby

quote: A discipline I have observed is an attitude of love and reverence to people.
author: Bessie Head

quote: I can't believe the pro-choicers attitude toward unborn children-to me it's the ultimate liberal cause, to defend those without a voice.
author: Michael Aston

quote: An attitude of philosophic doubt, of suspended judgment, is repugnant to the natural man. Belief is an independent joy to him.
author: William Minto

quote: There are no easy answers' but there are simple answers. We must have the courage to do what we know is morally right.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.
author: John Wayne

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
author: Aristotle

quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Faced with what is right, to leave it undone shows a lack of courage.
author: Confucius

quote: One man with courage is a majority.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: How few there are who have courage enough to own their faults, or resolution enough to mend them.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: A great part of courage is the courage of having done the thing before.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: Andre Gide

quote: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
author: Socrates

quote: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
author: John Wooden

quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: America was not built on fear. America was built on courage, on imagination and an unbeatable determination to do the job at hand.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: The only service a friend can really render is to keep up your courage by holding up to you a mirror in which you can see a noble image of yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
author: George S. Patton

quote: Courage is the greatest of all virtues, because if you haven't courage, you may not have an opportunity to use any of the others.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
author: Jim Hightower

quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Real courage is when you know you're licked before you begin, but you begin anyway and see it through no matter what.
author: Harper Lee

quote: From caring comes courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: One man with courage makes a majority.
author: Andrew Jackson

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.
author: Loretta Young

quote: To have courage for whatever comes in life - everything lies in that.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Courage is a kind of salvation.
author: Plato

quote: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Those who lack the courage will always find a philosophy to justify it.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Any intelligent fool can make things bigger and more complex... It takes a touch of genius - and a lot of courage to move in the opposite direction.
author: E. F. Schumacher

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
author: Thucydides

quote: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
author: Les Brown

quote: Courage is not the absence of despair; it is, rather, the capacity to move ahead in spite of despair.
author: Rollo May

quote: It requires more courage to suffer than to die.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Courage - a perfect sensibility of the measure of danger, and a mental willingness to endure it.
author: William Tecumseh Sherman

quote: It is only necessary to have courage, for strength without self-confidence is useless.
author: Giacomo Casanova

quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.
author: John Irving

quote: Courage is being afraid but going on anyhow.
author: Dan Rather

quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
author: Thomas Szasz

quote: People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: My great hope is to laugh as much as I cry; to get my work done and try to love somebody and have the courage to accept the love in return.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Courage means to keep working a relationship, to continue seeking solutions to difficult problems, and to stay focused during stressful periods.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: History, despite its wrenching pain, cannot be unlived, but if faced with courage, need not be lived again.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: You don't develop courage by being happy in your relationships everyday. You develop it by surviving difficult times and challenging adversity.
author: Epicurus

quote: A man of courage is also full of faith.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.
author: Confucius

quote: The principles of living greatly include the capacity to face trouble with courage, disappointment with cheerfulness, and trial with humility.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is.
author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities... because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
author: Aristotle

quote: My mother taught me about the power of inspiration and courage, and she did it with a strength and a passion that I wish could be bottled.
author: Carly Fiorina

quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
author: Tori Amos

quote: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween.
author: Doug Coupland

quote: Every man has his own courage, and is betrayed because he seeks in himself the courage of other persons.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: A man of great common sense and good taste - meaning thereby a man without originality or moral courage.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Believers, look up - take courage. The angels are nearer than you think.
author: Billy Graham

quote: It is only through labor and painful effort, by grim energy and resolute courage, that we move on to better things.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
author: Plato

quote: Courtesy is as much a mark of a gentleman as courage.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Courage is almost a contradiction in terms. It means a strong desire to live taking the form of readiness to die.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Life is to be entered upon with courage.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
author: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice, it is conformity.
author: Rollo May

quote: I never thought much of the courage of a lion tamer. Inside the cage he is at least safe from people.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: All of us have moments in our lives that test our courage. Taking children into a house with a white carpet is one of them.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.
author: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Courage is a mean with regard to fear and confidence.
author: Aristotle

quote: Courage and perseverance have a magical talisman, before which difficulties disappear and obstacles vanish into air.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: Courage, above all things, is the first quality of a warrior.
author: Karl Von Clausewitz

quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
author: Mickey Mantle

quote: We need men with moral courage to speak and write their real thoughts, and to stand by their convictions, even to the very death.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Traits like humility, courage, and empathy are easily overlooked - but it's immensely important to find them in your closest relationships.
author: Laura Linney

quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Simulated disorder postulates perfect discipline; simulated fear postulates courage; simulated weakness postulates strength.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We've begun to raise daughters more like sons... but few have the courage to raise our sons more like our daughters.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it.
author: Pericles

quote: Way down deep, we're all motivated by the same urges. Cats have the courage to live by them.
author: Jim Davis

quote: Take chances, make mistakes. That's how you grow. Pain nourishes your courage. You have to fail in order to practice being brave.
author: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: Determination, energy, and courage appear spontaneously when we care deeply about something. We take risks that are unimaginable in any other context.
author: Margaret J. Wheatley

quote: Perfect courage is to do without witnesses what one would be capable of doing with the world looking on.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I beg you take courage; the brave soul can mend even disaster.
author: Catherine II

quote: There can be no failure to a man who has not lost his courage, his character, his self respect, or his self-confidence. He is still a King.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Everyone has talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it leads.
author: Erica Jong

quote: He's a man of great common sense and good taste - meaning thereby a man without originality or moral courage.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: In the Soviet army it takes more courage to retreat than advance.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared.
author: Eddie Rickenbacker

quote: Valor is stability, not of legs and arms, but of courage and the soul.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The first virtue in a soldier is endurance of fatigue; courage is only the second virtue.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: It is courage, courage, courage, that raises the blood of life to crimson splendor. Live bravely and present a brave front to adversity.
author: Horace

quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Creativity takes courage.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: He that fails in his endeavors after wealth or power will not long retain either honesty or courage.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks, and courage.
author: Charles Luckman

quote: Just remaining quietly in the presence of God, listening to Him, being attentive to Him, requires a lot of courage and know-how.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: It takes vision and courage to create - it takes faith and courage to prove.
author: Owen D. Young

quote: There is nothing in the world so much admired as a man who knows how to bear unhappiness with courage.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Courage is what preserves our liberty, safety, life, and our homes and parents, our country and children. Courage comprises all things.
author: Plautus

quote: You will find as you grow older that courage is the rarest of all qualities to be found in public life.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Failure is only postponed success as long as courage 'coaches' ambition. The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.
author: Herbert Kaufman

quote: He who loses wealth loses much; he who loses a friend loses more; but he that loses his courage loses all.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: The paradox of courage is that a man must be a little careless of his life even in order to keep it.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning.
author: William Blake

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Courage without conscience is a wild beast.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Courage is simply the willingness to be afraid and act anyway.
author: Robert Anthony

quote: I'm sick of not having the courage to be an absolute nobody.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: The courage we desire and prize is not the courage to die decently, but to live manfully.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Unless a reviewer has the courage to give you unqualified praise, I say ignore the bastard.
author: John Steinbeck

quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
author: Tommy Douglas

quote: Courage enlarges, cowardice diminishes resources. In desperate straits the fears of the timid aggravate the dangers that imperil the brave.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Despair gives courage to a coward.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Courage conquers all things: it even gives strength to the body.
author: Ovid

quote: It takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeeded.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Today we affirm a new commitment to live out our nation's promise through civility, courage, compassion and character.
author: George W. Bush

quote: We are very much what others think of us. The reception our observations meet with gives us courage to proceed, or damps our efforts.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: A wise woman knows how to summon her courage and do what is right, rather than what is easy.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Courage consists not in blindly overlooking danger, but in seeing it, and conquering it.
author: Jean Paul

quote: I think there's a difference between ditzy and dumb. Dumb is just not knowing. Ditzy is having the courage to ask!
author: Jessica Simpson

quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: Religion in its humility restores man to his only dignity, the courage to live by grace.
author: George Santayana

quote: America needs jobs, smaller government, less spending and a president with the courage to offer more than yet another speech.
author: Rick Perry

quote: The more wit the less courage.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Have the courage to act instead of react.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: I have the courage of my convictions.
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: The strangest, most generous, and proudest of all virtues is true courage.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: When God speaks, oftentimes His voice will call for an act of courage on our part.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I don't understand why people say that I am full of courage. I feel terribly nervous.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Audacity augments courage; hesitation, fear.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: There can be no great courage where there is no confidence or assurance, and half the battle is in the conviction that we can do what we undertake.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: Political courage is not political suicide.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: To persevere, trusting in what hopes he has, is courage in a man.
author: Euripides

quote: The test of courage comes when we are in the minority. The test of tolerance comes when we are in the majority.
author: Ralph W. Sockman

quote: Why should we honour those that die upon the field of battle? A man may show as reckless a courage in entering into the abyss of himself.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: To live we must conquer incessantly, we must have the courage to be happy.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage.
author: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Courage is the capacity to confront what can be imagined.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: Every man of courage is a man of his word.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Conscience is the root of all true courage; if a man would be brave let him obey his conscience.
author: James Freeman Clarke

quote: In strife who inquires whether stratagem or courage was used?
author: Virgil

quote: Courage can't see around corners but goes around them anyway.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: You have to have courage to be obedient to God.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I have no physical courage, I've asked for a double.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Untutored courage is useless in the face of educated bullets.
author: George S. Patton

quote: We're going to be OK because of the American people. They have more grit, determination and courage than you can imagine.
author: Joe Biden

quote: You have to do what you need to do as an artist. You have to have that courage.
author: Liz Phair

quote: Never undertake anything for which you wouldn't have the courage to ask the blessings of heaven.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: It takes a lot of courage to face up to things you can't do because we feed ourselves so much denial.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: You cannot build character and courage by destroying men's initiative and independence.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: Courage is often lack of insight, whereas cowardice in many cases is based on good information.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: I went through a long period where I was afraid of doing things I wanted to do, and you get your courage back, which is what's important.
author: George Michael

quote: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: I want to thank the Academy for its courage and generosity.
author: Elia Kazan

quote: My mother taught me that we all have the power to achieve our dreams. What I lacked was the courage.
author: Clay Aiken

quote: There are pretenders to piety as well as to courage.
author: Moliere

quote: The principal act of courage is to endure and withstand dangers doggedly rather than to attack them.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Deep Throat's information, and in my view, courage, allowed the newspaper to use what he knew and suspected.
author: Bob Woodward

quote: Honest conviction is my courage; the Constitution is my guide.
author: Andrew Johnson

quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Courage is always rewarded.
author: Kenny Loggins

quote: A military coup needs a sacrifice and courage that you can't find in an army without morale.
author: Jalal Talabani

quote: Courage is the art of being the only one who knows you're scared to death.
author: Earl Wilson

quote: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear; but being resolutely minded in a just cause.
author: Plutarch

quote: I have reached the conclusion that those who have physical courage also have moral courage. Physical courage is a great test.
author: Oriana Fallaci

quote: If you could get up the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed.
author: David Viscott

quote: Physical bravery is an animal instinct; moral bravery is much higher and truer courage.
author: Wendell Phillips

quote: Fashion should not be expected to serve in the stead of courage or character.
author: Loretta Young

quote: Suffering! We owe to it all that is good in us, all that gives value to life; we owe to it pity, we owe to it courage, we owe to it all the virtues.
author: Anatole France

quote: I've always been inspired by artists who have shown musical and intellectual curiosity and the courage to take risks.
author: Renee Fleming

quote: Our film examines the heroism, courage and prowess of the Soviet submarine force in ways never seen before.
author: Kathryn Bigelow

quote: At the same time, I would add that the American people have a lot of courage.
author: Tadao Ando

quote: On sensitive issues, talk isn't cheap - it takes real courage to pry open topics nailed shut.
author: Marvin Olasky

quote: The last thing a woman will consent to discover in a man whom she loves, or on whom she simply depends, is want of courage.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Nothing gives us courage more readily than the desire to avoid looking like a damn fool.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: The courage to be is rooted in the God who appears when God has disappeared in the anxiety of doubt.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Cowardice and courage are never without a measure of affectation. Nor is love. Feelings are never true. They play with their mirrors.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: Being gifted needs courage.
author: Georg Brandes

quote: The courage of the poet is to keep ajar the door that leads into madness.
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Wait for the Lord. Behave yourself manfully, and be of good courage. Do not be faithless, but stay in your place and do not turn back.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: One has to have the courage of one's pessimism.
author: Ian Mcewan

quote: It takes someone with a vision of the possibilities to attain new levels of experience. Someone with the courage to live his dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: Courage in danger is half the battle.
author: Plautus

quote: Courage easily finds its own eloquence.
author: Plautus

quote: Good courage in a bad affair is half of the evil overcome.
author: Plautus

quote: When you really believe in God, it gives you a courage, a confidence that enables you to meet the things coming.
author: Della Reese

quote: The courage of a soldier is found to be the cheapest and most common quality of human nature.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: A man of courage never needs weapons, but he may need bail.
author: Lewis Mumford

quote: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: You can't test courage cautiously.
author: Annie Dillard

quote: Men create real miracles when they use their God-given courage and intelligence.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Australia is a nation of compassion. Courage and compassion. And the third of these great values: resilience.
author: Kevin Rudd

quote: With enough courage, you can do without a reputation.
author: Margaret Mitchell

quote: Maybe you will be afraid and maybe you will fail, but the courage to take risks in any part of your life is, I feel, a very worthwhile way to live.
author: Emile Hirsch

quote: Nothing gives a fearful man more courage than another's fear.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Courage is a peculiar kind of fear.
author: Charles Kennedy

quote: I always disliked dogs, those protectors of cowards who lack the courage to fight an assailant themselves.
author: August Strindberg

quote: Courage stands halfway between cowardice and rashness, one of which is a lack, the other an excess of courage.
author: Plutarch

quote: So the brother in black offers to these United States the source of courage that endures, and laughter.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Whether you be man or woman you will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
author: James Allen

quote: Have the courage to be ignorant of a great number of things, in order to avoid the calamity of being ignorant of everything.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: Physical courage is a great test.
author: Oriana Fallaci

quote: When I was straight, I had the courage and energy to become an actress. I owe my career to my will to stop using.
author: Kirstie Alley

quote: We had no more courage than Harriet Tubman or Marcus Garvey had in their times. We just had a more vulnerable enemy.
author: Stokely Carmichael

quote: To me, there is no greater act of courage than being the one who kisses first.
author: Janeane Garofalo

quote: It takes both courage and talent to stand up in front of fellow human beings and make them crack a smile, and at the same time keep it clean.
author: Ray Comfort

quote: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: What is more mortifying than to feel that you have missed the plum for want of courage to shake the tree?
author: Logan P. Smith

quote: Your determination, selflessness and courage have brought the freedom struggle towards its fulfilment.
author: Gerry Adams

quote: War is fear cloaked in courage.
author: William Westmoreland

quote: But courage which goes against military expediency is stupidity, or, if it is insisted upon by a commander, irresponsibility.
author: Erwin Rommel

quote: The world will step aside for nearly anyone who has the courage of his of her opinions.
author: George Weinberg

quote: It takes a certain courage and a certain greatness to be truly base.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Until the day of his death, no man can be sure of his courage.
author: Jean Anouilh

quote: Falsehood is cowardice, the truth courage.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: I have a lot of courage. I'm a realist.
author: Elisabeth Rohm

quote: Courage and grace are a formidable mixture. The only place to see it is in the bullring.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: Leadership requires the courage to make decisions that will benefit the next generation.
author: Alan Autry

quote: We want deeper sincerity of motive, a greater courage in speech and earnestness in action.
author: Sarojini Naidu

quote: You must have love as the core; it takes courage to be willing to constantly tell the truth to each other and risk letting the relationship go.
author: Kenny Loggins

quote: Courage to continue comes from deeper sources than outward results.
author: Kenneth L. Pike

quote: Now that I've got some films under my belt, I have the courage of my convictions regarding acting. It gives me a leg to stand on.
author: Mira Sorvino

quote: One of the things that makes Hamlet unique among Shakespeare's characters is his courage to face up to the darker elements of his personality.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: I'll know how to die with courage; that is easier than living.
author: Georg Buchner

quote: I wish we lived in a society that made it safe and provided the courage for everyone to come out.
author: Judith Light

quote: The courage in journalism is sticking up for the unpopular, not the popular.
author: Geraldo Rivera

quote: It takes a good deal of physical courage to ride a horse. This, however, I have. I get it at about forty cents a flask, and take it as required.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: Often the test of courage is not to die but to live.
author: Vittorio Alfieri

quote: Men was formed for society, and is neither capable of living alone, nor has the courage to do it.
author: William Blackstone

quote: The word courage - God, I love that word. Words are so important to me.
author: Peter Fonda

quote: Peace is a fragile thing. It takes courage to secure it. It takes wisdom to maintain it.
author: Jenny Shipley

quote: Part of courage is simple consistency.
author: Peggy Noonan

quote: War alone brings up to their highest tension all human energies and imposes the stamp of nobility upon the peoples who have the courage to make it.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Such decisions will be far reaching and difficult. But you never lacked courage in the past. Your courage is now needed for the future.
author: Gerry Adams

quote: That's what acting is - it's about... having the courage to allow your audience into the private moments of your characters' lives.
author: Kerry Washington

quote: Success means having the courage, the determination, and the will to become the person you believe you were meant to be.
author: George A. Sheehan

quote: Courage is poorly housed that dwells in numbers; the lion never counts the herd that are about him, nor weighs how many flocks he has to scatter.
author: Aaron Hill

quote: The only reason I'm in Hollywood is that I don't have the moral courage to refuse the money.
author: Marlon Brando

quote: Courage: Great Russian word, fit for the songs of our children's children, pure on their tongues, and free.
author: Anna Akhmatova

quote: I love Joan Collins. She's a wonderful lady. She has such courage. She's such a good actress.
author: Robert Wagner

quote: A leader must have the courage to act against an expert's advice.
author: James Callaghan

quote: I saw courage both in the Vietnam War and in the struggle to stop it. I learned that patriotism includes protest, not just military service.
author: John F. Kerry

quote: We are telling the American people to have patience, courage, resolve and determination.
author: Muammar al-Gaddafi

quote: Courage is... the knowledge of how to fear what ought to be feared and how not to fear what ought not to be feared.
author: David Ben-Gurion

quote: Courage is a special kind of knowledge: the knowledge of how to fear what ought to be feared and how not to fear what ought not to be feared.
author: David Ben-Gurion

quote: More firm and sure the hand of courage strikes, when it obeys the watchful eye of caution.
author: James Thomson

quote: Real courage is knowing what faces you and knowing how to face it.
author: Timothy Dalton

quote: Ingenuity, plus courage, plus work, equals miracles.
author: Bob Richards

quote: It takes a great deal of courage to follow another person's lead.
author: Bill Hybels

quote: People think I have courage. The courage in my family are my wife Pam, my three daughters, here, Nicole, Jamie, LeeAnn, my mom, who's right here too.
author: Jim Valvano

quote: I think that people need to have the courage of their convictions and not be trying to fool people into thinking that they've changed overnight.
author: Chris Bell

quote: Love makes a subtle man out of a crude one, it gives eloquence to the mute, it gives courage the cowardly and makes the idle quick and sharp.
author: Juan Ruiz

quote: The right response to the non-problem of global warming is to have the courage to do nothing.
author: Christopher Monckton

quote: A man of courage flees forward, in the midst of new things.
author: Jacques Maritain

quote: Freedom. And Justice. If you have those two, it covers everything. You must stick to those principles and have the courage of your convictions.
author: Ian Smith

quote: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
author: Grace Paley

quote: It would be sad if we lost our instinct and our courage to love and protect.
author: Emeli Sande

quote: My sword I give to him that shall succeed me in my pilgrimage, and my courage and skill to him that can get it.
author: John Bunyan

quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
author: Ruth Gordon

quote: It takes courage to know when you ought to be afraid.
author: James A. Michener

quote: I know what real courage is, and I understand true compassion.
author: Mo Yan

quote: No man in the world has more courage than the man who can stop after eating one peanut.
author: Channing Pollock

quote: The enchanting charms of this sublime science reveal only to those who have the courage to go deeply into it.
author: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quote: The courage of a soldier is heightened by his knowledge of his profession.
author: Publius Flavius Vegetius Renatus

quote: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears.
author: Arthur Koestler

quote: Pugnacity is a form of courage, but a very bad form.
author: Sinclair Lewis

quote: I try to be a truthful artist and I try to show a level of courage. I enjoy that. I'm a messenger.
author: Jeff Koons

quote: Yes, you must have the courage of being free.
author: Jose Carreras

quote: Love is the most difficult and dangerous form of courage. Courage is the most desperate, admirable and noble kind of love.
author: Delmore Schwartz

quote: One of the marks of a gift is to have the courage of it.
author: Katherine Anne Porter

quote: Courage is action, not talk.
author: Jeff Rich

quote: Presumption should never make us neglect that which appears easy to us, nor despair make us lose courage at the sight of difficulties.
author: Benjamin Banneker

quote: To see what is right and not to do it is want of courage, or of principle.
author: Kong Fu Zi

quote: But steel bars have never yet kept out a mob; it takes something a good deal stronger: human courage backed up by the consciousness of being right.
author: Ray Stannard Baker

quote: It is our conduct, our patriotism and belief in our American way of life, our courage that will win the final battle.
author: Prescott Bush

quote: I would kiss you, had I the courage.
author: Edouard Manet

quote: I like so much wearing heels, legs look so much better, everything looks better. But it's only recently I've had the courage to do that.
author: Blanka Vlasic

quote: True courage is a result of reasoning. A brave mind is always impregnable.
author: Jeremy Collier

quote: I have always had the courage for the new things that life sometimes offers.
author: Wallis Simpson

quote: The man who has the courage of his platitudes is always a successful man.
author: Van Wyck Brooks

quote: My talent is such that no undertaking, however vast in size... has ever surpassed my courage.
author: Peter Paul Rubens

quote: Have the courage of your desire.
author: George Gissing

quote: Ofttimes the test of courage becomes rather to live than to die.
author: Vittorio Alfieri

quote: Men who live valiantly and die nobly have a strength and a courage from the eternal Father.
author: Josephus Daniels

quote: Give the people not hell, but hope and courage.
author: John Murray

quote: The courage of very ordinary people is all that stands between us and the dark.
author: Pam Brown

quote: Grave was the man in years, in looks, in word, his locks were grey, yet was his courage green.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: Freedom is a system based on courage.
author: Charles Peguy

quote: Courage is just fear, plus prayers, plus understanding.
author: Edward Albert

quote: To bathe a cat takes brute force, perseverance, courage of conviction - and a cat. The last ingredient is usually hardest to come by.
author: Stephen Baker

quote: Whatever enlarges hope will also exalt courage.
author: William Samuel Johnson

quote: Courage ought to have eyes as well as arms.
author: H. G. Bohn

quote: Courage is rightly esteemed the first of human qualities - because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
author: Joseph Chamberlain

quote: Courage to be is the key to revelatory power of the feminist revolution.
author: Mary Daly

quote: Courage! I have shown it for years; think you I shall lose it at the moment when my sufferings are to end?
author: Marie Antoinette

quote: Optimism is the foundation of courage.
author: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: Necessity does the work of courage.
author: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.
author: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: People don't follow titles, they follow courage.
author: William Wells Brown

quote: Keep courage. Whatever you do, do not feel sorry for yourself. You will win in a great age of opportunity.
author: Richard L. Evans

quote: The presidents of colleges have to have some courage to step forward. You can't limit alcohol in college sports, you have to get rid of it.
author: Dean Smith

quote: I took my courage in both hands and went to the Laundromat to do my washing. I had to use three machines.
author: Julie Doucet

quote: Support the strong, give courage to the timid, remind the indifferent, and warn the opposed.
author: Whitney M. Young

quote: It is a wise man who knows where courage ends and stupidity begins.
author: Jerome Cady

quote: True courage is like a kite; a contrary wind raises it higher.
author: John Petit-Senn

quote: Moral courage is higher and a rarer virtue than physical courage.
author: William Slim

quote: Courage is the fear of being thought a coward.
author: Horace Smith

quote: A man of character in peace is a man of courage in war.
author: Charles Wilson

quote: Morality may consist solely in the courage of making a choice.
author: Leon Blum

quote: Greatness, in the last analysis, is largely bravery - courage in escaping from old ideas and old standards and respectable ways of doing things.
author: James Robinson

quote: War paralyzes your courage and deadens the spirit of true manhood.
author: Alexander Berkman

quote: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.
author: Stanislaus I

quote: To him that waits all things reveal themselves, provided that he has the courage not to deny, in the darkness, what he has seen in the light.
author: Coventry Patmore

quote: Resignation is the courage of Christian sorrow.
author: Alexandre Vinet

quote: There can be a fundamental gulf of gracelessness in a human heart which neither our love nor our courage can bridge.
author: Patrick Campbell

quote: I know that if I'd had to go and take an exam for acting, I wouldn't have got anywhere. You don't take exams for acting, you take your courage.
author: Dame Edith Evans

quote: You cannot build character and courage by taking away a man's initiative and independence.
author: William Boetcker

quote: Courage is always the surest wisdom.
author: Wilfred Grenfell

quote: It often takes more courage to change one's opinion than to keep it.
author: Willy Brandt

quote: We simply do not understand our place in the universe and have not the courage to admit it.
author: Barry Lopez

quote: I want to encourage our people, to educate our people to have the courage to understand and fight for their rights.
author: Megawati Sukarnoputri

quote: Dream as if you'll live forever. Live as if you'll die today.
author: James Dean

quote: A dream doesn't become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination and hard work.
author: Colin Powell

quote: A dreamer is one who can only find his way by moonlight, and his punishment is that he sees the dawn before the rest of the world.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Deep into that darkness peering, long I stood there, wondering, fearing, doubting, dreaming dreams no mortal ever dared to dream before.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: I'm sick of following my dreams. I'm just going to ask them where they're goin', and hook up with them later.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: Reality is wrong. Dreams are for real.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: There are those who look at things the way they are, and ask why... I dream of things that never were, and ask why not?
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: Dream no small dreams for they have no power to move the hearts of men.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: All human beings are also dream beings. Dreaming ties all mankind together.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: If you take responsibility for yourself you will develop a hunger to accomplish your dreams.
author: Les Brown

quote: Dreams are today's answers to tomorrow's questions.
author: Edgar Cayce

quote: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
author: Anatole France

quote: A man is not old until regrets take the place of dreams.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Dream and give yourself permission to envision a You that you choose to be.
author: Joy Page

quote: Do all you can to make your dreams come true.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: You have to dream before your dreams can come true.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Dreams are the touchstones of our character.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We all have dreams. But in order to make dreams come into reality, it takes an awful lot of determination, dedication, self-discipline, and effort.
author: Jesse Owens

quote: Dreams have only one owner at a time. That's why dreamers are lonely.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: Dreams are necessary to life.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Throw your dreams into space like a kite, and you do not know what it will bring back, a new life, a new friend, a new love, a new country.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Yesterday is but today's memory, and tomorrow is today's dream.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: Dreams are true while they last, and do we not live in dreams?
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: All men of action are dreamers.
author: James Huneker

quote: Dreaming or awake, we perceive only events that have meaning to us.
author: Jane Roberts

quote: I'm a dreamer. I have to dream and reach for the stars, and if I miss a star then I grab a handful of clouds.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: All the things one has forgotten scream for help in dreams.
author: Elias Canetti

quote: Dream in a pragmatic way.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: The interpretation of dreams is the royal road to a knowledge of the unconscious activities of the mind.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: He was a dreamer, a thinker, a speculative philosopher... or, as his wife would have it, an idiot.
author: Douglas Adams

quote: Dreaming of a tomorrow, which tomorrow, will be as distant then as 'tis today.
author: Lope de Vega

quote: Dreaming men are haunted men.
author: Stephen Vincent Benet

quote: Sometimes, the only realists are the dreamers.
author: Paul Wellstone

quote: Without leaps of imagination, or dreaming, we lose the excitement of possibilities. Dreaming, after all, is a form of planning.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: So many of our dreams at first seem impossible, then they seem improbable, and then, when we summon the will, they soon become inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Dreams will get you nowhere, a good kick in the pants will take you a long way.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: In dreams begins responsibility.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Judge of your natural character by what you do in your dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Each man should frame life so that at some future hour fact and his dreaming meet.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Myths are public dreams, dreams are private myths.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Ideologies separate us. Dreams and anguish bring us together.
author: Eugene Ionesco

quote: Great dreams of great dreamers are always transcended.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Living in dreams of yesterday, we find ourselves still dreaming of impossible future conquests.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: I stand for freedom of expression, doing what you believe in, and going after your dreams.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: I am accustomed to sleep and in my dreams to imagine the same things that lunatics imagine when awake.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: Only in our dreams are we free. The rest of the time we need wages.
author: Terry Pratchett

quote: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: I think we dream so we don't have to be apart so long. If we're in each other's dreams, we can play together all night.
author: Bill Watterson

quote: Youth is a wonderful thing. What a crime to waste it on children.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I am a dreamer. Seriously, I'm living on another planet.
author: Eva Green

quote: I do not know whether I was then a man dreaming I was a butterfly, or whether I am now a butterfly dreaming I am a man.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: The dreamer can know no truth, not even about his dream, except by awaking out of it.
author: George Santayana

quote: I tell people I'm too stupid to know what's impossible. I have ridiculously large dreams, and half the time they come true.
author: Debi Thomas

quote: When you cease to dream you cease to live.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: I don't use drugs, my dreams are frightening enough.
author: M. C. Escher

quote: My dreams were all my own; I accounted for them to nobody; they were my refuge when annoyed - my dearest pleasure when free.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quote: Perhaps life is just that... a dream and a fear.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: Man is a genius when he is dreaming.
author: Akira Kurosawa

quote: I was always a dreamer, in childhood especially. People thought I was a little strange.
author: Charley Pride

quote: Like all dreamers, I mistook disenchantment for truth.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: We are near waking when we dream we are dreaming.
author: Novalis

quote: We all keep dreaming, and luckily, dreams come true.
author: Katie Holmes

quote: Those who have compared our life to a dream were right... we were sleeping wake, and waking sleep.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The world of men is dreaming, it has gone mad in its sleep, and a snake is strangling it, but it can't wake up.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Married or unmarried, young or old, poet or worker, you are still a dreamer, and will one time know, and feel, that your life is but a dream.
author: Donald G. Mitchell

quote: This is the city of dreamers and time and again it's the place where the greatest dream of all, the American dream, has been tested and has triumphed.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: Was it only by dreaming or writing that I could find out what I thought?
author: Joan Didion

quote: One of the most adventurous things left us is to go to bed. For no one can lay a hand on our dreams.
author: E. V. Lucas

quote: Dream manfully and nobly, and thy dreams shall be prophets.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: You have to have a dream so you can get up in the morning.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: That's what keeps me going: dreaming, inventing, then hoping and dreaming some more in order to keep dreaming.
author: Joseph Barbera

quote: Everybody's a dreamer.
author: John Lithgow
