quote: Writers write. Dreamers talk about it.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: Oh, I was never a businessman. I was a visionary, a dreamer.
author: Jim Bakker

quote: You know, Willie Wonka said it best: we are the makers of dreams, the dreamers of dreams.
author: Herb Brooks

quote: Only the dreamer shall understand realities, though in truth his dreaming must be not out of proportion to his waking.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: You can plant a dream.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: Take everything easy and quit dreaming and brooding and you will be well guarded from a thousand evils.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: People need dreams, there's as much nourishment in 'em as food.
author: Dorothy Gilman

quote: I challenge you to be dreamers; I challenge you to be doers and let us make the greatest place in the world even better.
author: Brian Schweitzer

quote: Strivers achieve what dreamers believe.
author: Usher

quote: We should never discourage young people from dreaming dreams.
author: Lenny Wilkens

quote: Only things the dreamers make live on. They are the eternal conquerors.
author: Herbert Kaufman

quote: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Follow your dreams, work hard, practice and persevere. Make sure you eat a variety of foods, get plenty of exercise and maintain a healthy lifestyle.
author: Sasha Cohen

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Your vision will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
author: Carl Jung

quote: But I, being poor, have only my dreams; I have spread my dreams under your feet; Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Friends... they cherish one another's hopes. They are kind to one another's dreams.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I like the dreams of the future better than the history of the past.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Keep true to the dreams of your youth.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The only thing that comes to a sleeping man is dreams.
author: Tupac Shakur

quote: Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken-winged bird that cannot fly.
author: Langston Hughes

quote: Sometimes dreams are wiser than waking.
author: Black Elk

quote: Dreams must be heeded and accepted. For a great many of them come true.
author: Paracelsus

quote: Dreams are often most profound when they seem the most crazy.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: The biggest adventure you can take is to live the life of your dreams.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: I really had a lot of dreams when I was a kid, and I think a great deal of that grew out of the fact that I had a chance to read a lot.
author: Bill Gates

quote: Why does the eye see a thing more clearly in dreams than the imagination when awake?
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: I prefer to be a dreamer among the humblest, with visions to be realized, than lord among those without dreams and desires.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Our truest life is when we are in dreams awake.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It is not true that people stop pursuing dreams because they grow old, they grow old because they stop pursuing dreams.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: A man is a god in ruins. When men are innocent, life shall be longer, and shall pass into the immortal, as gently as we awake from dreams.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: In my dreams I hear again the crash of guns, the rattle of musketry, the strange, mournful mutter of the battlefield.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: When all of your wishes are granted, many of your dreams will be destroyed.
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: Trust in dreams, for in them is hidden the gate to eternity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I'll let you be in my dreams if I can be in yours.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: If you dream the proper dreams, and share the myths with people, they will want to grow up to be like you.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: Tread softly because you tread on my dreams.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Help others achieve their dreams and you will achieve yours.
author: Les Brown

quote: Dreams are illustrations... from the book your soul is writing about you.
author: Marsha Norman

quote: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
author: Les Brown

quote: I never paint dreams or nightmares. I paint my own reality.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: We become not a melting pot but a beautiful mosaic. Different people, different beliefs, different yearnings, different hopes, different dreams.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: There's nothing as exciting as a comeback - seeing someone with dreams, watching them fail, and then getting a second chance.
author: Rachel Griffiths

quote: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: I'd say it's been my biggest problem all my life... it's money. It takes a lot of money to make these dreams come true.
author: Walt Disney

quote: I tell kids to pursue their basketball dreams, but I tell them to not let that be their only dream.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Common sense tells us that the things of the earth exist only a little, and that true reality is only in dreams.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: The work goes on, the cause endures, the hope still lives and the dreams shall never die.
author: Edward Kennedy

quote: Man, alone, has the power to transform his thoughts into physical reality; man, alone, can dream and make his dreams come true.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: An athlete cannot run with money in his pockets. He must run with hope in his heart and dreams in his head.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: Our dreams must be stronger than our memories. We must be pulled by our dreams, rater than pushed by our memories.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Lose your dreams and you might lose your mind.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: Before God we are all equally wise - and equally foolish.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: To the degree we're not living our dreams, our comfort zone has more control of us than we have over ourselves.
author: Peter McWilliams

quote: Racism is still with us. But it is up to us to prepare our children for what they have to meet, and, hopefully, we shall overcome.
author: Rosa Parks

quote: A friend told me that teenage girls are always looking for someone to pin their dreams on. That doesn't make it any less weird though.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: All this talk about equality. The only thing people really have in common is that they are all going to die.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: I am free of all prejudices. I hate every one equally.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: The wisdom of man never yet contrived a system of taxation that would operate with perfect equality.
author: Andrew Jackson

quote: Don't give up on your dreams, or your dreams will give up on you.
author: John Wooden

quote: Coming generations will learn equality from poverty, and love from woes.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Follow your dreams. Just make sure to have fun too.
author: Chris Brown

quote: Much can be inferred about a man from his mistress: in her one beholds his weaknesses and his dreams.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: Equality may perhaps be a right, but no power on earth can ever turn it into a fact.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The life of a man consists not in seeing visions and in dreaming dreams, but in active charity and in willing service.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Freedom and democracy are dreams you never give up.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: These men ask for just the same thing, fairness, and fairness only. This, so far as in my power, they, and all others, shall have.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Our life is composed greatly from dreams, from the unconscious, and they must be brought into connection with action. They must be woven together.
author: Anais Nin

quote: I believe in equality for everyone, except reporters and photographers.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I'm not just a boy toy. I have feelings and dreams like anybody else.
author: Jon Stewart

quote: A woman who thinks she is intelligent demands the same rights as man. An intelligent woman gives up.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: The world is seldom what it seems; to man, who dimly sees, realities appear as dreams, and dreams realities.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Dreams don't have deadlines. I'm thinking of doing bigger and better things and having more fun with it.
author: LL Cool J

quote: The sweltering summer of the Negro's legitimate discontent will not pass until there is an invigorating autumn of freedom and equality.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Dreams are not without meaning wherever thay may come from-from fantasy, from the elements, or from other inspiration.
author: Paracelsus

quote: As equality increases, so does the number of people struggling for predominance.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: To be successful, a woman has to be much better at her job than a man.
author: Golda Meir

quote: All men are created equal, it is only men themselves who place themselves above equality.
author: David Allan Coe

quote: All the people like us are we, and everyone else is They.
author: Rudyard Kipling

quote: The emotional, sexual, and psychological stereotyping of females begins when the doctor says: It's a girl.
author: Shirley Chisholm

quote: Democracy does not guarantee equality of conditions - it only guarantees equality of opportunity.
author: Irving Kristol

quote: A successful life is one that is lived through understanding and pursuing one's own path, not chasing after the dreams of others.
author: Chin-Ning Chu

quote: Flying dreams mean that you're doing the right thing with your life.
author: Doug Coupland

quote: It is better that some should be unhappy rather than that none should be happy, which would be the case in a general state of equality.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Women are the only exploited group in history to have been idealized into powerlessness.
author: Erica Jong

quote: The year was 2081, and everyone was finally equal.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Follow your dreams, believe in yourself and don't give up.
author: Rachel Corrie

quote: No struggle can ever succeed without women participating side by side with men.
author: Muhammad Ali Jinnah

quote: I'm aware of the mystery around us, so I write about coincidences, premonitions, emotions, dreams, the power of nature, magic.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: Equality is the soul of liberty; there is, in fact, no liberty without it.
author: Frances Wright

quote: Ocean is more ancient than the mountains, and freighted with the memories and the dreams of Time.
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: The cry of equality pulls everyone down.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Do not call for black power or green power. Call for brain power.
author: Barbara Jordan

quote: One of the things about equality is not just that you be treated equally to a man, but that you treat yourself equally to the way you treat a man.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: It is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Equality is not in regarding different things similarly, equality is in regarding different things differently.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: People are never more insecure than when they become obsessed with their fears at the expense of their dreams.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Private religious speech can't be discriminated against. It has to be treated equally with secular speech.
author: Samuel Alito

quote: A runner must run with dreams in his heart, not money in his pocket.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: The battle for women's rights has been largely won.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Stay focused, go after your dreams and keep moving toward your goals.
author: LL Cool J

quote: I've said it before, but it's absolutely true: My mother gave me my drive, but my father gave me my dreams. Thanks to him, I could see a future.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: More countries have understood that women's equality is a prerequisite for development.
author: Kofi Annan

quote: At first, dreams seem impossible, then improbable, and eventually inevitable.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: If you can't read, it's going to be hard to realize dreams.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: I have no respect for the passion of equality, which seems to me merely idealizing envy.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: All imaginable futures are not equally possible.
author: Kevin Kelly

quote: It's insecurity that is always chasing you and standing in the way of your dreams.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: People are pretty much alike. It's only that our differences are more susceptible to definition than our similarities.
author: Linda Ellerbee

quote: Nobody really believes in equality anyway.
author: Warren Farrell

quote: If we were to select the most intelligent, imaginative, energetic, and emotionally stable third of mankind, all races would be present.
author: Franz Boas

quote: For all life is a dream, and dreams themselves are only dreams.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Equal pay isn't just a women's issue; when women get equal pay, their family incomes rise and the whole family benefits.
author: Mike Honda

quote: I've had quite a lot of luck with dreams. I've often awoken in the night with a phrase or even a whole song in my head.
author: Brian Eno

quote: I want to organize so that women see ourselves as people who are entitled to power, entitled to leadership.
author: Patricia Ireland

quote: I have had dreams and I have had nightmares, but I have conquered my nightmares because of my dreams.
author: Jonas Salk

quote: Stewardesses are still paid so little that in many cases, new hires qualify for food stamps.
author: Patricia Ireland

quote: Virtue can only flourish among equals.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft

quote: No matter how carefully you plan your goals they will never be more than pipe dreams unless you pursue them with gusto.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: I want for myself what I want for other women, absolute equality.
author: Agnes Macphail

quote: All men are born equally free.
author: Salmon P. Chase

quote: We who are liberal and progressive know that the poor are our equals in every sense except that of being equal to us.
author: Lionel Trilling

quote: Democratic principles are the result of equality of condition.
author: Mercy Otis Warren

quote: Equality and development will not be achieved however if peace is not understood from women's' point of view.
author: Jenny Shipley

quote: Women have a lot to say about how to advance women's rights, and governments need to learn from that, listen to the movement and respond.
author: Charlotte Bunch

quote: We are a model country where gender equality is concerned.
author: Tarja Halonen

quote: I am an aristocrat. I love liberty; I hate equality.
author: John Randolph

quote: I refuse to consign the whole male sex to the nursery. I insist on believing that some men are my equals.
author: Brigid Brophy

quote: The extension of women's rights is the basic principle of all social progress.
author: Charles Fourier

quote: Dreams get you into the future and add excitement to the present.
author: Robert Conklin

quote: Nobody can give you freedom. Nobody can give you equality or justice or anything. If you're a man, you take it.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Americans are so enamored of equality that they would rather be equal in slavery than unequal in freedom.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Democracy... is a charming form of government, full of variety and disorder; and dispensing a sort of equality to equals and unequals alike.
author: Plato

quote: Dreams are like paper, they tear so easily.
author: Gilda Radner

quote: The law, in its majestic equality, forbids the rich as well as the poor to sleep under bridges, to beg in the streets, and to steal bread.
author: Anatole France

quote: Do It Under the Influence Yourself! That's what we're shooting for! Get drunk and make your dreams come true.
author: Aziz Ansari

quote: I just write what I wanted to write. I write what amuses me. It's totally for myself. I never in my wildest dreams expected this popularity.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: A claim for equality of material position can be met only by a government with totalitarian powers.
author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: We've removed the ceiling above our dreams. There are no more impossible dreams.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: We do not really feel grateful toward those who make our dreams come true; they ruin our dreams.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: With unemployment still abysmally high, the Obama economy is crushing Hispanics' dreams for their children to live a better life.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: From the naturalistic point of view, all men are equal. There are only two exceptions to this rule of naturalistic equality: geniuses and idiots.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: We're special because dreams that are impossible anywhere else, come true here. That's not just my story. That's your story. That's our story.
author: Marco Rubio

quote: We use our parents like recurring dreams, to be entered into when needed.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: Reality seems valueless by comparison with the dreams of fevered imaginations; reality is therefore abandoned.
author: Emile Durkheim

quote: Subordination tends greatly to human happiness. Were we all upon an equality, we should have no other enjoyment than mere animal pleasure.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: I like the religion that teaches liberty, equality and fraternity.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: The real hero is always a hero by mistake; he dreams of being an honest coward like everybody else.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: No advance in wealth, no softening of manners, no reform or revolution has ever brought human equality a millimeter nearer.
author: George Orwell

quote: I can never decide whether my dreams are the result of my thoughts, or my thoughts the result of my dreams.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Socialism values equality more than liberty.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: The curse of the romantic is a greed for dreams, an intensity of expectation that, in the end, diminishes the reality.
author: Marya Mannes

quote: Life being what it is, one dreams of revenge.
author: Paul Gauguin

quote: Then not only custom, but also nature affirms that to do is more disgraceful than to suffer injustice, and that justice is equality.
author: Plato

quote: I know how men in exile feed on dreams.
author: Aeschylus

quote: It is clear that not in one thing alone, but in many ways equality and freedom of speech are a good thing.
author: Herodotus

quote: When the legends die, the dreams end; there is no more greatness.
author: Tecumseh

quote: I love watching people's dreams come true.
author: Jessica Simpson

quote: Never in my wildest dreams did I entertain the idea that I would become a fashion designer.
author: Giorgio Armani

quote: Big dreams create the magic that stir men's souls to greatness.
author: Bill McCartney

quote: Jackie Robinson, as an athlete and as someone who was trying to make a stand for equality, he was exemplary.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I've had dreams about tricks.
author: Shaun White

quote: Small natures require despotism to exercise their sinews, as great souls thirst for equality to give play to their heart.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Yet it is in our idleness, in our dreams, that the submerged truth sometimes comes to the top.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Until we get equality in education, we won't have an equal society.
author: Sonia Sotomayor

quote: Women will only have true equality when men share with them the responsibility of bringing up the next generation.
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: So many financial dreams are thwarted by the failure to act upon good intentions.
author: Suze Orman

quote: You can't break my spirit, it's my dreams you take.
author: James Blunt

quote: Candor is a compliment; it implies equality. It's how true friends talk.
author: Peggy Noonan

quote: The media says that equality for women has arrived, but if you look around, you still don't see girls playing guitars and having success with it.
author: Joan Jett

quote: American society will never completely understand the true meaning of equality.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The state controlling a woman would mean denying her full autonomy and full equality.
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: I am fiscally prudent and socially progressive. I believe in protecting a woman's right to choose. I believe in marriage equality.
author: Andrew Cuomo

quote: Dreams are real as long as they last. Can we say more of life?
author: Havelock Ellis

quote: Marriage equality changed life for people.
author: Andrew Cuomo

quote: I have those dreams that you can't put into words.
author: Harry Connick, Jr.

quote: Proclaim human equality as loudly as you like, Witless will serve his brother.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: Marriage equality is about more than just marriage. It's about something greater. It's about acceptance.
author: Charlize Theron

quote: The word 'equality' shows up too much in our founding documents for anyone to pretend it's not the American way.
author: Martha Plimpton

quote: I'm living out my dreams and I love what I do.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: Take pleasure in your dreams; relish your principles and drape your purest feelings on the heart of a precious lover.
author: Giotto di Bondone

quote: Learn from your dreams what you lack.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Each country has a soul, and France's soul is equality.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: Like dreams, statistics are a form of wish fulfillment.
author: Jean Baudrillard

quote: Republicans many times can't get the words 'equality of opportunity' out of their mouths. Their lips do not form that way.
author: Jack Kemp

quote: The true and solid peace of nations consists not in equality of arms, but in mutual trust alone.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: Political Freedom without economic equality is a pretense, a fraud, a lie; and the workers want no lying.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: I was not looking for my dreams to interpret my life, but rather for my life to interpret my dreams.
author: Susan Sontag

quote: It is one of the blessings of this world that few people see visions and dream dreams.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: I am a universalist, passionately devoted to the cause of equality within the human family.
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: A test of what is real is that it is hard and rough. Joys are found in it, not pleasure. What is pleasant belongs to dreams.
author: Simone Weil

quote: In the end no segregationist scheme has withstood the force of a simple idea: equality under law.
author: Eric Liu

quote: Acting is also working with people who invite you into their dreams and trust you with their innermost being.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: In dreams the truth is learned that all good works are done in the absence of a caress.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: I'm a big fan of dreams. Unfortunately, dreams are our first casualty in life - people seem to give them up, quicker than anything, for a 'reality.'
author: Kevin Costner

quote: In Nicaragua, liberty, equality and the rule of law were the stuff of dreams. But in Paris I discovered the value of those words.
author: Bianca Jagger

quote: I don't like dreams or reality. I like when dreams become reality because that is my life.
author: Jean Paul Gaultier

quote: Genius is an African who dreams up snow.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance.
author: Kim Campbell

quote: Through hard work, perseverance and a faith in God, you can live your dreams.
author: Benjamin Carson

quote: We live in a world where equality is pretty important.
author: John Key

quote: Literature for me isn't a workaday job, but something which involves desires, dreams and fantasy.
author: Antonio Tabucchi

quote: When we see the face of a child, we think of the future. We think of their dreams about what they might become, and what they might accomplish.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: I'm an activist for gay marriage equality and children's rights. I'm the face of Share Our Strength.
author: Sandra Lee

quote: I think when you move past your fear and you go after your dreams wholeheartedly, you become free.
author: LL Cool J

quote: Genuine equality between the sexes can only be realized in the process of the socialist transformation of society as a whole.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: I just kind of wake up with a new idea and new dreams every day, and I follow that dream, as they say.
author: Dolly Parton

quote: Our politics are our deepest form of expression: they mirror our past experiences and reflect our dreams and aspirations for the future.
author: Paul Wellstone

quote: Friendship is something that creates equality and mutuality, not a reward for finding equality or a way of intensifying existing mutuality.
author: Rowan D. Williams

quote: What better model of a synthesis than a nocturnal dream? Dreams simplify, don't they?
author: Manuel Puig

quote: As soon as man enters into a state of society he loses the sense of his weakness; equality ceases, and then commences the state of war.
author: Charles de Secondat

quote: Without peace, all other dreams vanish and are reduced to ashes.
author: Jawaharlal Nehru

quote: Equality implies individuality.
author: Trey Anastasio

quote: Unless man is committed to the belief that all mankind are his brothers, then he labors in vain and hypocritically in the vineyards of equality.
author: Adam Clayton

quote: The sole equality on earth is death.
author: Philip James Bailey

quote: Worse than not realizing the dreams of your youth, would be to have been young and never dreamed at all.
author: Jean Genet

quote: Take, if you must, this little bag of dreams, Unloose the cord, and they will wrap you round.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Everyone wants to look their best, everyone has dreams of wanting to look like something else. But we are who we are.
author: Samantha Morton

quote: Most of all, we should remember all of us are capable of individually helping advance the spirit of equality for all.
author: Mike Rogers

quote: Within our dreams and aspirations we find our opportunities.
author: Sugar Ray Leonard

quote: You have all the reason in the world to achieve your grandest dreams. Imagination plus innovation equals realization.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Inequality can have a bad downside, but equality, for its part, sure does get in the way of coordination.
author: Mary Douglas

quote: Field of Dreams is probably our generation's It's A Wonderful Life.
author: Kevin Costner

quote: I believe I've always been a big believer in equality. No one has ever been able to tell me I couldn't do something because I was a girl.
author: Anne Hathaway

quote: People ask how can a Jewish kid from the Bronx do preppy clothes? Does it have to do with class and money? It has to do with dreams.
author: Ralph Lauren

quote: Any serious shift towards more sustainable societies has to include gender equality.
author: Helen Clark

quote: His lordship may compel us to be equal upstairs, but there will never be equality in the servants hall.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: It's a pity one can't imagine what one can't compare to anything. Genius is an African who dreams up snow.
author: Vladimir Nabokov

quote: I want to help children in Serbia and around the world so they can realize their dreams.
author: Novak Djokovic

quote: The rights of one sex, political and otherwise, are the same as those of the other sex, and this equality of rights ought to be fully recognized.
author: Leland Stanford

quote: Those born into poverty or on the margins of society require our extra support to realize their dreams.
author: Novak Djokovic

quote: 'Vote Love' means vote equality. It means vote change. It means vote what's right for humanity.
author: Macklemore

quote: It's not like I don't have my own wants and dreams anymore - it's just that the kids come first. It's primal.
author: Angie Harmon

quote: Such security is equal liberty. But it is not necessarily equality in the use of the earth.
author: Benjamin Tucker

quote: You learn about equality in history and civics, but you find out life is not really like that.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Never set limits, go after your dreams, don't be afraid to push the boundaries. And laugh a lot - it's good for you!
author: Paula Radcliffe

quote: I think cinema is closer to allegories than to reality. It's closer to our dreams.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: I don't believe in social equality, and they know it.
author: George Smathers

quote: A player dreams of being a superstar, but he doesn't want people flocking all over him asking for an autograph.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: The history of the past is but one long struggle upward to equality.
author: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: All sports must be treated on the basis of equality.
author: Pierre de Coubertin

quote: It has been my observation that parents kill more dreams than anybody.
author: Spike Lee

quote: As I live and am a man, this is an unexaggerated tale - my dreams become the substances of my life.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Dreams come true; without that possibility, nature would not incite us to have them.
author: John Updike

quote: Today, I'm very happy about myself, because I realized my dreams. I learned how to understand what people want.
author: Roberto Cavalli

quote: Dreams do come true. If anyone's proof of that, it's me.
author: Jennifer Hudson

quote: Sinn Fein has demonstrated the ability to play a leadership role as part of a popular movement towards peace, equality and justice.
author: Gerry Adams

quote: The permanent temptation of life is to confuse dreams with reality. The permanent defeat of life comes when dreams are surrendered to reality.
author: James A. Michener

quote: Take what you can from your dreams, make them as real as anything.
author: Dave Matthews

quote: In 1965, I marched for equality.
author: Alphonso Jackson

quote: In a couple, sometimes, one or both people have to give up their personal life, dreams and ambitions for the good of the family.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: No one may speak for the dead, no one may interpret their mutilated dreams and visions.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: You have the dreams that you want, and then you have to do other jobs until you can get to that dream.
author: Channing Tatum

quote: In science, all facts, no matter how trivial or banal, enjoy democratic equality.
author: Mary McCarthy

quote: We live because of the dreams.
author: Marat Safin

quote: I was always someone who lived in the future all the time, it was always the next thing - dreams of escape.
author: Julie Walters

quote: The basis, the corner-stone of this Government, was the perfect equality of the free, sovereign, and independent States which made it.
author: Robert Toombs

quote: Give us equality of enjoyment, equal right to expansion - it is as necessary to our prosperity as yours.
author: Robert Toombs

quote: My dreams and aspirations when I was a child for as long as I can remember was to be an entertainer.
author: Brittany Murphy

quote: Democracy not only requires equality but also an unshakable conviction in the value of each person, who is then equal.
author: Jeane Kirkpatrick

quote: The purpose that brought the fourteenth amendment into being was equality before the law, and equality, not separation, was written into the law.
author: Robert Bork

quote: God, that dumping ground of our dreams.
author: Jean Rostand

quote: My professional dreams were coming true while I was living a personal nightmare.
author: Dane Cook

quote: My dreams are all follies.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: My mother gave me my drive but my father gave me my dreams.
author: Liza Minnelli

quote: But are not the dreams of poets and the tales of travellers notoriously false?
author: H. P. Lovecraft

quote: A dream is a scripture, and many scriptures are nothing but dreams.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: My life turned out to be beyond my greatest dreams.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Do people really want liberty, equality, fraternity? Is it not some manner of speaking?
author: Krzysztof Kieslowski

quote: There's always going to be dreams and goals I have, but I never really tell people what they are.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Dreams do come true, even for someone who couldn't speak English and never had a music lesson or much of an education.
author: Lawrence Welk

quote: They should invent some way to tape-record your dreams. I've written songs in my dreams that were Beatles songs. Then I'd wake up and they'd be gone.
author: Alice Cooper

quote: Sometimes, you follow your dreams. I say to the young people, 'If you have a dream, chase it.'
author: Karl Malone

quote: As many political writers have pointed out, commitment to political equality is not an empirical claim that people are clones.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: I want my boys to have an understanding of people's emotions, their insecurities, people's distress, and their hopes and dreams.
author: Princess Diana

quote: A resilient people cherishing liberty and equality and the rule of law will endure.
author: Nick Rahall

quote: I said on the equality side of it, that it is essential to a woman's equality with man that she be the decision-maker, that her choice be controlling.
author: Ruth Bader Ginsburg

quote: I'm particularly proud of my reluctance to share my dreams with anyone.
author: Todd Barry

quote: Dreams are illusions, and we can't let go of them because we would be dead.
author: David Copperfield

quote: We are also further than ever from equality of opportunity.
author: Ferdinand Mount

quote: I try to help people realize their dreams by using magic to tell stories that educate, move, and inspire.
author: David Copperfield

quote: You'll be much more successful if you follow your dreams and follow your passions.
author: Jay Weatherill

quote: No person has the right to rain on your dreams.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: My father, his spirit is with me constantly, and I'm a believer in that world and the world of dreams and that stuff.
author: Ziggy Marley

quote: His lordship may compel us to be equal upstairs, but there will never be equality in the servants' hall.
author: J. M. Barrie

quote: Free trade is very important if we respect equality among nations.
author: Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva

quote: The Columbia is lost, but the dreams that inspired its crew remain with us.
author: Dick Cheney

quote: In a society in which equality is a fact, not merely a word, words of racial or sexual assault and humiliation will be nonsense syllables.
author: Catharine MacKinnon

quote: Dreams have always expanded our understanding of reality by challenging our boundaries of the real, of the possible.
author: Henry Reed

quote: My office is at Yankee stadium. Yes, dreams do come true.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: I think men are allowed to be fat and bald and ugly and women aren't. And it's just not - there is no equality there.
author: Connie Chung

quote: Everybody thinks that equality comes from identifying people, and that's not where equality comes from.
author: Matt Bomer

quote: Always wear cute pyjamas to bed, you'll never know who u will meet in your dreams.
author: Joel Madden

quote: I think everyone dreams of that nice romantic wedding.
author: Lance Bass

quote: So many of my dreams were to actually be able to make a living of what I did as a hobby.
author: Rick Baker

quote: To all, to each, a fair good-night, and pleasing dreams, and slumbers light.
author: Walter Scott

quote: Martin Luther King, Jr. didn't carry just a piece of cloth to symbolize his belief in racial equality; he carried the American flag.
author: Adrian Cronauer

quote: I've been interested in dreams since I as a kid and I've wanted to do a film about them for a long time.
author: Christopher Nolan

quote: I worked on my voice for Sweet Dreams, but only to match my speaking voice to Patsy's actual singing voice. That was my way into that character.
author: Jessica Lange

quote: Vain hopes are like certain dreams of those who wake.
author: Quintilian

quote: Again, it may be said, that to love justice and equality the people need no great effort of virtue; it is sufficient that they love themselves.
author: Maximilien Robespierre

quote: I have a notebook that is filled to the brim with my dreams and ideas and goals and aspirations.
author: Karlie Kloss

quote: Family law is institutionally anti-male. I've been lobbying MPs, and I'm not going to give up campaigning for equality until I get equality.
author: Louis de Bernieres

quote: I've never dreamed of a story idea. I have such boring dreams.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: I've accomplished a lot, but I still have more dreams that I want to achieve.
author: Joe Jonas

quote: Think of submitting our measure to the advice of politicians! I would as soon submit the subject of the equality of a goose to a fox.
author: Anna Howard Shaw

quote: I will feel equality has arrived when we can elect to office women who are as incompetent as some of the men who are already there.
author: Maureen Reagan

quote: The highest political buzz word is not liberty, equality, fraternity or solidarity; it is service.
author: Arthur Hugh Clough

quote: I don't understand people who dream in black and white. I just don't get it. My dreams have always been vivid color.
author: Gary Ross

quote: I have absurdly vivid dreams.
author: Erin Morgenstern

quote: My dreams have become puny with the reality my life has become.
author: Imelda Marcos

quote: The interpretation of dreams is a great art.
author: Paracelsus

quote: I have shared my whole life. My private and my show business life. It helps me actually to feel my songs and to go on with my dreams.
author: Celine Dion

quote: There needs to be radical development in equality law to create the environment to allow women to stay in work.
author: Ken Livingstone

quote: I mean, we've all had those dreams where, you know, we try to cry out and our voice won't come.
author: Tom Hooper

quote: Demands for equality for women are threats to men's self-esteem and sense of sexual turf.
author: Alice S. Rossi

quote: Equality means nothing unless incorporated into the institutions.
author: Slobodan Milosevic

quote: My wife is beginning to instruct me on means to retrieve dreams, and bit by bit, it does seem to be working.
author: Theodore Sturgeon

quote: Yugoslavia is a multinational community and it can survive only under the conditions of full equality for all nations that live in it.
author: Slobodan Milosevic

quote: We all have our time machines. Some take us back, they're called memories. Some take us forward, they're called dreams.
author: Jeremy Irons

quote: I am consumed with the fear of failing. Reaching deep down and finding confidence has made all my dreams come true.
author: Arsenio Hall

quote: Good dreams don't come cheap, you've got to pay for them and If you just dream when you're asleep this is no way for them to come alive... to survive.
author: Harry Chapin

quote: It has never been my object to record my dreams, just the determination to realize them.
author: Man Ray

quote: In my wildest dreams, I could not have imagined a sweeter life.
author: Hugh Hefner

quote: The usual channels of university studies or secretarial work did not appeal to me. I cherished difficult dreams through confidence in myself.
author: Ella Maillart

quote: I married the man of my dreams in 1998.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: You have to dream dreams to live dreams.
author: Eric Lindros

quote: Catcher in the Rye had a profound impact on me-the idea that we all have lots of dreams that are slowly being chipped away as we grow up.
author: Judd Nelson

quote: Dreams are the seeds of change. Nothing ever grows without a seed, and nothing ever changes without a dream.
author: Debby Boone

quote: To all the kids out there: Follow your dream. Believe in your dream. Because dreams do come true.
author: Rickey Henderson

quote: And our dreams are who we are.
author: Barbara Sher

quote: That disturbs people when they know they didn't have the guts or integrity to stick to their dreams.
author: Sandra Bernhard

quote: I know it sounds corny, but when you follow your dreams, it happens. And if it's music, take it seriously.
author: Enrique Iglesias

quote: Saddle your dreams before you ride em.
author: Mary Webb

quote: I can't sing but I can understand wanting to keep a balance, trying to pursue dreams, while creating a stable environment for my children.
author: Gabrielle Reece

quote: People who insist on telling their dreams are among the terrors of the breakfast table.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: We must stop talking about the American dream and start listening to the dreams of Americans.
author: Max Beerbohm

quote: The old studios that mass-produced dreams are gone with the wind, just like the old downtown theaters that were the temples of the dreams.
author: Suzanne Fields

quote: I wasn't prepared to get a mammogram until I was 40 years old, like I'd been told. I never in my wildest dreams expected anything to be wrong.
author: Giuliana Rancic

quote: I am very lucky because I am realizing my childhood dreams, and after presenting my shows it's like a party.
author: Jean Paul Gaultier

quote: It never occurred to me that I'd be on a television show or in feature films but when those came into play my dreams changed along the way.
author: Camryn Manheim

quote: My mother was really my partner in every project that I had. She was just the great enabler of my dreams.
author: Diane Keaton

quote: I think dreams can come true, but not necessarily like fairy-tales. It's not always so perfect like that.
author: Patrick Dempsey

quote: My work is to reach people with ideas, hopes, dreams, encouragement, insight, and revelation. That's what an actor wants to do.
author: John Astin

quote: Our dreams drench us in senses, and senses steps us again in dreams.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: Whatever dreams I have wished have come true.
author: Annette Funicello

quote: As a kid, this is what I wanted my life to be. Not in my wildest dreams did I ever dare to dream that it would be this.
author: Smokey Robinson

quote: Sometimes your dreams come true.
author: Frank Bruno

quote: From time immemorial artistic insights have been revealed to artists in their sleep and in dreams, so that at all times they ardently desired them.
author: Paracelsus

quote: 'The Cut' is going to give someone the opportunity of a lifetime and help that person achieve his or her dreams.
author: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: I'm sure I have a process, but it mostly takes place in my dreams.
author: William H. Macy

quote: I never had any big dreams about doing something on a huge scale.
author: Alison Krauss

quote: You can't censor people's dreams.
author: Robyn Hitchcock

quote: Dreams are a scientific fact.
author: Robyn Hitchcock

quote: Love is the most terrible, and also the most generous of the passions; it is the only one which includes in its dreams the happiness of someone else.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: I tell people, 'It's just like a cliche, but it's true: In Hollywood, dreams can come true.'
author: Michael Clarke Duncan

quote: Cherish your visions and your dreams, as they are the children of your soul; the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.
author: Napolean Hill

quote: Google is a global Rorschach test. We see in it what we want to see. Google has built an infrastructure that makes a lot of dreams closer to reality.
author: John Battelle

quote: Dreams really tell you about yourself more than anything else in this world could ever tell you.
author: Sylvia Browne

quote: Everyone dreams, but not everybody remembers their dreams because some people go into delta; they go too low.
author: Sylvia Browne

quote: I am a child of Hollywood and dreams. To me, to be on the red carpet is the best place in the world.
author: Steven Cojocaru

quote: I've got heaps of dreams.
author: Abbie Cornish

quote: I'm thinking of slowing down on modeling and branching out to other things. I want to pursue some new and old dreams and start making them happen.
author: Chanel Iman

quote: Dreams are, by definition, cursed with short life spans.
author: Candice Bergen

quote: An Academy Award nomination is stuff dreams are made of.
author: Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy

quote: Don't give up your dreams.
author: Sharmeen Obaid-Chinoy

quote: We must not let our passions destroy our dreams.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: I actually build my dreams around the dancers I've got in my company.
author: Graeme Murphy

quote: Our dreams are made of real things, like a shoebox full of photographs.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: If dreams are like movies, then memories are films about ghosts.
author: Adam Duritz

quote: Dreams seem to have a will of their own.
author: Henry Reed

quote: When I first left Iran at the age of 13, Iran had become such a shining star - it was the point to which all my desires and dreams returned.
author: Azar Nafisi

quote: My heroes, my dreams, and my future lay in Yankee Stadium. And they can't take that away from me.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: My childhood dreams were focused on being part of the effort to make humanity a multiplanetary species.
author: Peter Diamandis

quote: One of my dreams in life is to do fund-raising for the youth.
author: Picabo Street

quote: Anderson Cooper every night dreams about getting my job permanently really.
author: Regis Philbin

quote: We control the content of our dreams.
author: Thom Gunn

quote: Men act out like they're horrified by marriage, but when they find the woman of their dreams, they love it.
author: Rachel Hunter

quote: When we are motivated by goals that have deep meaning, by dreams that need completion, by pure love that needs expressing, then we truly live.
author: Greg Anderson

quote: I still marvel at how God turns dreams into reality.
author: Martha Reeves

quote: I worshipped Berry Gordy for the creative dreams he had made come true.
author: Martha Reeves

quote: Humanity needs dreams to be able to survive the miseries of daily existence, even if only for an instant.
author: Oscar Niemeyer

quote: I mean, every child at one stage dreams of being a prince or a princess.
author: Mary, Crown Princess of Denmark

quote: I am rich beyond the dreams of avarice.
author: Edward Moore

quote: Maybe the body learns from dreams. Maybe the muscles, the neutrons, revitalize.
author: Michael Zaslow

quote: I began my career with infantile dreams of becoming a composer.
author: Ivor Novello

quote: Talking, talking. Spinning a web of words, pale walls of dreams, between myself and all I see.
author: John Gardner

quote: I want to keep my dreams, even bad ones, because without them, I might have nothing all night long.
author: Joseph Heller

quote: Sexual dreams aren't usually about sex.
author: Pamela Stephenson

quote: My dreams are of water. And my nightmares.
author: Siouxsie Sioux

quote: You have to work hard for what you want to achieve and you have to set goals and dreams and really go for them.
author: Natalie du Toit

quote: My dreams were at once more fantastic and agreeable than my writings.
author: Mary Wollstonecraft Shelley

quote: My mother dreamed dreams for Joaquin and for me long before we could dream them for ourselves.
author: Julian Castro

quote: You've got to have a dream... if you don't have any big dreams, nothing happens.
author: Ian Rush

quote: When I grew up, I only had two dreams. One was to be a cowboy and another was to be in the military. I grew up extremely patriotic and riding horses.
author: Chris Kyle

quote: People's real hopes and dreams can be distorted and misdirected and packaged until you're not sure what you really want or what you even really need.
author: Tracy Chapman

quote: If our dreams were more regular, more connected, more stable, they would also have more practical importance for us.
author: Ernst Mach

quote: I want to still be singing at 70 years old. I want to be open to the dreams I haven't even dreamed up.
author: Fantasia Barrino

quote: Today I know that there is still work to be done, but along the way my I am achieving my dreams.
author: Candace Parker

quote: Believe in and follow your dreams.
author: Kristanna Loken

quote: The great function of poetry is to give back to us the situations of our dreams.
author: Gaston Bachelard

quote: I understand it's my role to realize people's dreams.
author: Ayumi Hamasaki

quote: I don't have dreams. How can I say it? I myself am a dream.
author: Ayumi Hamasaki

quote: I understand it's my role to realize people's dreams. I'm O.K. with that so long as my songs are my own. No one can take my songs away from me.
author: Ayumi Hamasaki

quote: It's not my job to dream your dreams. It's my job to make your dreams become a reality.
author: Blanche Lincoln

quote: When you're a young English person who wants to be an actress and you have dreams, you dream of being Vanessa Redgrave or Judi Dench.
author: Janet McTeer

quote: Don't let your dreams be dreams.
author: Jack Johnson

quote: My hero's, my dreams, and my future lie in Yankee Stadium and they can't take that from me.
author: Derek Jeter

quote: Ever since we were little, we were so on fire for our dreams. We never let anyone blow our flames out.
author: Kelly Rowland

quote: I really want to live in New York. That's the city of my dreams.
author: Joel Kinnaman

quote: Dreams can still come true; you need a great deal of energy and determination, and a little bit of luck.
author: Stefano Gabbana

quote: Happiness is making your dreams come true.
author: Jourdan Dunn

quote: Am I athletic? In my dreams.
author: Hugh Bonneville

quote: Seems like God don't see fit to give the black man nothing but dreams - but He did give us children to make them dreams seem worthwhile.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: I would like to see anyone be able to achieve their dreams, and that's what this organization does.
author: Sergey Brin

quote: The man who never dreams, goes slowly mad.
author: Thomas Dolby

quote: Never let your dreams go away.
author: Mike Piazza

quote: He's dreaming with his eyes open, and those that dream with their eyes open are dangerous, for they do not know when their dreams come to an end.
author: Hugo Pratt

quote: IN April 1882 my father died; and I was at once whirled out of my land of dreams into a very different sphere.
author: Edward Carpenter

quote: Though I know he loves me, tonight my heart is sad; his kiss was not so wonderful as all the dreams I had.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: There's a lot of blood, sweat, and guts between dreams and success.
author: Paul Bryant

quote: I was a great dreamer of day dreams.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: The worst thing you can do to a kid is tell them that their dreams are invalid.
author: Juliette Lewis

quote: Dreams have only the pigmentation of fact.
author: Djuna Barnes

quote: This may sound strange but I had dreams as a kid of doing exactly what I ended up doing in my life.
author: Corey Hart

quote: To be here today is just beyond my wildest dreams.
author: Rick Yune

quote: To see your friend's dreams come true, there's really nothing that can make you happier.
author: Josh Hopkins

quote: Dreams say what they mean, but they don't say it in daytime language.
author: Gail Godwin

quote: When you stop having dreams and ideals - well, you might as well stop altogether.
author: Marian Anderson

quote: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
author: Donovan Bailey

quote: It's surreal to know my dreams are coming true.
author: Mario Vazquez

quote: The Olympics is about letting people believe in their own dreams.
author: Kyle Shewfelt

quote: Dreams become reality when we put our minds to it.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: All books are either dreams or swords, you can cut, or you can drug, with words.
author: Amy Lowell

quote: No man's brain is so dull, and no man's eye so blind, that they cannot catch food for dreams.
author: Donald G. Mitchell

quote: I put a lot of faith in dreams. I know that big movie roles and opportunities are going to happen.
author: Krista Allen

quote: As far as my dreams go, all I want to do is be a working actor, and I happily achieved that.
author: Lucas Grabeel

quote: Women are not in love with me but with the picture of me on the screen. I am merely the canvas on which women paint their dreams.
author: Rudolph Valentino

quote: Let your dreams outgrow the shoes of your expectations.
author: Ryunosuke Satoro

quote: Men are the dreams of a shadow.
author: Pindar

quote: Here Fashion is a despot, and no one dreams of evading its dictates.
author: Marguerite Gardiner

quote: Hopes are but the dreams of those that wake.
author: Matthew Prior

quote: Jazz to me is a living music. It's a music that since its beginning has expressed the feelings, the dreams, hopes, of the people.
author: Dexter Gordon

quote: I just want to be myself and go for my own dreams and goals.
author: Natalie du Toit

quote: I don't remember my dreams. I'm one of those weird people. I know there are tricks and things you can do, but I never remember my dreams.
author: Jayma Mays

quote: Art is for entertainment purposes, but it's also to reflect our dreams, our hopes, the present, the future the past - whether it's good or bad.
author: Amber Valletta

quote: I had dreams, but I didn't have the sense that they would necessarily work out. They seemed very far-fetched.
author: Greta Gerwig

quote: Dreams can be like charades in which we act out words rather than see or speak them.
author: Jane Roberts

quote: Dream the impossible because dreams do come true.
author: Elijah Wood

quote: I can think of some things that would be fun, but I'm living my dreams.
author: Mike Farrell

quote: If you have a dream, just lie about it. Lie your way unto your dreams.
author: Joel McHale

quote: When you're a kid, you have these big ideas and these big dreams to make a change, or maybe you feel like you can't make a difference.
author: AnnaSophia Robb

quote: For even in dreams a good deed is not lost.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: I never felt I would be part of the international scene for 50 caps in my wildest dreams.
author: Kenny Cunningham

quote: Our fathers had their dreams; we have ours; the generation that follows will have its own. Without dreams and phantoms man cannot exist.
author: Olive Schreiner

quote: We didn't know how to run a business, but we had dreams and talent.
author: Ruth Handler

quote: They were using the dolls to project their dreams of their own futures as adult women.
author: Ruth Handler

quote: I look up to people who succeed in accomplishing their dreams.
author: Joanna Noelle Levesque

quote: Hollywood is the dream factory, and no one dreams about older women.
author: Amy Heckerling

quote: American dreams are strongest in the hearts of those who have seen America only in their dreams.
author: Pico Iyer

quote: Hollywood has always been a cage... a cage to catch our dreams.
author: John Huston

quote: I've succeeded beyond my wildest dreams - financially and the amount of fun I have in my life.
author: Phil Hartman

quote: People have to remain positive and believe in those dreams. It's really important.
author: Kirsty Coventry

quote: You've got to have dreams to keep you going.
author: Steve Waugh

quote: In my dreams I am not crippled. In my dreams, I dance.
author: Louise Brooks

quote: Hopefully kids will look at me and see that your dreams can come true.
author: Roy Keane

quote: Dreams have as much influence as actions.
author: Stephane Mallarme

quote: I've been blessed by doing classic plays on Broadway, which was one of my great dreams forever.
author: Michael Emerson

quote: We can bring to characters dark and bright sides that nobody even dreams about.
author: Sonia Braga

quote: Dreams grow holy put in action.
author: Adelaide Anne Procter

quote: It's not too late, I can still live my dreams.
author: Diana Nyad

quote: If you choose not to pursue your dreams, you'll still be a part of a dream - only it will be someone else's.
author: Mike Hawkins

quote: Every actor dreams of getting a big break, a big opportunity.
author: Liam McIntyre

quote: To provoke dreams of terror in the slumber of prosperity has become the moral duty of literature.
author: Ernst Fischer

quote: We don't have an eternity to realize our dreams, only the time we are here.
author: Susan Taylor

quote: Only in dreams, in poetry, in play do we sometimes arrive at what we were before we were this thing that, who knows, we are.
author: Julio Cortazar

quote: In my wildest dreams I never thought - well, I never thought I'd work.
author: Steve Carell

quote: The armored cars of dreams, contrived to let us do so many a dangerous thing.
author: Elizabeth Bishop

quote: Ground not upon dreams; you know they are ever contrary.
author: Thomas Middleton

quote: Books that distribute things... with as daring a freedom as we use in dreams, put us on our feet again.
author: Marsilio Ficino

quote: I adore this adventure, I adore working with youth. For me it's a daily challenge, working to help these youths realize their dreams.
author: Patrick Roy

quote: My mom taught me to go after my dreams. I have this faith in myself that I must have gotten from her.
author: Amy Jo Johnson

quote: America allows us to be able to dream, then gives us the ability to achieve those dreams.
author: Rick Mears

quote: Man is firmly convinced that he is awake; in reality he is caught in a net of sleep and dreams which he has unconsciously woven himself.
author: Gustave Meyrink

quote: Wide awake I can make my most fantastic dreams come true.
author: Lorenz Hart

quote: Let us keep the dance of rain our fathers kept and tread our dreams beneath the jungle sky.
author: Arna Bontemps

quote: You don't get old until you replace dreams with regrets.
author: Troy Dumais

quote: In our dreams we are always young.
author: Sarah Louise Delany

quote: But I am delighted to be a Dodger, I grew up a Dodger fan and now my dreams have really come true.
author: Milton Bradley

quote: War is eternity jammed into frantic minutes that will fill a lifetime with dreams and nightmares.
author: John Cory

quote: In my childhood, America was like a religion. Then, real-life Americans abruptly entered my life - in jeeps - and upset all my dreams.
author: Sergio Leone

quote: Tell me about yourself - your struggles, your dreams, your telephone number.
author: Peter Arno

quote: I'll see you in my dreams.
author: Gus Kahn

quote: When your dreams tire, they go underground and out of kindness that's where they stay.
author: Libby Houston

quote: We are selling dreams. We are merchants of happiness.
author: Bernard Loiseau

quote: If there were dreams to sell, what would you buy?
author: Thomas Lovell Beddoes

quote: There are no dreams too large, no innovation unimaginable and no frontiers beyond our reach.
author: John S. Herrington

quote: Be faithful in small things because it is in them that your strength lies.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Take the first step in faith. You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: All who call on God in true faith, earnestly from the heart, will certainly be heard, and will receive what they have asked and desired.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Before the throne of the Almighty, man will be judged not by his acts but by his intentions. For God alone reads our hearts.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Doubt is a pain too lonely to know that faith is his twin brother.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: When you focus on being a blessing, God makes sure that you are always blessed in abundance.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: Faith activates God - Fear activates the Enemy.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: God didn't make a mistake when He made you. You need to see yourself as God sees you.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: God will never give you anything you can't handle, so don't stress.
author: Kelly Clarkson

quote: Faith is a knowledge within the heart, beyond the reach of proof.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Faith consists in believing when it is beyond the power of reason to believe.
author: Voltaire

quote: If fear is cultivated it will become stronger, if faith is cultivated it will achieve mastery.
author: John Paul Jones

quote: Faith is to believe what you do not see; the reward of this faith is to see what you believe.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: A casual stroll through the lunatic asylum shows that faith does not prove anything.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: God, our Creator, has stored within our minds and personalities, great potential strength and ability. Prayer helps us tap and develop these powers.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: If patience is worth anything, it must endure to the end of time. And a living faith will last in the midst of the blackest storm.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Every tomorrow has two handles. We can take hold of it with the handle of anxiety or the handle of faith.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Faith and prayer are the vitamins of the soul; man cannot live in health without them.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: Faith: not wanting to know what is true.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Pray as though everything depended on God. Work as though everything depended on you.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: A faith is a necessity to a man. Woe to him who believes in nothing.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To one who has faith, no explanation is necessary. To one without faith, no explanation is possible.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: We are never defeated unless we give up on God.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: God always takes the simplest way.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: I gave in, and admitted that God was God.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: I am still far from being what I want to be, but with God's help I shall succeed.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Pray, and let God worry.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Faith is a living, daring confidence in God's grace, so sure and certain that a man could stake his life on it a thousand times.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Belief in a cruel God makes a cruel man.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Faith is not something to grasp, it is a state to grow into.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith is not belief without proof, but trust without reservation.
author: D. Elton Trueblood

quote: Now, God be praised, that to believing souls gives light in darkness, comfort in despair.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Faith has to do with things that are not seen and hope with things that are not at hand.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: We have one life; it soon will be past; what we do for God is all that will last.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Be a sinner and sin strongly, but more strongly have faith and rejoice in Christ.
author: Martin Luther

quote: In faith there is enough light for those who want to believe and enough shadows to blind those who don't.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Faithless is he that says farewell when the road darkens.
author: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: Faith and doubt both are needed - not as antagonists, but working side by side to take us around the unknown curve.
author: Lillian Smith

quote: Faith is deliberate confidence in the character of God whose ways you may not understand at the time.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: God enters by a private door into every individual.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you have God on your side, everything becomes clear.
author: Ayrton Senna

quote: Physical strength can never permanently withstand the impact of spiritual force.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Have faith in God; God has faith in you.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: We are twice armed if we fight with faith.
author: Plato

quote: God continues to work miracles in my life.
author: Willie Aames

quote: Put your nose into the Bible everyday. It is your spiritual food. And then share it. Make a vow not to be a lukewarm Christian.
author: Kirk Cameron

quote: I do respect people's faith, but I don't respect their manipulation of that faith in order to create fear and control.
author: Javier Bardem

quote: You were made by God and for God, and until you understand that, life will never make sense.
author: Rick Warren

quote: Faith indeed tells what the senses do not tell, but not the contrary of what they see. It is above them and not contrary to them.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Faith is a passionate intuition.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Our faith comes in moments; our vice is habitual.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: God never made a promise that was too good to be true.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: Faith means belief in something concerning which doubt is theoretically possible.
author: William James

quote: He wants you all to Himself to put His loving, divine arms around you.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: God... a being whose only definition is that he is beyond man's power to conceive.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: The faith that stands on authority is not faith.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I live and love in God's peculiar light.
author: Michelangelo

quote: A wise ruler ought never to keep faith when by doing so it would be against his interests.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: Keep the faith, don't lose your perseverance and always trust your gut extinct.
author: Paula Abdul

quote: Your faithfulness makes you trustworthy to God.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: To me faith means not worrying.
author: John Dewey

quote: In the affairs of this world, men are saved not by faith, but by the want of it.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Ultimately, blind faith is the only kind.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: I hold that religion and faith are two different things.
author: Pat Buckley

quote: Faith is the very first thing you should pack in a hope chest.
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quote: Reason is our soul's left hand, faith her right.
author: John Donne

quote: Worry is spiritual short sight. Its cure is intelligent faith.
author: Paul Brunton

quote: We can no more do without spirituality than we can do without food, shelter, or clothing.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: What does God the Father look like? Although I've never seen Him, I believe - as with the Holy Spirit - He looks like Jesus looked on earth.
author: Benny Hinn

quote: Faith is spiritualized imagination.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: The power of faith will often shine forth the most when the character is naturally weak.
author: Augustus Hare

quote: Keep your faith in God, but keep your powder dry.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Faith, to my mind, is a stiffening process, a sort of mental starch.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Love, hope, fear, faith - these make humanity; These are its sign and note and character.
author: Robert Browning

quote: I seek a deeper truth, but I don't think I have to go to a building designated for worship to find it.
author: Ted Lange

quote: The only faith that wears well and holds its color in all weathers is that which is woven of conviction and set with the sharp mordant of experience.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: I die the king's faithful servant, but God's first.
author: Thomas More

quote: It is truer to say that martyrs create faith more than faith creates martyrs.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: We are a long time in learning that all our strength and salvation is in God.
author: David Brainerd

quote: My reason nourishes my faith and my faith my reason.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Knowledge is only one half. Faith is the other.
author: Novalis

quote: Faith is reason grown courageous.
author: Sherwood Eddy

quote: Only faith is sufficient.
author: Robert Ley

quote: No matter how old we become, we can still call them 'Holy Mother' and 'Father' and put a child-like trust in them.
author: Desmond Morris

quote: Vision looks upward and becomes faith.
author: Stephen Samuel Wise

quote: Faith is not contrary to reason.
author: Sherwood Eddy

quote: I think the greatest taboos in America are faith and failure.
author: Michael Malone

quote: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Always be yourself, express yourself, have faith in yourself, do not go out and look for a successful personality and duplicate it.
author: Bruce Lee

quote: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
author: Helen Keller

quote: You must not lose faith in humanity. Humanity is an ocean; if a few drops of the ocean are dirty, the ocean does not become dirty.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith makes all things possible... love makes all things easy.
author: Dwight L. Moody

quote: The foundation stones for a balanced success are honesty, character, integrity, faith, love and loyalty.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: A small body of determined spirits fired by an unquenchable faith in their mission can alter the course of history.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If you have a particular faith or religion, that is good. But you can survive without it.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Faith is an oasis in the heart which will never be reached by the caravan of thinking.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It's lack of faith that makes people afraid of meeting challenges, and I believed in myself.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Believe in yourself, and the rest will fall into place. Have faith in your own abilities, work hard, and there is nothing you cannot accomplish.
author: Brad Henry

quote: I have great faith in fools; self-confidence my friends call it.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: There is nothing that wastes the body like worry, and one who has any faith in God should be ashamed to worry about anything whatsoever.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Liberty cannot be established without morality, nor morality without faith.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Back of every creation, supporting it like an arch, is faith. Enthusiasm is nothing: it comes and goes. But if one believes, then miracles occur.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Faith is love taking the form of aspiration.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: I forbid you, agnostic, doubting thoughts, to destroy the house of my faith.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Observe good faith and justice toward all nations. Cultivate peace and harmony with all.
author: George Washington

quote: Forgiveness is like faith. You have to keep reviving it.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Sometimes life hits you in the head with a brick. Don't lose faith.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Faith... must be enforced by reason... when faith becomes blind it dies.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Faith, mighty faith, the promise sees, And looks to God alone; Laughs at impossibilities, And cries it shall be done.
author: Charles Wesley

quote: Darkness cannot drive out darkness; only light can do that. Hate cannot drive out hate; only love can do that.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Lets have faith that right makes might; and in that faith let us, to the end, dare to do our duty as we understand it.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Forgive your enemies, but never forget their names.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I slept with faith and found a corpse in my arms on awakening; I drank and danced all night with doubt and found her a virgin in the morning.
author: Aleister Crowley

quote: Faith means living with uncertainty - feeling your way through life, letting your heart guide you like a lantern in the dark.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Always forgive your enemies - nothing annoys them so much.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
author: Mark Twain

quote: You will know that forgiveness has begun when you recall those who hurt you and feel the power to wish them well.
author: Lewis B. Smedes

quote: No human race is superior; no religious faith is inferior. All collective judgments are wrong. Only racists make them.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Never forget the three powerful resources you always have available to you: love, prayer, and forgiveness.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Faith must trample under foot all reason, sense, and understanding.
author: Martin Luther

quote: He that cannot forgive others breaks the bridge over which he must pass himself; for every man has need to be forgiven.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: To Follow by faith alone is to follow blindly.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Forgiveness is a virtue of the brave.
author: Indira Gandhi

quote: Faith is the first factor in a life devoted to service. Without it, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: For love would be love of the wrong thing; there is yet faith, But the faith and the love and the hope are all in the waiting.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Faith is the highest passion in a human being. Many in every generation may not come that far, but none comes further.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Forgiveness is the final form of love.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: The smallest seed of faith is better than the largest fruit of happiness.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: To err is human; to forgive, divine.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Faith, there hath been many great men that have flattered the people who ne'er loved them.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: People can be more forgiving than you can imagine. But you have to forgive yourself. Let go of what's bitter and move on.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Love, like a chicken salad or restaurant hash, must be taken with blind faith or it loses its flavor.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: A mistake is always forgivable, rarely excusable and always unacceptable.
author: Robert Fripp

quote: Faith is the sense of life, that sense by virtue of which man does not destroy himself, but continues to live on. It is the force whereby we live.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Forgotten is forgiven.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Choose your friends with caution; plan your future with purpose, and frame your life with faith.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
author: Lewis B. Smedes

quote: The meme for blind faith secures its own perpetuation by the simple unconscious expedient of discouraging rational inquiry.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: Forgiveness means letting go of the past.
author: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: The way to see by Faith is to shut the Eye of Reason.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Forgiveness is the remission of sins. For it is by this that what has been lost, and was found, is saved from being lost again.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Politics is an act of faith; you have to show some kind of confidence in the intellectual and moral capacity of the public.
author: George McGovern

quote: Forgiveness is the answer to the child's dream of a miracle by which what is broken is made whole again, what is soiled is made clean again.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Faith moves mountains, but you have to keep pushing while you are praying.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Forgiveness is a gift you give yourself.
author: Suzanne Somers

quote: No lover, if he be of good faith, and sincere, will deny he would prefer to see his mistress dead than unfaithful.
author: Marquis de Sade

quote: Forgiveness is a funny thing. It warms the heart and cools the sting.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: Faith is much better than belief. Belief is when someone else does the thinking.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: There is no love without forgiveness, and there is no forgiveness without love.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: But for my faith in God, I should have been a raving maniac.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: One forgives to the degree that one loves.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: It is easier to forgive an enemy than to forgive a friend.
author: William Blake

quote: Forgive yourself for your faults and your mistakes and move on.

quote: Faith keeps many doubts in her pay. If I could not doubt, I should not believe.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Thank you, God, for this good life and forgive us if we do not love it enough.

quote: The practice of forgiveness is our most important contribution to the healing of the world.

quote: Nonviolence is the first article of my faith. It is also the last article of my creed.

quote: When women love us, they forgive us everything, even our crimes; when they do not love us, they give us credit for nothing, not even our virtues.

quote: Man has two great spiritual needs. One is for forgiveness. The other is for goodness.

quote: Once a woman has forgiven her man, she must not reheat his sins for breakfast.

quote: It takes one person to forgive, it takes two people to be reunited.

quote: Talk unbelief, and you will have unbelief; but talk faith, and you will have faith. According to the seed sown will be the harvest.

quote: Bad faith likes discourse on friendship and loyalty.

quote: Without forgiveness, there's no future.

quote: There is no revenge so complete as forgiveness.

quote: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.

quote: Blind faith in your leaders, or in anything, will get you killed.

quote: Humanity is never so beautiful as when praying for forgiveness, or else forgiving another.

quote: Amidst the confusion of the times, the conflicts of conscience, and the turmoil of daily living, an abiding faith becomes an anchor to our lives.

quote: God will forgive me. It's his job.

quote: Forgive many things in others; nothing in yourself.

quote: The public is wonderfully tolerant. It forgives everything except genius.

quote: How unhappy is he who cannot forgive himself.

quote: A better world shall emerge based on faith and understanding.

quote: Only he can take great resolves who has indomitable faith in God and has fear of God.

quote: If there is something to pardon in everything, there is also something to condemn.

quote: Non-violence requires a double faith, faith in God and also faith in man.
