quote: I do not bring forgiveness with me, nor forgetfulness. The only ones who can forgive are dead; the living have no right to forget.

quote: The ability to forgive is one of man's greatest achievements.

quote: My faith helps me overcome such negative emotions and find my equilibrium.

quote: Life is an adventure in forgiveness.

quote: It is very east to forgive others their mistakes; it takes more grit and gumption to forgive them for having witnessed your own.

quote: Non-violence is the article of faith.

quote: Intolerance betrays want of faith in one's cause.

quote: The ineffable joy of forgiving and being forgiven forms an ecstasy that might well arouse the envy of the gods.

quote: Do I think faith will be an important part of being a good president? Yes, I do.

quote: My desire is to be a forgiving, non-judgmental person.

quote: Forgive, son; men are men; they needs must err.

quote: To understand is to forgive, even oneself.

quote: To be social is to be forgiving.

quote: Forgiveness is the giving, and so the receiving, of life.

quote: It's said in Hollywood that you should always forgive your enemies - because you never know when you'll have to work with them.

quote: It is often easier to ask for forgiveness than to ask for permission.

quote: There is nothing wrong with America that faith, love of freedom, intelligence, and energy of her citizens cannot cure.

quote: It's far easier to forgive an enemy after you've got even with him.

quote: Faith in a holy cause is to a considerable extent a substitute for lost faith in ourselves.

quote: If you have no faith, you've lost your battle.

quote: There lives more faith in honest doubt, believe me, than in half the creeds.

quote: Love is an act of endless forgiveness, a tender look which becomes a habit.

quote: A library implies an act of faith.

quote: Faith is not believing that God can. It is knowing that God will.

quote: Forgiveness says you are given another chance to make a new beginning.

quote: That willing suspension of disbelief for the moment, which constitutes poetic faith.

quote: Forgiveness is an act of the will, and the will can function regardless of the temperature of the heart.

quote: The glory of Christianity is to conquer by forgiveness.

quote: To be an atheist requires an indefinitely greater measure of faith than to recieve all the great truths which atheism would deny.

quote: I believe in the forgiveness of sin and the redemption of ignorance.

quote: With faith, discipline and selfless devotion to duty, there is nothing worthwhile that you cannot achieve.

quote: Forgiveness is God's command.

quote: Faith never makes a confession.

quote: Forgiveness to the injured does belong; but they ne'er pardon who have done wrong.

quote: Faith is a state of openness or trust.

quote: You know, my faith is one that admits some doubt.

quote: Life is a battle between faith and reason in which each feeds upon the other, drawing sustenance from it and destroying it.

quote: There is greatness in the fear of God, contentment in faith of God, and honour in humility.

quote: Faith may be defined briefly as an illogical belief in the occurrence of the improbable.

quote: Faith is an aptitude of the spirit. It is, in fact, a talent: you must be born with it.

quote: An Adult faith does not follow the waves of fashion and the latest novelties.

quote: When prayer removes distrust and doubt and enters the field of mental certainty, it becomes faith; and the universe is built on faith.

quote: Faith begins where Reason sinks exhausted.

quote: Faith - you can do very little with it, but you can do nothing without it.

quote: Faith crosses every border and touches every heart in every nation.

quote: Fear clogs; faith liberates.

quote: I don't have faith in young people any more. I don't waste time trying to communicate with them.

quote: Every life is a profession of faith, and exercises an inevitable and silent influence.

quote: There's a loss of faith in the banking system that for so long has been the backbone of prosperity and growth.

quote: I've lost my faith in science.

quote: I'm about as big a star as the Baha'i faith has got, which is pretty pathetic.

quote: Faith, culture, structure and guidance are good things.

quote: The Bible is our rule of faith and doctrine.

quote: Faith is an act of a finite being who is grasped by, and turned to, the infinite.

quote: Human misery is too great for men to do without faith.

quote: I have faith in the United States and our ability to make good decisions based on the facts.
author: Al Gore

quote: I'd be lying if I said I had confidence in every choice I've made, that I have faith in every film I do on every shot.

quote: The abuse of faith has to be resisted precisely.

quote: A mission is a place where you ask nonbelievers to come and find faith and hope and feel love.

quote: The principle part of faith is patience.

quote: We got on his label, and the Bizarre organization is just going up and up. So we have faith.

quote: Faith is the confidence, the assurance, the enforcing truth, the knowing.

quote: I just can't say enough about the actors having faith and trust in the writers and the writers having faith and trust in the actors.

quote: The past is a source of knowledge, and the future is a source of hope. Love of the past implies faith in the future.

quote: All of my children are ideologically and politically in sync with me, they all have authentic Christian faith. It's something I'm very grateful for.
author: Mike Huckabee

quote: I have great faith in the intelligence of the American viewer and reader to put two and two together and come up with four.

quote: The saddest thing that befalls a soul Is when it loses faith in God and woman.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: First, I prepare. Then I have faith.

quote: I had faith in the concept and the theory that all Americans are endowed with the right to a fair trial and I would be fairly judged and fairly tried.

quote: Well, I think that Catholicism's basic foundation of faith is personal conscience. I think it's between you and God, not you and the Church.

quote: I try to act out of faith.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Not truth, but faith, it is that keeps the world alive.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: I don't have too much faith in destiny, or an afterlife. This is it.
author: Robin Gibb

quote: Faith in God's revelation has nothing to do with an ideology which glorifies the status quo.
author: Karl Barth

quote: It's a war of attrition. If you have patience and a modicum of faith in yourself your chances are not too bad.
author: Julie Bowen

quote: It's OK to be outspoken about your faith.
author: Tim Tebow

quote: Life is only a long and bitter suicide, and faith alone can transform this suicide into a sacrifice.
author: Franz Liszt

quote: Laughter kills fear, and without fear there can be no faith. For without fear of the devil there is no need for God.

quote: When did we begin to lose faith in our ability to effect change?
author: Wynton Marsalis

quote: Catholicism played such a huge part in my life, I would not have survived without my faith.
author: Samantha Morton

quote: My faith doesn't go over real well in Hollywood.
author: Jim Caviezel

quote: As a world view, Darwinism cannot of course be refuted, since Faith is, always has been, and always will be, stronger than facts.
author: Francis Parker Yockey

quote: To study history means submitting to chaos and nevertheless retaining faith in order and meaning.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: I have my work and my faith... If that's boring to some people, I can't tell you how much I don't care.
author: Madonna Ciccone

quote: A large psychic void is left by a loss of faith. So many Catholics have tried so many things to replace it.
author: Phil Donahue

quote: For both faith and want of faith have destroyed men alike.
author: Hesiod

quote: Stand straight, walk proud, have a little faith.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: Let God be true but every man a liar is the language of true faith.
author: Aiden Wilson Tozer

quote: They are the weakest, however strong, who have no faith in themselves or their own powers.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: Intelligence must follow faith, never precede it, and never destroy it.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Look, I think Hispanic community - the values that resonate in our community are fundamentally conservative. They are faith, family and patriotism.

quote: The media seems to think only abortion and gay marriage are religious issues. Poverty is a moral issue, it's a faith issue, it's a religious issue.
author: Jim Wallis

quote: The Pledge of Allegiance reflects the truth that faith in God has played a significant role in America since the days of the founding of our country.
author: Randy Neugebauer

quote: What makes community organizing especially attractive is the faith it places in the ability of the poor to make decisions for themselves.
author: Paul Wellstone

quote: The enemies of the Christian religion and the Law of God confuse law with faith.
author: Randall Terry

quote: I'm just glad that my community has faith and confidence in me.
author: Charles Rangel

quote: In a democracy, dissent is an act of faith.
author: J. William Fulbright

quote: Without faith, nothing is possible. With it, nothing is impossible.
author: Mary McLeod Bethune

quote: The greatest act of faith is when a man understands he is not God.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: The great act of faith is when a man decides he is not God.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I still have all the faith and love for my music and yet I'm still playing places for kids.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: I'm on the board of a national group called Faith in America. It's designed to fight religious-based bigotry.
author: James McGreevey

quote: No relief was forthcoming from my then-Catholic faith, which said the practice of homosexuality was a 'mortal sin' subject to damnation.
author: James McGreevey

quote: We may not only find faith in God in our sorrow. We may also become faithful to Him in times of calm.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Through history, people look for something spiritual. The greatest scientists in the world were men of religion and faith, too.
author: Kirstie Alley

quote: I love Canada. It's a wonderful political act of faith that exists atop a breathtakingly beautiful land.
author: Yann Martel

quote: Fanatics do not have faith - they have belief. With faith you let go. You trust. Whereas with belief you cling.
author: Yann Martel

quote: I was brought up the Mexican way, where actors are paid very little and every part you take is an act of faith. If people respect that, then great.
author: Gael Garcia Bernal

quote: Most atheists bristle at the thought that atheism has anything to do with faith, but not Penn Jillette.
author: Ray Comfort

quote: If I want to understand the laws of physics I have to first believe what I read about physics. I have to have faith in what I read.
author: Ray Comfort

quote: I have faith in the jury system.
author: Nancy Grace

quote: That is the definition of faith - acceptance of that which we imagine to be true, that which we cannot prove.
author: Dan Brown

quote: Have faith in your own thoughts.
author: Brooke Shields

quote: I just have faith. It's just there. It's not any big deal.
author: Ernie Harwell

quote: I have a great faith in God and Jesus.
author: Ernie Harwell

quote: Don't be confused that my interest in religion, faith, and spirituality is driven by any sense of faith or spirituality of my own.
author: Peter Jennings

quote: I am sensitive to the value of faith and religion and spirituality in people's lives because I'm a journalist.
author: Peter Jennings

quote: Man doesn't dictate what you do or how you do it. If you believe in God, believe in God; have your faith in him. That's where my faith lies.
author: Ray Lewis

quote: Your faith in yourself is all you will ever have. Don't let anyone take it away from you, ever.
author: Holly Marie Combs

quote: I think the Moslem faith teaches hate.
author: Jerry Falwell

quote: We receive by faith and we keep it by faith.
author: Benny Hinn

quote: Resist your fear; fear will never lead to you a positive end. Go for your faith and what you believe.

quote: I think that my preaching style and many of my ideas and ideals about faith are based in both Pentecostal and Baptist background.
author: T. D. Jakes

quote: These are strange times. Reason, which once combatted faith and seemed to have conquered it, now has to look to faith to save it from dissolution.
author: Johan Huizinga

quote: I haven't lost faith in human nature and I haven't decided to be less compassionate to strangers.

quote: When the truth is that there would be no great Western music, and certainly no decent choral repertoire, without the Catholic faith.
author: Richard Morris

quote: I come from a Christian faith. I am not going to give you insight into my particular beliefs.
author: Patricia Ireland

quote: Of course, bad marriages are so pervasive that they have invaded the faith community too.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: Hollywood is a suction for your confidence or your faith or your togetherness. Just walking on the street you can feel it.
author: Robin Wright Penn

quote: Ann Romney makes all women proud by the way she has conducted her life as a strong woman of faith, as a mother, as a wife and as a true patriot.

quote: The unutterable violence of the Holocaust shook our confidence in the possibility of telling any story of faith at all.
author: Timothy Radcliffe

quote: Act strenuously, would appear to be our faith, and right thinking will take care of itself.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: The democratic idealist is prone to make light of the whole question of standards and leadership because of his unbounded faith in the plain people.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: Democrats are people who raise your taxes and spend your money on weird stuff. They steal your guns, and they spit on your faith.
author: Grover Norquist

quote: I have faith in the market when we get the rules right.
author: Kenneth Lay

quote: My faith is the grand drama of my life. I'm a believer, so I sing words of God to those who have no faith.
author: Olivier Messiaen

quote: Comedy is an escape, not from truth but from despair; a narrow escape into faith.
author: Christopher Fry

quote: No one else in our family was a professional musician so this took an enormous leap of faith on their part.
author: Tony Visconti

quote: Faith is the black person's federal reserve system.
author: Hattie McDaniel

quote: If you went to your closet today, would you pull out the same outfit you wore 10 or 15 years ago? You wear feelings and faith differently as well.

quote: I think the Hispanic community, the values that resonate in our community, are fundamentally conservative. They are faith, family, patriotism.

quote: I have faith in the justice system, and what will happen will happen. I'm just trying to do the right thing.
author: Tracey Gold

quote: Faith is not a sense, nor sight, nor reason, but taking God at His work.
author: Faith Evans

quote: My daddy, Rev. A. D. King, my granddaddy, Martin Luther King, Senior - we are a family of faith, hope and love.

quote: In Christ the original image of God is restored, by faith in this world and by sight in the world to come.
author: Walter Lang

quote: I do not purpose to discuss faith in its dogmatic sense today.
author: Matthew Simpson

quote: We know the past and its great events, the present in its multitudinous complications, chiefly through faith in the testimony of others.
author: Matthew Simpson

quote: If, then, knowledge be power, how much more power to we gain through the agency of faith, and what elevation must it give to human character.
author: Matthew Simpson

quote: If, then, faith widens the connections, it elevates the man.
author: Matthew Simpson

quote: Human societies, like human beings, live by faith and die when faith dies.
author: Whittaker Chambers

quote: I want people to just to see, all you got to do is have a little faith.
author: Fantasia Barrino

quote: Once you're successful with a certain kind of music, it's hard not to have faith in it as a means to stay successful.

quote: The Afghans did not have sophisticated weapons like the Soviets did, but with their faith they defeated a superpower.

quote: If you desire faith, then you have faith enough.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Is a faith without action a sincere faith?

quote: Our religion does not discriminate according to color, sex or anything else. What counts is piety and faith.
author: King Hussein I

quote: I have faith in faith. God is there, whether we have faith or not, so why not have faith in him?

quote: Everyone should have a moment with Ron Howard in their life to give you faith in our industry.
author: Sally Kirkland

quote: American government was founded on a belief and a faith in God and in doing what is right and just.
author: Ginny Brown-Waite

quote: I suppose I should say that I treasure blasphemy, as a faith of the highest order.
author: Rick Moody

quote: I believe in faith, family and country. I really keep it that simple.

quote: That bedrock faith that I could write was what blinded me to attempts to discourage me.
author: Lynn Abbey

quote: The ultimate ground of faith and knowledge is confidence in God.
author: Charles Hodge

quote: I haven't chosen to make an issue of faith.
author: Peter Garrett

quote: I walked along that slippery slope where if you fail through lack of faith, you sell your soul to the devil.

quote: Faith is a kind of winged intellect. The great workmen of history have been men who believed like giants.
author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quote: You can judge the quality of their faith from the way they behave. Discipline is an index to doctrine.

quote: Faith is never identical with piety.
author: Karl Barth

quote: If solace is any sort of succor to someone, that is sufficient. I believe in the faith of people, whatever faith they may have.
author: Studs Terkel

quote: The faith I was born into formed me.
author: Huston Smith

quote: I have a lot of faith in people.
author: John Lithgow

quote: The substance of faith is a hope in the unseen.
author: Ron Suskind

quote: True faith is belief in the reality of absolute values.
author: William Ralph Inge

quote: The only thing that stands between a man and what he wants from life is often merely the will to try it and the faith to believe that it is possible.

quote: At the time I perceived most religious men, particularly the pastors with all their talk about love, faith and relationship, as effeminate.
author: Luke Ford

quote: For more than three thousand years men have quarreled concerning the formulas of their faith.
author: Felix Adler

quote: Bereavement is the sharpest challenge to our trust in God; if faith can overcome this, there is no mountain which it cannot remove.

quote: All faith consists essentially in the recognition of a world of spiritual values behind, yet not apart from, the world of natural phenomena.
author: Dean Inge

quote: The independence of the economic sphere was a tenet of faith with Liberalism.
author: Francis Parker Yockey

quote: I think the American people, understandably, have sort of lost faith in the United Nations.

quote: Through these adversities, Israel has endured with continued strength, conviction, and faith.
author: Jerry Costello

quote: Men who accomplish great things in the industrial world are the ones who have faith in the money producing power of ideas.
author: Charles Fillmore

quote: I see heaven's glories shine and faith shines equal.

quote: There are more people living in Lower Manhattan now than before the terrorist attacks. That's faith for you. There's such a strong spirit here.

quote: I'm not Candide, nor Dr Pangloss, but we know that faith moves mountains.
author: Daniel Libeskind

quote: Of course, Americans have no monopoly of patriotic enthusiasm and good faith.

quote: I think the issue of clergy sexual abuse sparked people to look at their faith in a different way.

quote: We are the meeting place, an entity that's trying to connect faith and culture.
author: William P. Leahy

quote: My faith always has been and always will be important to me.
author: Aretha Franklin

quote: I would not attack the faith of a heathen without being sure I had a better one to put in its place.

quote: I believe that my own Christian faith does indeed make universal claims.
author: Timothy Radcliffe

quote: I don't worry about being in a hurry any more, because my faith in God will always deliver me on time.

quote: If faith is your motivation, share that.
author: Tim Kaine

quote: It comes with faith, for with complete faith there is no fear of what faces you in life or death.
author: Jacqueline Cochran

quote: As a Christian, there is no other part of the New Right ideology that concerns me more than its self-serving misuse of religious faith.

quote: Faith is the state of being ultimately concerned.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: Men of Virginia, countrymen of Washington, of Patrick Henry, of Jefferson, and of Madison, will ye be true to your constitutional faith?
author: Caleb Cushing

quote: Justifying faith is not a naked assent to the truths of the gospel.
author: William Gurnall

quote: Godliness, as well as the doctrine of our faith, is a mystery.
author: William Gurnall

quote: I would never have gone anywhere if it hadn't been for Mother's faith and support.
author: Patsy Cline

quote: All the faith and good will in the world is wasted without direction.
author: Bill Owens

quote: The enemy is not Islam, the great world faith, but a perversion of Islam.
author: John Cornyn

quote: I always wanted to be honest with myself and to those who have had faith in me.
author: Rafael Nadal

quote: The essential element in personal magnetism is a consuming sincerity - an overwhelming faith in the importance of the work one has to do.

quote: The investigator should have a robust faith - and yet not believe.
author: Claude Bernard

quote: Are you gonna fuel your faith or fuel your fear? I'm all about fueling my faith, especially when it's hard to do so.

quote: I want our government to encourage and protect freedom as well as our traditions of faith and family.
author: Jesse Helms

quote: Bush's faith in the rightness of his strategy in the broader war is deep-seated. It is a product of faith.
author: Rich Lowry

quote: My faith has no bed to sleep upon but omnipotence.

quote: I'm often asked what I think about the faith of the President George W. Bush. I think it is sincere. I think it's very real. I think it's deeply held.

quote: So when the only domestic social policy is tax cuts that mostly benefit the wealthiest Americans, we say, 'Where is faith being put into action here?'
author: Jim Wallis

quote: In the third century after Christ the faith continued to spread.
author: Kenneth Scott Latourette

quote: I still have great faith in what is good and right in all of us.
author: Marvin Hamlisch

quote: Christ does not save us by acting a parable of divine love; he acts the parable of divine love by saving us. That is the Christian faith.

quote: It is not reason which makes faith hard, but life.
author: Jean Ingelow

quote: To believe only possibilities is not faith, but mere philosophy.
author: Thomas Browne

quote: As reason is a rebel to faith, so passion is a rebel to reason.
author: Thomas Browne

quote: Have a little faith. Don't give up.
author: Fantasia Barrino

quote: The great thing is that whether we have faith or not, we are by and large very tolerant of people, whatever their particular view.

quote: Faith, sir, we are here today, and gone tomorrow.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: Bobby had faith in my ability as a singer.
author: Julie London

quote: Faith gives you an inner strength and a sense of balance and perspective in life.
author: Gregory Peck

quote: While your life is the true expression of your faith, whom can you fear?
author: Julia Ward Howe

quote: Downtown, one has less time. But there are in Europe much people who have the faith, in South America, too.
author: Yannick Noah

quote: Creativity is always a leap of faith. You're faced with a blank page, blank easel, or an empty stage.
author: Julia Cameron

quote: Voters must have faith in the electoral process for our democracy to succeed.
author: Blanche Lincoln

quote: I think that for some people faith is good - they have something to draw to.
author: Aaron Paul

quote: Faith is the heroism of the intellect.
author: Charles Henry Parkhurst

quote: After 'Four Feathers,' I quit then because I just lost faith. I didn't like how the business was.
author: Wes Bentley

quote: Know why you believe, understand what you believe, and possess a reason for the faith that is in you.
author: Francis Wright

quote: Great feelings will often take the aspect of error, and great faith the aspect of illusion.
author: Robert Burton

quote: I think there is a great deal of interest still in the Christian faith.
author: Rowan Williams

quote: If you cast your bread upon the water and you have faith, you'll get back cash. If you don't have faith, you'll get soggy bread.
author: Don King

quote: Faith means intense, usually confident, belief that is not based on evidence sufficient to command assent from every reasonable person.

quote: The process of philosophic and scientific enlightenment has shaken the stability of beliefs held explicitly as articles of faith.
author: Michael Polanyi

quote: Millions of Americans find community, comfort and support in their faith.
author: Sheila Jackson Lee

quote: It's okay to have faith in something that you can't see or touch.
author: Chad Kroeger

quote: I desire an special interest in your prayers that my faith fail not in the day of adversity.
author: John Hawley

quote: Faith is not a thing which one "loses," we merely cease to shape our lives by it.
author: Georges Bernanos

quote: Let those who, still in their youth, have preserved their faith and fullness of hope, keep looking up.
author: George A. Smith

quote: God's got something for me. I have faith it'll be OK.
author: Chubby Checker

quote: It would make life much easier if I could have total faith and not question everything all the time, but I can't do it and I won't do it.
