quote: I believe that today's players who are Christians feel that it's important and their responsibility to acknowledge their faith.
author: Lynn Swann

quote: Skepticism, riddling the faith of yesterday, prepared the way for the faith of tomorrow.
author: Romain Rolland

quote: The orthodox Jewish faith practically excludes woman from religious life.
author: Abraham Cahan

quote: I have learned that track doesn't define me. My faith defines me. I'm running because I have been blessed with a gift.
author: Allyson Felix

quote: I have learned to have more faith in the scientist than he does in himself.
author: David Sarnoff

quote: Buddhism has a very beautiful teaching that says the worst thing you can do to your soul is to tell someone their faith is wrong.
author: Ricky Martin

quote: I've always had great faith in people.
author: Wayne Newton

quote: I've always had great faith in the Man Upstairs.
author: Wayne Newton

quote: I don't accept as an article of faith that lots of short-term stimulus boosts the economy and gets us back on the long-term trajectory.
author: Glenn Hubbard

quote: I ultimately have faith though, that good films will find their audience.
author: Joshua Leonard

quote: Seeds of faith are always within us; sometimes it takes a crisis to nourish and encourage their growth.
author: Susan Taylor

quote: Humor has always been important to me. If there is a shield of faith that you can keep up against difficulties, humor is the Teflon coating.
author: Laurel Lee

quote: When you have put all your faith in man and continue to be disappointed, don't you hope there is something out of there that is not of human element?
author: Natalie Cole

quote: Faith is the response to something which is calling us from the timeless part of our reality.
author: Sydney Carter

quote: Our faith in the present dies out long before our faith in the future.
author: Ruth Benedict

quote: When a person is determined to believe something, the very absurdity of the doctrine confirms them in their faith.
author: Junius

quote: Faith is like a kernel of wheat.
author: Joe Bob Briggs

quote: The only force that can overcome an idea and a faith is another and better idea and faith, positively and fearlessly upheld.
author: Dorothy Thompson

quote: I am struck by the fact that personal faith and political agendas are intertwined more closely now than at any other time in recent history.
author: David E. Price

quote: Personal faith can be a powerful force for public good.
author: David E. Price

quote: The only thing an artist has to remember is to never lose faith in his vision.
author: James Lee Burke

quote: He was of the faith chiefly in the sense that the church he currently did not attend was Catholic.
author: Kingsley Amis

quote: Faith is building on what you know is here, so you can reach what you know is there.
author: Cullen Hightower

quote: The faith must express itself in charity and in solidarity, which is the civil form of charity.
author: Claudio Hummes

quote: You can be a virtuous person without faith in God.
author: Bill Bennett

quote: Jesus isn't a logo, I'm not promoting some company, some brand. I'm just professing my faith.
author: Stephen Baldwin

quote: I want to be remembered as the person who helped us restore faith in ourselves.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: To believe Christ's cross to be a friend, as he himself is a friend, is also a special act of faith.
author: Samuel Rutherford

quote: A quick example of that is a woman who said she'd been healed of throat cancer where the faith healer admitted he touched her on the forehead.
author: James Randi

quote: I have great faith in the jury system.
author: Judge Mills Lane

quote: We will grieve not, rather find strength in what remains behind. In the faith that looks through death, in years that bring the philosophic mind.
author: John Bacon

quote: Obedience is the fruit of faith.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: I am convinced we shall succeed. I have faith in this country, because I have faith in its people.
author: Horst Koehler

quote: You know, this is a war of ideology, a war of thoughts and of faith. And we need people to really stand for faith and trust, not hope and change.
author: Sharron Angle

quote: Pray for intestinal fortitude, work hard, and keep the faith. Oh, and pray for good luck, you're gonna need it.
author: Jerry Reed

quote: I wrap my heart in yours, placing divulged faith in the whole of your being, wistfully awaiting the trumpet you return.
author: Isabel Yosito

quote: Well, the research into it affected me. And the novel, it very much strengthened my faith.
author: William Peter Blatty

quote: Faith is a higher faculty than reason.
author: H. C. Bailey

quote: Because of my faith and my imagination, I was able to enjoy my childhood, even though it was tough.
author: Donna Brazile

quote: As an actor, you usually live your life with faith.
author: Molly Parker

quote: Faith is a continuation of reason.
author: William Adams

quote: Faith is not trying to believe something regardless of the evidence. Faith is daring to do something regardless of the consequences.
author: Sherwood Eddy

quote: Faith is not belief. Belief is passive. Faith is active.
author: Edith Hamilton

quote: Faith is believing in things when common sense tells you not to.
author: George Seaton

quote: In the first place, our faith ought to lay hold on Christ as God and man in that nature by which He has been made our neighbor, kinsman, and brother.
author: Martin Chemnitz

quote: Faith given back to us after a night of doubt is a stronger thing, and far more valuable to us than faith that has never been tested.
author: Elizabeth Goudge

quote: Today a new faith is stirring: the myth of blood, the faith that along with blood we are defending the divine nature of man as a whole.
author: Alfred Rosenberg

quote: The principal end both of my father and of myself in the conquest of India... has been the propagation of the holy Catholic faith.
author: Ignatius Loyola

quote: I must have had faith that day. When I went out, I was Henry Fonda again. An unemployed actor but a man.
author: Henry Fonda

quote: I have faith in my imperfections!
author: Dana Delany

quote: Put your faith in God and confidence in yourself.
author: Alberta Hunter

quote: Losing faith in your own singularity is the start of wisdom, I suppose; also the first announcement of death.
author: Peter Conrad

quote: Inflexible in faith, invincible in arms.
author: James Beattie

quote: Why should any man have power over any other man's faith, seeing Christ Himself is the author of it?
author: George Fox

quote: I believe though I do not comprehend, and I hold by faith what I cannot grasp with the mind.
author: Saint Bernard

quote: His faith perhaps in some nice tenets might be wrong; his life, I'm sure, was always in the right.
author: Abraham Cowley

quote: Every great discovery I ever made, I gambled that the truth was there, and then I acted in faith until I could prove its existence.
author: Arthur H. Compton

quote: A fellow has to have faith in God above and Rollie Fingers in the bullpen.
author: Alvin Dark

quote: A friend is one who knows you and loves you just the same.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend.
author: Albert Camus

quote: An insincere and evil friend is more to be feared than a wild beast; a wild beast may wound your body, but an evil friend will wound your mind.
author: Buddha

quote: Friendship... is not something you learn in school. But if you haven't learned the meaning of friendship, you really haven't learned anything.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Lots of people want to ride with you in the limo, but what you want is someone who will take the bus with you when the limo breaks down.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: A true friend never gets in your way unless you happen to be going down.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: A single rose can be my garden... a single friend, my world.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: I value the friend who for me finds time on his calendar, but I cherish the friend who for me does not consult his calendar.
author: Robert Brault

quote: Be courteous to all, but intimate with few, and let those few be well tried before you give them your confidence.
author: George Washington

quote: Let us be grateful to people who make us happy, they are the charming gardeners who make our souls blossom.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Think where man's glory most begins and ends, and say my glory was I had such friends.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: One of the most beautiful qualities of true friendship is to understand and to be understood.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: True friends stab you in the front.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A friend to all is a friend to none.
author: Aristotle

quote: A friend is someone who gives you total freedom to be yourself.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Friendship is a single soul dwelling in two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: It is one of the blessings of old friends that you can afford to be stupid with them.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Friends and good manners will carry you where money won't go.
author: Margaret Walker

quote: Friends show their love in times of trouble, not in happiness.
author: Euripides

quote: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
author: Helen Keller

quote: A hug is like a boomerang - you get it back right away.
author: Bil Keane

quote: Am I not destroying my enemies when I make friends of them?
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Never explain - your friends do not need it and your enemies will not believe you anyway.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Each friend represents a world in us, a world not born until they arrive, and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born.
author: Anais Nin

quote: It is only the great hearted who can be true friends. The mean and cowardly, Can never know what true friendship means.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: A true friend is someone who is there for you when he'd rather be anywhere else.
author: Len Wein

quote: Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: When you choose your friends, don't be short-changed by choosing personality over character.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Men kick friendship around like a football, but it doesn't seem to crack. Women treat it like glass and it goes to pieces.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Rare as is true love, true friendship is rarer.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: There is nothing on this earth more to be prized than true friendship.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: The only way to have a friend is to be one.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You can always tell a real friend: when you've made a fool of yourself he doesn't feel you've done a permanent job.
author: Laurence J. Peter

quote: The language of friendship is not words but meanings.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: It's the friends you can call up at 4 a.m. that matter.
author: Marlene Dietrich

quote: The friend is the man who knows all about you, and still likes you.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Nothing but heaven itself is better than a friend who is really a friend.
author: Plautus

quote: Never make friends with people who are above or below you in status. Such friendships will never give you any happiness.
author: Chanakya

quote: I have friends in overalls whose friendship I would not swap for the favor of the kings of the world.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: Friendship and money: oil and water.
author: Mario Puzo

quote: So long as the memory of certain beloved friends lives in my heart, I shall say that life is good.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The world is round so that friendship may encircle it.
author: Pierre Teilhard de Chardin

quote: Our friends interpret the world and ourselves to us, if we take them tenderly and truly.
author: Amos Bronson Alcott

quote: The sincere friends of this world are as ship lights in the stormiest of nights.
author: Giotto di Bondone

quote: Silences make the real conversations between friends. Not the saying but the never needing to say is what counts.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quote: A friend is one who walks in when others walk out.
author: Walter Winchell

quote: The most I can do for my friend is simply be his friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Wishing to be friends is quick work, but friendship is a slow ripening fruit.
author: Aristotle

quote: The greatest gift of life is friendship, and I have received it.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: A true friend is the greatest of all blessings, and that which we take the least care of all to acquire.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A man's growth is seen in the successive choirs of his friends.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
author: Confucius

quote: A quarrel between friends, when made up, adds a new tie to friendship.
author: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Friendship is one mind in two bodies.
author: Mencius

quote: I always felt that the great high privilege, relief and comfort of friendship was that one had to explain nothing.
author: Katherine Mansfield

quote: Love is blind; friendship closes its eyes.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: An excellent man; he has no enemies; and none of his friends like him.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Fear makes strangers of people who would be friends.
author: Shirley MacLaine

quote: It takes a long time to grow an old friend.
author: John Leonard

quote: But friendship is the breathing rose, with sweets in every fold.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: A friend may well be reckoned the masterpiece of nature.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: No person is your friend who demands your silence, or denies your right to grow.
author: Alice Walker

quote: Lovers have a right to betray you... friends don't.
author: Judy Holliday

quote: It is not so much our friends' help that helps us, as the confidence of their help.
author: Epicurus

quote: Friendship multiplies the good of life and divides the evil.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Friendship needs no words - it is solitude delivered from the anguish of loneliness.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: If you have one true friend you have more than your share.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Friendship is certainly the finest balm for the pangs of disappointed love.
author: Jane Austen

quote: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: A friend is, as it were, a second self.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: He has no enemies, but is intensely disliked by his friends.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Some people go to priests; others to poetry; I to my friends.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: The real test of friendship is: can you literally do nothing with the other person? Can you enjoy those moments of life that are utterly simple?
author: Eugene Kennedy

quote: As iron sharpens iron, so a friend sharpens a friend.
author: King Solomon

quote: Be slow in choosing a friend, slower in changing.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: He who hath many friends hath none.
author: Aristotle

quote: The bird a nest, the spider a web, man friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: Without wearing any mask we are conscious of, we have a special face for each friend.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Since there is nothing so well worth having as friends, never lose a chance to make them.
author: Francesco Guicciardini

quote: Rejoicing in our joy, not suffering over our suffering, makes someone a friend.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Let there be no purpose in friendship save the deepening of the spirit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Never have a companion that casts you in the shade.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: It is important to our friends to believe that we are unreservedly frank with them, and important to friendship that we are not.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Never contract friendship with a man that is not better than thyself.
author: Confucius

quote: All you need to do to be my friend is like me.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: There is no friend like an old friend who has shared our morning days, no greeting like his welcome, no homage like his praise.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: Friendship improves happiness and abates misery, by the doubling of our joy and the dividing of our grief.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: A man cannot be said to succeed in this life who does not satisfy one friend.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One's friends are that part of the human race with which one can be human.
author: George Santayana

quote: Life has no blessing like a prudent friend.
author: Euripides

quote: When a friend is in trouble, don't annoy him by asking if there is anything you can do. Think up something appropriate and do it.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Love demands infinitely less than friendship.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: Nothing so fortifies a friendship as a belief on the part of one friend that he is superior to the other.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Mighty proud I am that I am able to have a spare bed for my friends.
author: Samuel Pepys

quote: Instead of loving your enemies - treat your friends a little better.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Friends are born, not made.
author: Henry Adams

quote: The best time to make friends is before you need them.
author: Ethel Barrymore

quote: We're born alone, we live alone, we die alone. Only through our love and friendship can we create the illusion for the moment that we're not alone.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Friendship is always a sweet responsibility, never an opportunity.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It is not a lack of love, but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Friendship often ends in love; but love in friendship - never.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Between men and women there is no friendship possible. There is passion, enmity, worship, love, but no friendship.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: True friendship ought never to conceal what it thinks.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Friendship is the shadow of the evening, which increases with the setting sun of life.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: True friendship is a plant of slow growth, and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity, before it is entitled to the appellation.
author: George Washington

quote: Friendship may, and often does, grow into love, but love never subsides into friendship.
author: Lord Byron

quote: False friendship, like the ivy, decays and ruins the walls it embraces; but true friendship gives new life and animation to the object it supports.
author: Richard Burton

quote: A woman may very well form a friendship with a man, but for this to endure, it must be assisted by a little physical antipathy.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: There is some self-interest behind every friendship. There is no friendship without self-interests. This is a bitter truth.
author: Chanakya

quote: Eros will have naked bodies; Friendship naked personalities.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: True friendship can afford true knowledge. It does not depend on darkness and ignorance.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One's life has value so long as one attributes value to the life of others, by means of love, friendship, indignation and compassion.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Friendship with ones self is all important, because without it one cannot be friends with anyone else in the world.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Peace and friendship with all mankind is our wisest policy, and I wish we may be permitted to pursue it.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Friendship marks a life even more deeply than love. Love risks degenerating into obsession, friendship is never anything but sharing.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: The greatest healing therapy is friendship and love.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: Depth of friendship does not depend on length of acquaintance.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Friendship is Love without his wings!
author: Lord Byron

quote: True friendship is like sound health; the value of it is seldom known until it is lost.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: If there is such a thing as a good marriage, it is because it resembles friendship rather than love.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: There is no friendship, no love, like that of the parent for the child.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: However rare true love may be, it is less so than true friendship.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Loyalty and friendship, which is to me the same, created all the wealth that I've ever thought I'd have.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: The essence of true friendship is to make allowance for another's little lapses.
author: David Storey

quote: Friendship is the source of the greatest pleasures, and without friends even the most agreeable pursuits become tedious.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Even in the common affairs of life, in love, friendship, and marriage, how little security have we when we trust our happiness in the hands of others!
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Caring for but never trying to own may be a further way to define friendship.
author: William Glasser

quote: If we are to judge of love by its consequences, it more nearly resembles hatred than friendship.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Friendship, like love, is destroyed by long absence, though it may be increased by short intermissions.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Friendship, like the immortality of the soul, is too good to be believed.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Love is friendship set on fire.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: In friendship as well as love, ignorance very often contributes more to our happiness than knowledge.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I had three chairs in my house; one for solitude, two for friendship, three for society.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Peace, commerce and honest friendship with all nations; entangling alliances with none.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Friendship is like money, easier made than kept.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Friendship is a plant of slow growth and must undergo and withstand the shocks of adversity before it is entitled to the appellation.
author: George Washington

quote: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Of all the things which wisdom provides to make us entirely happy, much the greatest is the possession of friendship.
author: Epicurus

quote: Friendship is the marriage of the soul, and this marriage is liable to divorce.
author: Voltaire

quote: Fan the sinking flame of hilarity with the wing of friendship; and pass the rosy wine.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: If one of two lovers is loyal, and the other jealous and false, how may their friendship last, for Love is slain!
author: Marie de France

quote: I have long enjoyed the friendship and companionship of Republicans because I am by instinct a teacher, and I would like to teach them something.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: No distance of place or lapse of time can lessen the friendship of those who are thoroughly persuaded of each other's worth.
author: Robert Southey

quote: The greatest sweetener of human life is Friendship. To raise this to the highest pitch of enjoyment, is a secret which but few discover.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: How can sincerity be a condition of friendship? A taste for truth at any cost is a passion which spares nothing.
author: Albert Camus

quote: There is a scarcity of friendship, but not of friends.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Freedom prospers when religion is vibrant and the rule of law under God is acknowledged.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: For to be free is not merely to cast off one's chains, but to live in a way that respects and enhances the freedom of others.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The feeling of friendship is like that of being comfortably filled with roast beef; love, like being enlivened with champagne.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: If you want total security, go to prison. There you're fed, clothed, given medical care and so on. The only thing lacking... is freedom.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: People demand freedom of speech as a compensation for the freedom of thought which they seldom use.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Freedom is what you do with what's been done to you.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Friendship, like credit, is highest when it is not used.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Freedom is nothing but a chance to be better.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The desire of gold is not for gold. It is for the means of freedom and benefit.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: It is difficult to obtain the friendship of a cat. It is a philosophical animal... one that does not place its affections thoughtlessly.
author: Theophile Gautier

quote: I love life in spite of all that mars it. I love friendship, jokes and laughter.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: Freedom is not worth having if it does not connote freedom to err.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Freedom is a man's natural power of doing what he pleases, so far as he is not prevented by force or law.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Opposition is true friendship.
author: William Blake

quote: I hope for nothing. I fear nothing. I am free.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: Real friendship, like real poetry, is extremely rare - and precious as a pearl.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: Friendship is essentially a partnership.
author: Aristotle

quote: Do not allow to slip away from you freedoms the people who came before you won with such hard knocks.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: I'm a big advocate of freedom: freedom of speech, freedom of expression, freedom of thought.
author: Jimmy Wales

quote: Friendship increases in visiting friends, but in visiting them seldom.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: To be capable of steady friendship or lasting love, are the two greatest proofs, not only of goodness of heart, but of strength of mind.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: We must be willing to pay a price for freedom.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Pity and friendship are two passions incompatible with each other.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: We are driven by five genetic needs: survival, love and belonging, power, freedom, and fun.
author: William Glasser

quote: Friendship is a sheltering tree.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: We will not waver; we will not tire; we will not falter, and we will not fail. Peace and Freedom will prevail.
author: George W. Bush

quote: When the world is so complicated, the simple gift of friendship is within all of our hands.
author: Maria Shriver

quote: None who have always been free can understand the terrible fascinating power of the hope of freedom to those who are not free.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: But it all comes down to friendship, treating people right.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: What is freedom of expression? Without the freedom to offend, it ceases to exist.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: There are two freedoms - the false, where a man is free to do what he likes; the true, where he is free to do what he ought.
author: Charles Kingsley

quote: What I cannot love, I overlook. Is that real friendship?
author: Anais Nin

quote: Is freedom anything else than the right to live as we wish? Nothing else.
author: Epictetus

quote: Perfect freedom is as necessary to the health and vigor of commerce as it is to the health and vigor of citizenship.
author: Patrick Henry

quote: There are no rules for friendship. It must be left to itself. We cannot force it any more than love.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: Freedom rings where opinions clash.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: Friendship's the wine of life: but friendship new... is neither strong nor pure.
author: Edward Young

quote: Accountability in friendship is the equivalent of love without strategy.
author: Anita Brookner

quote: Seek freedom and become captive of your desires. Seek discipline and find your liberty.
author: Frank Herbert

quote: Before the flowers of friendship faded friendship faded.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Children should have enough freedom to be themselves - once they've learned the rules.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Real freedom is having nothing. I was freer when I didn't have a cent.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: Friendship is almost always the union of a part of one mind with the part of another; people are friends in spots.
author: George Santayana

quote: May we think of freedom, not as the right to do as we please, but as the opportunity to do what is right.
author: Peter Marshall

quote: You can only protect your liberties in this world by protecting the other man's freedom.
author: Clarence Darrow

quote: Marriage: A friendship recognized by the police.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: In America, through pressure of conformity, there is freedom of choice, but nothing to choose from.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: The friendship that can cease has never been real.
author: St. Jerome

quote: Freedom is the oxygen of the soul.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: Freedom is absolutely necessary for the progress in science and the liberal arts.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: It may happen sometimes that a long debate becomes the cause of a longer friendship. Commonly, those who dispute with one another at last agree.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I believe in freedom of speech, but I believe we should also have the right to comment on freedom of speech.
author: Stockwell Day

quote: You have freedom when you're easy in your harness.
author: Robert Frost

quote: If we would build on a sure foundation in friendship, we must love friends for their sake rather than for our own.
author: Charlotte Bronte

quote: We're giving our freedoms away. The American experiment was about freedom. Freedom to be stupid, freedom to fail, freedom to succeed.
author: Glenn Beck

quote: Our freedom can be measured by the number of things we can walk away from.
author: Vernon Howard

quote: Love is rarer than genius itself. And friendship is rarer than love.
author: Charles Peguy

quote: Freedom of speech includes the freedom to offend people.
author: Brad Thor

quote: Friendship, of itself a holy tie, is made more sacred by adversity.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: Freedom is the only law which genius knows.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: All love that has not friendship for its base, is like a mansion built upon the sand.
author: Ella Wheeler Wilcox

quote: Freedom is from within.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: One measure of friendship consists not in the number of things friends can discuss, but in the number of things they need no longer mention.
author: Clifton Paul Fadiman

quote: Heresy is another word for freedom of thought.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Sweet is the scene where genial friendship plays the pleasing game of interchanging praise.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Freedom is the recognition of necessity.
author: Friedrich Engels

quote: Moral science is better occupied when treating of friendship than of justice.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Freedom from fear could be said to sum up the whole philosophy of human rights.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: I chose America as my home because I value freedom and democracy, civil liberties and an open society.
author: George Soros

quote: You cannot parcel out freedom in pieces because freedom is all or nothing.
author: Tertullian

quote: Sixth grade was a big time, in my childhood, of hoops and friendship, and coming up with funny things.
author: Adam Sandler

quote: We do not commonly see in a tax a diminution of freedom, and yet it clearly is one.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: There is no such thing as a little freedom. Either you are all free, or you are not free.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: Time makes friendship stronger, but love weaker.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Friendship is mutual blackmail elevated to the level of love.
author: Robin Morgan

quote: The right to be let alone is indeed the beginning of all freedoms.
author: William O. Douglas

quote: Free speech carries with it some freedom to listen.
author: Warren E. Burger

quote: Freedom of the press is not an end in itself but a means to the end of achieving a free society.
author: Felix Frankfurter

quote: Freedom is the right to one's dignity as a man.
author: Archibald MacLeish

quote: Your experiences will be yours alone. But truth and best friendship will rarely if ever disappoint you.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: You've got to reach a hand of friendship across the aisle and across philosophies in this country.
author: Joe Biden

quote: Coercion, after all, merely captures man. Freedom captivates him.
author: Robert McNamara

quote: The very idea of freedom incites fear in the hearts of terrorists across the world.
author: Elizabeth Dole

quote: Friendship is also about liking a person for their failings, their weakness. It's also about mutual help, not about exploitation.
author: Paul Theroux

quote: Freedom is never easily won, but once established, freedom lasts, spreads and chokes out tyranny.
author: Trent Lott

quote: I'm single, footloose and fancy free, I have no responsibilities, no anchors. Work, friendship and self-improvement, that's me.
author: Joel Edgerton

quote: The link between my experience as an entrepreneur and that of a politician is all in one word: freedom.
author: Silvio Berlusconi

quote: General benevolence, but not general friendship, made a man what he ought to be.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Human beings crave freedom at their core.
author: John Ensign

quote: I hope to continue my friendship with France and its filmmakers for many years to come.
author: Harvey Weinstein

quote: We should favor innovation and freedom over regulation.
author: George Allen

quote: Friendship without self-interest is one of the rare and beautiful things of life.
author: James F. Byrnes

quote: Value your friendship. Value your relationships.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: Love and friendship exclude each other.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Friendship is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Plautus

quote: It may be a cold, clammy thing to say, but those that treat friendship the same as any other selfishness seem to get the most out of it.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: The little trouble in the world that is not due to love is due to friendship.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Expose yourself to your deepest fear; after that, fear has no power, and the fear of freedom shrinks and vanishes. You are free.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Read as you taste fruit or savor wine, or enjoy friendship, love or life.
author: George Herbert

quote: If the freedom of speech is taken away then dumb and silent we may be led, like sheep to the slaughter.
author: George Washington

quote: Suspicion is the cancer of friendship.
author: Petrarch

quote: All the great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose our response. In our response lies our growth and our freedom.
author: Viktor E. Frankl

quote: Love is flower like; Friendship is like a sheltering tree.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Success always necessitates a degree of ruthlessness. Given the choice of friendship or success, I'd probably choose success.
author: Sting

quote: Freedom is never voluntarily given by the oppressor; it must be demanded by the oppressed.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Aristotle uses a mother's love for her child as the prime example of love or friendship.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Conjugal love, or the friendship of spouses, can persist even after sexual desires have weakened, withered, and disappeared.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: Friendship is a very taxing and arduous form of leisure activity.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: It does not take a majority to prevail... but rather an irate, tireless minority, keen on setting brushfires of freedom in the minds of men.
author: Samuel Adams

quote: My inspiration are the woman, friendship, and loneliness.
author: Enrique Iglesias

quote: For prayer is nothing else than being on terms of friendship with God.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: A friendship like love is warm; a love like friendship is steady.
author: Thomas More

quote: The differences between friends cannot but reinforce their friendship.
author: Mao Zedong

quote: We must reach out our hand in friendship and dignity both to those who would befriend us and those who would be our enemy.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Freedom lies in being bold.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Madam, I have been looking for a person who disliked gravy all my life; let us swear eternal friendship.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: Freedom is the right to tell people what they do not want to hear.
author: George Orwell

quote: It is wise to apply the oil of refined politeness to the mechanism of friendship.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: Friendship is an arrangement by which we undertake to exchange small favors for big ones.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: Those who deny freedom to others deserve it not for themselves.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Secrecy is the chastity of friendship.
author: Jeremy Taylor

quote: Great is the victory, but the friendship of all is greater.
author: Emil Zatopek

quote: I am a Republican, a black, dyed in the wool Republican, and I never intend to belong to any other party than the party of freedom and progress.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: If we don't believe in freedom of expression for people we despise, we don't believe in it at all.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: The ideal friendship is to feel as one while remaining two.
author: Sophie Swetchine

quote: Tis the privilege of friendship to talk nonsense, and have her nonsense respected.
author: Charles Lamb

quote: Friendship has its illusions no less than love.
author: Stendhal

quote: Friendship is one of the most tangible things in a world which offers fewer and fewer supports.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: To like and dislike the same things, this is what makes a solid friendship.
author: Sallust

quote: War is peace. Freedom is slavery. Ignorance is strength.
author: George Orwell

quote: A hero is someone who understands the responsibility that comes with his freedom.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: The firmest friendship is based on an identity of likes and dislikes.
author: Sallust

quote: Most people do not really want freedom, because freedom involves responsibility, and most people are frightened of responsibility.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Friendship is a disinterested commerce between equals; love, an abject intercourse between tyrants and slaves.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Friendship always benefits; love sometimes injures.
author: Seneca

quote: During the 1950s, Aristotle Onassis and I formed what grew to be a close friendship and association in several business ventures.
author: Paul Getty

quote: That friendship will not continue to the end which is begun for an end.
author: Francis Quarles

quote: The framers of our Constitution meant we were to have freedom of religion, not freedom from religion.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Love is like the wild rose-briar; Friendship like the holly-tree. The holly is dark when the rose-briar blooms, but which will bloom most constantly?
author: Emily Bronte

quote: I've got many close friends, but there's an awful lot about friendship that is not demonstrative in my case.
author: Warren Christopher

quote: Freedom means you are unobstructed in living your life as you choose. Anything less is a form of slavery.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Friendship is held to be the severest test of character.
author: Charles Eastman

quote: The fight for freedom must go on until it is won; until our country is free and happy and peaceful as part of the community of man, we cannot rest.
author: Oliver Tambo

quote: The most deadly fruit is borne by the hatred which one grafts on an extinguished friendship.
author: Gotthold Ephraim Lessing

quote: If you're not ready to die for it, put the word 'freedom' out of your vocabulary.
author: Malcolm X

quote: I come from the New York theatre world, and I have a lot of gay male friends, so this friendship of Will and Grace's isn't such a stretch.
author: Debra Messing

quote: There has to be chemistry in a duet, but if you go beyond the point of friendship and attraction, you lose something.
author: Kenny Rogers

quote: You can't separate peace from freedom because no one can be at peace unless he has his freedom.
author: Malcolm X

quote: Friendship is a strong and habitual inclination in two persons to promote the good and happiness of one another.
author: Eustace Budgell

quote: Money won't create success, the freedom to make it will.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Even where friendship is concerned, it takes me a long time to trust people.
author: Namie Amuro

quote: A big part of financial freedom is having your heart and mind free from worry about the what-ifs of life.
author: Suze Orman

quote: Friendship based solely upon gratitude is like a photograph; with time it fades.
author: Carmen Sylva

quote: Posterity: you will never know how much it has cost my generation to preserve your freedom. I hope you will make good use of it.
author: John Quincy Adams

quote: I wish that every human life might be pure transparent freedom.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The steady discipline of intimate friendship with Jesus results in men becoming like Him.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: The more decisions that you are forced to make alone, the more you are aware of your freedom to choose.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: This is the highest wisdom that I own; freedom and life are earned by those alone who conquer them each day anew.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Freedom consists not in doing what we like, but in having the right to do what we ought.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: I think the way to keep a friendship is to respect that everybody is different.
author: Emma Bunton

quote: Freedom has cost too much blood and agony to be relinquished at the cheap price of rhetoric.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: The building of friendship, family, community and love is complicated. We are so isolated in this country, no longer supported by tribes and villages.
author: Jasmine Guy

quote: Neatness begets order; but from order to taste there is the same difference as from taste to genius, or from love to friendship.
author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: Well, if crime fighters fight crime and fire fighters fight fire, what do freedom fighters fight? They never mention that part to us, do they?
author: George Carlin

quote: Good fellowship and friendship are lasting, rational and manly pleasures.
author: William Wycherley

quote: Friendship is a word, the very sight of which in print makes the heart warm.
author: Augustine Birrell

quote: The secret of freedom lies in educating people, whereas the secret of tyranny is in keeping them ignorant.
author: Maximilien Robespierre

quote: Let freedom reign. The sun never set on so glorious a human achievement.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: A free press can, of course, be good or bad, but, most certainly without freedom, the press will never be anything but bad.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Came but for friendship, and took away love.
author: Thomas Moore

quote: History does not long entrust the care of freedom to the weak or the timid.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: In this possibly terminal phase of human existence, democracy and freedom are more than just ideals to be valued - they may be essential to survival.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: Blunders, no, only friendship binds us to honesty - attracting crypts of mushrooms in the wake of our snowboards.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: Necessity is blind until it becomes conscious. Freedom is the consciousness of necessity.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Friendship will not stand the strain of very much good advice for very long.
author: Robert Staughton Lynd

quote: You don't have to be a man to fight for freedom. All you have to do is to be an intelligent human being.
author: Malcolm X

quote: For in the end, freedom is a personal and lonely battle; and one faces down fears of today so that those of tomorrow might be engaged.
author: Alice Walker

quote: The rare few, who, early in life have rid themselves of the friendship of the many.
author: James Whistler

quote: Anxiety is the dizziness of freedom.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: But, based on my friendship with Evie as young mothers, I started going on freedom rides in 1966.
author: June Jordan

quote: Freedom is not something that one people can bestow on another as a gift. Thy claim it as their own and none can keep it from them.
author: Kwame Nkrumah

quote: Human beings the world over need freedom and security that they may be able to realize their full potential.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: I have a very close friendship with the skaters.
author: Eric Heiden

quote: I think of a hero as someone who understands the degree of responsibility that comes with his freedom.
author: Bob Dylan

quote: Love and esteem are the first principles of friendship; it is always imperfect if either of these two are wanting.
author: Eustace Budgell

quote: Friendship is the golden thread that ties the heart of all the world.
author: John Evelyn

quote: Responsibility is the price of freedom.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: No nation could preserve its freedom in the midst of continual warfare.
author: James Madison

quote: A filmmaker has almost the same freedom as a novelist has when he buys himself some paper.
author: Stanley Kubrick

quote: Friendship! Mysterious cement of the soul, Sweet'ner of life, and solder of society.
author: Robert Blair

quote: Freedom in capitalist society always remains about the same as it was in ancient Greek republics: Freedom for slave owners.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: I would like to raise my glass to friendship between Russia and the United States.
author: Richard Lugar

quote: Freedom is never dear at any price. It is the breath of life. What would a man not pay for living?
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: People instantly assume you can't have a platonic friendship with someone of the opposite sex. I think this may be specific to L.A. - or America.
author: Isabel Lucas

quote: I keep my friends as misers do their treasure, because, of all the things granted us by wisdom, none is greater or better than friendship.
author: Pietro Aretino

quote: One sure way to lose another woman's friendship is to try to improve her flower arrangements.
author: Marcelene Cox

quote: He only earns his freedom and his life Who takes them every day by storm.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Those who expect to reap the blessings of freedom must, like men, undergo the fatigue of supporting it.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: The friendship we share grows amidst the craggy rock pond; reeds of water spray fireflies scented with bonfires.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: The joys of friendship inert the heart and fizzy home bouncing jubilantly with laughter-buttered love.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: Plunderous is the palate I gift to you, openly I hug the universe of our friendship expanding its outer limit.
author: Bradley Chicho

quote: Marriage, for a woman at least, hampers the two things that made life to me glorious - friendship and learning.
author: Jane Harrison

quote: You can have peace. Or you can have freedom. Don't ever count on having both at once.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: The sacrifices of friendship were beautiful in her eyes as long as she was not asked to make them.
author: Hector Hugh Munro

quote: My reputation is too important to put it aside for purposes of some friendship. We have a job to do.
author: Stephanie Tubbs Jones

quote: Power in defense of freedom is greater than power in behalf of tyranny and oppression.
author: Malcolm X

quote: No one person can possibly combine all the elements supposed to make up what everyone means by friendship.
author: Francis Marion Crawford

quote: Our plans protect freedom and opportunity, and our blueprint is the Constitution of the United States.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Just living is not enough. One must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
author: Hans Christian Andersen

quote: To some it may be a thrill to be known, to me it's a thrill to start a friendship even up.
author: Christopher Knight

quote: I think quite a lot of people have a friendship or a love that's gone like that and it never quite reconciles properly.
author: Tim Finn

quote: Freedom itself was attacked this morning by a faceless coward, and freedom will be defended.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Although the troops have struck us, we throw it all behind and are glad to meet you in peace and friendship.
author: Black Kettle

quote: One of the great things personally coming to Hawai'i is my friendship of Jim Nicholson.
author: Dan Fouts

quote: Nobody ever chooses the already unfortunate as objects of his loyal friendship.
author: Lucan

quote: To say that any people are not fit for freedom, is to make poverty their choice, and to say they had rather be loaded with taxes than not.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Only solitary men know the full joys of friendship. Others have their family; but to a solitary and an exile his friends are everything.
author: Warren G. Harding

quote: Those who profess to favor freedom, and yet depreciate agitation, are men who want crops without plowing up the ground.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: So far as it depends on the course of this government, our relations of good will and friendship will be sedulously cultivated with all nations.
author: John Tyler

quote: Friendship is inexplicable, it should not be explained if one doesn't want to kill it.
author: Max Jacob

quote: A passion for politics stems usually from an insatiable need, either for power, or for friendship and adulation, or a combination of both.
author: Fawn M. Brodie

quote: The friendship of Shostakovich cast a brilliant light over my whole life and whose spiritual qualities captured my soul once and for all time.
author: Galina Vishnevskaya

quote: I know of no country in which there is so little independence of mind and real freedom of discussion as in America.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: My films are always concerned with family, friendship, honor, and patriotism.
author: John Woo

quote: Everywhere that freedom stirs, let tyrants fear.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Never be afraid to meet to the hilt the demand of either work, or friendship - two of life's major assets.
author: Eleanor Robson Belmont

quote: In the name of the United States and President Bush, I want to thank the Mexican people, President Fox and his government for their friendship.
author: Tony Garza

quote: Friendship's the privilege of private men; for wretched greatness knows no blessing so substantial.
author: Nahum Tate

quote: I come bearing an olive branch in one hand, and the freedom fighter's gun in the other. Do not let the olive branch fall from my hand.
author: Yasser Arafat

quote: The greatest threat to freedom is the absence of criticism.
author: Wole Soyinka

quote: Love does not claim possession, but gives freedom.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Violent means will give violent freedom. That would be a menace to the world and to India herself.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: We cannot defend freedom abroad by deserting it at home.
author: Edward R. Murrow

quote: As soon as laws are necessary for men, they are no longer fit for freedom.
author: Pythagoras

quote: I had crossed the line. I was free; but there was no one to welcome me to the land of freedom. I was a stranger in a strange land.
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: Freedom from the desire for an answer is essential to the understanding of a problem.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: All people hope Islam helps everything in life. Islam will make jobs. Islam will make freedom. Islam will make everything.
author: Ahmed Ali

quote: A Buddha is someone who finds freedom in good fortune and bad.
author: Bodhidharma

quote: What then is freedom? The power to live as one wishes.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Freedom is a possession of inestimable value.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: The revelation of thought takes men out of servitude into freedom.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I am a lover of truth, a worshipper of freedom, a celebrant at the altar of language and purity and tolerance.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: Freedom of speech is always under attack by Fascist mentality, which exists in all parts of the world, unfortunately.
author: Lawrence Ferlinghetti

quote: Freedom is the freedom to say that two plus two make four. If that is granted, all else follows.
author: George Orwell

quote: Who is more to be pitied, a writer bound and gagged by policemen or one living in perfect freedom who has nothing more to say?
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Only free men can negotiate; prisoners cannot enter into contracts. Your freedom and mine cannot be separated.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Freedom of the press is guaranteed only to those who own one.
author: A. J. Liebling

quote: When there is state there can be no freedom, but when there is freedom there will be no state.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: True independence and freedom can only exist in doing what's right.
author: Brigham Young

quote: In many respects, the United States is a great country. Freedom of speech is protected more than in any other country. It is also a very free society.
author: Noam Chomsky

quote: Freedom of speech, freedom of the press, and freedom of religion all have a double aspect - freedom of thought and freedom of action.
author: Frank Murphy

quote: We cannot expect that all nations will adopt like systems, for conformity is the jailer of freedom and the enemy of growth.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Underlying most arguments against the free market is a lack of belief in freedom itself.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: Freedom from effort in the present merely means that there has been effort stored up in the past.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: For us democracy is a question of human dignity. And human dignity is political freedom.
author: Olof Palme

quote: Just living is not enough... one must have sunshine, freedom, and a little flower.
author: Hans Christian Anderson

quote: History suggests that capitalism is a necessary condition for political freedom. Clearly it is not a sufficient condition.
author: Milton Friedman

quote: Nothing has been purchased more dearly than the little bit of reason and sense of freedom which now constitutes our pride.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Analysis does not set out to make pathological reactions impossible, but to give the patient's ego freedom to decide one way or another.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Punk has always been about doing things your own way. What it represents for me is ultimate freedom and a sense of individuality.
author: Billie Joe Armstrong

quote: No amount of political freedom will satisfy the hungry masses.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: Both the American people and nations that censor the internet should understand that our government is committed to helping promote internet freedom.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: I think my first album opened a lot of doors for me to push the freedom of speech to the limit.
author: Eminem

quote: I love music. It's freedom, a way to deal with pent-up frustration.
author: Ice Cube

quote: Whenever men take the law into their own hands, the loser is the law. And when the law loses, freedom languishes.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: Young players need freedom of expression to develop as creative players... they should be encouraged to try skills without fear of failure.
author: Arsene Wenger

quote: I believe that God has planted in every heart the desire to live in freedom.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Freedom would be not to choose between black and white but to abjure such prescribed choices.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Freedom means the right of people to assemble, organize, and debate openly.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Freedom granted only when it is known beforehand that its effects will be beneficial is not freedom.
author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: Freedom is not procured by a full enjoyment of what is desired, but by controlling the desire.
author: Epictetus

quote: There is no such thing as part freedom.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: A nation which makes the final sacrifice for life and freedom does not get beaten.
author: Kemal Ataturk

quote: Ultimately, America's answer to the intolerant man is diversity, the very diversity which our heritage of religious freedom has inspired.
author: Robert Kennedy

quote: So long as you do not achieve social liberty, whatever freedom is provided by the law is of no avail to you.
author: B. R. Ambedkar

quote: You measure a democracy by the freedom it gives its dissidents, not the freedom it gives its assimilated conformists.
author: Abbie Hoffman

quote: Freedom is hammered out on the anvil of discussion, dissent, and debate.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: We must face the fact that the preservation of individual freedom is incompatible with a full satisfaction of our views of distributive justice.
author: Friedrich August von Hayek

quote: Freedom is fragile and must be protected. To sacrifice it, even as a temporary measure, is to betray it.
author: Germaine Greer

quote: Struggle is a never ending process. Freedom is never really won, you earn it and win it in every generation.
author: Coretta Scott King

quote: Secrecy is the freedom tyrants dream of.
author: Bill Moyers

quote: Freedom - to walk free and own no superior.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: A political prisoner is someone who is out fighting for his or her people's rights and freedom and is imprisoned for that alone.
author: Leonard Peltier

quote: Freedom is the open window through which pours the sunlight of the human spirit and human dignity.
author: Herbert Hoover

quote: I think this society suffers so much from too much freedom, too many rights that allow people to be irresponsible.
author: Boyd Rice

quote: No protracted war can fail to endanger the freedom of a democratic country.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: Freedom in general may be defined as the absence of obstacles to the realization of desires.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Bondage is of the mind; freedom too is of the mind. If you say 'I am a free soul. I am a son of God who can bind me' free you shall be.
author: Ramakrishna

quote: Make no mistake, in this campaign, I will offer the American ideals of economic freedom a clear and unapologetic defense.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Those religions that are oppressive to women are also against democracy, human rights, and freedom of expression.
author: Taslima Nasrin

quote: The State is the altar of political freedom and, like the religious altar, it is maintained for the purpose of human sacrifice.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: We don't appreciate what we have until it's gone. Freedom is like that. It's like air. When you have it, you don't notice it.
author: Boris Yeltsin

quote: The degree of freedom from unwanted thoughts and the degree of concentration on a single thought are the measures to gauge spiritual progress.
author: Ramana Maharshi

quote: When you're not concerned with succeeding, you can work with complete freedom.
author: Larry David

quote: Freedom of opinion can only exist when the government thinks itself secure.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: If we wish to free ourselves from enslavement, we must choose freedom and the responsibility this entails.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Men are never really willing to die except for the sake of freedom: therefore they do not believe in dying completely.
author: Albert Camus

quote: I felt extremely uncomfortable as the focal point, in the spotlight. I really like the behind the scenes role, because all my freedom is there.
author: Brian Eno

quote: The intense happiness of our union is derived in a high degree from the perfect freedom with which we each follow and declare our own impressions.
author: George Eliot

quote: The precondition to freedom is security.
author: Rand Beers

quote: Emancipation from the bondage of the soil is no freedom for the tree.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: The worst enemy of life, freedom and the common decencies is total anarchy; their second worst enemy is total efficiency.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: You don't have freedom because you are a hyphenated American; you have freedom because you are an individual, and that should be protected.
author: Ron Paul

quote: In 1960, when I came out of prison as an ex-convict, I had more freedom under parolee supervision than there's available... in America right now.
author: Merle Haggard

quote: Freedom comes only to those who no longer ask of life that it shall yield them any of those personal goods that are subject to the mutations of time.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: You can't put democracy and freedom back into a box.
author: George W. Bush

quote: The wisest use of American strength is to advance freedom.
author: George W. Bush

quote: None can love freedom heartily, but good men; the rest love not freedom, but licence.
author: John Milton

quote: When we talk of freedom and opportunity for all nations, the mocking paradoxes in our own society become so clear they can no longer be ignored.
author: Wendell Willkie

quote: A man may be a pessimistic determinist before lunch and an optimistic believer in the will's freedom after it.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Victorious living does not mean freedom from temptation, nor does it mean freedom from mistakes.
author: E. Stanley Jones

quote: Not to sound overly cheesy but I really appreciate the freedom we have in America - especially as a female.
author: Katy Perry

quote: If society fits you comfortably enough, you call it freedom.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Once I know people know who I am, it gives me a lot of licence and freedom to behave in ways I wouldn't normally.
author: Larry David

quote: We need the children of Indonesia and the Philippines to manufacture our freedom of choice.
author: Marc Maron

quote: For all who love freedom and peace, the world without Saddam Hussein's regime is a better and safer place.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Satisfaction consists in freedom from pain, which is the positive element of life.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Freedom is a right ultimately defended by the sacrifice of America's servicemen and women.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Men are freest when they are most unconscious of freedom. The shout is a rattling of chains, always was.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: We gain freedom when we have paid the full price.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Freedom is not enough.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: America is a model of force and freedom and moderation - with all the coarseness and rudeness of its people.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Fiction is such a world of freedom, it's wonderful. If you want someone to fly, they can fly.
author: Alice Walker

quote: No one can enjoy freedom without trembling.
author: Emile M. Cioran

quote: The only certain freedom's in departure.
author: Robert Frost

quote: The United States of America will never be intimidated by thugs and assassins. The killers will fail, and the Iraqi people will live in freedom.
author: George W. Bush

quote: While the State exists there can be no freedom; when there is freedom there will be no State.
author: Vladimir Lenin

quote: What is the essence of America? Finding and maintaining that perfect, delicate balance between freedom "to" and freedom "from.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: A person is a fool to become a writer. His only compensation is absolute freedom.
author: Roald Dahl

quote: The fifth freedom is freedom from ignorance.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Every tyrant who has lived has believed in freedom for himself.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: I'm not sure if it's good to have freedom or not. I'm really confused now.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: If you can make people understand why freedom is so important through the arts, that would be a big help.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: In a completely sane world, madness is the only freedom.
author: J. G. Ballard

quote: It is easy to believe in freedom of speech for those with whom we agree.
author: Leo McKern

quote: For you who no longer posses it, freedom is everything, for us who do, it is merely an illusion.
author: Emile M. Cioran

quote: Freedom cannot be given... It can only be taken away.
author: David Allan Coe

quote: We seek peace, knowing that peace is the climate of freedom.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: It is better to lose everything you have to keep the balance of justice level, than to live a life of petty privilege devoid of true freedom.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Only people who have been allowed to practise freedom can have the grown-up look in their eyes.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: The road to freedom lies not through mysteries or occult performances, but through the intelligent use of natural forces and laws.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: The magic of America is that we're a free and open society with a mixed population. Part of our security is our freedom.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: The freedom to be an individual is the essence of America.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: Freedom has a price. Most people aren't willing to pay it.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: To enjoy freedom we have to control ourselves.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: My wife needs her freedom just like me.
author: Clive Owen

quote: There are two good things in life - freedom of thought and freedom of action.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: We know there is no such thing as freedom without the risk of failure.
author: Rick Perry

quote: The First Amendment freedom of religion is as important today as when the Bill of Rights was first written.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: Freedom and order are not incompatible... truth is strength... free discussion is the very life of truth.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: Analysis gave me great freedom of emotions and fantastic confidence. I felt I had served my time as a puppet.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: There must be freedom for all to live, to think, to worship, no book, no avenue must be closed.
author: James Larkin

quote: Thought takes man out of servitude, into freedom.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: No people in history have ever survived who thought they could protect their freedom by making themselves inoffensive to their enemies.
author: Dean Acheson

quote: I think there's some connection between absolute discipline and absolute freedom.
author: Alan Rickman

quote: The man form is higher than the angel form; of all forms it is the highest. Man is the highest being in creation, because he aspires to freedom.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: It is the people who scream the loudest about America and Freedom who see to be the most intolerant for a differing point of view.
author: Rosanne Cash

quote: Back a hundred years ago, especially around Woodrow Wilson, what happened in this country is we took freedom and we chopped it into pieces.
author: Ron Paul

quote: Freedom is the right to live as we wish.
author: Epictetus

quote: If they want to hang me, let them. And on the scaffold I will shout Freedom for the working class!
author: Mother Jones

quote: To me, punk rock is the freedom to create, freedom to be successful, freedom to not be successful, freedom to be who you are. It's freedom.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Too much freedom can lead to the soul's decay.
author: Prince

quote: The political core of any movement for freedom in the society has to have the political imperative to protect free speech.
author: Bell Hooks

quote: People demand freedom only when they have no power.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: We know what works. Freedom Works. We know what's right. Freedom is right.
author: George H. W. Bush

quote: We hold our heads high, despite the price we have paid, because freedom is priceless.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: The history of the world is none other than the progress of the consciousness of freedom.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: Freedom of choice is more to be treasured than any possession earth can give.
author: David O. McKay

quote: Racism is a refuge for the ignorant. It seeks to divide and to destroy. It is the enemy of freedom, and deserves to be met head-on and stamped out.
author: Pierre Berton

quote: Pleasure and freedom from pain, are the only things desirable as ends.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: If our freedom is taken, the American dream will wither and die.
author: Rand Paul

quote: The clash of ideas is the sound of freedom.
author: Lady Bird Johnson

quote: Among the many values in life, I appreciate freedom most.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: I like repressed characters. That gives me a lot of freedom to make a lot of different choices through subtleties.
author: Jeremy Renner

quote: Freedom is not an ideal, it is not even a protection, if it means nothing more than the freedom to stagnate.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: I'm not a drug addict. My wild period wasn't about drugs; it was about sexual freedom.
author: Calvin Klein

quote: Real freedom lies in wildness, not in civilization.
author: Charles Lindbergh

quote: No, my work does not reflect my sexual preferences, it reflects the fact that I feel total freedom as an artist.
author: Patti Smith

quote: To me, the American Dream is being able to follow your own personal calling. To be able to do what you want to do is incredible freedom.
author: Maya Lin

quote: No slavery can be abolished without a double emancipation, and the master will benefit by freedom more than the freed-man.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: But I found that disappointing people is a good thing, because disapproval is freedom.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: We know from our own history that democratic institutions take decades to mature, and we know from past conflicts that freedom is not free.
author: Jim DeMint

quote: One man's blasphemy doesn't override other people's free-speech rights, their freedom to publish, freedom of thought.
author: Dan Savage

quote: Freedom requires no effort to enjoy but requires heroic efforts to preserve.
author: Richard G. Scott

quote: The price of freedom is eternal vigilance.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Exclusion is never the way forward on our shared paths to freedom and justice.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Freedom is control in your own life.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: The United Nations is designed to make possible lasting freedom and independence for all its members.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: Freedom of conscience entails more dangers than authority and despotism.
author: Michel Foucault

quote: True human goodness, in all its purity and freedom, can come to the fore only when its recipient has no power.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: The Ego is partly free. partly determined, and reaches fuller freedom by approaching the Individual who is most free: God.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Well, I'm a libertarian conservative, so I believe in limited government/maximum individual freedom.
author: John Bolton

quote: There can be no real freedom without the freedom to fail.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: I've come to realize that protecting freedom of choice in our everyday lives is essential to maintaining a healthy civil society.
author: George McGovern

quote: Great research universities must insist on independence from government and on the exercise of academic freedom.
author: Alan Dershowitz

quote: Freedom is the most contagious virus known to man.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: The general interest of the masses might take the place of the insight of genius if it were allowed freedom of action.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: A nice, easy place for freedom of speech to be eroded is comics, because comics are a natural target whenever an election comes up.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: The current total of countries in the world with First Amendments is one. You have guaranteed freedom of speech. Other countries don't have that.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Giving up even an ounce of precious freedom is a very serious thing to do.
author: Charles Schumer

quote: America's Veterans have served their country with the belief that democracy and freedom are ideals to be upheld around the world.
author: John Doolittle

quote: In health there is freedom. Health is the first of all liberties.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Novelists have always had complete freedom to pretty much tell their story any way they saw fit. And that's what I'm trying to do.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: Modernism released us from the constraints of everything that had gone before with a euphoric sense of freedom.
author: Arthur Erickson

quote: Anything outside marriage seems like freedom and excitement.
author: Jeanette Winterson

quote: I wasn't a woman who stayed tiny like I thought I would. I definitely gave myself the freedom to eat what I wanted.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: I'm privileged, because I have a lot of freedom. I want to use it to make as warm and normal a life as I can for our daughters.
author: Jennifer Garner

quote: Until you have lost your reputation, you never realize what a burden it was or what freedom really is.
author: Margaret Mitchell

quote: The spread of freedom is the best security for the free.
author: Tony Blair

quote: The American dream is about freedom.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: I remain optimistic. What we've seen in Europe and the rest of the world is that freedom has a much stronger attraction than radical fundamentalism.
author: Gijs de Vries

quote: America, to me, is freedom.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I feel like my honesty gives people the freedom to talk about things they wouldn't otherwise.
author: Jane Fonda

quote: Freedom is just Chaos, with better lighting.
author: Alan Dean Foster

quote: I tasted freedom and I really liked it.
author: Phil Lynott

quote: They call them terrorists, I call them freedom fighters.
author: Louis Farrakhan

quote: Even in the darkest regions, people have discovered their right of freedom.
author: Javier Bardem

quote: The work of art is a scream of freedom.
author: Christo

quote: Roosevelt talked not only about Freedom from Fear, but also Freedom from Want.
author: Jeffrey Sachs

quote: Fashion is an imposition, a reign on freedom.
author: Golda Meir

quote: I try to give the media as many confusing images as I can to retain my freedom. What's real is for my children and the people I live with.
author: Sting

quote: One of the rewards of success is freedom, the ability to do whatever you like.
author: Sting

quote: I don't believe in firing professors. They have academic freedom.
author: Alan Dershowitz

quote: The freedom of each individual can only be the freedom of all.
author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: Only the freedom of mind can prevent the state from becoming totalitarian and from issuing totalitarian demands.
author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: The pillars of truth and the pillars of freedom - they are the pillars of society.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: To criticize a person for their race is manifestly irrational and ridiculous, but to criticize their religion, that is a right. That is a freedom.
author: Rowan Atkinson

quote: Not caring more about what other people think than what you think. That's freedom.
author: Demi Moore

quote: Freedom means the opportunity to be what we never thought we would be.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Freedom is the emancipation from the arbitrary rule of other men.
author: Mortimer Adler

quote: I defend both the freedom of expression and society's right to counter it. I must pay the price for differing. It is the natural way of things.
author: Naguib Mahfouz

quote: I was intelligent enough to make up my own mind. I not only had freedom of choice, I had freedom of expression.
author: Amy Tan

quote: My philosophy is, don't take no for an answer and be willing to sacrifice your entire project for freedom.
author: Tim Robbins

quote: Is Walt turning over in his grave? A man named Joe Roth runs Disney right now-he gave me the go-ahead and total freedom to do whatever I wanted to do.
author: Tim Robbins

quote: We who officially value freedom of speech above life itself seem to have nothing to talk about but the weather.
author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: No, I don't believe in genius. I believe in freedom. I think anyone can do it. Anyone can be like Rembrandt.
author: Damien Hirst

quote: The greatest blessing of our democracy is freedom. But in the last analysis, our only freedom is the freedom to discipline ourselves.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: I've returned to being an amateur without any ties or strings attached, which gives me a freedom I never had before.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: Freedom is secured every day by our men and women in uniform. We must build a future worthy of their sacrifice.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: They have called Operation Iraqi Freedom a war of choice that isn't part of the real war on terror. Someone should tell that to al Qaeda.
author: John Boehner

quote: Judgment traps you within the limitations of your comparisons. It inhibits freedom.
author: Willie Stargell

quote: Freedom is such a gift.
author: Ryan Gosling

quote: Don't give me any money, don't give me any people, but give freedom, and I'll give you a movie that looks gigantic.
author: Robert Rodriguez

quote: We must plan for freedom, and not only for security, if for no other reason than that only freedom can make security secure.
author: Karl Popper

quote: As a boy, I believed freedom for America meant freedom for me. There was a time I believed every word spoken.
author: Barry White

quote: I'm a true believer in karma. You get what you give, whether it's bad or good.

quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings.

quote: Whatever you are, be a good one.

quote: A good conscience is a continual Christmas.

quote: No man is good enough to govern another man without the other's consent.

quote: A good thing to remember is somebody's got it a lot worse than we do.

quote: Good leadership consists of showing average people how to do the work of superior people.

quote: Every actual State is corrupt. Good men must not obey laws too well.
