quote: There was never a good war, or a bad peace.

quote: Many a man fails as an original thinker simply because his memory it too good.

quote: A hard man is good to find.

quote: The only thing to do with good advice is to pass it on. It is never of any use to oneself.

quote: A retentive memory may be a good thing, but the ability to forget is the true token of greatness.

quote: Mothers are the people who love us for no good reason. And those of us who are mothers know it's the most exquisite love of all.

quote: By having a reverence for life, we enter into a spiritual relation with the world By practicing reverence for life we become good, deep, and alive.

quote: The good ended happily, and the bad unhappily. That is what fiction means.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A good novel tells us the truth about its hero; but a bad novel tells us the truth about its author.

quote: A good reputation is more valuable than money.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: A good garden may have some weeds.

quote: She generally gave herself very good advice, (though she very seldom followed it).

quote: Fun is good.
author: Dr. Seuss

quote: Being stubborn can be a good thing. Being stubborn can be a bad thing. It just depends on how you use it.

quote: The important thing is that men should have a purpose in life. It should be something useful, something good.

quote: Those who can win a war well can rarely make a good peace and those who could make a good peace would never have won the war.

quote: Life is not a matter of holding good cards, but sometimes, playing a poor hand well.

quote: A liar should have a good memory.

quote: Endure and persist; this pain will turn to good by and by.

quote: I think we consider too much the good luck of the early bird and not enough the bad luck of the early worm.

quote: I cannot emphasize enough the importance of a good teacher.

quote: According to the Sutras, evil deeds result in hardships and good deeds result in blessings.

quote: What is moral is what you feel good after, and what is immoral is what you feel bad after.

quote: There are no rules for good photographs, there are only good photographs.

quote: Silence is golden when you can't think of a good answer.

quote: Every book you pick up has its own lesson or lessons, and quite often the bad books have more to teach than the good ones.

quote: Bad officials are the ones elected by good citizens who do not vote.

quote: A film is never really good unless the camera is an eye in the head of a poet.

quote: Life is a moderately good play with a badly written third act.

quote: Good men must not obey the laws too well.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: There is no kind of dishonesty into which otherwise good people more easily and frequently fall than that of defrauding the government.

quote: Each year one vicious habit discarded, in time might make the worst of us good.

quote: It is a good thing for an uneducated man to read books of quotations.

quote: Sometimes the truth hurts. And sometimes it feels real good.

quote: Nothing tastes as good as skinny feels.

quote: Non-cooperation with evil is as much a duty as is cooperation with good.

quote: A good film is when the price of the dinner, the theatre admission and the babysitter were worth it.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: Inspiration is one thing and you can't control it, but hard work is what keeps the ship moving. Good luck means, work hard. Keep up the good work.
author: Kevin Eubanks

quote: I look back on my life like a good day's work, it was done and I am satisfied with it.
author: Grandma Moses

quote: All tyranny needs to gain a foothold is for people of good conscience to remain silent.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: Yet, taught by time, my heart has learned to glow for other's good, and melt at other's woe.
author: Homer

quote: If the opposition disarms, well and good. If it refuses to disarm, we shall disarm it ourselves.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: Great and good are seldom the same man.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Whatever is done for love always occurs beyond good and evil.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The problem with having a sense of humor is often that people you use it on aren't in a very good mood.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: In life, all good things come hard, but wisdom is the hardest to come by.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: I keep my ideals, because in spite of everything I still believe that people are really good at heart.
author: Anne Frank

quote: There are several good protections against temptation, but the surest is cowardice.
author: Mark Twain

quote: To be good is noble; but to show others how to be good is nobler and no trouble.
author: Mark Twain

quote: A good thing never ends.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: A good man would prefer to be defeated than to defeat injustice by evil means.
author: Sallust

quote: The only work that will ultimately bring any good to any of us is the work of contributing to the healing of the world.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: One good schoolmaster is of more use than a hundred priests.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: A good artist should be isolated. If he isn't isolated, something is wrong.
author: Orson Welles

quote: Good things happen when you meet strangers.
author: Yo-Yo Ma

quote: Many a good hanging prevents a bad marriage.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Setting a good example is a far better way to spread ideals than through force of arms.
author: Ron Paul

quote: When you realize who the good people are in your life, you're so lucky.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: Make up your mind to act decidedly and take the consequences. No good is ever done in this world by hesitation.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: When people see your personality come out, they feel so good, like they actually know who you are.
author: Usain Bolt

quote: They didn't want it good, they wanted it Wednesday.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: A lot of good arguments are spoiled by some fool who knows what he is talking about.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: A good idea is about ten percent and implementation and hard work, and luck is 90 percent.
author: Guy Kawasaki

quote: I wish they'd had electric guitars in cotton fields back in the good old days. A whole lot of things would've been straightened out.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: It's always good to be underestimated.

quote: An affair now and then is good for a marriage. It adds spice, stops it from getting boring... I ought to know.
author: Bette Davis

quote: As a matter of self-preservation, a man needs good friends or ardent enemies, for the former instruct him and the latter take him to task.
author: Diogenes

quote: I am in politics because of the conflict between good and evil, and I believe that in the end good will triumph.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: It's no good trying to keep up old friendships. It's painful for both sides. The fact is, one grows out of people, and the only thing is to face it.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: The good man is the man who, no matter how morally unworthy he has been, is moving to become better.
author: John Dewey

quote: That terrible mood of depression of whether it's any good or not is what is known as The Artist's Reward.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: He who is not a good servant will not be a good master.
author: Plato

quote: Life is growth. If we stop growing, technically and spiritually, we are as good as dead.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: The Jews don't like Farrakhan, so they call me Hitler. Well, that's a good name. Hitler was a very great man.
author: Louis Farrakhan

quote: Go to foreign countries and you will get to know the good things one possesses at home.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The good physician treats the disease; the great physician treats the patient who has the disease.
author: William Osler

quote: The chief enemy of creativity is "good" sense.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: I used to work in a funeral home to feel good about myself, just the fact that I was breathing.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: If you don't have a spiritual practice in place when times are good, you can't expect to suddenly develop one during a moment of crisis.
author: Doug Coupland

quote: I shall the effect of this good lesson keeps as watchman to my heart.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Better is the enemy of good.
author: Voltaire

quote: All the good music has already been written by people with wigs and stuff.
author: Frank Zappa

quote: You're never as good as everyone tells you when you win, and you're never as bad as they say when you lose.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Good humor is the health of the soul, sadness is its poison.
author: Lord Chesterfield

quote: Anybody can be good in the country. There are no temptations there.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: But the real secret to lifelong good health is actually the opposite: Let your body take care of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: I must say I find television very educational. The minute somebody turns it on, I go to the library and read a good book.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The reading of all good books is like a conversation with the finest minds of past centuries.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: Hearing voices no one else can hear isn't a good sign, even in the wizarding world.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: Thinking good thoughts is not enough, doing good deeds is not enough, seeing others follow your good examples is enough.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Compromise is but the sacrifice of one right or good in the hope of retaining another - too often ending in the loss of both.
author: Tryon Edwards

quote: Compromise makes a good umbrella, but a poor roof; it is temporary expedient, often wise in party politics, almost sure to be unwise in statesmanship.
author: James Russell Lowell

quote: Nothing that you do will ever feel good if you let people convince you that you have no choice.
author: Fiona Apple

quote: People who have good relationships at home are more effective in the marketplace.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: If it's a good movie, the sound could go off and the audience would still have a perfectly clear idea of what was going on.
author: Alfred Hitchcock

quote: I'm leaving because the weather is too good. I hate London when it's not raining.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The good fighters of old first put themselves beyond the possibility of defeat, and then waited for an opportunity of defeating the enemy.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: The infliction of cruelty with a good conscience is a delight to moralists. That is why they invented Hell.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Listen; there's a hell of a good universe next door: let's go.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: While playing golf today I hit two good balls. I stepped on a rake.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: But I can say that life is good to me. Has been and is good. So I think my task is to be good to it. So how do you be good to life? You live it.

quote: I'm a big believer in that if you focus on good skin care, you really won't need a lot of makeup.
author: Demi Moore

quote: A book is good company. It is full of conversation without loquacity. It comes to your longing with full instruction, but pursues you never.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I have thought a sufficient measure of civilization is the influence of good women.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Hell isn't merely paved with good intentions; it's walled and roofed with them. Yes, and furnished too.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I surround myself with positive, productive people of good will and decency.
author: Ted Nugent

quote: To live well is to work well, to show a good activity.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: A good teacher, like a good entertainer first must hold his audience's attention, then he can teach his lesson.
author: John Henrik Clarke

quote: Anybody who says they are a good liar obviously is not, because any legitimately savvy liar would always insist they're honest about everything.
author: Chuck Klosterman

quote: Books are good enough in their own way, but they are a poor substitute for life.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: The old cathedrals are good, but the great blue dome that hangs over everything is better.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: To be doing good deeds is man's most glorious task.
author: Sophocles

quote: You can't be truly rude until you understand good manners.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: The four characteristics of humanism are curiosity, a free mind, belief in good taste, and belief in the human race.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: I've had extraordinary good luck with my health, other than a broken elbow.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: One must learn to love, and go through a good deal of suffering to get to it... and the journey is always towards the other soul.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Nobody gets justice. People only get good luck or bad luck.
author: Orson Welles

quote: I only wish that ordinary people had an unlimited capacity for doing harm; then they might have an unlimited power for doing good.
author: Socrates

quote: An unfortunate thing about this world is that the good habits are much easier to give up than the bad ones.

quote: I've gone for each type: the rough guy; the nerdy, sweet, lovable guy; and the slick guy. I don't really have a type. Men in general are a good thing.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: A humorist is a person who feels bad, but who feels good about it.
author: Don Herold

quote: Henceforth I ask not good fortune. I myself am good fortune.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Walk a mile in my shoes is good advice. Our children will learn to respect others if they are used to imagining themselves in another's place.
author: Neil Kurshan

quote: The good die young but not always. The wicked prevail but not consistently. I am confused by life, and I feel safe within the confines of the theatre.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: No good opera plot can be sensible, for people do not sing when they are feeling sensible.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Absences are a good influence in love and keep it bright and delicate.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Being a good teammate is when you try to sprint down a ball that everyone thinks is going out of bounds. But you go after it anyways and you get it.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: People write negatives things, cause they feel that's what sells. Good news to them, doesn't sell.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: Old people love to give good advice; it compensates them for their inability to set a bad example.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The desire of talking of ourselves, and showing those faults we do not mind having seen, makes up a good part of our sincerity.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Live fast, die young, and leave a good looking corpse.
author: John Derek

quote: My New Year's resolution is to stick to a good workout plan that will keep me healthy and happy.
author: James Lafferty

quote: A market is never saturated with a good product, but it is very quickly saturated with a bad one.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Well, real estate is always good, as far as I'm concerned.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Tolerating evil leads only to more evil. And when good people stand by and do nothing while wickedness reigns, their communities will be consumed.

quote: If I hold back, I'm no good. I'm no good. I'd rather be good sometimes, than holding back all the time.
author: Janis Joplin

quote: Dogs and philosophers do the greatest good and get the fewest rewards.

quote: A man that does not know how to be angry does not know how to be good.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Far from idleness being the root of all evil, it is rather the only true good.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: A general is just as good or just as bad as the troops under his command make him.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: At first, I only laughed at myself. Then I noticed that life itself is amusing. I've been in a generally good mood ever since.

quote: It is a fact often observed, that men have written good verses under the inspiration of passion, who cannot write well under other circumstances.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Plans are only good intentions unless they immediately degenerate into hard work.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: I've always wanted to improve on the idea of living well, In moderation, wine is good for you - mentally, physically, and spiritually.
author: Robert Mondavi

quote: He who is to be a good ruler must have first been ruled.

quote: Any man may be in good spirits and good temper when he's well dressed. There ain't much credit in that.

quote: We would frequently be ashamed of our good deeds if people saw all of the motives that produced them.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: It takes nearly as much ability to know how to profit by good advice as to know how to act for one's self.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Whatever good things people say of us, they tell us nothing new.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I like to do weird things in the shower, like drink my coffee, brush my teeth and drink a smoothie. It's good time management.

quote: I like a man who can be a real friend, has a good sense of humor, a good pair of shoes and a healthy gold card.

quote: Never call an accountant a credit to his profession; a good accountant is a debit to his profession.
author: Charles Lyell

quote: A perpetual holiday is a good working definition of hell.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Active Evil is better than Passive Good.
author: William Blake

quote: Only the pure in heart can make a good soup.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Any good music must be an innovation.
author: Les Baxter

quote: I don't think it's a good advert for any restaurant, a fat chef, and secondly, who wants to eat a dessert when the chef's a fat pig.

quote: Giving every man a vote has no more made men wise and free than Christianity has made them good.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Hugs can do great amounts of good - especially for children.
author: Princess Diana

quote: My spelling is Wobbly. It's good spelling but it Wobbles, and the letters get in the wrong places.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: I want people to remember me as a full on entertainer and a good person.

quote: A serious and good philosophical work could be written consisting entirely of jokes.

quote: It is not often that someone comes along who is a true friend and a good writer.

quote: The virtues, like the Muses, are always seen in groups. A good principle was never found solitary in any breast.

quote: You say it is the good cause that hallows even war? I say unto you: it is the good war that hallows any cause.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Each man is good in His sight. It is not necessary for eagles to be crows.

quote: I have seen how the foundations of the world are laid, and I have not the least doubt that it will stand a good while.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: All good books have one thing in common - they are truer than if they had really happened.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The idea of redemption is always good news, even if it means sacrifice or some difficult times.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Therefore, the good of man must be the end of the science of politics.
author: Aristotle

quote: To good and true love fear is forever affixed.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Destiny is a good thing to accept when it's going your way. When it isn't, don't call it destiny; call it injustice, treachery, or simple bad luck.
