quote: The bad fortune of the good turns their faces up to heaven; the good fortune of the bad bows their heads down to the earth.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Nothing is so contagious as example; and we never do any great good or evil which does not produce its like.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Old men are fond of giving good advice to console themselves for their inability to give bad examples.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There are heroes in evil as well as in good.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Well, for us, in history where goodness is a rare pearl, he who was good almost takes precedence over he who was great.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: That good disposition which boasts of being most tender is often stifled by the least urging of self-interest.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: We seldom praise anyone in good earnest, except such as admire us.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There is no better proof of a man's being truly good than his desiring to be constantly under the observation of good men.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The moderation of people in prosperity is the effect of a smooth and composed temper, owing to the calm of their good fortune.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Marriage is good enough for the lower classes: they have facilities for desertion that are denied to us.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Greek philosophy seems to have met with something with which a good tragedy is not supposed to meet, namely, a dull ending.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Mornin' ladies, my goodness don't you look happy. Must be cuttin' somebody up pretty good.
author: Andy Griffith

quote: No one would remember the Good Samaritan if he'd only had good intentions; he had money as well.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: Be a good animal, true to your animal instincts.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: A good husband makes a good wife.
author: John Florio

quote: It is good to rub and polish our brain against that of others.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: The opportunity for doing mischief is found a hundred times a day, and of doing good once in a year.
author: Voltaire

quote: My creed is that: Happiness is the only good. The place to be happy is here. The time to be happy is now. The way to be happy is to make others so.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: It is good that war is so horrible, or we might grow to like it.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: A good idea will keep you awake during the morning, but a great idea will keep you awake during the night.
author: Marilyn vos Savant

quote: It's a good place when all you have is hope and not expectations.
author: Danny Boyle

quote: I feel beautiful when I'm at peace with myself. When I'm serene, when I'm a good person, when I've been considerate of others.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: My mother gave lots of good advice and had a lot to say. As you get older, you realize everything she said was true.
author: Lenny Kravitz

quote: A good man can be stupid and still be good. But a bad man must have brains.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: For all right judgment of any man or things it is useful, nay, essential, to see his good qualities before pronouncing on his bad.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: It is good taste, and good taste alone, that possesses the power to sterilize and is always the first handicap to any creative functioning.
author: Salvador Dali

quote: Success is not a good teacher, failure makes you humble.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: There is more of good nature than of good sense at the bottom of most marriages.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: What a good thing Adam had. When he said a good thing he knew nobody had said it before.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Papa, potatoes, poultry, prunes and prism, are all very good words for the lips.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: All good writing is swimming under water and holding your breath.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Employee of the month is a good example of how somebody can be both a winner and a loser at the same time.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: You make a choice in your life, and it affects your life in all the ways, good and bad.
author: John Mayer

quote: It seems to never occur to fools that merit and good fortune are closely united.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Always remember that the most important thing in a good marriage is not happiness, but stability.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: Anyone who tells a lie has not a pure heart, and cannot make a good soup.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: The less we deserve good fortune, the more we hope for it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Actors are good liars; writers are good liars with good memories.
author: Daniel Keys Moran

quote: He that does good to another does good also to himself.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: There is as much greatness of mind in acknowledging a good turn, as in doing it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Man's true nature being lost, everything becomes his nature; as, his true good being lost, everything becomes his good.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: I am an over-achiever, and I want to be known for the good things in my life.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: Imagine what a harmonious world it could be if every single person, both young and old shared a little of what he is good at doing.
author: Quincy Jones

quote: A good photographer can make you look incredible, even when you're not feeling very sexy.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: Bad taste creates many more millionaires than good taste.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: I am glad that I paid so little attention to good advice; had I abided by it I might have been saved from some of my most valuable mistakes.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: Teach and practice, practice and teach - that is all we have; that is all we are good for; that is all we ever ought to do.
author: Ernest Holmes

quote: A bad man is the sort who weeps every time he speaks of a good woman.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: I sit astride life like a bad rider on a horse. I only owe it to the horse's good nature that I am not thrown off at this very moment.
author: Ludwig Wittgenstein

quote: A friend is always good to have, but a lover's kiss is better than angels raining down on me.
author: Dave Matthews

quote: The good we secure for ourselves is precarious and uncertain until it is secured for all of us and incorporated into our common life.
author: Jane Addams

quote: Human felicity is produced not as much by great pieces of good fortune that seldom happen as by little advantages that occur every day.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Reading isn't good for a ballplayer. Not good for his eyes. If my eyes went bad even a little bit I couldn't hit home runs. So I gave up reading.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: I think that the good and the great are only separated by the willingness to sacrifice.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: As brilliant an individual that Michael Jordan was, he was not successful until he got with a good team unit.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: Let's not be afraid to speak the common sense truth: you can't have high standards without good discipline.
author: William Hague

quote: In this country it is a good thing to kill an admiral from time to time to encourage the others.
author: Voltaire

quote: Whenever a doctor cannot do good, he must be kept from doing harm.
author: Hippocrates

quote: No man is good enough to govern any woman without her consent.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: What is good? All that heightens the feeling of power, the will to power, power itself in man.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: A good sacrifice is one that is not necessarily sound but leaves your opponent dazed and confused.
author: Nigel Short

quote: There are only two things worth aiming for, good music and a clean conscience.
author: Paul Hindemith

quote: Under all speech that is good for anything there lies a silence that is better, Silence is deep as Eternity; speech is shallow as Time.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Four legs good, two legs bad.
author: George Orwell

quote: Sarcasm I now see to be, in general, the language of the devil; for which reason I have long since as good as renounced it.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: The good of the people is the greatest law.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Mankind is not likely to salvage civilization unless he can evolve a system of good and evil which is independent of heaven and hell.
author: George Orwell

quote: Twelve significant photographs in any one year is a good crop.
author: Ansel Adams

quote: Always do good to others. Be selfless. Mentally remove everything and be free. This is divine life. This is the direct way to Moksha or salvation.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: The battleline between good and evil runs through the heart of every man.
author: Aleksandr Solzhenitsyn

quote: I just cash in on the fact that I'm good looking, and I've got a nice figure and girls like me.
author: Sid Vicious

quote: In modern life nothing produces such an effect as a good platitude. It makes the whole world kin.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I know only that what is moral is what you feel good after and what is immoral is what you feel bad after.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Harvard takes perfectly good plums as students, and turns them into prunes.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: I love good sense above all, perhaps because I have none.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: It's better to be good than evil, but one achieves goodness at a terrific cost.
author: Stephen King

quote: When I prayed for success, I forgot to ask for sound sleep and good digestion.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: The good die young, because they see it's no use living if you have got to be good.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Dear World, I am leaving because I am bored. I feel I have lived long enough. I am leaving you with your worries in this sweet cesspool. Good luck.
author: George Sanders

quote: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: That which is not good for the bee-hive cannot be good for the bees.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: The function of wisdom is to discriminate between good and evil.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: It is the merit of a general to impart good news, and to conceal the truth.
author: Sophocles

quote: I never said I wanted to be around for a long time. I always said I wanted to be here for a good time.
author: Kid Rock

quote: Happiness often sneaks in through a door you didn't know you left open.
author: John Barrymore

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Most folks are as happy as they make up their minds to be.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Some cause happiness wherever they go; others whenever they go.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Don't wait around for other people to be happy for you. Any happiness you get you've got to make yourself.
author: Alice Walker

quote: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Future. That period of time in which our affairs prosper, our friends are true and our happiness is assured.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: A table, a chair, a bowl of fruit and a violin; what else does a man need to be happy?
author: Albert Einstein

quote: It is not how much we have, but how much we enjoy, that makes happiness.
author: Charles Spurgeon

quote: The Constitution only gives people the right to pursue happiness. You have to catch it yourself.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Be happy with what you have and are, be generous with both, and you won't have to hunt for happiness.
author: William E. Gladstone

quote: Happiness depends upon ourselves.
author: Aristotle

quote: Action may not always bring happiness; but there is no happiness without action.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Happiness in intelligent people is the rarest thing I know.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: Money can't buy happiness, but it can make you awfully comfortable while you're being miserable.
author: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Just do what must be done. This may not be happiness, but it is greatness.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: The first recipe for happiness is: avoid too lengthy meditation on the past.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: There is only one way to happiness and that is to cease worrying about things which are beyond the power of our will.
author: Epictetus

quote: If your happiness depends on what somebody else does, I guess you do have a problem.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Happiness is like a kiss. You must share it to enjoy it.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: But what is happiness except the simple harmony between a man and the life he leads?
author: Albert Camus

quote: If you want to be happy, be.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Happiness is not a goal; it is a by-product.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Everyone chases after happiness, not noticing that happiness is right at their heels.
author: Bertolt Brecht

quote: Happy is the man who has broken the chains which hurt the mind, and has given up worrying once and for all.
author: Ovid

quote: A sure way to lose happiness, I found, is to want it at the expense of everything else.
author: Bette Davis

quote: In order to have great happiness you have to have great pain and unhappiness - otherwise how would you know when you're happy?
author: Leslie Caron

quote: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life.
author: Omar Khayyam

quote: True happiness is... to enjoy the present, without anxious dependence upon the future.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: To be without some of the things you want is an indispensable part of happiness.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Happiness is an inside job.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: Love is trembling happiness.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: It is neither wealth nor splendor; but tranquility and occupation which give you happiness.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: There are people who can do all fine and heroic things but one - keep from telling their happiness to the unhappy.
author: Mark Twain

quote: All happiness or unhappiness solely depends upon the quality of the object to which we are attached by love.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: The two enemies of human happiness are pain and boredom.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: True happiness... is not attained through self-gratification, but through fidelity to a worthy purpose.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Happiness is ideal, it is the work of the imagination.
author: Marquis de Sade

quote: The person born with a talent they are meant to use will find their greatest happiness in using it.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Happiness is a continuation of happenings which are not resisted.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: Happiness makes up in height for what it lacks in length.
author: Robert Frost

quote: You can be happy where you are.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I am a kind of paranoid in reverse. I suspect people of plotting to make me happy.
author: J. D. Salinger

quote: All who joy would win must share it. Happiness was born a Twin.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Happiness is that state of consciousness which proceeds from the achievement of one's values.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: Always leave something to wish for; otherwise you will be miserable from your very happiness.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: You must try to generate happiness within yourself. If you aren't happy in one place, chances are you won't be happy anyplace.
author: Ernie Banks

quote: Happiness depends more on how life strikes you than on what happens.
author: Andy Rooney

quote: Happiness comes only when we push our brains and hearts to the farthest reaches of which we are capable.
author: Leo Rosten

quote: The greatest of follies is to sacrifice health for any other kind of happiness.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Happiness grows at our own firesides, and is not to be picked in strangers' gardens.
author: Douglas William Jerrold

quote: Every gift from a friend is a wish for your happiness.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Do not speak of your happiness to one less fortunate than yourself.
author: Plutarch

quote: Happiness is like those palaces in fairy tales whose gates are guarded by dragons: we must fight in order to conquer it.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: Your successes and happiness are forgiven you only if you generously consent to share them.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Happiness is found in doing, not merely possessing.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: Happiness is having a scratch for every itch.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Happiness is a direction, not a place.
author: Sydney J. Harris

quote: Happiness: an agreeable sensation arising from contemplating the misery of another.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Don't walk behind me, I may not lead. There is only one happiness in life, to love and be loved.
author: George Sand

quote: True happiness consists not in the multitude of friends, but in the worth and choice.
author: Ben Jonson

quote: It is not easy to find happiness in ourselves, and it is not possible to find it elsewhere.
author: Agnes Repplier

quote: Happiness does not lie in happiness, but in the achievement of it.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: An effort made for the happiness of others lifts above ourselves.
author: Lydia M. Child

quote: Never mind your happiness; do your duty.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Money can't buy you happiness, but it can buy you a yacht big enough to pull up right alongside it.
author: David Lee Roth

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: When what we are is what we want to be, that's happiness.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: There is something curiously boring about somebody else's happiness.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: Desire is individual. Happiness is common.
author: Julian Casablancas

quote: People let their own hang-ups become the obstacles between them and personal happiness.
author: Lucinda Williams

quote: What we call the secret of happiness is no more a secret than our willingness to choose life.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Happiness is like a cloud, if you stare at it long enough, it evaporates.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: One of the keys to happiness is a bad memory.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: Happiness is mostly a by-product of doing what makes us feel fulfilled.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Happiness is itself a kind of gratitude.
author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: Nothing prevents happiness like the memory of happiness.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Our happiness depends on wisdom all the way.
author: Sophocles

quote: The moments of happiness we enjoy take us by surprise. It is not that we seize them, but that they seize us.
author: Ashley Montagu

quote: Happiness is a virtue, not its reward.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: Happiness never lays its finger on its pulse.
author: Adam Smith

quote: Happiness does not consist in self-love.
author: Joseph Butler

quote: Happiness seems made to be shared.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Lovers who love truly do not write down their happiness.
author: Anatole France

quote: Happiness is brief. It will not stay. God batters at its sails.
author: Euripides

quote: There is only one passion, the passion for happiness.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: It's pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: Only man clogs his happiness with care, destroying what is with thoughts of what may be.
author: John Dryden

quote: Growth itself contains the germ of happiness.
author: Pearl S. Buck

quote: If you have easy self-contentment, you might have a very, very cheap source of happiness.
author: Leon Kass

quote: To buy happiness is to sell soul.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: The happiness of a man in this life does not consist in the absence but in the mastery of his passions.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Happiness is a by-product. You cannot pursue it by itself.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: There is happiness in duty, although it may not seem so.
author: Jose Marti

quote: Unquestionably, it is possible to do without happiness; it is done involuntarily by nineteen-twentieths of mankind.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: To describe happiness is to diminish it.
author: Stendhal

quote: Happiness is composed of misfortunes avoided.
author: Alphonse Karr

quote: Life everlasting in a state of happiness is the greatest desire of all men.
author: Joseph Franklin Rutherford

quote: We possess only the happiness we are able to understand.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: How easy to be amiable in the midst of happiness and success.
author: William Ellery Channing

quote: We are no longer happy so soon as we wish to be happier.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: Satisfaction of one's curiosity is one of the greatest sources of happiness in life.
author: Linus Pauling

quote: Life in common among people who love each other is the ideal of happiness.
author: George Sand

quote: To attain happiness in another world we need only to believe something, while to secure it in this world we must do something.
author: Charlotte Perkins Gilman

quote: The right to happiness is fundamental.
author: Anna Pavlova

quote: Happiness is hard to recall. Its just a glow.
author: Frank McCourt

quote: The action is best that secures the greatest happiness for the greatest number.
author: William Dean Howells

quote: The secret of happiness is to admire without desiring. And that is not happiness.
author: F. H. Bradley

quote: The happiness which is lacking makes one think even the happiness one has unbearable.
author: Joseph Roux

quote: Happiness will come from materialism, not from meaning.
author: Andrei Platonov

quote: The happiness of most people is not ruined by great catastrophes or fatal errors, but by the repetition of slowly destructive little things.
author: Ernest Dimnet

quote: There is no worse sorrow than remembering happiness in the day of sorrow.
author: Alfred de Musset

quote: So long as we can lose any happiness, we possess some.
author: Booth Tarkington

quote: Affection is responsible for nine-tenths of whatever solid and durable happiness there is in our lives.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Thousands of candles can be lighted from a single candle, and the life of the candle will not be shortened. Happiness never decreases by being shared.
author: Buddha

quote: You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life.
author: Albert Camus

quote: The U. S. Constitution doesn't guarantee happiness, only the pursuit of it. You have to catch up with it yourself.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Happiness and moral duty are inseparably connected.
author: George Washington

quote: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul.
author: Democritus

quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Money has never made man happy, nor will it, there is nothing in its nature to produce happiness. The more of it one has the more one wants.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is wanting what you get.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: True happiness involves the full use of one's power and talents.
author: John W. Gardner

quote: I heard a definition once: Happiness is health and a short memory! I wish I'd invented it, because it is very true.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: But O, how bitter a thing it is to look into happiness through another man's eyes.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Choose your life's mate carefully. From this one decision will come 90 percent of all your happiness or misery.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: To find out what one is fitted to do, and to secure an opportunity to do it, is the key to happiness.
author: John Dewey

quote: Happiness is neither virtue nor pleasure nor this thing nor that but simply growth, We are happy when we are growing.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I would maintain that thanks are the highest form of thought, and that gratitude is happiness doubled by wonder.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Truth is a deep kindness that teaches us to be content in our everyday life and share with the people the same happiness.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Happiness can exist only in acceptance.
author: George Orwell

quote: The true secret of happiness lies in taking a genuine interest in all the details of daily life.
author: William Morris

quote: Happiness lies in the joy of achievement and the thrill of creative effort.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: Independence is happiness.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Three grand essentials to happiness in this life are something to do, something to love, and something to hope for.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: Be more dedicated to making solid achievements than in running after swift but synthetic happiness.
author: Abdul Kalam

quote: Happiness is a butterfly, which when pursued, is always just beyond your grasp, but which, if you will sit down quietly, may alight upon you.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: There is no value in life except what you choose to place upon it and no happiness in any place except what you bring to it yourself.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Marriage is the most natural state of man, and... the state in which you will find solid happiness.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Happiness is a how; not a what. A talent, not an object.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: We all want to help one another. Human beings are like that. We want to live by each other's happiness, not by each other's misery.
author: Charlie Chaplin

quote: There is no greater sorrow than to recall happiness in times of misery.
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: Happiness is not being pained in body or troubled in mind.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Morality is not the doctrine of how we may make ourselves happy, but how we may make ourselves worthy of happiness.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: A smile is happiness you'll find right under your nose.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: People take different roads seeking fulfillment and happiness. Just because they're not on your road doesn't mean they've gotten lost.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: One test of the correctness of educational procedure is the happiness of the child.
author: Maria Montessori

quote: The only way to find true happiness is to risk being completely cut open.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: The word "happiness" would lose its meaning if it were not balanced by sadness.
author: Carl Jung

quote: I do believe that if you haven't learnt about sadness, you cannot appreciate happiness.
author: Nana Mouskouri

quote: Happiness is a byproduct of function, purpose, and conflict; those who seek happiness for itself seek victory without war.
author: William S. Burroughs

quote: Happiness is beneficial for the body, but it is grief that develops the powers of the mind.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: A mother's happiness is like a beacon, lighting up the future but reflected also on the past in the guise of fond memories.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Happiness is a ball after which we run wherever it rolls, and we push it with our feet when it stops.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The supreme happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather in spite of ourselves.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: No one has a right to consume happiness without producing it.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The secret to happiness is to face the fact that the world is horrible.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: It is not in the pursuit of happiness that we find fulfillment, it is in the happiness of pursuit.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Happiness is not a reward - it is a consequence. Suffering is not a punishment - it is a result.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: The essence of philosophy is that a man should so live that his happiness shall depend as little as possible on external things.
author: Epictetus

quote: Caring about others, running the risk of feeling, and leaving an impact on people, brings happiness.
author: Harold Kushner

quote: Politicians also have no leisure, because they are always aiming at something beyond political life itself, power and glory, or happiness.
author: Aristotle

quote: People say that money is not the key to happiness, but I always figured if you have enough money, you can have a key made.
author: Joan Rivers

quote: Contempt for happiness is usually contempt for other people's happiness, and is an elegant disguise for hatred of the human race.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: The happiness of life is made up of minute fractions - the little, soon forgotten charities of a kiss or a smile, a kind look or heartfelt compliment.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Nothing flatters a man as much as the happiness of his wife; he is always proud of himself as the source of it.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Happiness is the natural flower of duty.
author: Phillips Brooks

quote: Doing nothing is happiness for children and misery for old men.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: One of the first conditions of happiness is that the link between Man and Nature shall not be broken.
author: Leo Tolstoy

quote: Happiness is the absence of the striving for happiness.
author: Zhuangzi

quote: What we call happiness in the strictest sense comes from the (preferably sudden) satisfaction of needs which have been dammed up to a high degree.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Why love if losing hurts so much? I have no answers anymore; only the life I have lived. The pain now is part of the happiness then.
author: Anthony Hopkins

quote: Did perpetual happiness in the Garden of Eden maybe get so boring that eating the apple was justified?
author: Chuck Palahniuk

quote: Happiness is not an ideal of reason, but of imagination.
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: We have no more right to consume happiness without producing it than to consume wealth without producing it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Happiness is different from pleasure. Happiness has something to do with struggling and enduring and accomplishing.
author: George A. Sheehan

quote: Our object in the construction of the state is the greatest happiness of the whole, and not that of any one class.
author: Plato

quote: Ladies of Fashion starve their happiness to feed their vanity, and their love to feed their pride.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: A really great talent finds its happiness in execution.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Happiness is your own treasure because it lies within you.
author: Prem Rawat

quote: Action may not bring happiness but there is no happiness without action.
author: William James

quote: Life's greatest happiness is to be convinced we are loved.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: If all our happiness is bound up entirely in our personal circumstances it is difficult not to demand of life more than it has to give.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Money can't buy you happiness but it does bring you a more pleasant form of misery.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: Part of the happiness of life consists not in fighting battles, but in avoiding them. A masterly retreat is in itself a victory.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: There is joy in work. There is no happiness except in the realization that we have accomplished something.
author: Henry Ford

quote: It is not true that suffering ennobles the character; happiness does that sometimes, but suffering for the most part, makes men petty and vindictive.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: No man is happy without a delusion of some kind. Delusions are as necessary to our happiness as realities.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: For happiness one needs security, but joy can spring like a flower even from the cliffs of despair.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: Fun I love, but too much fun is of all things the most loathsome. Mirth is better than fun, and happiness is better than mirth.
author: William Blake

quote: Happiness in marriage is entirely a matter of chance.
author: Jane Austen

quote: My happiness grows in direct proportion to my acceptance, and in inverse proportion to my expectations.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Curiosity is one of the great secrets of happiness.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The happiness and misery of men depend no less on temper than fortune.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Where fear is, happiness is not.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: No matter how dull, or how mean, or how wise a man is, he feels that happiness is his indisputable right.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Of all forms of caution, caution in love is perhaps the most fatal to true happiness.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Wisdom is the supreme part of happiness.
author: Sophocles

quote: I refuse to accept other people's ideas of happiness for me. As if there's a 'one size fits all' standard for happiness.
author: Kanye West

quote: We never taste happiness in perfection, our most fortunate successes are mixed with sadness.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Happiness is the only sanction of life; where happiness fails, existence remains a mad and lamentable experiment.
author: George Santayana

quote: Success is getting what you want. Happiness is liking what you get.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: I have this really high priority on happiness and finding something to be happy about.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: The first requisite for the happiness of the people is the abolition of religion.
author: Karl Marx

quote: While we are focusing on fear, worry, or hate, it is not possible for us to be experiencing happiness, enthusiasm or love.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Life does not agree with philosophy: There is no happiness that is not idleness, and only what is useless is pleasurable.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: Dancing and running shake up the chemistry of happiness.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Happiness is a choice that requires effort at times.
author: Aeschylus

quote: You take away all the other luxuries in life, and if you can make someone smile and laugh, you have given the most special gift: happiness.
author: Brad Garrett

quote: When ambition ends, happiness begins.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: Money may not buy happiness, but it can damn well give it!
author: Freddie Mercury

quote: Men can only be happy when they do not assume that the object of life is happiness.
author: George Orwell

quote: Wealth, like happiness, is never attained when sought after directly. It comes as a by-product of providing a useful service.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Plenty of people miss their share of happiness, not because they never found it, but because they didn't stop to enjoy it.
author: William Feather

quote: It is pretty hard to tell what does bring happiness; poverty and wealth have both failed.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: To be perfectly happy it does not suffice to possess happiness, it is necessary to have deserved it.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The most worth-while thing is to try to put happiness into the lives of others.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: An act of goodness is of itself an act of happiness. No reward coming after the event can compare with the sweet reward that went with it.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: Our envy always lasts longer than the happiness of those we envy.
author: Heraclitus

quote: I have learned to seek my happiness by limiting my desires, rather than in attempting to satisfy them.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: The world is full of people looking for spectacular happiness while they snub contentment.
author: Doug Larson

quote: Whoever said money can't buy happiness simply didn't know where to go shopping.
author: Bo Derek

quote: There is nothing which has yet been contrived by man, by which so much happiness is produced as by a good tavern.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: The person who seeks all their applause from outside has their happiness in another's keeping .
author: Dale Carnegie

quote: Happiness always looks small while you hold it in your hands, but let it go, and you learn at once how big and precious it is.
author: Maxim Gorky

quote: Indeed, man wishes to be happy even when he so lives as to make happiness impossible.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Grief at the absence of a loved one is happiness compared to life with a person one hates.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Bride: A woman with a fine prospect of happiness behind her.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Happiness in the present is only shattered by comparison with the past.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: The health of the people is really the foundation upon which all their happiness and all their powers as a state depend.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I hump the wild to take it all in, there is no bag limit on happiness.
author: Ted Nugent

quote: Every day is a new day, and you'll never be able to find happiness if you don't move on.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: Everyone has their own way of expressing happiness.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: The wish for healing has always been half of health.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The great thing in the world is not so much to seek happiness as to earn peace and self-respect.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: Happiness is your dentist telling you it won't hurt and then having him catch his hand in the drill.
author: Johnny Carson

quote: Happiness is a mystery, like religion, and should never be rationalised.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The way you think, the way you behave, the way you eat, can influence your life by 30 to 50 years.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: Life is to be fortified by many friendships. To love and to be loved is the greatest happiness of existence.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity.
author: Hippocrates

quote: You know, all that really matters is that the people you love are happy and healthy. Everything else is just sprinkles on the sundae.
author: Paul Walker

quote: The only happiness a brave person ever troubles themselves in asking about, is happiness enough to get their work done.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: There is only one way to achieve happiness on this terrestrial ball, and that is to have either a clear conscience or none at all.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: When a man has lost all happiness, he's not alive. Call him a breathing corpse.
author: Sophocles

quote: 'Tis healthy to be sick sometimes.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The Constitution guarantees us our rights to life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness. That's all. It doesn't guarantee our rights to charity.
author: Jesse Ventura

quote: Love is not a feeling of happiness. Love is a willingness to sacrifice.
author: Michael Novak

quote: Give a man health and a course to steer, and he'll never stop to trouble about whether he's happy or not.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: I have the body of an eighteen year old. I keep it in the fridge.
author: Spike Milligan

quote: The white man's happiness cannot be purchased by the black man's misery.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: Your body hears everything your mind says.
author: Naomi Judd

quote: A healthy outside starts from the inside.
author: Robert Urich

quote: There can be no happiness if the things we believe in are different from the things we do.
author: Freya Stark

quote: True silence is the rest of the mind, and is to the spirit what sleep is to the body, nourishment and refreshment.
author: William Penn

quote: Whether happiness may come or not, one should try and prepare one's self to do without it.
author: George Eliot

quote: How do I stay so healthy and boyishly handsome? It's simple. I drink the blood of young runaways.
author: William Shatner

quote: I believe that how you feel is very important to how you look - that healthy equals beautiful.
author: Victoria Principal

quote: My body is like breakfast, lunch, and dinner. I don't think about it, I just have it.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Happiness is good health and a bad memory.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: My health may be better preserved if I exert myself less, but in the end doesn't each person give his life for his calling?
author: Clara Schumann

quote: The said truth is that it is the greatest happiness of the greatest number that is the measure of right and wrong.
author: Jeremy Bentham

quote: As the blessings of health and fortune have a beginning, so they must also find an end. Everything rises but to fall, and increases but to decay.
author: Sallust

quote: Happiness is a hard master, particularly other people's happiness.
author: Aldous Huxley

quote: I wish people could acheive what they think would bring them happiness in order for them to realize that thats not really what happiness is.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: My personal goals are to be happy, healthy and to be surrounded by loved ones.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Rest when you're weary. Refresh and renew yourself, your body, your mind, your spirit. Then get back to work.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Self-pity comes so naturally to all of us. The most solid happiness can be shaken by the compassion of a fool.
author: Andre Maurois

quote: The trouble with always trying to preserve the health of the body is that it is so difficult to do without destroying the health of the mind.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: People who don't know how to keep themselves healthy ought to have the decency to get themselves buried, and not waste time about it.
author: Henrik Ibsen

quote: Character is the basis of happiness and happiness the sanction of character.
author: George Santayana

quote: I feel pretty good. My body actually looks like an old banana, but it's fine.
author: Mike Piazza

quote: Knowledge of what is possible is the beginning of happiness.
author: George Santayana

quote: Arguments are healthy. They clear the air.
author: John Deacon

quote: The happiness of one's own heart alone cannot satisfy the soul; one must try to include, as necessary to one's own happiness, the happiness of others.
author: Paramahansa Yogananda

quote: America's health care system is in crisis precisely because we systematically neglect wellness and prevention.
author: Tom Harkin

quote: Man needs difficulties; they are necessary for health.
author: Carl Jung

quote: I have a healthy body, free of the chemicals that once controlled it.
author: Lorna Luft

quote: The search for happiness is one of the chief sources of unhappiness.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: The minute anyone's getting anxious I say, You must eat and you must sleep. They're the two vital elements for a healthy life.
author: Francesca Annis

quote: And one who is just of his own free will shall not lack for happiness; and he will never come to utter ruin.
author: Aeschylus

quote: I'm exhausted trying to stay healthy.
author: Steve Yzerman

quote: I sit on my duff, smoke cigarettes and watch TV. I'm not exactly a poster girl for healthy living.
author: Lexa Doig

quote: Music is the refuge of souls ulcerated by happiness.
author: Emile M. Cioran

quote: I eat really healthy, and if I'm tired, I take a nap.
author: Casper Van Dien

quote: You traverse the world in search of happiness, which is within the reach of every man. A contented mind confers it on all.
author: Horace

quote: I'm still healthy as can be.
author: Darrell Royal

quote: I've made a promise to myself to be a 100% healthy person if nothing else.
author: Picabo Street

quote: What the public expects and what is healthy for an individual are two very different things.
author: Esther Williams

quote: The body is a sacred garment.
author: Martha Graham

quote: Every possession and every happiness is but lent by chance for an uncertain time, and may therefore be demanded back the next hour.
author: Arthur Schopenhauer

quote: Sorrow happens, hardship happens, the hell with it, who never knew the price of happiness, will not be happy.
author: Yevgeny Yevtushenko

quote: I stand before you a totally healthy person.
author: Melissa Etheridge

quote: I had my moments when I got very frightened that I would not recover.
author: Fran Drescher

quote: We exaggerate misfortune and happiness alike. We are never as bad off or as happy as we say we are.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The average, healthy, well-adjusted adult gets up at seven-thirty in the morning feeling just plain terrible.
author: Jean Kerr

quote: Healthy people live with their world.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: Happiness is perfume, you can't pour it on somebody else without getting a few drops on yourself.
author: James Van Der Zee

quote: Know then this truth, enough for man to know virtue alone is happiness below.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: You know, true love really matters, friends really matter, family really matters. Being responsible and disciplined and healthy really matters.
author: Courtney Thorne Smith

quote: When you relinquish the desire to control your future, you can have more happiness.
author: Nicole Kidman

quote: Money, if it does not bring you happiness, will at least help you be miserable in comfort.
author: Helen Gurley Brown

quote: The happiness of the bee and the dolphin is to exist. For man it is to know that and to wonder at it.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Health is the greatest possession. Contentment is the greatest treasure. Confidence is the greatest friend. Non-being is the greatest joy.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: I adored Mickey Mouse when I was a child. He was the emblem of happiness and funniness.
author: Maurice Sendak

quote: It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: When wealth is lost, nothing is lost; when health is lost, something is lost; when character is lost, all is lost.
author: Billy Graham

quote: Happiness comes when we test our skills towards some meaningful purpose.
author: John Stossel

quote: Be careful about reading health books. You may die of a misprint.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Grief knits two hearts in closer bonds than happiness ever can; and common sufferings are far stronger links than common joys.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: The happiness of this life depends less on what befalls you than the way in which you take it.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: The devil has put a penalty on all things we enjoy in life. Either we suffer in health or we suffer in soul or we get fat.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Self-esteem is as important to our well-being as legs are to a table. It is essential for physical and mental health and for happiness.
author: Louise Hart

quote: I am about to be married, and am of course in all the misery of a man in pursuit of happiness.
author: Lord Byron

quote: To be obliged to beg our daily happiness from others bespeaks a more lamentable poverty than that of him who begs his daily bread.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
author: Mark Twain

quote: If you ever find happiness by hunting for it, you will find it, as the old woman did her lost spectacles, safe on her own nose all the time.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Happiness: a good bank account, a good cook, and a good digestion.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: There is no correlation between happiness and amounts of money.
author: Kesha

quote: Use your health, even to the point of wearing it out. That is what it is for. Spend all you have before you die; do not outlive yourself.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Happiness... consists in giving, and in serving others.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: In theory there is a possibility of perfect happiness: To believe in the indestructible element within one, and not to strive towards it.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: Objects we ardently pursue bring little happiness when gained; most of our pleasures come from unexpected sources.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: The happiness of the creature consists in rejoicing in God, by which also God is magnified and exalted.
author: Jonathan Edwards

quote: Happiness and peace will come to earth only as the light of love and human compassion enter the souls of men.
author: David O. McKay

quote: The Bluebird of Happiness long absent from his life, Ned is visited by the Chicken of Depression.
author: Gary Larson

quote: I can be forced to live without happiness, but I will never consent to live without honor.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: Why does watching a dog be a dog fill one with happiness?
author: Jonathan Safran Foer

quote: The health of the eye seems to demand a horizon. We are never tired, so long as we can see far enough.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: There is no happiness in love, except at the end of an English novel.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: As to happiness in this life it is hardly compatible with that diminished respect which ever attends the relinquishing of labour.
author: Anthony Trollope

quote: Happiness is nothing but temporary moments here and there - and I love those. But I would be bored out of my mind if I were happy all the time.
author: Zoe Saldana

quote: There is no happiness in having or in getting, but only in giving.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: As a child is indulged or checked in its early follies, a ground is generally laid for the happiness or misery of the future man.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: Crying is cleansing. There's a reason for tears, happiness or sadness.
author: Dionne Warwick

quote: True religion... is giving and finding one's happiness by bringing happiness into the lives of others.
author: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: One mustn't ask apple trees for oranges, France for sun, women for love, life for happiness.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Health nuts are going to feel stupid someday, lying in hospitals dying of nothing.
author: Redd Foxx

quote: The secret to true happiness is a combination of low expectations and insensitivity.
author: Olivia Goldsmith

quote: A good way I know to find happiness, is to not bore a hole to fit the plug.
author: Josh Billings

quote: What is called genius is the abundance of life and health.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Happiness is the longing for repetition.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: All mankind... being all equal and independent, no one ought to harm another in his life, health, liberty or possessions.
author: John Locke

quote: Happiness is obsolete: uneconomic.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: A wise man should consider that health is the greatest of human blessings, and learn how by his own thought to derive benefit from his illnesses.
author: Hippocrates

quote: What's the use of happiness? It can't buy you money.
author: Henny Youngman

quote: If you have not taken the time to define what happiness means to you, what have your spent your whole life pursuing?
author: Bo Bennett

quote: I try to stress to my children that buying something never leads to true happiness.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: He who avoids complaint invites happiness.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: You've got to ask! Asking is, in my opinion, the world's most powerful - and neglected - secret to success and happiness.
author: Percy Ross

quote: It's no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The true index of a man's character is the health of his wife.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: The British do not expect happiness. I had the impression, all the time that I lived there, that they do not want to be happy; they want to be right.
author: Quentin Crisp

quote: Health is not valued till sickness comes.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Happiness is a monstrosity! Punished are those who seek it.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I've gotten to a point, where I realize that happiness doesn't come from the outside.
author: Ricky Williams

quote: My life has run from misery to happiness.
author: Loretta Lynn

quote: Happiness is a choice. You can choose to be happy. There's going to be stress in life, but it's your choice whether you let it affect you or not.
author: Valerie Bertinelli

quote: One of the indictments of civilizations is that happiness and intelligence are so rarely found in the same person.
author: William Feather

quote: The will of man is his happiness.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The worst thing that can happen to a man is to lose his money, the next worst his health, the next worst his reputation.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Happiness is the reward we get for living to the highest right we know.
author: Richard Bach

quote: Happiness isn't happiness unless there's a violin-playing goat.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: The gratification of desire is not happiness.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Happiness is a matter of one's most ordinary and everyday mode of consciousness being busy and lively and unconcerned with self.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Most people ask for happiness on condition. Happiness can only be felt if you don't set any condition.
author: Arthur Rubinstein

quote: Happiness serves hardly any other purpose than to make unhappiness possible.
author: Marcel Proust

quote: Happiness is secured through virtue; it is a good attained by man's own will.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: But happiness is no respecter of persons.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: America's health care system is neither healthy, caring, nor a system.
author: Walter Cronkite

quote: A good cook is like a sorceress who dispenses happiness.
author: Elsa Schiaparelli

quote: Power, after love, is the first source of happiness.
author: Stendhal

quote: Capital is reckless of the health or length of life of the laborer, unless under compulsion from society.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Every poll about the Left, the Right, and happiness reveals that the farther left one goes, the less happy the person is likely to be.
author: Dennis Prager

quote: Money is to my social existence what health is to my body.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Since every man desires happiness, it is evidently no small matter whether he conceives of happiness in terms of work or of enjoyment.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: Happiness isn't getting what you want, it's wanting what you got.
author: Garth Brooks

quote: It's bizarre that the produce manager is more important to my children's health than the pediatrician.
author: Meryl Streep

quote: I enjoy being happy every day, and hopefully you can hear my happiness in my music. Life is beautiful.
author: Christina Milian

quote: God's children and their happiness are my reasons for being.
author: Red Skelton

quote: I don't think that sin and pursuing happiness are not necessarily the same thing.
author: Dan Savage

quote: Mental health is often missing from public health debates even though it's critical to wellbeing.
author: Diane Abbott

quote: How can you tell somebody whose is pursuing happiness that they're somehow not American when that was the very first promise that America made?
author: Dan Savage

quote: A moderate addiction to money may not always be hurtful; but when taken in excess it is nearly always bad for the health.
author: Clarence Day

quote: In a disordered mind, as in a disordered body, soundness of health is impossible.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: No human being can really understand another, and no one can arrange another's happiness.
author: Graham Greene

quote: I've never had very high regard for therapists. I owe my health, my mental survival, to my friends and loved ones.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: Health is the soul that animates all the enjoyments of life, which fade and are tasteless without it.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: It's horrible when people are only interested in buying labels, because it doesn't bring them the happiness they think it will.
author: Miuccia Prada

quote: And perfect happiness? Man, that's a... the pool is about 92 degrees, the Jacuzzi is about 102 and an avocado farm.
author: Jamie Foxx

quote: Joe E. Lewis said, 'Money doesn't buy happiness but it calms the nerves.' And that is how I feel about a film being well-received.
author: Alexander Payne

quote: Sobriety and health is the greatest thing.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Avoid lawsuits beyond all things; they pervert your conscience, impair your health, and dissipate your property.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: A comfortable house is a great source of happiness. It ranks immediately after health and a good conscience.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: Some of us might find happiness if we quit struggling so desperately for it.
author: William Feather

quote: Eating ice cream and not exercising is great. The downside is your health isn't so good.
author: Jeff Bridges

quote: Maturity - among other things, the unclouded happiness of the child at play, who takes it for granted that he is at one with his play-mates.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Happiness and virtue rest upon each other; the best are not only the happiest, but the happiest are usually the best.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I don't have the recipe for happiness, but I think the engine is simply having the desire.
author: Vanessa Paradis

quote: I've often thought if I didn't make my marriage work, I would have failed at my one true shot at happiness.
author: Bethenny Frankel

quote: Happiness is always a coincidence.
author: Jose Bergamin

quote: I figure if I have my health, can pay the rent and I have my friends, I call it 'content.'
author: Lauren Bacall

quote: Existence is a strange bargain. Life owes us little; we owe it everything. The only true happiness comes from squandering ourselves for a purpose.
author: William Cowper

quote: I don't know the true meaning of happiness.
author: Jonathan Davis

quote: Happiness is no respecter of persons.
author: Stephen Fry

quote: A teacher must believe in the value and interest of his subject as a doctor believes in health.
author: Gilbert Highet

quote: My travels led me to where I am today. Sometimes these steps have felt painful, difficult, but led me to greater happiness and opportunites.
author: Diana Ross

quote: Fate often puts all the material for happiness and prosperity into a man's hands just to see how miserable he can make himself with them.
author: Don Marquis

quote: Medicine sometimes snatches away health, sometimes gives it.
author: Ovid

quote: I have never yet met a healthy person who worried very much about his health, or a really good person who worried much about his own soul.
author: John B. S. Haldane

quote: Derive happiness in oneself from a good day's work, from illuminating the fog that surrounds us.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: I am deeply convinced that happiness does not exist in this world.
author: Taylor Caldwell

quote: The most exciting happiness is the happiness generated by forces beyond your control.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: I think it's horrible that people have to be told. Don't smoke! Everybody knows it's bad for the health. But they have to forbid it.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: The discovery of a new dish confers more happiness on humanity, than the discovery of a new star.
author: Jean Anthelme Brillat-Savarin

quote: What can be added to the happiness of a man who is in health, out of debt, and has a clear conscience?
author: Adam Smith

quote: Health consists with temperance alone.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: The sound of laughter is like the vaulted dome of a temple of happiness.
author: Milan Kundera

quote: We do not have a functioning market in the true sense of the word in health care. That's a layer of transparency that's sorely needed in America.
author: Paul Ryan

quote: Heartache is very fertile ground for song-making but so is happiness, so is absolute bliss.
author: K. D. Lang

quote: Happiness is mental harmony; unhappiness is mental inharmony.
author: James Allen

quote: Each person is living for himself; his own happiness is all he can ever personally feel.
author: Harry Browne

quote: I think the secret to happiness is having a Teflon soul. Whatever comes your way, you either let it slide or you cook with it.
author: Diane Lane

quote: I received free health care.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: If you can be well without health, you may be happy without virtue.
author: Edmund Burke

quote: What would there be in a story of happiness? Only what prepares it, only what destroys it can be told.
author: Andre Gide

quote: If thou be industrious to procure wealth, be generous in the disposal of it. Man never is so happy as when he giveth happiness unto another.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: My life in Brooklyn was in constant danger because of my bad health.
author: Maurice Sendak

quote: To be able to throw one's self away for the sake of a moment, to be able to sacrifice years for a woman's smile - that is happiness.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: My health is fine.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: It is better to lose health like a spendthrift than to waste it like a miser.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: People use so much more health care when they live longer.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: Happiness is inward, and not outward; and so, it does not depend on what we have, but on what we are.
author: Henry Van Dyke

quote: Holiness, not happiness, is the chief end of man.
author: Oswald Chambers

quote: My main goal is to stay healthy because when you're injured you realise how lucky you are to have your health.
author: Maria Sharapova

quote: My mother was a public school teacher in Virginia, and we didn't have any money, we just survived on happiness, on being a happy family.
author: Dave Grohl

quote: So even though I consider myself a fairly upbeat person, energetic and things like that, I never do very well on happiness tests.
author: Barbara Ehrenreich

quote: I love acting. It's my playground, it let's me explore. But my happiness in this world - my level of peace - is never going to be dictated by acting.
author: Chris Evans

quote: But my happiness in this world - my level of peace - is never going to be dictated by acting.
author: Chris Evans

quote: A wise woman never yields by appointment. It should always be an unforeseen happiness.
author: Stendhal

quote: Successful health reform must not just make health insurance affordable, affordable health insurance has to make health care affordable.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: Happiness is a thing to be practiced, like the violin.
author: John Lubbock

quote: Overnight stardom can be harmful to your mental health. Yeah. It has ruined a lot of people.
author: Clint Eastwood

quote: No company is preferable to bad. We are more apt to catch the vices of others than virtues, as disease is far more contagious than health.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: We cannot continue. Our pension costs and health care costs for our employees are going to bankrupt this city.
author: Michael Bloomberg

quote: I never was someone who was at ease with happiness.
author: Hugh Laurie

quote: Happiness? No, it's not there for me.
author: Robert Mapplethorpe

quote: My mum brought me up to think that personal happiness is more important than your family.
author: Gail Porter

quote: Those who seek happiness miss it, and those who discuss it, lack it.
author: Holbrook Jackson

quote: I am happy as happiness goes, for a woman who has so many memories and who lives the lonely life of an actress.
author: Lillie Langtry

quote: Restoring responsibility and accountability is essential to the economic and fiscal health of our nation.
author: Carl Levin

quote: Scarcely one person in a thousand is capable of tasting the happiness of others.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: There is an old saying that money can't buy happiness. If it could, I would buy myself four hits every game.
author: Pete Rose

quote: You find happiness where you find it.
author: Anna Paquin

quote: Even when they have nothing, the Irish emit a kind of happiness, a joy.
author: Fiona Shaw

quote: I believe in universal health care. And I am not afraid to say so.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: I'm convinced that we can shape a different future for this country as it relates to mental health and as it relates to suicide.
author: David Satcher

quote: When we were together, I loved you deeply and you gave me so much happiness I can never repay you.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: The slave may be happy, but happiness is not enough.
author: Herbert Read

quote: The purpose of human life and the sense of happiness is to give the maximum what the man is able to give.
author: Alexander Alekhine

quote: I am opposed to anybody making a decision for you or me or anybody else about what health care plan we should have.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: There's nothing more important than our good health - that's our principal capital asset.
author: Arlen Specter

quote: I come before you to declare that my sex are entitled to the inalienable right to life, liberty, and the pursuit of happiness.
author: Victoria Woodhull

quote: Happiness is a very small desk and a very big wastebasket.
author: Robert Orben

quote: Happiness is a wine of the rarest vintage, and seems insipid to a vulgar taste.
author: Logan P. Smith

quote: I think my capacity to change has given me tremendous happiness, because who I am today I am completely content to be.
author: Jamie Lee Curtis

quote: You can have a lot of unhappiness by not having money, but the reverse is no guarantee of happiness.
author: Philip Kaufman

quote: I don't really care how I am remembered as long as I bring happiness and joy to people.
author: Eddie Albert

quote: What is at stake in the debate over health care is more than the mere crafting of policy. The issue is now the identity of the Democratic Party.
author: Thomas Frank

quote: Thus happiness depends, as nature shows, less on exterior things than most suppose.
author: William Cowper

quote: The greatest happiness comes from being vitally interested in something that excites all your energies.
author: Walter Annenberg

quote: Medicine to produce health must examine disease; and music, to create harmony must investigate discord.
author: Plutarch

quote: Exuberant health is always, as such, sickness also.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: When you analyze happiness, it turns out that the way you spend your time is extremely important.
author: Daniel Kahneman

quote: No matter how old you are, no matter how much you weigh, you can still control the health of your body.
author: Mehmet Oz

quote: Wendy Malick and Valerie Bertinelli make fun of me, but I take care of my health - I don't abuse it.
author: Betty White

quote: Goodness does not more certainly make men happy than happiness makes them good.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: Good health is not something we can buy. However, it can be an extremely valuable savings account.
author: Anne Wilson Schaef

quote: America doesn't have health insurance.
author: Joe Biden

quote: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions and not our circumstances.
author: Martha Washington

quote: Health is the state about which medicine has nothing to say.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: We should be concerned not only about the health of individual patients, but also the health of our entire society.
author: Benjamin Carson

quote: That is happiness; to be dissolved into something complete and great.
author: Willa Cather

quote: The health of a democratic society may be measured by the quality of functions performed by private citizens.
author: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: My health is very good.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: I had to try and find a way to express happiness without sounding corny.
author: Daniel Johns

quote: The power of community to create health is far greater than any physician, clinic or hospital.
author: Mark Hyman

quote: Lost wealth may be replaced by industry, lost knowledge by study, lost health by temperance or medicine, but lost time is gone forever.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: My health is very much improved.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: To me, the most important thing is happiness.
author: Sheryl Swoopes

quote: Happiness is spiritual, born of truth and love. It is unselfish; therefore it cannot exist alone, but requires all mankind to share it.
author: Mary Baker Eddy

quote: For sleep, riches and health to be truly enjoyed, they must be interrupted.
author: Jean Paul

quote: You do the right thing even if it makes you feel bad. The purpose of life is not to be happy but to be worthy of happiness.
author: Tracy Kidder

quote: You don't have to be a wreck. You don't have to be sick. One's aim in life should be to die in good health. Just like a candle that burns out.
author: Jeanne Moreau

quote: Happiness is not a state to arrive at, but a manner of traveling.
author: Margaret Lee Runbeck

quote: Pleasure only starts once the worm has got into the fruit, to become delightful happiness must be tainted with poison.
author: Georges Bataille

quote: Life finds its purpose and fulfillment in the expansion of happiness.
author: Maharishi Mahesh Yogi

quote: People will survive, and they will find happiness. Happiness only comes when you're not looking for it.
author: Hugh Laurie

quote: If Charlton Heston can have a constitutional right carry a rifle, why can't grandma have a constitutional right to health care?
author: Al Sharpton

quote: There is even a happiness - that makes the heart afraid.
author: Thomas Hood

quote: It is not the possession of truth, but the success which attends the seeking after it, that enriches the seeker and brings happiness to him.
author: Max Planck

quote: I just hope I can spread some of the happiness that's been coming my way.
author: Kenny Rogers

quote: I used to drink tons of caffeine. Now I make smoothies with frozen berries and Green Vibrance health powder.
author: Leighton Meester

quote: I think government has a major role to play in helping us with the pursuit of happiness.
author: William Weld

quote: Hollywood... a city I was to come back to time and again, in sickness and in health, in success and in failure, with anticipation and with dread.
author: Dirk Benedict

quote: The secret of happiness is something to do.
author: John Burroughs

quote: Take all that is given whether wealth, love or language, nothing comes by mistake and with good digestion all can be turned to health.
author: George Herbert

quote: The health effects of air pollution imperil human lives. This fact is well-documented.
author: Eddie Bernice Johnson

quote: The arrival of any child brings you a lot of happiness.
author: Seal

quote: For the sake of our health, our children and grandchildren and even our economic well-being, we must make protecting the planet our top priority.
author: David Suzuki

quote: There's a higher form of happiness in commitment. I'm counting on it.
author: Claire Forlani

quote: It's enough to indulge and to be selfish but true happiness is really when you start giving back.
author: Adrian Grenier

quote: If someday they say of me that in my work I have contributed something to the welfare and happiness of my fellow man, I shall be satisfied.
author: George Westinghouse

quote: Women know the financial, social and physical costs of not having access to basic health care.
author: Martha Plimpton

quote: It is the personality of the mistress that the home expresses. Men are forever guests in our homes, no matter how much happiness they may find there.
author: Elsie de Wolfe

quote: Off with you! You're a happy fellow, for you'll give happiness and joy to many other people. There is nothing better or greater than that!
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: I have a lot of health anxiety.
author: Charlie Kaufman

quote: To show a child what once delighted you, to find the child's delight added to your own - this is happiness.
author: J. B. Priestley

quote: Trifles make up the happiness or the misery of human life.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: Well, the truth is that a lot of people lie about their health, they lie about the finances, they lie about things at work, they lie about things.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: Women are half the population and they know how to take care of themselves, if they are only given access to health care.
author: Cynthia Nixon

quote: To have the sense of creative activity is the great happiness and the great proof of being alive.
author: Matthew Arnold

quote: It's obvious, but perhaps worth saying, that happiness has virtually nothing to do with the state of your intellect.
author: Daniel Keys Moran

quote: Women's health needs to be front and center - it often isn't, but it needs to be.
author: Cynthia Nixon

quote: Yoga is wonderful. It clears up most health problems. It also gives you an overview.
author: Helen Reddy

quote: Fame is indeed beautiful and benign and gentle and satisfying, but happiness is something at once tender and brilliant beyond all things.
author: Mary MacLane

quote: I want fame more than I can tell. But more than I want fame I want happiness.
author: Mary MacLane

quote: The most simple things can bring the most happiness.
author: Izabella Scorupco

quote: True health care reform cannot happen in Washington. It has to happen in our kitchens, in our homes, in our communities. All health care is personal.
author: Mehmet Oz

quote: Inside every adult there's still a child that lingers. We're happiness merchants - giving people the opportunity to dream like children.
author: Guy Laliberte

quote: All happiness depends on a leisurely breakfast.
author: John Gunther

quote: Happiness is working with Jack Lemmon.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: Happiness doesn't depend on how much you have to enjoy, but how much you enjoy what you have.
author: Tom Wilson

quote: The independence of all political and other bother is a happiness.
author: Rutherford B. Hayes

quote: Fixing health care and fixing the economy are two sides of the same coin.
author: Ron Wyden

quote: Remember that happiness is as contagious as gloom. It should be the first duty of those who are happy to let others know of their gladness.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: I used to wonder if it was God's plan that I should be alone for so much of my life. But I found peace. I found happiness within people and the world.
author: Lana Del Rey

quote: I ask the rights to pursue happiness by having a voice in that government to which I am accountable.
author: Victoria Woodhull

quote: Seek happiness for its own sake, and you will not find it; seek for duty, and happiness will follow as the shadow comes with the sunshine.
author: Tryon Edwards

quote: It's correct that I wanted health reform to do more to create choices and promote competition.
author: Ron Wyden

quote: I've had at least my share of tragedy, but I have had far more than my share of happiness.
author: Pierre Salinger

quote: As long as you are being true to yourself, you will always find happiness.
author: Amber Riley

quote: How often we fail to realize our good fortune in living in a country where happiness is more than a lack of tragedy.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: Happiness comes of the capacity to feel deeply, to enjoy simply, to think freely, to risk life, to be needed.
author: Storm Jameson

quote: People need to realise what real happiness and success is, because success as an actor is fleeting. You can be up there one day and gone the next.
author: Chuck Norris

quote: With a host of proposals on the table and a President examining new ideas for health reform, we have an obligation to give real reform our best shot.
author: Ron Wyden

quote: He whom the gods love dies young, while he is in health, has his senses and his judgments sound.
author: Plautus
