author: Jerome K. Jerome

quote: One in seven Americans lives without health insurance, and that's a truly staggering figure.
author: John M. McHugh

quote: Unfortunately, we are still in an age where individuals may be discriminated against because of health conditions.
author: Lois Capps

quote: General Motors spends more on health care than steel.
author: Kathleen Sebelius

quote: If I have my health I can carry on. There will be a point when I do quit but I have absolutely no idea when that is.
author: Alex Ferguson

quote: Most illegals are without health insurance, and when these workers need emergency healthcare, the American taxpayer gets stuck with the bill.
author: Spencer Bachus

quote: Seven presidents before him - Democrats and Republicans - tried to expand health care to all Americans. President Obama got it done.
author: Julian Castro

quote: Each and every day health centers provide high-quality primary and preventive care to our constituents.
author: Jan Schakowsky

quote: The real cure for what ails our health care system today is less government and more freedom.
author: Steve Forbes

quote: The old problems - love, money, security, status, health, etc. - are still here to plague us or please us.
author: Shelley Berman

quote: Congress is attempting to eviscerate women's health care. Like many women across America, I am outraged.
author: Felicity Huffman

quote: Nothing is more capable of troubling our reason, and consuming our health, than secret notions of jealousy in solitude.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: I'd just turned 50, weighed 285, and my doctor had read me the riot act about my health.
author: Daniel Baldwin

quote: After the break up of the municipality and the loss of his income my father lost health and spirits.
author: Catherine Helen Spence

quote: In 2001, America 's hospitals provided nearly $21 billion in uncompensated health care services.
author: Gary Miller

quote: Those were the ideals that drove us to nationalization of the health service.
author: Barbara Castle

quote: No one has the right to threaten the health, education, and well-being of children by involving them in illegal or inappropriate work.
author: Hilda Solis

quote: We are all ill: but even a universal sickness implies an idea of health.
author: Lionel Trilling

quote: As patients and consumers, we are better informed today about our health care than any previous generation.
author: Patricia Hewitt

quote: A modern health and social care system has to be completely focussed on the needs of its users.
author: Patricia Hewitt

quote: You can't make assumptions when you're dealing with health issues.
author: Adam Clayton

quote: I'm a big proponent of having a mental health component go along with whatever the physical realities are.
author: Alan Thicke

quote: I never could have achieved the success that I have without setting physical activity and health goals.
author: Bonnie Blair

quote: Making sure that health care is affordable for every American. I think that is very, very important.
author: Kendrick Meek

quote: I am not the Conservative Party's health care spokesman. I'm fond of Andrew Lansley, and I strongly support David Cameron as party leader.
author: Daniel Hannan

quote: I'm as obsessive with health as I was with destruction.
author: Dave Navarro

quote: Yes, I do agree we need health care reform; however, this bill badly misses the mark. Congress can and must do better for the American people.
author: John Mica

quote: President Obama's health care law raided Medicare in the tune of five hundred million dollars to create a new program.
author: Mario Diaz-Balart

quote: I happen to believe that health care is an imminent crisis. It is.
author: Eric Massa

quote: In health care, the biggest imperative is: Fix those who cannot get insurance without changing the world for everyone else.
author: Eric Massa

quote: We know a great deal more about the causes of physical disease than we do about the causes of physical health.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: With more than 1,300 sites of care, VA operates the largest integrated health care system in the county.
author: Bob Filner

quote: America's doctors, nurses and medical researchers are the best in the world, but our health care system is broken.
author: Mike Ferguson

quote: Sleep is that golden chain that ties health and our bodies together.
author: Thomas Dekker

quote: I believe we ought to subsidize some health care for the poor, but Medicare subsidizes everyone's health care.
author: James Q. Wilson

quote: I am all about health... and to me, size is not what defines your health.
author: Teri Hatcher

quote: I believe that stress is a factor in any bad health.
author: Christopher Shays

quote: They've got to tell us what is necessary to ensure the future health of the river system.
author: John Anderson

quote: Therefore in medicine we ought to know the causes of sickness and health.
author: Avicenna

quote: We cannot seek or attain health, wealth, learning, justice or kindness in general. Action is always specific, concrete, individualized, unique.
author: Benjamin Jowett

quote: I welcome the President and working with him to try to get some of that medical malpractice reform so we can get the cost of health care to come down.
author: Ben Quayle

quote: The arrival of a good clown exercises a more beneficial influence upon the health of a town than of twenty asses laden with drugs.
author: Thomas Sydenham

quote: For me, it always has to be about health. That's why I'm a vegan. Well, I don't even do that for my health entirely, I do it for animals.
author: Emily Deschanel

quote: We will have health care reform in America.
author: Dick Durbin

quote: The first draught serveth for health, the second for pleasure, the third for shame, and the fourth for madness.
author: Anacharsis

quote: I think we do better as a country when we go step by step toward a goal, and the goal in this case should be reducing health care costs.
author: Lamar Alexander

quote: The U.S. routinely ranks lower than other countries in health outcomes such as infant mortality.
author: Tammy Baldwin

quote: Government health care changes the relationship between the citizen and the state, and, in fact, I think it's an assault on citizenship.
author: Mark Steyn

quote: Health care does not worry me a great deal. I've been impressed by some wonderful old people.
author: Graham Chapman

quote: Health is very important to me.
author: Niki Taylor

quote: Make health care a right, not a privilege.
author: Ed Pastor

quote: Health care should be affordable for everyone.
author: Ed Pastor

quote: I will continue to support legislation that provides American families and Seniors affordable health care.
author: Ed Pastor

quote: Access to basic quality health care is one of the most important domestic issues facing our nation.
author: Ed Pastor

quote: I'm one of those that have said, one of my key principles is I will not support a health care reform bill that is not deficit-neutral, period.
author: Mike Ross

quote: I've laid down my set of principles, so I will not force government-run health care on anyone.
author: Mike Ross

quote: My good health is due to a soup made of white doves. It is simply wonderful as a tonic.
author: Chiang Kai-shek

quote: I realized that health is the most important thing and that all the other things come with time if you are devoted enough.
author: Blanka Vlasic

quote: Steroids can seem necessary to compete at the highest levels, and the quick rewards can outweigh the long term consequences to the user's health.
author: Howard Berman

quote: The political health of Britain has deteriorated very sharply. The Conservative Party must do something about it. I am the man to do it.
author: Kenneth Clarke

quote: We were elected in a wave because the people in America, if they had a single issue that troubled them the most, it was that health care vote.
author: Nan Hayworth

quote: That's one of the ironies of our time: Right when we're on the edge of serious improvements in health care, we're also cooking the planet.
author: Kim Stanley Robinson

quote: To get rich never risk your health. For it is the truth that health is the wealth of wealth.
author: Richard Baker

quote: Fettuccine Alfredo is dangerous for your health.
author: Robert M. Parker, Jr.

quote: Our goal is to make Maine the healthiest state in the nation and reduce our overall health care costs.
author: John Baldacci

quote: Let's face it, in America today we don't have a health care system, we have a sick care system.
author: Tom Harkin

quote: From labour health, from health contentment spring; contentment opes the source of every joy.
author: James Beattie

quote: The same things that lead to disparities in health in this country on a day-to-day basis led to disparities in the impact of Hurricane Katrina.
author: David Satcher

quote: The state of my poor boy's health prevents me from leaving home for a night.
author: Edward Irving

quote: I really never look at my health issues as 'Woe is me.' I've seen the reality of that. And it's not a pleasant thing.
author: Rick Majerus

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Don't judge each day by the harvest you reap but by the seeds that you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Try to be like the turtle - at ease in your own shell.
author: Bill Copeland

quote: Find a place inside where there's joy, and the joy will burn out the pain.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Even if I knew that tomorrow the world would go to pieces, I would still plant my apple tree.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Hope is a waking dream.
author: Aristotle

quote: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says 'I'm possible'!
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: I have looked into your eyes with my eyes. I have put my heart near your heart.
author: Pope John XXIII

quote: I hated every minute of training, but I said, 'Don't quit. Suffer now and live the rest of your life as a champion.'
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Clouds come floating into my life, no longer to carry rain or usher storm, but to add color to my sunset sky.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Every moment and every event of every man's life on earth plants something in his soul.
author: Thomas Merton

quote: The glow of one warm thought is to me worth more than money.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: We can't help everyone, but everyone can help someone.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: Be faithful to that which exists within yourself.
author: Andre Gide

quote: Put your heart, mind, and soul into even your smallest acts. This is the secret of success.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Someone's sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago.
author: Warren Buffett

quote: Don't let the fear of striking out hold you back.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: It is always the simple that produces the marvelous.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Whoever is happy will make others happy too.
author: Anne Frank

quote: Thought is the wind, knowledge the sail, and mankind the vessel.
author: Augustus Hare

quote: Every charitable act is a stepping stone toward heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Judge each day not by the harvest you reap but by the seeds you plant.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: There are two ways of spreading light: to be the candle or the mirror that reflects it.
author: Edith Wharton

quote: A #2 pencil and a dream can take you anywhere.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: A compliment is something like a kiss through a veil.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Belief creates the actual fact.
author: William James

quote: In a gentle way, you can shake the world.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If it were not for hopes, the heart would break.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: There is nothing stronger in the world than gentleness.
author: Han Suyin

quote: Thinking: the talking of the soul with itself.
author: Plato

quote: Give light and people will find the way.
author: Ella Baker

quote: With self-discipline most anything is possible.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: And now, this is the sweetest and most glorious day that ever my eyes did see.
author: Donald Cargill

quote: A place for everything, everything in its place.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is only in sorrow bad weather masters us; in joy we face the storm and defy it.
author: Amelia Barr

quote: Man never made any material as resilient as the human spirit.
author: Bern Williams

quote: When deeds speak, words are nothing.
author: Pierre-Joseph Proudhon

quote: Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: For a gallant spirit there can never be defeat.
author: Wallis Simpson

quote: How glorious a greeting the sun gives the mountains!
author: John Muir

quote: Tears are often the telescope by which men see far into heaven.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Wonder rather than doubt is the root of all knowledge.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Every heart that has beat strongly and cheerfully has left a hopeful impulse behind it in the world, and bettered the tradition of mankind.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Enthusiasm moves the world.
author: Arthur Balfour

quote: Nothing makes one feel so strong as a call for help.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: It is by acts and not by ideas that people live.
author: Harry Emerson Fosdick

quote: The power of imagination makes us infinite.
author: John Muir

quote: Noble deeds that are concealed are most esteemed.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: The truth is on the march and nothing will stop it.
author: Emile Zola

quote: Tears of joy are like the summer rain drops pierced by sunbeams.
author: Hosea Ballou

quote: I am deliberate and afraid of nothing.
author: Audre Lorde

quote: The meaning I picked, the one that changed my life: Overcome fear, behold wonder.
author: Richard Bach

quote: As knowledge increases, wonder deepens.
author: Charles Morgan

quote: Men must live and create. Live to the point of tears.
author: Albert Camus

quote: It is not ignorance but knowledge which is the mother of wonder.
author: Joseph Wood Krutch

quote: Think with your whole body.
author: Taisen Deshimaru

quote: Joy descends gently upon us like the evening dew, and does not patter down like a hailstorm.
author: Jean Paul

quote: Plant thy foot firmly in the prints which His foot has made before thee.
author: Joseph Barber Lightfoot

quote: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow. The important thing is not to stop questioning.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: None are more hopelessly enslaved than those who falsely believe they are free.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I find hope in the darkest of days, and focus in the brightest. I do not judge the universe.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul - and sings the tunes without the words - and never stops at all.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Hope in reality is the worst of all evils because it prolongs the torments of man.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Do not spoil what you have by desiring what you have not; remember that what you now have was once among the things you only hoped for.
author: Epicurus

quote: A little more persistence, a little more effort, and what seemed hopeless failure may turn to glorious success.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Be careful to leave your sons well instructed rather than rich, for the hopes of the instructed are better than the wealth of the ignorant.
author: Epictetus

quote: Hope springs eternal in the human breast: Man never is, but always To be Blest.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: We must free ourselves of the hope that the sea will ever rest. We must learn to sail in high winds.
author: Aristotle Onassis

quote: Hope is tomorrow's veneer over today's disappointment.
author: Evan Esar

quote: In the end, that's what this election is about. Do we participate in a politics of cynicism or a politics of hope?
author: Barack Obama

quote: I hope to stand firm enough to not go backward, and yet not go forward fast enough to wreck the country's cause.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: Lord save us all from a hope tree that has lost the faculty of putting out blossoms.
author: Mark Twain

quote: At the end of the day, we must go forward with hope and not backward by fear and division.
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Chance has never yet satisfied the hope of a suffering people.
author: Marcus Garvey

quote: Tomorrow hopes we have learned something from yesterday.
author: John Wayne

quote: Youth is easily deceived because it is quick to hope.
author: Aristotle

quote: A strong mind always hopes, and has always cause to hope.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: He that lives upon hope will die fasting.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Never deprive someone of hope; it might be all they have.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: This suspense is terrible. I hope it will last.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: My hope still is to leave the world a bit better than when I got here.
author: Jim Henson

quote: Everything that is done in the world is done by hope.
author: Martin Luther

quote: We have always held to the hope, the belief, the conviction that there is a better life, a better world, beyond the horizon.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: I said to my soul, be still, and wait without hope, For hope would be hope for the wrong thing.
author: T. S. Eliot

quote: Hope is the dream of a waking man.
author: Aristotle

quote: Don't give up. Don't lose hope. Don't sell out.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: Hopeful thinking can get you out of your fear zone and into your appreciation zone.
author: Martha Beck

quote: Beware how you take away hope from another human being.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: Hope is the last thing a person does before they are defeated.
author: Henry Rollins

quote: I have tried to keep on with my striving because this is the only hope I have of ever achieving anything worthwhile and lasting.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Things start out as hopes and end up as habits.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: Hope will never be silent.
author: Harvey Milk

quote: Hope is like the sun, which, as we journey toward it, casts the shadow of our burden behind us.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: Where there is no vision, there is no hope.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: The world is bad but not without hope. It is only hopeless when you look at it from an ideal viewpoint.
author: Friedrich Durrenmatt

quote: One lives in the hope of becoming a memory.
author: Antonio Porchia

quote: To live without Hope is to Cease to live.
author: Fyodor Dostoevsky

quote: Expecting something for nothing is the most popular form of hope.
author: Arnold H. Glasow

quote: A whole stack of memories never equal one little hope.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Uncertainty is the refuge of hope.
author: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: It is only hope which is real, and reality is a bitterness and a deceit.
author: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: The trouble with most people is that they think with their hopes or fears or wishes rather than with their minds.
author: Will Durant

quote: Hope is the only universal liar who never loses his reputation for veracity.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: Hope is a good breakfast, but it is a bad supper.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: I hope that I may always desire more than I can accomplish.
author: Michelangelo

quote: All human wisdom is summed up in two words; wait and hope.
author: Alexandre Dumas

quote: How disappointment tracks the steps of hope.
author: Letitia Elizabeth Landon

quote: I wish I could know everything ever, like that would be my wish - that's what I hope heaven is, that they tell you who shot JFK and all that stuff.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: All hope abandon, ye who enter here!
author: Dante Alighieri

quote: A very small degree of hope is sufficient to cause the birth of love.
author: Stendhal

quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: No matter how dark the moment, love and hope are always possible.
author: George Chakiris

quote: Disappointment is a sort of bankruptcy - the bankruptcy of a soul that expends too much in hope and expectation.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Few things in the world are more powerful than a positive push. A smile. A world of optimism and hope. A 'you can do it' when things are tough.
author: Richard M. DeVos

quote: Desire is the starting point of all achievement, not a hope, not a wish, but a keen pulsating desire which transcends everything.
author: Napoleon Hill

quote: The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace and brotherhood.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Fear cannot be without hope nor hope without fear.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Depression can seem worse than terminal cancer, because most cancer patients feel loved and they have hope and self-esteem.
author: David D. Burns

quote: I hope our wisdom will grow with our power, and teach us, that the less we use our power the greater it will be.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: While there's life, there's hope.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: A leader is a dealer in hope.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Maybe all one can do is hope to end up with the right regrets.
author: Arthur Miller

quote: One loves to possess arms, though they hope never to have occasion for them.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I hope I shall possess firmness and virtue enough to maintain what I consider the most enviable of all titles, the character of an honest man.
author: George Washington

quote: The sudden disappointment of a hope leaves a scar which the ultimate fulfillment of that hope never entirely removes.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: What is true of the individual will be tomorrow true of the whole nation if individuals will but refuse to lose heart and hope.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Be prepared, work hard, and hope for a little luck. Recognize that the harder you work and the better prepared you are, the more luck you might have.
author: Ed Bradley

quote: Woe to the man whose heart has not learned while young to hope, to love - and to put its trust in life.
author: Joseph Conrad

quote: The worst thing that can happen in a democracy - as well as in an individual's life - is to become cynical about the future and lose hope.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: Marriage is like putting your hand into a bag of snakes in the hope of pulling out an eel.
author: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Fifty percent of people won't vote, and fifty percent don't read newspapers. I hope it's the same fifty percent.
author: Gore Vidal

quote: As for gun control advocates, I have no hope whatever that any facts whatever will make the slightest dent in their thinking - or lack of thinking.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: My theory has always been, that if we are to dream, the flatteries of hope are as cheap, and pleasanter, than the gloom of despair.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I'm a romantic; a sentimental person thinks things will last, a romantic person hopes against hope that they won't.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Hope is the greatest thing for moms of autism. Hope is what gets us out of bed in the morning. I'm on a mission to tell parents that there is a way.
author: Jenny McCarthy

quote: Comedy is defiance. It's a snort of contempt in the face of fear and anxiety. And it's the laughter that allows hope to creep back on the inhale.
author: Will Durst

quote: Religion. A daughter of Hope and Fear, explaining to Ignorance the nature of the Unknowable.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Love is a springtime plant that perfumes everything with its hope, even the ruins to which it clings.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: Present, n. That part of eternity dividing the domain of disappointment from the realm of hope.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: At the end of the day, all you can hope for is to go on. The older I get, the more I realize that just keeping on keeping on is what life's all about.
author: Janis Ian

quote: When I die, I hope to go to Heaven, whatever the Hell that is.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: It is a vain hope to make people happy by politics.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: But what we call our despair is often only the painful eagerness of unfed hope.
author: George Eliot

quote: Hope, deceiving as it is, serves at least to lead us to the end of our lives by an agreeable route.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: I wish you a tolerable Thursday. That's all any of us can hope for.
author: April Winchell

quote: The youth is the hope of our future.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: Drugs are the enemies of ambition and hope - and when we fight against drugs we are fighting for the future.
author: Bob Riley

quote: Gratitude is merely the secret hope of further favors.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: In most of mankind gratitude is merely a secret hope of further favors.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: How wonderful that we have met with a paradox. Now we have some hope of making progress.
author: Niels Bohr

quote: I just hope that our fans are people who are inspired by music, and just use our music as a background or inspiration for whatever it is they do.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: I totally disagree with the view that the Tibet struggle will die, and there will be no hope for Tibet, after the Dalai Lama passes away.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: It is only by not paying one's bills that one can hope to live in the memory of the commercial classes.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: The happy Union of these States is a wonder; their Constitution a miracle; their example the hope of Liberty throughout the world.
author: James Madison

quote: Neither should a ship rely on one small anchor, nor should life rest on a single hope.
author: Epictetus

quote: I hope I didn't bore you too much with my life story.
author: Elvis Presley

quote: I don't feel a lack of hope. It's just disappointment that after all these years we're still fighting meaningless wars for a handful of people.
author: Geezer Butler

quote: Hope is the denial of reality.
author: Margaret Weis

quote: What we hope ever to do with ease, we must learn first to do with diligence.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Those who hope for no other life are dead even for this.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: The natural flights of the human mind are not from pleasure to pleasure, but from hope to hope.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Your ordinary acts of love and hope point to the extraordinary promise that every human life is of inestimable value.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: When I consider life, it is all a cheat. Yet fooled with hope, people favor this deceit.
author: John Dryden

quote: It is difficult to say what is impossible, for the dream of yesterday is the hope of today and the reality of tomorrow.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: We really feel happier when things look bleak. Hope is endurance. Hope is holding on and going on and trusting in the Lord.
author: Michael Novak

quote: I can only hope to be 10 percent of the mom mine was to me. She encouraged me to be confident and enjoy life. That's what I want for my son.
author: Charlize Theron

quote: I hope you love birds too. It is economical. It saves going to heaven.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: The present is the ever moving shadow that divides yesterday from tomorrow. In that lies hope.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: War is just when it is necessary; arms are permissible when there is no hope except in arms.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: I hope that people will finally come to realize that there is only one 'race' - the human race - and that we are all members of it.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Unless our conception of patriotism is progressive, it cannot hope to embody the real affection and the real interest of the nation.
author: Jane Addams

quote: My hope is that gays will be running the world, because then there would be no war. Just a greater emphasis on military apparel.
author: Roseanne Barr

quote: I hope that women everywhere will wear this jewelry and feel the passion and love that is, to me, the real spirit of True Harmony.
author: Carol Alt

quote: Litigant. A person about to give up his skin for the hope of retaining his bones.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: Together we will build an America where hope is a new job with a paycheck, not a faded word on an old bumper sticker.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: The reason I never give up hope is because everything is so basically hopeless.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: Keep hope alive!
author: Jesse Jackson

quote: Man is, properly speaking, based upon hope, he has no other possession but hope; this world of his is emphatically the place of hope.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: Blues are the songs of despair, but gospel songs are the songs of hope.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: A propensity to hope and joy is real riches; one to fear and sorrow real poverty.
author: David Hume

quote: All kids need is a little help, a little hope and somebody who believes in them.
author: Magic Johnson

quote: I hope the seeds I have sown will be taken up by those who will follow me because the journey I have begun cannot be undertaken in isolation.
author: Evelyn Glennie

quote: Designing a house is like doing a movie: Once you're done, you want to say, 'I hope you all enjoy it.'
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Hope is not the conviction that something will turn out well but the certainty that something makes sense, regardless of how it turns out.
author: Vaclav Havel

quote: Like any good tree that one would hope to grow, we must set our roots deep into the ground so that what is real will prosper in the Light of Love.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: Theater is, of course, a reflection of life. Maybe we have to improve life before we can hope to improve theater.
author: William Ralph Inge

quote: The charm of fishing is that it is the pursuit of what is elusive but attainable, a perpetual series of occasions for hope.
author: John Buchan

quote: Anarchy is the only slight glimmer of hope.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: My hopes are not always realized, but I always hope.
author: Ovid

quote: I hope when I'm dead I'll be considered an icon, though.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: Hope never abandons you, you abandon it.
author: George Weinberg

quote: To me, we're marketing hope.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: It is the around-the-corner brand of hope that prompts people to action, while the distant hope acts as an opiate.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: I see the whole concept of Generation X implies that everyone has lost hope.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: Man wants to live, but it is useless to hope that this desire will dictate all his actions.
author: Albert Camus

quote: He who despairs of the human condition is a coward, but he who has hope for it is a fool.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Minds that are ill at ease are agitated by both hope and fear.
author: Ovid

quote: The sea, the great unifier, is man's only hope. Now, as never before, the old phrase has a literal meaning: we are all in the same boat.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: I hope that you will learn to take responsibility for your decisions. don't take counsel of your fears.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: I want you to take away the hope because that's the thing that's killing me.
author: Denis Leary

quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
author: Tom Bodett

quote: If we become too scared to confront the chief problems of our time, there is no hope of ever solving them.
author: Jim DeMint

quote: This man is freed from servile bands, Of hope to rise, or fear to fall; Lord of himself, though not of lands, And leaving nothing, yet hath all.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Hope travels through, nor quits us when we die.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: But groundless hope, like unconditional love, is the only kind worth having.
author: John Perry Barlow

quote: I've convinced myself - I hope I'm right - that children despair of you if you don't tell them the truth.
author: Maurice Sendak

quote: I certainly hope I'm not still answering child-star questions by the time I reach menopause.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: As long as we can tell stories about our ability to survive, the more we will hope, not self-destruct.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: I hope I die before I get old.
author: Roger Daltrey

quote: Let's hope you feel better now.
author: Jack Kevorkian

quote: I have been coaching recently. I coached high school basketball in Arizona, and I hope that more opportunities become available.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I hope to be involved in a successful movie script.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: I'm really fun. I'm ridiculously fun. I hope I'm infectiously fun.
author: Kesha

quote: On the other hand, I believe there's hope, because the breakdown and the repair are happening simultaneously.
author: Kathryn Bigelow

quote: There are only two lasting bequests we can hope to give our children. One of these is roots, the other, wings.
author: Hodding Carter

quote: I hope I am the Tim Tebow of the Iowa caucuses.
author: Rick Perry

quote: I have met a few Casanovas I like and a few I have not liked - and I hope to meet a few more.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: I enjoy comedy and I hope that people enjoy watching me do it.
author: David Duchovny

quote: I do protect human rights, and I hope I shall always be looked up as a champion of human rights.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: I think by now I have made it fairly clear that I am not very happy with the word hope. I don't believe in people just hoping.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Counting is the religion of this generation it is its hope and its salvation.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: To Live signifies to believe and hope - to lie and to lie to oneself.
author: Emile M. Cioran

quote: We would not be interested in human beings if we did not have the hope of someday meeting someone worse off than ourselves.
author: Emile M. Cioran

quote: Ireland was a place for the renewal of hope and I still see it like that.
author: Daniel Day-Lewis

quote: If I had to choose between betraying my country and betraying my friend, I hope I should have the guts to betray my country.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: Just as despair can come to one only from other human beings, hope, too, can be given to one only by other human beings.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: I hope my music sets up the platform for me to be able to do lots of things - to have a cowboy-boot line, maybe, or do a perfume or makeup deal.
author: Miranda Lambert

quote: Put your blog out into the world and hope that your talent will speak for itself.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: It's possible that I've matured as a writer, and I hope I've matured emotionally, but I always find myself revisiting these adolescent scenes.
author: Diablo Cody

quote: My hope is that that person will come forward that can win the presidency that we can all get behind.
author: Rick Perry

quote: Our shared conservative values, our belief in the individual is the great hope of our nation.
author: Rick Perry

quote: I hope there are some audiophiles still out there.
author: Norah Jones

quote: Good news doesn't necessarily have to be a positive thing. Bringing good news is imparting hope to one's fellow man.
author: Patti Smith

quote: Hope has a good memory, gratitude a bad one.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: I hope I have important things to say.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: It's just a part of our nature to hope.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: Hope is the cordial that keeps life from stagnating.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: A lot of presidential memoirs, they say, are dull and self-serving. I hope mine is interesting and self-serving.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: There's always hope. You can lose everything else in the world, but Jews never lose hope.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: Having a sense of purpose is having a sense of self. A course to plot is a destination to hope for.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Hope can be the most wonderful thing in the world or it can crush your heart like an eggshell.
author: Harlan Coben

quote: At twenty a man is full of fight and hope. He wants to reform the world. When he is seventy he still wants to reform the world, but he know he can't.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: When hope is not pinned wriggling onto a shiny image or expectation, it sometimes floats forth and opens.
author: Anne Lamott

quote: We hope that the long darkness through which the Burmese people have lived may now be coming to an end.
author: William Hague

quote: My hope is that we continue to nurture the places that we love, but that we also look outside our immediate worlds.
author: Annie Leibovitz

quote: I don't know what can be so dangerous about giving people hope.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: I hope to inspire people, influence people.
author: Ashley Tisdale

quote: If we hope for what we are not likely to possess, we act and think in vain, and make life a greater dream and shadow than it really is.
author: Joseph Addison

quote: I hope to be scaring children for the rest of my life.
author: Tom Felton

quote: Every night when I go to bed, I hope that I may never wake again, and every morning renews my grief.
author: Franz Schubert

quote: I too hope in this short reign to be a man of peace.
author: Pope Benedict XVI

quote: On what rests the hope of the republic? One country, one language, one flag!
author: Alexander Henry

quote: I hope that anyone I worked with wouldn't exploit our relationship.
author: Laura Linney

quote: A widow's refusal of a lover is seldom so explicit as to exclude hope.
author: Samuel Richardson

quote: I really hope my peers appreciate and respect what I'm doing.
author: Shania Twain

quote: I temporarily lost my hope in love, and it was temporary, thank goodness.
author: Shania Twain

quote: About the most originality that any writer can hope to achieve honestly is to steal with good judgment.
author: Josh Billings

quote: If you keep thinking about what you want to do or what you hope will happen, you don't do it, and it won't happen.
author: Desiderius Erasmus

quote: In the company of the accomplished, people hope it will rub off on themselves, in the company of the misfortunate, they fear it!
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The greatest joys are found not only in what we do and feel, but also in what we hope for.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The hope of a new politics does not lie in formulating a left-wing reply to the right-it lies in rejecting conventional political categories.
author: Christopher Lasch

quote: Little progress can be made by merely attempting to repress what is evil. Our great hope lies in developing what is good.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: One thing I hope I'll never be is drunk with my own power. And anybody who says I am will never work in this town again.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: My sweetest hope is to lose hope.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: In between films I like to travel and hope to visit every continent before I become a mother.
author: Diane Kruger

quote: To hope means to be ready at every moment for that which is not yet born, and yet not become desperate if there is no birth in our lifetime.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Who dares nothing, need hope for nothing.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: A person, who no matter how desperate the situation, gives others hope, is a true leader.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: A man must love a thing very much if he not only practices it without any hope of fame and money, but even... without any hope of doing it well.
author: Oliver Herford

quote: The Middle East is hopeful. There's hope there.
author: Joe Biden

quote: We should not moor a ship with one anchor, or our life with one hope.
author: Epictetus

quote: They have a kind of Bob Hope and Bing Crosby thing going on.
author: Christopher Walken

quote: I think they'd rather us follow our hearts and I hope that's what some people will understand.
author: Fred Durst

quote: I, for one, hope that youth will again revolt and again demoralize the dead weight of conformity that now lies upon us.
author: Howard Mumford Jones

quote: You can't go around hoping that most people have sterling moral characters. The most you can hope for is that people will pretend that they do.
author: Fran Lebowitz

quote: Together we can make a world where cancer no longer means living with fear, without hope, or worse.
author: Patrick Swayze

quote: The results of political changes are hardly ever those which their friends hope or their foes fear.
author: Thomas Huxley

quote: Hope is a great falsifier. Let good judgment keep her in check.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Life has changed enormously, and I hope - I hope more people read good things.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: To withdraw is not to run away, and to stay is no wise action, when there's more reason to fear than to hope.
author: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: I hope I left behind a legacy that people will enjoy. But whatever they want to say, I can't predict.
author: Robert Duvall

quote: In an election, one needs both hope and audacity.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: And as far as false hope, there is no such thing. There is only hope or the absence of hope-nothing else.
author: Patti Davis

quote: The very least you can do in your life is to figure out what you hope for. And the most you can do is live inside that hope.
author: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: One must always hope when one is desperate, and doubt when one hopes.
author: Gustave Flaubert

quote: I hope my tongue in prune juice smothers, If I belittle dogs and mothers.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: I hope my own children never have to fight a war.
author: George H. W. Bush

quote: I hope to work harder than ever to help people around the world.
author: Lech Walesa

quote: I would hope they would be our fellow artists, rather than trying to emulate or idolize clowns like us.
author: Maynard James Keenan

quote: Beware how you take away hope from any human being.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Jr.

quote: I don't consider myself to be a major talent, so the only solace I can take is to hope I'm growing.
author: Paul Simon

quote: I love being able to sing for my job. I am blessed beyond words and I hope my fans can feel that while I'm on stage!
author: Jordin Sparks

quote: Fear is a very explosive emotion, but it has a short life span. It's the sprint. The marathon is hope.
author: Mike Huckabee

quote: The only way of knowing a person is to love them without hope.
author: Walter Benjamin

quote: It's always been my hope, as an actor, to reveal only what is relevant about myself to the work.
author: Eric Bana

quote: I hope I live long enough to see every hungry school child in the world being fed under the so-called McGovern-Dole program.
author: George McGovern

quote: I don't know how many good books I still have in me; I hope there are another four or five.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Among physicists, I'm respected I hope.
author: Stephen Hawking

quote: Nor dread nor hope attend a dying animal; a man awaits his end dreading and hoping all.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Hope founded upon a human being, a man-made philosophy or any institution is always misplaced... because these things are unreliable and fleeting.
author: Charles Stanley

quote: I kind of call myself an atheist, I suppose - although quite a spiritual atheist, I hope.
author: Danny Boyle

quote: For a person who promised hope and civility in politics, Mr. Obama has shown a borderline obsessiveness in blaming Mr. Bush.
author: Karl Rove

quote: I hope to make movies that are so small they don't need to make anything to be profitable.
author: J. J. Abrams

quote: There is nothing so well known as that we should not expect something for nothing - but we all do and call it Hope.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Nothing that is worth doing can be achieved in a lifetime; therefore we must be saved by hope.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Acting provides the fulfillment of never being fulfilled. You're never as good as you'd like to be. So there's always something to hope for.
author: Washington Irving

quote: I think almost every writer in the world would hope that books would be always talked about with respect and civility and depth and seriousness.
author: Dave Eggers

quote: You cannot hope to sweep someone else away by the force of your writing until it has been done to you.
author: Stephen King

quote: One of my favorite people is Gypsy Rose Lee. She bears out the Biblical promise that he who has, gets. And I hope she gets a lot more.
author: Hedy Lamarr

quote: Hope is a feeling that life and work have meaning. You either have it or you don't, regardless of the state of the world that surrounds you.
author: Vaclav Havel

quote: You never know what movie I will be in next, but let's just hope it's sells (for my sake at least)!
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: I hope by the time I'm 30 to have a husband and maybe a baby.
author: Vanessa Hudgens

quote: In our recovery package we put new standards of accountability and transparency, which we hope will now apply.
author: Nancy Pelosi

quote: I am proud to have been capable of giving people hope again.
author: Francois Hollande

quote: Right now I'm not involved with anybody, but I hope by 75 I will be again.
author: Stevie Nicks

quote: I hope Obama gets scary in the next four years, 'cuz he ain't gotta worry about getting re-elected.
author: Samuel L. Jackson

quote: I still believe in a place called Hope.
author: William J. Clinton

quote: As a black man, my hope is that I can touch more and more people all over the world of different races and different colours.
author: LL Cool J

quote: The only thing I hope I did was never put in question my love for the game, or my passion to be counted on when it mattered most.
author: Curt Schilling

quote: Hope... is the companion of power, and the mother of success; for who so hopes has within him the gift of miracles.
author: Samuel Smiles

quote: I hope to be an actor and never retire.
author: Dominic Monaghan

quote: I would hope everyone would be a feminist.
author: Mia Wasikowska

quote: I try to give people hope. Even though life is bleak, there's hope out there.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: The climate, the economic situation, rising birth rates; none of these things give me a lot of hope or reason to be optimistic.
author: David Attenborough

quote: Being a star has made it possible for me to get insulted in places where the average Negro could never hope to go and get insulted.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: It doesn't matter that the way of life shown by Hollywood was phony. It helped you hope.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: Ironically, Latin American countries, in their instability, give writers and intellectuals the hope that they are needed.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: Hope is a very unruly emotion.
author: Gloria Steinem

quote: People always ask me if I'm going to stop modeling because I have started an acting career. I hope to continue to model for years to come.
author: Tyra Banks

quote: Creativity comes from trust. Trust your instincts. And never hope more than you work.
author: Rita Mae Brown

quote: I hope that none of the countries in the Middle East are planning anything but the peaceful utilization of nuclear energy.
author: King Abdullah II

quote: At the end of the day we want to bring stability and hope to Iraq. That's the only way to defeat terrorism.
author: King Abdullah II

quote: We have to always hope in humanity that people will make the right choices.
author: King Abdullah II

quote: In the kind of world we have today, transformation of humanity might well be our only real hope for survival.
author: Stanislav Grof

quote: I don't feel despair because I am able to make the films I want to make, and that gives me hope.
author: Alexander Payne

quote: I just hope that the democratic will of the Zimbabwean people prevails. If it does we must move quickly to help restore stability and prosperity.
author: Lucy Powell

quote: He is the best physician who is the most ingenious inspirer of hope.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: I hope that when I'm 80 years old, people will still be talking about my wedding.
author: Jennifer Hudson

quote: Loss of hope rather than loss of life is what decides the issues of war. But helplessness induces hopelessness.
author: B. H. Liddell Hart

quote: Hope is the feeling we have that the feeling we have is not permanent.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: We are all serving a life sentence, and good behavior is our only hope for a pardon.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: If you think you can do a thing or think you can't do a thing, you're right.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I don't want to say never, but I hope I don't become that 'take me seriously now' guy.
author: Trey Parker

quote: A genuine leader is not a searcher for consensus but a molder of consensus.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Effective leadership is not about making speeches or being liked; leadership is defined by results not attributes.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Hope is the only bee that makes honey without flowers.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: What can I know? What ought I to do? What can I hope?
author: Immanuel Kant

quote: Be careful the environment you choose for it will shape you; be careful the friends you choose for you will become like them.
author: W. Clement Stone

quote: Not without hope we suffer and we mourn.
author: William Wordsworth

quote: Be a yardstick of quality. Some people aren't used to an environment where excellence is expected.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Don't find fault, find a remedy.
author: Henry Ford

quote: I suppose leadership at one time meant muscles; but today it means getting along with people.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Management is doing things right; leadership is doing the right things.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Effective leadership is putting first things first. Effective management is discipline, carrying it out.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: I hope I can help guys come out and say, 'All right, dude, I got a manicure... and I liked it.'
author: Ryan Seacrest

quote: Like when I host a party. I hope my guests get along. But if not, how interesting!
author: Andy Cohen

quote: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The capacity for hope is the most significant fact of life. It provides human beings with a sense of destination and the energy to get started.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: A man who wants to lead the orchestra must turn his back on the crowd.
author: Max Lucado

quote: Leadership, leadership is about taking responsibility, not making excuses.
author: Mitt Romney

quote: Hold yourself responsible for a higher standard than anybody expects of you. Never excuse yourself.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Affirmation without discipline is the beginning of delusion.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Leadership cannot really be taught. It can only be learned.
author: Harold S. Geneen

quote: Hope is the pillar that holds up the world. Hope is the dream of a waking man.
author: Pliny the Elder

quote: People ask the difference between a leader and a boss. The leader leads, and the boss drives.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: When I get into bed at night, I hope I don't get into it alone!
author: Calvin Klein

quote: He who is prudent and lies in wait for an enemy who is not, will be victorious.
author: Sun Tzu

quote: I have always striven to raise the voice of hope for a world where hate gives way to respect and oppression to liberation.
author: Theodore Bikel

quote: People who enjoy meetings should not be in charge of anything.
author: Thomas Sowell

quote: High expectations are the key to everything.
author: Sam Walton

quote: There is no hope even that woman, with her right to vote, will ever purify politics.
author: Emma Goldman

quote: Leaders must be close enough to relate to others, but far enough ahead to motivate them.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: I have been reading Stephen King since CARRIE and hope to read him for many years to come.
author: Dean Koontz

quote: Leadership is unlocking people's potential to become better.
author: Bill Bradley

quote: If a window of opportunity appears, don't pull down the shade.
author: Tom Peters

quote: You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
author: Donald Trump

quote: I hope one day I will host my own charity event to give back to society.
author: Yani Tseng

quote: Example is leadership.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
author: Warren G. Bennis

quote: If you command wisely, you'll be obeyed cheerfully.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: The task of the leader is to get his people from where they are to where they have not been.
author: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: There is a powerful need for people to feel that gust of hope rise up again.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: People who don't take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year. People who do take risks generally make about two big mistakes a year.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: Give whatever you are doing and whoever you are with the gift of your attention.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: I hope you will no longer accuse me of a lack of delicacy. as I now count on your understanding.
author: Gustav Mahler

quote: How we think shows through in how we act. Attitudes are mirrors of the mind. They reflect thinking.
author: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Leadership is influence.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: We all hope for breakthrough rebirth moments.
author: Dane Cook

quote: Without initiative, leaders are simply workers in leadership positions.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Getting in touch with your true self must be your first priority.
author: Tom Hopkins

quote: Go as far as you can see; when you get there, you'll be able to see farther.
author: J. P. Morgan

quote: I try and reduce myself to an almost blank slate and hope to God that I am creative.
author: Ben Kingsley

quote: The quality of a leader is reflected in the standards they set for themselves.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: You hope that your teenage self would like and forgive your 50-year-old self.
author: Hugh Laurie

quote: If you want a quality, act as if you already had it.
author: William James

quote: The real leader has no need to lead - he is content to point the way.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Hope is the struggle of the soul, breaking loose from what is perishable, and attesting her eternity.
author: Herman Melville

quote: Clarity affords focus.
author: Thomas Leonard

quote: Structure is one of the things that I always hope will reveal itself to me.
author: Richard Russo

quote: There are three secrets to managing. The first secret is have patience. The second is be patient. And the third most important secret is patience.
author: Chuck Tanner

quote: Millions saw the apple fall, but Newton was the one who asked why.
author: Bernard Baruch

quote: Doing is a quantum leap from imagining.
author: Barbara Sher

quote: The 2012 London Olympic Games fostered a generation of hope. I witnessed women participating for the very first time, representing every nation.
author: Jackie Joyner-Kersee

quote: I've had some incredible moments in my life - thus far. I hope a lot more are coming.
author: Dionne Warwick

quote: The cautious seldom err.
author: Confucius

quote: We are all here to be a service to those who can't be a service to themselves. We can give people hope and more reasons for being human.
author: Dionne Warwick

quote: The secret of my success is a two word answer: Know people.
author: Harvey S. Firestone

quote: Being an artist is a very long game. It is not a 10-year game. I hope I'll be around making art when I'm 80.
author: Anish Kapoor

quote: When your values are clear to you, making decisions becomes easier.
author: Roy E. Disney

quote: I try to make my life about service, and hope that one day we can all 'see' a little better because God is with everyone and everywhere.
author: Russell Simmons

quote: Obstacles are things a person sees when he takes his eyes off his goal.
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Management is about arranging and telling. Leadership is about nurturing and enhancing.
author: Tom Peters

quote: Someday I hope to write a book where the royalties will pay for the copies I give away.
author: Clarence Darrow

quote: People buy into the leader before they buy into the vision.
author: John C. Maxwell

quote: Actually oddly enough, I think my work, the activism, will be forgotten. And I hope it will. Because I hope those problems will have gone away.
author: Bono

quote: The first man gets the oyster, the second man gets the shell.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: I think it's impossible to judge whether another person should come out. You just hope they will on their own time and their own terms.
author: Billie Jean King

quote: Think little goals and expect little achievements. Think big goals and win big success.
author: David Joseph Schwartz

quote: Leaders must encourage their organizations to dance to forms of music yet to be heard.
author: Warren G. Bennis

quote: Today a reader, tomorrow a leader.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: If you care enough for a result, you will most certainly attain it.
author: William James

quote: In fair weather prepare for foul.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: I don't think I'm a total pessimist, so I think you can find hope in all my films.
author: Spike Lee

quote: Fighting a war on terrorism is like fighting against crime. We can never hope to eradicate crime, so we shouldn't bother fighting it.
author: Craig Bruce

quote: The speed of the leader is the speed of the gang.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: The employer generally gets the employees he deserves.
author: J. Paul Getty

quote: You know, in my hometown of Hope, Arkansas, the three sacred heroes were Jesus, Elvis, and FDR, not necessarily in that order.
author: Mike Huckabee

quote: The amount of good luck coming your way depends on your willingness to act.
author: Barbara Sher

quote: There is no hope unmingled with fear, and no fear unmingled with hope.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Good enough never is.
author: Debbi Fields

quote: I'm not a natural leader. I'm too intellectual; I'm too abstract; I think too much.
author: Newt Gingrich

quote: You're only as good as the people you hire.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Making good decisions is a crucial skill at every level.
author: Peter Drucker

quote: When you are kind to someone in trouble, you hope they'll remember and be kind to someone else. And it'll become like a wildfire.
author: Whoopi Goldberg

quote: Leaders grasp nettles.
author: David Ogilvy

quote: My hope is that countries like Morocco will have investment to create work, so people don't have to leave.
author: Tahar Ben Jelloun

quote: It is, after all, the responsibility of the expert to operate the familiar and that of the leader to transcend it.
author: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: You don't ever know with films. You just hope for the best, but sometimes it's a bit of a crapshoot.
author: Famke Janssen

quote: I look for what needs to be done. After all, that's how the universe designs itself.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: The great leaders have always stage-managed their effects.
author: Charles de Gaulle

quote: Great companies in the way they work, start with great leaders.
author: Steve Ballmer

quote: Every silver lining has a cloud.
author: Mary Kay Ash

quote: What helps people, helps business.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: I hope to have communion with the people, that is the most important thing.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: You have no power at all if you do not exercise constant power.
author: Major Owens

quote: Yesterday I was a dog. Today I'm a dog. Tomorrow I'll probably still be a dog. Sigh! There's so little hope for advancement.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Strong convictions precede great actions.
author: James Freeman Clarke

quote: Hope, the best comfort of our imperfect condition.
author: Edward Gibbon

quote: You have to have your heart in the business and the business in your heart.
author: An Wang

quote: To my utter despair I have discovered, and discover every day anew, that there is in the masses no revolutionary idea or hope or passion.
author: Mikhail Bakunin

quote: To succeed, one must be creative and persistent.
author: John H. Johnson

quote: Problems are only opportunities in work clothes.
author: Henry J. Kaiser

quote: Whatever ought to be, can be.
author: James Rouse

quote: The very exercise of leadership fosters capacity for it.
author: Cyril Falls

quote: The nicest thing about standards is that there are so many of them to choose from.
author: Ken Olsen

quote: Hope is independent of the apparatus of logic.
author: Norman Cousins

quote: Everybody, sooner or later, will have to go under the knife. Let's hope they make out as well as I did.
author: Bobby Darin

quote: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I hope I never get so hard up I have to do advertisements. I've gotten ridiculous offers.

quote: Leadership is a potent combination of strategy and character. But if you must be without one, be without the strategy.

quote: I'm more than open to hope, but I think men and women have a difficult time dealing with each other and often take the low road.

quote: The great hope of society is in individual character.

quote: Leadership is a privilege to better the lives of others. It is not an opportunity to satisfy personal greed.

quote: Management is efficiency in climbing the ladder of success; leadership determines whether the ladder is leaning against the right wall.

quote: Leadership is the other side of the coin of loneliness, and he who is a leader must always act alone. And acting alone, accept everything alone.

quote: When I am dead, I hope it may be said: His sins were scarlet, but his books were read.

quote: Leadership is a matter of having people look at you and gain confidence, seeing how you react. If you're in control, they're in control.

quote: In love, unlike most other passions, the recollection of what you have had and lost is always better than what you can hope for in the future.

quote: The growth and development of people is the highest calling of leadership.

quote: When we cannot hope to win, it is an advantage to yield.

quote: Whatever I do, I hope it's quality, I hope it's something that's class.

quote: We hope the world will act in the spirit of enlightened self-interest.

quote: Leadership has a harder job to do than just choose sides. It must bring sides together.

quote: If the skies fall, one may hope to catch larks.

quote: I start with the premise that the function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.

quote: I hope all you young girls see yourself up there... we were just like you.

quote: Leadership is getting someone to do what they don't want to do, to achieve what they want to achieve.

quote: I hope to bring people to God with my songs.

quote: The function of leadership is to produce more leaders, not more followers.

quote: So, influenced by these advisors and this hope, I have at length allowed my friends to publish the work, as they had long besought me to do.

quote: If the character is true, the movie will fall into place. Or at least that's what you hope.

quote: Honor bespeaks worth. Confidence begets trust. Service brings satisfaction. Cooperation proves the quality of leadership.

quote: I hope that my investment into Atomico will become my best financial investment to date.

quote: As I travel across the country speaking about MS, perhaps I can offer others comfort and hope.

quote: Overall, the challenge of leadership is both moral and one of developing the characteristics that make us respected by one another.

quote: This AIDS stuff is pretty scary. I hope I don't get it.

quote: You believe that easily which you hope for earnestly.

quote: I'm the kindest, most supportive friend ever, probably to my own detriment, but I hope that I am toughening up a little bit.

quote: I hope I never get so old I get religious.

quote: Our only hope is to control the vote.

quote: I'm not really sure what it was, the best moment. You always hope it's to come.

quote: I'm very honoured that there is a loyal following and I hope it continues.

quote: You just hope that you will get the opportunity to do what you love and pay your bills, and that is being a success as an actor.

quote: Different times need different types of leadership.

quote: I hope I will always have the chance to play the violin.

quote: Turnaround or growth, it's getting your people focused on the goal that is still the job of leadership.

quote: I do hope that our spring will be starting shortly and we will all be able to enjoy some sunshine again.

quote: People tend to overstate my resilience, but, of course, I hope they're right.

quote: I would hope that understanding and reconciliation are not limited to the 19th hole alone.

quote: I believe it is time for new leadership that is able to leave the '70s behind.

quote: It's a different era. Our job now is to show leadership and vision and to help the next generation of artists.

quote: Leadership should be born out of the understanding of the needs of those who would be affected by it.

quote: I'm comfortable, but not satisfied and I hope to always feel that way.

quote: I would hope that my writing's cleaner than it was when I started.

quote: It's tragic from how far we've come from 'Hope and Change'.

quote: Leadership is an active role; 'lead' is a verb. But the leader who tries to do it all is headed for burnout, and in a powerful hurry.

quote: Leadership offers an opportunity to make a difference in someone's life, no matter what the project.

quote: I hope that doing truthful portrayals of people in a variety of circumstances gives people a kind of subterranean link to those characters.

quote: Through teaching myself how to be happy and get through things, I hope I can also do that for other people.

quote: The grand old lady of bluegrass? Well, wouldn't that be a wonderful title to have? I hope I do enough to earn it some day.

quote: Leadership demands that we make tough choices.

quote: I hope what I do and what I just did inspires people around the world to reach for the skies.

quote: I hope I don't just sit around moping for two years.

quote: Sometimes I hope that through osmosis I might get a workout - just by wearing the clothes.

quote: I hope to actually get back to painting someday... soon. I sort of transitioned into cartooning from painting.

quote: My greatest desire is that the hope that has overcome fear in my country will help vanquish it around the world.

quote: I do hope to bring Jane Whitefield back before too long.

quote: We have a hope of succeeding if we learn from our past mistakes and pull together to make the hard choices.

quote: What I've really learned over time is that optimism is a very, very important part of leadership.

quote: I think if there's a great depression there might be some hope.

quote: I think it is important for people who are given leadership roles to assume that role immediately.

quote: We are now on the threshold of a newer movement, with a newer hope and a new inspiration.

quote: Shouldn't Democrats insist that Sen. Durbin step down as their whip, the number two man in their leadership?

quote: Through leadership of the fight against French colonialism, Ho Chi Minh had made a name for himself in the international political arena.
author: Nguyen Cao Ky

quote: We need real leadership, Democrat, Republican and independent to stand up and say, we have to live within our means.
author: Tom Coburn

quote: We had a military and political leadership at that period which was genuinely deluded.
author: Neil Sheehan

quote: But the fact is that the vast majority of Republicans support the Sinn Fein leadership.
author: Martin McGuinness

quote: I made a commitment... both to myself and to some supporters to carefully consider a run for the Liberal leadership for the Liberal Party of Canada.
author: Dalton McGuinty

quote: Divorced from ethics, leadership is reduced to management and politics to mere technique.
author: James MacGregor Burns

quote: I don't care tuppence whether I'm forced into a leadership position or not. I'd much sooner not.
author: E. P. Thompson

quote: Leadership is the key to 99 percent of all successful efforts.
author: Erskine Bowles

quote: Life isn't easy, and leadership is harder still.
author: Walter Russell Mead

quote: Instead of begging OPEC to drop its oil prices, let's use American leadership and ingenuity to solve our own energy problems.
author: Pete Domenici

quote: The failure of women to have reached positions of leadership has been due in large part to social and professional discrimination.
author: Rosalyn S. Yalow

quote: I'm floored that the House leadership would turn its back on job creation for Mississippians.
author: Haley Barbour

quote: Servant leadership is the foundation and the secret of Sam Walton's ability to achieve team synergy.
author: Michael Bergdahl

quote: I think leadership is service and there is power in that giving: to help people, to inspire and motivate them to reach their fullest potential.
author: Denise Morrison

quote: My focus as part of the leadership is to keep talking about the independent voters, independent voters - how do we get the independent voters back?
author: Henry Cuellar

quote: It's not as if our party has a leadership campaign underway.
author: Peter MacKay

quote: Sport fosters many things that are good; teamwork and leadership.
author: Daley Thompson

quote: Party domination and State leadership are concepts incompatible with one another.
author: Franz von Papen

quote: Bad leadership during the past years has cast on our Party the shadow of great and grave burdens.
author: Janos Kadar

quote: Yahoo! is the only company with both scale and leadership in branded and search advertising.
author: Terry Semel

quote: The sentiments in Hawaii about Washington's failure of leadership are no different than the rest of the country.
author: Ed Case

quote: The very essence of leadership is that you have to have vision. You can't blow an uncertain trumpet.
author: Theodore Hesburgh

quote: The test of leadership is not to put greatness into humanity, but to elicit it, for the greatness is already there.
author: James Buchanan

quote: With King Abdullah's leadership and his people's trust he can keep the kingdom stable and secure in all its affairs.
author: Sultan bin Abdul-Aziz Al Saud

quote: Leadership in telecommunications is also essential, since we are now in the age of e-commerce.
author: Michael Oxley

quote: Leadership appears to be the art of getting others to want to do something you are convinced should be done.
author: Vance Packard

quote: We do not need international help to stop corruption, we need strong Louisiana Leadership.
author: David Vitter

quote: Real leadership means tackling tough problems ourselves and not leaving them to our children.
author: Jon Kyl

quote: Jamal Crawford reminds me the most of myself, the way he goes to the basket. But they need leadership.
author: Earl Monroe

quote: We need someone with proven conservative leadership experience, not entitlement, to be able to represent us and lead us.
author: Randy Hultgren

quote: Leadership is particularly necessary to ensure ready acceptance of the unfamiliar and that which is contrary to tradition.
author: Cyril Falls

quote: Leadership - mobilization toward a common goal.
author: Gary Wills

quote: The next thing is: we can make IBM even better. We brought IBM back but we're gunning for leadership.
author: Louis Gerstner

quote: Why - because as a oil and gas small business owner - I know if someone is not doing their job, they should not get paid. Again leadership by example.
author: Jeff Landry

quote: Public office is supposed to be a public trust. This is a clear sign of the rampant corruption at the highest levels of the Republican leadership.
author: Bob Etheridge

quote: Leadership must be established from the top down.
author: Sam Nunn

quote: When a man assumes leadership, he forfeits the right to mercy.
author: Gennaro Angiulo

quote: Sometimes the heart sees what is invisible to the eye.
author: H. Jackson Brown, Jr.

quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
author: Aristotle

quote: Immature love says: 'I love you because I need you.' Mature love says 'I need you because I love you.'
author: Erich Fromm

quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
author: Ingrid Bergman

quote: I have found the paradox, that if you love until it hurts, there can be no more hurt, only more love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A loving heart is the beginning of all knowledge.
author: Thomas Carlyle

quote: For it was not into my ear you whispered, but into my heart. It was not my lips you kissed, but my soul.
author: Judy Garland

quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
author: Max Muller

quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.
author: A. A. Milne

quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Love does not begin and end the way we seem to think it does. Love is a battle, love is a war; love is a growing up.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Can miles truly separate you from friends... If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?
author: Richard Bach

quote: Gravitation is not responsible for people falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: A man is already halfway in love with any woman who listens to him.
author: Brendan Francis

quote: A kiss makes the heart young again and wipes out the years.
author: Rupert Brooke

quote: Do all things with love.
author: Og Mandino

quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
author: Plato

quote: Come live in my heart, and pay no rent.
author: Samuel Lover

quote: I was born with an enormous need for affection, and a terrible need to give it.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: If you press me to say why I loved him, I can say no more than because he was he, and I was I.
author: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Love is always bestowed as a gift - freely, willingly and without expectation. We don't love to be loved; we love to love.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: A part of kindness consists in loving people more than they deserve.
author: Joseph Joubert

quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line. You really have to love yourself to get anything done in this world.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: Love can sometimes be magic. But magic can sometimes... just be an illusion.
author: Javan

quote: I like not only to be loved, but also to be told I am loved.
author: George Eliot

quote: As soon go kindle fire with snow, as seek to quench the fire of love with words.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: All love shifts and changes. I don't know if you can be wholeheartedly in love all the time.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
author: Edgar Allan Poe

quote: A pair of powerful spectacles has sometimes sufficed to cure a person in love.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I can live without money, but I cannot live without love.
author: Judy Garland

quote: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
author: Loretta Young

quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Love makes your soul crawl out from its hiding place.
author: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: The hunger for love is much more difficult to remove than the hunger for bread.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: We are not the same persons this year as last; nor are those we love. It is a happy chance if we, changing, continue to love a changed person.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: True love is like ghosts, which everyone talks about and few have seen.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: If you want to be loved, be lovable.
author: Ovid

quote: Love is an irresistible desire to be irresistibly desired.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The one thing we can never get enough of is love. And the one thing we never give enough is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: Before I met my husband, I'd never fallen in love. I'd stepped in it a few times.
author: Rita Rudner

quote: We waste time looking for the perfect lover, instead of creating the perfect love.
author: Tom Robbins

quote: It is sad not to love, but it is much sadder not to be able to love.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: If you wish to be loved, show more of your faults than your virtues.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: For small creatures such as we the vastness is bearable only through love.
author: Carl Sagan

quote: It's useless to hold a person to anything he says while he's in love, drunk, or running for office.
author: Shirley MacLaine

quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: 'Tis better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
author: Eva Gabor

quote: A kiss is a rosy dot over the 'i' of loving.
author: Cyrano de Bergerac

quote: Don't brood. Get on with living and loving. You don't have forever.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: It is difficult to know at what moment love begins; it is less difficult to know that it has begun.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow
