quote: How absurd and delicious it is to be in love with somebody younger than yourself. Everybody should try it.
author: Barbara Pym

quote: Only do what your heart tells you.
author: Princess Diana

quote: Everything is clearer when you're in love.
author: John Lennon

quote: You never lose by loving. You always lose by holding back.
author: Barbara de Angelis

quote: Love is when you meet someone who tells you something new about yourself.
author: Andre Breton

quote: Love is being stupid together.
author: Paul Valery

quote: Love does not dominate; it cultivates.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Looking back, I have this to regret, that too often when I loved, I did not say so.
author: David Grayson

quote: When love is not madness, it is not love.
author: Pedro Calderon de la Barca

quote: Absence - that common cure of love.
author: Lord Byron

quote: I believe in the compelling power of love. I do not understand it. I believe it to be the most fragrant blossom of all this thorny existence.
author: Theodore Dreiser

quote: In love the paradox occurs that two beings become one and yet remain two.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: To say "I love you" one must first be able to say the "I.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: There is no disguise which can hide love for long where it exists, or simulate it where it does not.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: All mankind love a lover.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Gestures, in love, are incomparably more attractive, effective and valuable than words.
author: Francois Rabelais

quote: Blessed is the influence of one true, loving human soul on another.
author: George Eliot

quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
author: Emily Bronte

quote: Love is supreme and unconditional; like is nice but limited.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: Love takes off masks that we fear we cannot live without and know we cannot live within.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Sometimes it's a form of love just to talk to somebody that you have nothing in common with and still be fascinated by their presence.
author: David Byrne

quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One is loved because one is loved. No reason is needed for loving.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Be of love a little more careful than of anything.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: Love consists in this, that two solitudes protect and touch and greet each other.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: I love that feeling of being in love, the effect of having butterflies when you wake up in the morning. That is special.
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: The degree of loving is measured by the degree of giving.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: Love knows not distance; it hath no continent; its eyes are for the stars.
author: Gilbert Parker

quote: There is only one kind of love, but there are a thousand imitations.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: What love we've given, we'll have forever. What love we fail to give, will be lost for all eternity.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Love is of all passions the strongest, for it attacks simultaneously the head, the heart and the senses.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Lord, grant that I might not so much seek to be loved as to love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Follow love and it will flee, flee love and it will follow thee.
author: John Gay

quote: Love shall be our token; love be yours and love be mine.
author: Christina Rossetti

quote: If you could only love enough, you could be the most powerful person in the world.
author: Emmet Fox

quote: Love is the only sane and satisfactory answer to the problem of human existence.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: A new command I give you: Love one another. As I have loved you, so you must love one another.
author: Jesus Christ

quote: Who, being loved, is poor?
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Fortune and love favor the brave.
author: Ovid

quote: The most powerful weapon on earth is the human soul on fire.
author: Ferdinand Foch

quote: Love is my religion - I could die for it.
author: John Keats

quote: Love is the hardest habit to break, and the most difficult to satisfy.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: He is not a lover who does not love forever.
author: Euripides

quote: The sweetest of all sounds is that of the voice of the woman we love.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: Love is all we have, the only way that each can help the other.
author: Euripides

quote: Love is a gross exaggeration of the difference between one person and everybody else.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Love means to commit yourself without guarantee.
author: Anne Campbell

quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
author: James Thurber

quote: When we are in love we seem to ourselves quite different from what we were before.
author: Blaise Pascal

quote: Love takes up where knowledge leaves off.
author: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Come live with me and be my love, And we will all the pleasures prove, That valleys, groves, hills, and fields, Woods, or steepy mountain yields.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: Love is an emotion experienced by the many and enjoyed by the few.
author: George Jean Nathan

quote: The only abnormality is the incapacity to love.
author: Anais Nin

quote: Love is that splendid triggering of human vitality the supreme activity which nature affords anyone for going out of himself toward someone else.
author: Jose Ortega y Gasset

quote: Choose your love, Love your choice.
author: Thomas S. Monson

quote: Love is always being given where it is not required.
author: E. M. Forster

quote: There is always something left to love. And if you ain't learned that, you ain't learned nothing.
author: Lorraine Hansberry

quote: Love is only a dirty trick played on us to achieve continuation of the species.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: There are never enough I Love You's.
author: Lenny Bruce

quote: Love is but the discovery of ourselves in others, and the delight in the recognition.
author: Alexander Smith

quote: Love is not only something you feel, it is something you do.
author: David Wilkerson

quote: In every living thing there is the desire for love.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: Love looks through a telescope; envy, through a microscope.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Sometimes it's hard to be a woman giving all your love to just one man.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: People who throw kisses are hopelessly lazy.
author: Bob Hope

quote: Love is suffering. One side always loves more.
author: Catherine Deneuve

quote: Take away love and our earth is a tomb.
author: Robert Browning

quote: If you wished to be loved, love.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Love possesses not nor will it be possessed, for love is sufficient unto love.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: To love abundantly is to live abundantly, and to love forever is to live forever.
author: Henry Drummond

quote: We may give without loving, but we cannot love without giving.
author: Bernard Meltzer

quote: Love is the delusion that one woman differs from another.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Love is the word used to label the sexual excitement of the young, the habituation of the middle-aged, and the mutual dependence of the old.
author: John Ciardi

quote: Love is the power to see similarity in the dissimilar.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: We are all born for love. It is the principle of existence, and its only end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
author: David Viscott

quote: If you would be loved, love, and be loveable.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Love is the child of illusion and the parent of disillusion.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: The way to know life is to love many things.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Love conquers all.
author: Virgil

quote: Do you have to have a reason for loving?
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: Love... it surrounds every being and extends slowly to embrace all that shall be.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Love is the poetry of the senses.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: What the world really needs is more love and less paper work.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: The quarrels of lovers are the renewal of love.
author: Jean Racine

quote: He who loves, flies, runs, and rejoices; he is free and nothing holds him back.
author: Henri Matisse

quote: Love means to love that which is unlovable; or it is no virtue at all.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Love in its essence is spiritual fire.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Say what you will, 'tis better to be left than never to have been loved.
author: William Congreve

quote: When you love someone all your saved up wishes start coming out.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: It is easier to love humanity as a whole than to love one's neighbor.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Love means not ever having to say you're sorry.
author: Erich Segal

quote: Stand by your man. Give him two arms to cling to and something warm to come to.
author: Tammy Wynette

quote: To witness two lovers is a spectacle for the gods.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Love you will find only where you may show yourself weak without provoking strength.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Nobody has ever measured, not even poets, how much the heart can hold.
author: Zelda Fitzgerald

quote: There is no limit to the power of loving.
author: John Morton

quote: If thou must love me, let it be for naught except for love's sake only.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: The first magic of love is our ignorance that it can ever end.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Love is like a faucet, it turns off and on.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: For love is immortality.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Though lovers be lost love shall not.
author: Dylan Thomas

quote: You don't have to go looking for love when it's where you come from.
author: Werner Erhard

quote: Love's greatest gift is its ability to make everything it touches sacred.
author: Barbara de Angelis

quote: Let no one who loves be unhappy, even love unreturned has its rainbow.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: Pains of love be sweeter far than all other pleasures are.
author: John Dryden

quote: There is room in the smallest cottage for a happy loving pair.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: To love for the sake of being loved is human, but to love for the sake of loving is angelic.
author: Alphonse de Lamartine

quote: Love is a mutual self-giving which ends in self-recovery.
author: Fulton J. Sheen

quote: It is very easy to love alone.
author: Gertrude Stein

quote: Only love interests me, and I am only in contact with things that revolve around love.
author: Marc Chagall

quote: In love there are two things - bodies and words.
author: Joyce Carol Oates

quote: True love is quiescent, except in the nascent moments of true humility.
author: Bryant H. McGill

quote: Who so loves believes the impossible.
author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

quote: Love is metaphysical gravity.
author: R. Buckminster Fuller

quote: We can only learn to love by loving.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: Love is the only gold.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: More than kisses, letters mingle souls.
author: John Donne

quote: The richest love is that which submits to the arbitration of time.
author: Lawrence Durrell

quote: What is love? It is the morning and the evening star.
author: Sinclair Lewis

quote: Only divine love bestows the keys of knowledge.
author: Arthur Rimbaud

quote: We perceive when love begins and when it declines by our embarrassment when alone together.
author: Jean de la Bruyere

quote: We love but once, for once only are we perfectly equipped for loving.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: Love ceases to be a pleasure when it ceases to be a secret.
author: Aphra Behn

quote: I long for the raised voice, the howl of rage or love.
author: Leslie Fiedler

quote: But love's a malady without a cure.
author: John Dryden

quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
author: John Updike

quote: Ultimately love is everything.
author: M. Scott Peck

quote: Love is an energy which exists of itself. It is its own value.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Love is much nicer to be in than an automobile accident, a tight girdle, a higher tax bracket or a holding pattern over Philadelphia.
author: Judith Viorst

quote: Who would give a law to lovers? Love is unto itself a higher law.
author: Boethius

quote: Love is love's reward.
author: John Dryden

quote: Is it not by love alone that we succeed in penetrating to the very essence of being?
author: Igor Stravinsky

quote: Who ever loved that loved not at first sight?
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: With our love, we could save the world.
author: George Harrison

quote: There is more pleasure in loving than in being beloved.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: Love is a hole in the heart.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: All love is vanquished by a succeeding love.
author: Ovid

quote: Love is blind.
author: Geoffrey Chaucer

quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
author: Ben Hecht

quote: Who loves, raves.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Oh, love will make a dog howl in rhyme.
author: Francis Beaumont

quote: No one has ever loved anyone the way everyone wants to be loved.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: When we lose one we love, our bitterest tears are called forth by the memory of hours when we loved not enough.
author: Maurice Maeterlinck

quote: To enlarge or illustrate this power and effect of love is to set a candle in the sun.
author: Robert Burton

quote: One must not trifle with love.
author: Alfred de Musset

quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power the world will know peace.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
author: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Spread love everywhere you go. Let no one ever come to you without leaving happier.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Don't aim for success if you want it; just do what you love and believe in, and it will come naturally.
author: David Frost

quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
author: Charles M. Schulz

quote: Love and compassion are necessities, not luxuries. Without them humanity cannot survive.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: If you have only one smile in you give it to the people you love.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: I love mirrors. They let one pass through the surface of things.
author: Claude Chabrol

quote: Before marriage, a girl has to make love to a man to hold him. After marriage, she has to hold him to make love to him.
author: Marilyn Monroe

quote: If you love someone, set them free. If they come back they're yours; if they don't they never were.
author: Richard Bach

quote: When you arise in the morning, think of what a precious privilege it is to be alive - to breathe, to think, to enjoy, to love.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: I say what I want to say and do what I want to do. There's no in between. People will either love you for it or hate you for it.
author: Eminem

quote: I love you when you bow in your mosque, kneel in your temple, pray in your church. For you and I are sons of one religion, and it is the spirit.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Hatred does not cease by hatred, but only by love; this is the eternal rule.
author: Buddha

quote: I honestly think it is better to be a failure at something you love than to be a success at something you hate.
author: George Burns

quote: A coward is incapable of exhibiting love; it is the prerogative of the brave.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Christmas, my child, is love in action. Every time we love, every time we give, it's Christmas.
author: Dale Evans

quote: And ever has it been known that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. And if they don't, they never were.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I know of only one duty, and that is to love.
author: Albert Camus

quote: Kindness in words creates confidence. Kindness in thinking creates profoundness. Kindness in giving creates love.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: If you want a love message to be heard, it has got to be sent out. To keep a lamp burning, we have to keep putting oil in it.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Absence from those we love is self from self - a deadly banishment.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Accept the things to which fate binds you, and love the people with whom fate brings you together, but do so with all your heart.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Intense love does not measure, it just gives.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Men always want to be a woman's first love - women like to be a man's last romance.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Even the rich are hungry for love, for being cared for, for being wanted, for having someone to call their own.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: If we lose love and self respect for each other, this is how we finally die.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: Love is a fruit in season at all times, and within reach of every hand.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Love will find a way through paths where wolves fear to prey.
author: Lord Byron

quote: If someone thinks that love and peace is a cliche that must have been left behind in the Sixties, that's his problem. Love and peace are eternal.
author: John Lennon

quote: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into friend.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Love one another and help others to rise to the higher levels, simply by pouring out love. Love is infectious and the greatest healing energy.
author: Sai Baba

quote: One should always be in love. That is the reason one should never marry.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: Money can't buy love, but it improves your bargaining position.
author: Christopher Marlowe

quote: A man can be happy with any woman, as long as he does not love her.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I'll love you, dear, I'll love you till China and Africa meet and the river jumps over the mountain and the salmon sing in the street.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: Love is a serious mental disease.
author: Plato

quote: What light is to the eyes - what air is to the lungs - what love is to the heart, liberty is to the soul of man.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: We never know the love of a parent till we become parents ourselves.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: One advantage of marriage is that, when you fall out of love with him or he falls out of love with you, it keeps you together until you fall in again.
author: Judith Viorst

quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
author: Helen Keller

quote: I see when men love women. They give them but a little of their lives. But women when they love give everything.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: A dog is the only thing on earth that loves you more than you love yourself.
author: Josh Billings

quote: The man of knowledge must be able not only to love his enemies but also to hate his friends.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The course of true love never did run smooth.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you want to be successful, it's just this simple. Know what you are doing. Love what you are doing. And believe in what you are doing.
author: Will Rogers

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: Respect is what we owe; love, what we give.
author: Philip James Bailey

quote: Love and work are the cornerstones of our humanness.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: I have a very strong feeling that the opposite of love is not hate - it's apathy. It's not giving a damn.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: Rather than love, than money, than fame, give me truth.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Work like you don't need the money. Love like you've never been hurt. Dance like nobody's watching.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: It may be true that the law cannot make a man love me, but it can keep him from lynching me, and I think that's pretty important.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: At the center of non-violence stands the principle of love.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Many people mistake our work for our vocation. Our vocation is the love of Jesus.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: Loyalty and devotion lead to bravery. Bravery leads to the spirit of self-sacrifice. The spirit of self-sacrifice creates trust in the power of love.
author: Morihei Ueshiba

quote: Alcohol may be man's worst enemy, but the bible says love your enemy.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: Joy is a net of love by which you can catch souls.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: A man in love is incomplete until he has married. Then he's finished.
author: Zsa Zsa Gabor

quote: Love is like a virus. It can happen to anybody at any time.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: One is very crazy when in love.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: The Eskimos had fifty-two names for snow because it was important to them: there ought to be as many for love.
author: Margaret Atwood

quote: Let your religion be less of a theory and more of a love affair.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: The wise are wise only because they love. The fool are fools only because they think they can understand love.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Love has nothing to do with what you are expecting to get - only with what you are expecting to give - which is everything.
author: Katharine Hepburn

quote: Love to faults is always blind, always is to joy inclined. Lawless, winged, and unconfined, and breaks all chains from every mind.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Love one another, but make not a bond of love: Let it rather be a moving sea between the shores of your souls.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I love to be alone. I never found the companion that was so companionable as solitude.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Do not hire a man who does your work for money, but him who does it for love of it.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: All you need is love.
author: John Lennon

quote: I have an everyday religion that works for me. Love yourself first, and everything else falls into line.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Love is the answer, and you know that for sure; Love is a flower, you've got to let it grow.
author: John Lennon

quote: Love is never lost. If not reciprocated, it will flow back and soften and purify the heart.
author: Washington Irving

quote: If you love someone, you say it, right then, out loud. Otherwise, the moment just passes you by.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: I will love the light for it shows me the way, yet I will endure the darkness because it shows me the stars.
author: Og Mandino

quote: I love romance. I'm a sucker for it. I love it so much. It's pathetic.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: To keep your marriage brimming, With love in the loving cup, Whenever you're wrong, admit it; Whenever you're right, shut up.
author: Ogden Nash

quote: Even when I'm old and grey, I won't be able to play it, but I'll still love the game.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Love may be or it may not, but where it is, it ought to reveal itself in its immensity.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Depression is when you have lots of love, but no one's taking.
author: Doug Coupland

quote: The ultimate lesson all of us have to learn is unconditional love, which includes not only others but ourselves as well.
author: Elisabeth Kubler-Ross

quote: Lord, make me an instrument of thy peace. Where there is hatred, let me sow love.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: Do what you love. Know your own bone; gnaw at it, bury it, unearth it, and gnaw it still.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Hate is only a form love that hasn't found a way to express itself logically.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Love: A temporary insanity curable by marriage.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I love America more than any other country in this world, and, exactly for this reason, I insist on the right to criticize her perpetually.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: If having a soul means being able to feel love and loyalty and gratitude, then animals are better off than a lot of humans.
author: James Herriot

quote: There are more love songs than anything else. If songs could make you do something we'd all love one another.
author: Frank Zappa

quote: You can give without loving, but you can never love without giving.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: It is impossible to love and to be wise.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: I love you the more in that I believe you had liked me for my own sake and for nothing else.
author: John Keats

quote: The opposite of love is not hate, it's indifference.
author: Elie Wiesel

quote: Do not seek the because - in love there is no because, no reason, no explanation, no solutions.
author: Anais Nin

quote: The only creatures that are evolved enough to convey pure love are dogs and infants.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: A woman in love can't be reasonable - or she probably wouldn't be in love.
author: Mae West

quote: I love bringing roses to a woman when she least expects it.
author: Esai Morales

quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Love and doubt have never been on speaking terms.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Pursue some path, however narrow and crooked, in which you can walk with love and reverence.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: We are never so defensless against suffering as when we love.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Love thy neighbor - and if he happens to be tall, debonair and devastating, it will be that much easier.
author: Mae West

quote: Love cannot save you from your own fate.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: Acceptance is not love. You love a person because he or she has lovable traits, but you accept everybody just because they're alive and human.
author: Albert Ellis

quote: I love it when someone insults me. That means that I don't have to be nice anymore.
author: Billy Idol

quote: When you fish for love, bait with your heart, not your brain.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The highest patriotism is not a blind acceptance of official policy, but a love of one's country deep enough to call her to a higher plain.
author: George McGovern

quote: Among those whom I like or admire, I can find no common denominator, but among those whom I love, I can: all of them make me laugh.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: A wedding anniversary is the celebration of love, trust, partnership, tolerance and tenacity. The order varies for any given year.
author: Paul Sweeney

quote: I do not want a husband who honours me as a queen, if he does not love me as a woman.
author: Elizabeth I

quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
author: Theodore Hesburgh

quote: Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: I'm an introvert... I love being by myself, love being outdoors, love taking a long walk with my dogs and looking at the trees, flowers, the sky.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: It's tangible, it's solid, it's beautiful. It's artistic, from my standpoint, and I just love real estate.
author: Donald Trump

quote: Let us dream of tomorrow where we can truly love from the soul, and know love as the ultimate truth at the heart of all creation.
author: Michael Jackson

quote: So, fall asleep love, loved by me... for I know love, I am loved by thee.
author: Robert Browning

quote: One cannot think well, love well, sleep well, if one has not dined well.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: There is not enough love and goodness in the world to permit giving any of it away to imaginary beings.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Justice that love gives is a surrender, justice that law gives is a punishment.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: A heart is not judged by how much you love, but by how much you are loved by others.
author: Frank Morgan

quote: If we love our country, we should also love our countrymen.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: You gotta love livin', baby, 'cause dyin' is a pain in the ass.
author: Frank Sinatra

quote: The most authentic thing about us is our capacity to create, to overcome, to endure, to transform, to love and to be greater than our suffering.
author: Ben Okri

quote: Love is the only reality and it is not a mere sentiment. It is the ultimate truth that lies at the heart of creation.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: Don't forget to love yourself.
author: Soren Kierkegaard

quote: Don't threaten me with love, baby. Let's just go walking in the rain.
author: Billie Holiday

quote: Love is a fire. But whether it is going to warm your hearth or burn down your house, you can never tell.
author: Joan Crawford

quote: Love him and let him love you. Do you think anything else under heaven really matters?
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: People love chopping wood. In this activity one immediately sees results.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: We do not judge the people we love.
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

quote: Love is whatever you can still betray. Betrayal can only happen if you love.
author: John le Carre

quote: I'd kiss a frog even if there was no promise of a Prince Charming popping out of it. I love frogs.
author: Cameron Diaz

quote: Sex without love is merely healthy exercise.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: The time I burned my guitar it was like a sacrifice. You sacrifice the things you love. I love my guitar.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: No woman ever hates a man for being in love with her, but many a woman hate a man for being a friend to her.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: When you're taught to love everyone, to love your enemies, then what value does that place on love?
author: Marilyn Manson

quote: Behold, my friends, the spring is come; the earth has gladly received the embraces of the sun, and we shall soon see the results of their love!
author: Sitting Bull

quote: Women love us for our defects. If we have enough of them, they will forgive us everything, even our gigantic intellects.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: To love rightly is to love what is orderly and beautiful in an educated and disciplined way.
author: Plato

quote: Love is always open arms. If you close your arms about love you will find that you are left holding only yourself.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: I never knew how to worship until I knew how to love.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: I hate losing and cricket being my first love, once I enter the ground it's a different zone altogether and that hunger for winning is always there.
author: Sachin Tendulkar

quote: My number one goal is to love, support and be there for my son.
author: Farrah Fawcett

quote: It is with true love as it is with ghosts; everyone talks about it, but few have seen it.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Yes, love indeed is light from heaven; A spark of that immortal fire with angels shared, by Allah given to lift from earth our low desire.
author: Lord Byron

quote: May you live as long as you wish and love as long as you live.
author: Robert A. Heinlein

quote: A poet is, before anything else, a person who is passionately in love with language.
author: W. H. Auden

quote: In the silence of night I have often wished for just a few words of love from one man, rather than the applause of thousands of people.
author: Judy Garland

quote: If you don't love me, it does not matter, anyway I can love for both of us.
author: Stendhal

quote: Love is what we were born with. Fear is what we learned here.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Love can consign us to hell or to paradise, but it always takes us somewhere.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: This is one of the miracles of love: It gives a power of seeing through its own enchantments and yet not being disenchanted.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: There are more people who wish to be loved than there are who are willing to love.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: Having a child is surely the most beautifully irrational act that two people in love can commit.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Love is not love that alters when it alteration finds.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Whoever loves becomes humble. Those who love have, so to speak, pawned a part of their narcissism.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: Music is what I breath, what I love to do. It keeps me alive.
author: Miley Cyrus

quote: When a man has once loved a woman he will do anything for her except continue to love her.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: We love to expect, and when expectation is either disappointed or gratified, we want to be again expecting.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: You don't have to deserve your mother's love. You have to deserve your father's.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Girls we love for what they are; young men for what they promise to be.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: We look forward to the time when the power to love will replace the love of power. Then will our world know the blessings of peace.
author: William E. Gladstone

quote: We have enough religion to make us hate, but not enough to make us love one another.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: It's possible to love a human being if you don't know them too well.
author: Charles Bukowski

quote: What do I care about the purring of one who cannot love, like the cat?
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: I don't love studying. I hate studying. I like learning. Learning is beautiful.
author: Natalie Portman

quote: Even though we are deceived, still believe. Though we are betrayed, still forgive. Love completely even those who hate you.
author: Sun Myung Moon

quote: I can't imagine anything more worthwhile than doing what I most love. And they pay me for it.
author: Edgar Winter

quote: True love stories never have endings.
author: Richard Bach

quote: I love argument, I love debate. I don't expect anyone just to sit there and agree with me, that's not their job.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I love criticism just so long as it's unqualified praise.
author: Noel Coward

quote: Men love to wonder, and that is the seed of science.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Hatred is blind, as well as love.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I tore myself away from the safe comfort of certainties through my love for truth - and truth rewarded me.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: Love cannot endure indifference. It needs to be wanted. Like a lamp, it needs to be fed out of the oil of another's heart, or its flame burns low.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: It is not the creation of wealth that is wrong, but the love of money for its own sake.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: I have felt cats rubbing their faces against mine and touching my cheek with claws carefully sheathed. These things, to me, are expressions of love.
author: James Herriot

quote: Our first and last love is self-love.
author: Christian Nestell Bovee

quote: There are fathers who do not love their children; there is no grandfather who does not adore his grandson.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I love everything that's old, - old friends, old times, old manners, old books, old wine.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: Trust in what you love, continue to do it, and it will take you where you need to go.
author: Natalie Goldberg

quote: Love has its place, as does hate. Peace has its place, as does war. Mercy has its place, as do cruelty and revenge.
author: Meir Kahane

quote: Study nature, love nature, stay close to nature. It will never fail you.
author: Frank Lloyd Wright

quote: The perfect love affair is one which is conducted entirely by post.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Where there's marriage without love, there will be love without marriage.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: It is not love that should be depicted as blind, but self-love.
author: Voltaire

quote: Love is a special word, and I use it only when I mean it. You say the word too much and it becomes cheap.
author: Ray Charles

quote: Ignorance and bungling with love are better than wisdom and skill without.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: One can find women who have never had one love affair, but it is rare indeed to find any who have had only one.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: If we judge love by most of its effects, it resembles rather hatred than affection.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: There is no scarcity of opportunity to make a living at what you love; there's only scarcity of resolve to make it happen.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: I feel that there is nothing more truly artistic than to love people.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The more I think about it, the more I realize there is nothing more artistic than to love others.
author: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: The love of heaven makes one heavenly.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: I'm in trouble because I'm normal and slightly arrogant. A lot of people don't like themselves and I happen to be totally in love with myself.
author: Mike Tyson

quote: To live is like to love - all reason is against it, and all healthy instinct for it.
author: Samuel Butler

quote: Nobody loves a woman because she is handsome or ugly, stupid or intelligent. We love because we love.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: Only the broken-hearted know the truth about love.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: If you cannot inspire a woman with love of you, fill her above the brim with love of herself; all that runs over will be yours.
author: Charles Caleb Colton

quote: The first symptom of love in a young man is timidity; in a girl boldness.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: Love conquers all things except poverty and toothache.
author: Mae West

quote: True love cannot be found where it does not exist, nor can it be denied where it does.
author: Torquato Tasso

quote: It is easy to say how we love new friends, and what we think of them, but words can never trace out all the fibers that knit us to the old.
author: George Eliot

quote: I am not a vegetarian because I love animals; I am a vegetarian because I hate plants.
author: A. Whitney Brown

quote: I love those who do not know how to live for today.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Those whom we can love, we can hate; to others we are indifferent.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I love power. But it is as an artist that I love it. I love it as a musician loves his violin, to draw out its sounds and chords and harmonies.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: When a man must force himself to be faithful in his love, this is hardly better than unfaithfulness.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: A scholar who cherishes the love of comfort is not fit to be deemed a scholar.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Unless you love someone, nothing else makes any sense.
author: e. e. cummings

quote: I love Wagner, but the music I prefer is that of a cat hung up by its tail outside a window and trying to stick to the panes of glass with its claws.
author: Charles Baudelaire

quote: It is not enough to say we must not wage war. It is necessary to love peace and sacrifice for it.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Falling out of love is chiefly a matter of forgetting how charming someone is.
author: Iris Murdoch

quote: I wish people would love everybody else the way they love me. It would be a better world.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Love begins with an image; lust with a sensation.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Man's nature is not essentially evil. Brute nature has been know to yield to the influence of love. You must never despair of human nature.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: All the passions make us commit faults; love makes us commit the most ridiculous ones.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love and dignity cannot share the same abode.
author: Ovid

quote: Love is a trap. When it appears, we see only its light, not its shadows.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: I love my children beyond all reason. They're my joy, even when they're wild with kid energy.
author: Christopher Meloni

quote: Love is too young to know what conscience is.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: He who falls in love with himself will have no rivals.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: This is the miracle that happens every time to those who really love: the more they give, the more they possess.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: He who does not love his own language is worse than an animal and smelly fish.
author: Jose Rizal

quote: Love is not consolation. It is light.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: If any person wish to be idle, let them fall in love.
author: Ovid

quote: I love you more than my own skin.
author: Frida Kahlo

quote: Women have simple tastes. They get pleasure out of the conversation of children in arms and men in love.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: I love chicken. I would eat chicken fingers on Thanksgiving if it were socially acceptable.
author: Todd Barry

quote: If a person loves only one other person and is indifferent to all others, his love is not love but a symbiotic attachment, or an enlarged egotism.
author: Erich Fromm

quote: Love involves a peculiar unfathomable combination of understanding and misunderstanding.
author: Diane Arbus

quote: Truth is handsomer than the affectation of love. Your goodness must have some edge to it, else it is none.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Just don't give up trying to do what you really want to do. Where there is love and inspiration, I don't think you can go wrong.
author: Ella Fitzgerald

quote: The motto of chivalry is also the motto of wisdom; to serve all, but love only one.
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: The more I know of the world, the more I am convinced that I shall never see a man whom I can really love.
author: Jane Austen

quote: Mysterious love, uncertain treasure, hast thou more of pain or pleasure! Endless torments dwell about thee: Yet who would live, and live without thee!
author: Joseph Addison

quote: It is not in the power of even the most crafty dissimulation to conceal love long, where it really is, nor to counterfeit it long where it is not.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Grief is the price we pay for love.
author: Queen Elizabeth II

quote: Honesty does not always bring a response of love, but it is absolutely essential to it.
author: Ray Blanton

quote: Men often pass from love to ambition, but they seldom come back again from ambition to love.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: You don't have to love them. You just have to respect their rights.
author: Edward Koch

quote: If you love something let it go free. If it doesn't come back, you never had it. If it comes back, love it forever.
author: Douglas Horton

quote: Marriage is not a noun; it's a verb. It isn't something you get. It's something you do. It's the way you love your partner every day.
author: Barbara de Angelis

quote: The love that lasts longest is the love that is never returned.
author: W. Somerset Maugham

quote: Love is a portion of the soul itself, and it is of the same nature as the celestial breathing of the atmosphere of paradise.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: To love is so startling it leaves little time for anything else.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: Love at first sight is easy to understand; it's when two people have been looking at each other for a lifetime that it becomes a miracle.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Love always creates, it never destroys. In this lie's man's only promise.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: We always love those who admire us, but we do not always love those whom we admire.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: You don't walk away if you love someone. You help the person.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: We are nearer loving those who hate us than those who love us more than we wish.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Love matches, so called, have illusion for their father and need for their mother.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: We may sooner be brought to love them that hate us, than them that love us more than we would have them do.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: In the end, the love you take is equal to the love you make.
author: Paul McCartney

quote: We pardon to the extent that we love.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: In the game of love, the losers are more celebrated than the winners.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: True love comes quietly, without banners or flashing lights. If you hear bells, get your ears checked.
author: Erich Segal

quote: We don't believe in rheumatism and true love until after the first attack.
author: Marie von Ebner-Eschenbach

quote: To be interested in the changing seasons is a happier state of mind than to be hopelessly in love with spring.
author: George Santayana

quote: True love doesn't come to you it has to be inside you.
author: Julia Roberts

quote: Alcohol is like love. The first kiss is magic, the second is intimate, the third is routine. After that you take the girl's clothes off.
author: Raymond Chandler

quote: If love is the treasure, laughter is the key.
author: Yakov Smirnoff

quote: This is the hardest of all: to close the open hand out of love, and keep modest as a giver.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Those whom the gods love grow young.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: I've only been in love with a beer bottle and a mirror.
author: Sid Vicious

quote: If you love large, you've got to hurt large. If you've got a lot of light, you've probably got an equal amount of darkness.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: What I am is how I came out. No one's perfect and you just have to accept your flaws and learn to love yourself.
author: Kelly Brook

quote: The Bible tells us to love our neighbors, and also to love our enemies; probably because generally they are the same people.
author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Everything we do in life is based on fear, especially love.
author: Mel Brooks

quote: Love and work... work and love, that's all there is.
author: Sigmund Freud

quote: A flower falls, even though we love it; and a weed grows, even though we do not love it.
author: Dogen

quote: Infinite love is the only truth. Everything else is illusion.
author: David Icke

quote: Black as the devil, hot as hell, pure as an angel, sweet as love.
author: Charles Maurice de Talleyrand

quote: People protect what they love.
author: Jacques Yves Cousteau

quote: Hatred observes with more care than love does.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Act happy, feel happy, be happy, without a reason in the world. Then you can love, and do what you will.
author: Dan Millman

quote: May we so love as never to have occasion to repent of our love!
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The problem with marriage is that it ends every night after making love, and it must be rebuilt every morning before breakfast.
author: Gabriel Garcia Marquez

quote: It almost seems that nobody can hate America as much as native Americans. America needs new immigrants to love and cherish it.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: Love and kindness are never wasted. They always make a difference. They bless the one who receives them, and they bless you, the giver.
author: Barbara de Angelis

quote: Is it not enough to know the evil to shun it? If not, we should be sincere enough to admit that we love evil too well to give it up.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: No one is a friend to his friend who does not love in return.
author: Plato

quote: At the end of the day, you know, love does not happen between two perfect people as much as we would wish.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: The first time you marry for love, the second for money, and the third for companionship.
author: Jackie Kennedy

quote: I often try to tell kids to think about all the people who love you, don't cry over the one person who doesn't.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Do what you love; you'll be better at it. It sounds pretty simple, but you'd be surprised how many people don't get this one right away.
author: LL Cool J

quote: Tell the truth. Sing with passion. Work with laughter. Love with heart. 'Cause that's all that matters in the end.
author: Kris Kristofferson

quote: I was in love with the whole world and all that lived in its rainy arms.
author: Louise Erdrich

quote: Love is a snowmobile racing across the tundra and then suddenly it flips over, pinning you underneath. At night, the ice weasels come.
author: Matt Groening

quote: They do not love that do not show their love.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: If you work just for money, you'll never make it, but if you love what you're doing and you always put the customer first, success will be yours.
author: Ray Kroc

quote: Of all that is written, I love only what a person has written with his own blood.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Money can buy you a fine dog, but only love can make him wag his tail.
author: Kinky Friedman

quote: Life is pain and the enjoyment of love is an anesthetic.
author: Cesare Pavese

quote: There is always something ridiculous about the emotions of people whom one has ceased to love.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: If you don't love yourself, you can't love anybody else. And I think as women we really forget that.
author: Jennifer Lopez

quote: Guilt for being rich, and guilt thinking that perhaps love and peace isn't enough and you have to go and get shot or something.
author: John Lennon

quote: We're never so vulnerable than when we trust someone - but paradoxically, if we cannot trust, neither can we find love or joy.
author: Walter Anderson

quote: Romance is tempestuous. Love is calm.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Where love rules, there is no will to power; and where power predominates, there love is lacking. The one is the shadow of the other.
author: Carl Jung

quote: I love you is the inscription on Pandora's box.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Wine comes in at the mouth And love comes in at the eye; That's all we shall know for truth Before we grow old and die.
author: William Butler Yeats

quote: Sex is a part of love. You shouldn't go around doing it unless you are in love.
author: Bettie Page

quote: I'll come and make love to you at five o'clock. If I'm late start without me.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: I love not man the less, but Nature more.
author: Lord Byron

quote: From your parents you learn love and laughter and how to put one foot before the other. But when books are opened you discover that you have wings.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: Trust no friend without faults, and love a woman, but no angel.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: The word love has by no means the same sense for both sexes, and this is one cause of the serious misunderstandings that divide them.
author: Simone de Beauvoir

quote: The flowering of love is meditation.
author: Jiddu Krishnamurti

quote: The first duty of love is to listen.
author: Paul Tillich

quote: I love California, I practically grew up in Phoenix.
author: Dan Quayle

quote: In love we often doubt what we most believe.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: When a man is in love, he doubts, very often, what he most firmly believes.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: After a storm comes a calm.
author: Matthew Henry

quote: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

quote: If you're going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C. S. Lewis

quote: Be miserable. Or motivate yourself. Whatever has to be done, it's always your choice.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius

quote: I don't believe you have to be better than everybody else. I believe you have to be better than you ever thought you could be.
author: Ken Venturi

quote: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: If you can dream it, you can do it.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Learn from the past, set vivid, detailed goals for the future, and live in the only moment of time over which you have any control: now.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Even if you fall on your face, you're still moving forward.
author: Victor Kiam

quote: Do you want to know who you are? Don't ask. Act! Action will delineate and define you.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Expect problems and eat them for breakfast.
author: Alfred A. Montapert

quote: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
author: William James

quote: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: Always desire to learn something useful.
author: Sophocles

quote: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: Be gentle to all and stern with yourself.
author: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: I've worked too hard and too long to let anything stand in the way of my goals. I will not let my teammates down and I will not let myself down.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: Opportunity does not knock, it presents itself when you beat down the door.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: Things do not happen. Things are made to happen.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: Well done is better than well said.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Quality is not an act, it is a habit.
author: Aristotle

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: Never complain and never explain.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
author: Bo Jackson

quote: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Leap, and the net will appear.
author: John Burroughs

quote: The first step toward success is taken when you refuse to be a captive of the environment in which you first find yourself.
author: Mark Caine

quote: It's always too early to quit.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Begin to be now what you will be hereafter.
author: William James

quote: Crave for a thing, you will get it. Renounce the craving, the object will follow you by itself.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Who seeks shall find.
author: Sophocles

quote: The hardships that I encountered in the past will help me succeed in the future.
author: Philip Emeagwali

quote: Setting goals is the first step in turning the invisible into the visible.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: When you fail you learn from the mistakes you made and it motivates you to work even harder.
author: Natalie Gulbis

quote: You can never quit. Winners never quit, and quitters never win.
author: Ted Turner

quote: The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
author: Amelia Earhart

quote: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: Perseverance is failing 19 times and succeeding the 20th.
author: Julie Andrews

quote: You need to overcome the tug of people against you as you reach for high goals.
author: George S. Patton

quote: You can't wait for inspiration. You have to go after it with a club.
author: Jack London

quote: No matter how many goals you have achieved, you must set your sights on a higher one.
author: Jessica Savitch

quote: I can, therefore I am.
author: Simone Weil

quote: Do your work with your whole heart, and you will succeed - there's so little competition.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: Know or listen to those who know.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: You can't expect to hit the jackpot if you don't put a few nickels in the machine.
author: Flip Wilson

quote: The wise does at once what the fool does at last.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Wherever you are - be all there.
author: Jim Elliot

quote: In order to succeed, we must first believe that we can.
author: Nikos Kazantzakis

quote: The will to succeed is important, but what's more important is the will to prepare.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Be thine own palace, or the world's thy jail.
author: John Donne

quote: Only the educated are free.
author: Epictetus

quote: The weeds keep multiplying in our garden, which is our mind ruled by fear. Rip them out and call them by name.
author: Sylvia Browne

quote: One way to keep momentum going is to have constantly greater goals.
author: Michael Korda

quote: I was motivated to be different in part because I was different.
author: Donna Brazile

quote: Poverty was the greatest motivating factor in my life.
author: Jimmy Dean

quote: Do not weep; do not wax indignant. Understand.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: We make the world we live in and shape our own environment.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: The dog that trots about finds a bone.
author: Golda Meir

quote: To know oneself, one should assert oneself.
author: Albert Camus

quote: There is nothing deep down inside us except what we have put there ourselves.
author: Richard Rorty

quote: If you've got a talent, protect it.
author: Jim Carrey

quote: The ultimate aim of the ego is not to see something, but to be something.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: One may miss the mark by aiming too high as too low.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: You never know what motivates you.
author: Cicely Tyson

quote: To be wholly devoted to some intellectual exercise is to have succeeded in life.
author: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: I wake up every morning at nine and grab for the morning paper. Then I look at the obituary page. If my name is not on it, I get up.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: The sun is new each day.
author: Heraclitus

quote: An early-morning walk is a blessing for the whole day.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: In the morning a man walks with his whole body; in the evening, only with his legs.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Think in the morning. Act in the noon. Eat in the evening. Sleep in the night.
author: William Blake

quote: Do not say, 'It is morning,' and dismiss it with a name of yesterday. See it for the first time as a newborn child that has no name.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: This morning when I put on my underwear I could hear the fruit-of-the-loom guys laughing at me.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: Arranging a bowl of flowers in the morning can give a sense of quiet in a crowded day - like writing a poem or saying a prayer.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: In a real dark night of the soul, it is always three o'clock in the morning, day after day.
author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

quote: Be pleasant until ten o'clock in the morning and the rest of the day will take care of itself.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Each morning sees some task begun, each evening sees it close; Something attempted, something done, has earned a night's repose.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: First thing every morning before you arise say out loud, 'I believe,' three times.
author: Ovid

quote: Opportunities are like sunrises. If you wait too long, you miss them.
author: William Arthur Ward

quote: It ain't as bad as you think. It will look better in the morning.
author: Colin Powell

quote: Nothing is more beautiful than the loveliness of the woods before sunrise.
author: George Washington Carver

quote: I'm always thinking about creating. My future starts when I wake up every morning... Every day I find something creative to do with my life.
author: Miles Davis

quote: Some mornings, it's just not worth chewing through the leather straps.
author: Emo Philips

quote: I love the smell of juice boxes in the morning.
author: Robert Duvall

quote: Every morning I get up and look through the Forbes list of the richest people in America. If I'm not there, I go to work.
author: Robert Orben

quote: Early morning cheerfulness can be extremely obnoxious.
author: William Feather

quote: Good morning is a contradiction of terms.
author: Jim Davis

quote: I remind myself every morning: Nothing I say this day will teach me anything. So if I'm going to learn, I must do it by listening.
author: Larry King

quote: I never really look for anything. What God throws my way comes. I wake up in the morning and whichever way God turns my feet, I go.
author: Pearl Bailey

quote: I had a monumental idea this morning, but I didn't like it.
author: Samuel Goldwyn

quote: If some great catastrophe is not announced every morning, we feel a certain void. Nothing in the paper today, we sigh.
author: Lord Acton

quote: Morning comes whether you set the alarm or not.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin

quote: Lose an hour in the morning, and you will spend all day looking for it.
author: Richard Whately

quote: The most efficient way to live reasonably is every morning to make a plan of one's day and every night to examine the results obtained.
author: Alexis Carrel

quote: Never face facts; if you do you'll never get up in the morning.
author: Marlo Thomas

quote: It's always such a joy that you wake up in the morning and there's work to do.
author: Jerome Lawrence

quote: Tell him he can have my title, but I want it back in the morning.
author: Jack Dempsey

quote: It was a splendid summer morning and it seemed as if nothing could go wrong.
author: John Cheever

quote: We could hardly wait to get up in the morning.
author: Wilbur Wright

quote: I may be drunk, Miss, but in the morning I will be sober and you will still be ugly.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: The brain is a wonderful organ; it starts working the moment you get up in the morning and does not stop until you get into the office.
author: Robert Frost

quote: There's nothing sadder in this world than to awake Christmas morning and not be a child.
author: Erma Bombeck

quote: I have to be alone very often. I'd be quite happy if I spent from Saturday night until Monday morning alone in my apartment. That's how I refuel.
author: Audrey Hepburn

quote: Just in terms of allocation of time resources, religion is not very efficient. There's a lot more I could be doing on a Sunday morning.
author: Bill Gates

quote: I recently took up ice sculpting. Last night I made an ice cube. This morning I made 12, I was prolific.
author: Mitch Hedberg

quote: One morning I shot an elephant in my pajamas. How he got into my pajamas I'll never know.
author: Groucho Marx

quote: The person who doesn't scatter the morning dew will not comb gray hairs.
author: Hunter S. Thompson

quote: Morning without you is a dwindled dawn.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: My mother had morning sickness after I was born.
author: Rodney Dangerfield

quote: In these times you have to be an optimist to open your eyes when you awake in the morning.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: It is a matter of shame that in the morning the birds should be awake earlier than you.
author: Abu Bakr

quote: In my afternoon walk I would fain forget all my morning occupations and my obligations to society.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The happiest part of a man's life is what he passes lying awake in bed in the morning.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Cinema in India is like brushing your teeth in the morning. You can't escape it.
author: Shahrukh Khan

quote: The two most joyous times of the year are Christmas morning and the end of school.
author: Alice Cooper

quote: What inspires you, what excites you when you wake up in the morning?
author: Jennifer Aniston

quote: Above all, this country is our own. Nobody has to get up in the morning and worry what his neighbors think of him. Being a Jew is no problem here.
author: Golda Meir

quote: Make sure you never, never argue at night. You just lose a good night's sleep, and you can't settle anything until morning anyway.
author: Rose Kennedy

quote: We sleep, but the loom of life never stops, and the pattern which was weaving when the sun went down is weaving when it comes up in the morning.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: To simply wake up every morning a better person than when I went to bed.
author: Sidney Poitier

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I feel just like any other insecure 24-year-old girl.
author: Lady Gaga

quote: The less I behave like Whistler's mother the night before, the more I look like her the morning after.
author: Tallulah Bankhead

quote: And if I had a preference, it would be to be able to not be in the studio until 4 in the morning.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: I'm not an employee who goes to the office every morning at the same time. Then, vacations are needed.
author: Karl Lagerfeld

quote: I'm a very early riser, and I don't like to miss that beautiful early morning light.
author: David Hockney

quote: I draw flowers every day and send them to my friends so they get fresh blooms every morning.
author: David Hockney

quote: I wake up in the morning, I do a little stretching exercises, pick up the horn and play.
author: Herb Alpert

quote: I usually decide what to wear in the morning, but sometimes, I'll have a favorite coat or sweater or shoes, and I'll wear them everyday for a week!
author: Cameron Russell

quote: You wake up in the morning and you look at your old spoon, and you say to yourself, 'Mick, it's time to get yourself a new spoon.' And you do.
author: Mick Jagger

quote: In the morning, I practice 15 minutes of yoga.
author: Vivienne Westwood

quote: You won't see me in a better mood than 4:00 in the morning on my way to work.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: I'm always in bed by 11 or 12 and people laugh all the time - they want me to hang out until two in the morning, but n-n-no, I need my nine hours.
author: Christina Ricci

quote: Most of the time I spend when I get up in the morning is trying to figure out what is going to happen.
author: Madeleine Albright

quote: My children are the reason I laugh, smile and want to get up every morning.
author: Gena Lee Nolin

quote: By Thursday morning, we'd gotten over the worst of it.
author: William Scranton

quote: I became a musician so I wouldn't have to get up at 6 in the morning.
author: Norah Jones

quote: Acting is invigorating. But I don't analyse it too much. It's like a dog smelling where it's going to do its toilet in the morning.
author: Liam Neeson

quote: I have retired, but if there's anything that would kill me it is to wake up in the morning not knowing what to do.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I'm actually one of those people who get up energetic in the morning.
author: Elizabeth Edwards

quote: If I want to get work done, that's usually about 3 in the morning.
author: Marc Andreessen

quote: I, of course, meditate for two hours every morning. It's part of my schedule; I wake up at 4 a.m. every day and I love it.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: I see myself at 7:30 in the morning and it's not too pretty.
author: Rod Stewart

quote: Your body tells you what it needs, and if you sleep past your alarm on a Saturday morning, it's probably because you need the sleep.
author: Sophia Bush

quote: You always say 'I'll quit when I start to slide', and then one morning you wake up and realize you've done slid.
author: Sugar Ray Robinson

quote: And my only rule being if when I wake in the morning I'm looking forward to the things that I have to do that day, then I'm on the right track.
author: Demetri Martin

quote: Smile in the mirror. Do that every morning and you'll start to see a big difference in your life.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: The great fun in my life has been getting up every morning and rushing to the typewriter because some new idea has hit me.
author: Ray Bradbury

quote: What's the first thing I do when I wake up in the morning? Wish I hadn't.
author: Steven Patrick Morrissey

quote: I do yoga every morning, then I run for half an hour and take a sauna.
author: Antonio Banderas

quote: I wake up every morning, look in the mirror and ask, 'Am I a sex symbol?' Then I go back to bed again. It's stupid to think that way.
author: Antonio Banderas

quote: I never knew a man come to greatness or eminence who lay abed late in the morning.
author: Jonathan Swift

quote: Swallow a toad in the morning and you will encounter nothing more disgusting the rest of the day.
author: Nicolas Chamfort

quote: No man knows till he has suffered from the night how sweet and dear to his heart and eye the morning can be.
author: Bram Stoker

quote: I always do an all-night horror marathon on Saturdays where we start at seven and go until five in the morning.
author: Quentin Tarantino

quote: I blend my green drink every morning. I also fix my son a full-on American breakfast with bacon and toast.
author: Liz Phair

quote: It's hard to think of yourself as a brand, especially when I have four daughters who kick my butt early in the morning every day before I go to work.
author: Harvey Weinstein

quote: Every Wednesday, my husband and I have a study group with our friends. I attend church. We try to devote time in the morning, say a prayer.
author: Carrie Underwood

quote: The world is new to us every morning - this is God's gift; and every man should believe he is reborn each day.
author: Baal Shem Tov

quote: I love being. There's so much wisdom in it. You wake up in the morning and you think, Hey, isn't it great just being?
author: Gwyneth Paltrow

quote: How like herrings and onions our vices are in the morning after we have committed them.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: When I wake up at 5 in the morning is it just to jog? Definitely not, I give it all of my efforts.
author: Haile Gebrselassie

quote: I get up in the morning looking for an adventure.
author: George Foreman

quote: We awoke one morning in September, and the world lurched on its axis.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: I don't wake up each morning saying, 'Oh, wow, it's me. I think I'm the cat's meow. I'm the best.'
author: Jeb Bush

quote: I am not a morning person. I like to sleep in.
author: Martha Plimpton

quote: I'm not a morning person. I'm really not.
author: Brooke Burke

quote: I pray every night before I go to sleep and every morning when I wake up.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: I write when I'm inspired, and I see to it that I'm inspired at nine o'clock every morning.
author: Peter De Vries

quote: I get up at the same time every morning.
author: Mehmet Oz

quote: Sometimes, getting up in the morning and brishing your teath is the hardest part of the day - it all just hurts.
author: Tom Brady

quote: As far as I'm concerned, the entire reason for becoming a writer is not having to get up in the morning.
author: Neil Gaiman

quote: Do I get up every morning and ask: am I doing the things that I believe in and am I doing them for the best possible motives? Yes. Unambiguously yes.
author: Nick Clegg

quote: I mean, if you have to wake up in the morning to be validated by the editorial page of the New York Times, you got a pretty sorry existence.
author: Karl Rove

quote: The quality of life is so much higher anyplace you can ski in the morning and surf in the evening - there's something to be said for that.
author: Ian Somerhalder

quote: Of all the songs I've recorded, 'Amarillo By Morning' always sticks out in my mind.
author: George Strait

quote: I don't have to wait until the next morning to regret something I did that was kinda dumb.
author: Bobby Knight

quote: Making love in the morning got me through morning sickness. I found I could be happy and throw up at the same time.
author: Pamela Anderson

quote: My wife gets all the money I make. I just get an apple and clean clothes every morning.
author: Ray Romano

quote: Every morning I wake at 6am or 6.30am, champing at the bit.
author: John Grisham

quote: When you really deep down look at it, we go to bed every night, get up every morning, stay here for 70 or 80 years, and then we die.
author: Lee Trevino

quote: When I travel, I like to take advantage of room service. I'm really into eggs Benedict in the morning.
author: Jenny McCarthy

quote: When you walk out of your house in the morning, you don't know what you're going to see.
author: Kyle Chandler

quote: No city should be too large for a man to walk out of in a morning.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: I've never been a TV junkie. I remember watching Letterman way back when he had a morning show.
author: Todd Barry

quote: Autumn arrives in early morning, but spring at the close of a winter day.
author: Elizabeth Bowen

quote: When I first broke through, there was only NBC, CBS and ABC, and they had news in the morning and in the evening - there wasn't no 24-hour news.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: I am not a morning person.
author: Laurell K. Hamilton

quote: The one ironclad rule is that I have to try. I have to walk into my writing room and pick up my pen every weekday morning.
author: Anne Tyler

quote: When I wake up in the morning, I just can't get started until I've had that first, piping hot pot of coffee. Oh, I've tried other enemas.
author: Emo Philips

quote: Remember my first tenet in getting dressed is how you feel in the morning. So if you're not being true blue to that, it usually shows.
author: Pharrell Williams

quote: I'm obsessed with radio. It's a good start to Sunday morning.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: A real New Yorker likes the sound of a garbage truck in the morning.
author: R. L. Stine

quote: The day of the sun is like the day of a king. It is a promenade in the morning, a sitting on the throne at noon, a pageant in the evening.
author: Wallace Stevens

quote: Yes, I still love 'South Park,' but I also love morning TV now.
author: Mo Rocca

quote: I wake up every morning and I surprise myself. I wake up to a new me.
author: Gina Carano

quote: Normal people don't just wake up in the morning and say I think it'd be a good idea to run for president of the United States.
author: Jon Huntsman, Jr.

quote: Nobody has time to keep trying on a load of things in the morning like a teenager.
author: Claudia Schiffer

quote: That's the biggest part of doing comics: You have to create stuff that makes you want to get out of bed every morning and get to work.
author: Daniel Clowes

quote: My extravagance is my garden - it's the first thing I look at every morning when I wake up. It gives me so much pleasure.
author: Ina Garten

quote: It's not easy waking up every single morning knowing what you're going to put your body through and having to do it. We don't have days off.
author: Bryan Clay

quote: Let me tell you, sisters, seeing dried egg on a plate in the morning is a lot dirtier than anything I've had to deal with in politics.
author: Ann Richards

quote: When traveling with someone, take large does of patience and tolerance with your morning coffee.
author: Helen Hayes

quote: I wake up laughing. Yes, I wake up in the morning and there I am just laughing my head off.
author: Bruce Willis

quote: I still love doing what I do, and I'm really lucky to get up in the morning and want to go to work.
author: Heston Blumenthal

quote: It's such a luxury to be able to be happy about going to work in the morning.
author: Joe Pantoliano

quote: Men and women were declared equal one morning and everybody could divorce each other by postcard.
author: Kate Millett

quote: I do Yoga. I'd like to say I do it every morning, but I don't, I just don't have the time.
author: Radha Mitchell

quote: I was so young, and making movies, going to the studio every morning at dawn was magic.
author: Natalie Wood

quote: Chelsea Morning is a great Joni Mitchell song and I guess I'm partial to her lyrics because they show me a slightly different perspective on life.
author: Neil Diamond

quote: If I'm working on a film, I'll do sit-ups for before I shoot. Like, 100 in the morning or something.
author: James Franco

quote: Sometimes in the morning, when it's a good surf, I go out there, and I don't feel like it's a bad world.
author: Kary Mullis

quote: I squeeze oranges every morning to make juice.
author: Utada Hikaru

quote: I wake up every morning singing 'The Star-Spangled Banner.'
author: Terry McAuliffe

quote: Waking up with a bad head in the morning is difficult sometimes.
author: Caroline Corr

quote: Now, on nights that I can't sleep, I play video games alone until the morning.
author: Namie Amuro

quote: What I do is not some magical, mystical thing. I simply get up in the morning, get to work on time, say my lines, and do the best I can.
author: Parker Stevenson

quote: I woke up this morning, and I still don't believe I won the Daytona 500.
author: Dale Earnhardt

quote: Prince used to call me up 3am in the morning and invite me to hear some of his new songs.
author: Sheena Easton

quote: My ideal is to wake up in the morning and run around the meadow naked.
author: Daryl Hannah

quote: In the morning, I reach for the sports page.
author: Lisa Guerrero

quote: On my morning run, I listen to sports talk radio.
author: Lisa Guerrero

quote: I don't know why you call it morning sickness, because I was sick all day and night!
author: Soleil Moon Frye

quote: My days, if they start in the morning with a cuddle from my son, are just so much more glorious than they were prior to that.
author: Russell Crowe

quote: It seems a long time since the morning mail could be called correspondence.
author: Jacques Barzun

quote: It wasn't always easy getting up at 5 o'clock in the morning to go to the rink. Sometimes I wanted to just go back to sleep.
author: Nancy Kerrigan

quote: I just remember Stella Tenant and me dancing in Donatella Versace's bathtub until like four in the morning. It was one of those 'pinch me' moments.
author: Carolyn Murphy

quote: I was up late last night yapping about the elections on CNN and up early this morning doing the same thing in my daughter's kindergarten class.
author: Tucker Carlson

quote: I took prenatal yoga three times a week, including the morning I went into labor. It helped me stay comfortable.
author: Alyssa Milano

quote: I can't record in the morning because I sound like Barry White.
author: Toni Braxton
