quote: Self-defence is Nature's eldest law.
author: John Dryden

quote: The nature of the game is pain.
author: LL Cool J

quote: We have much to learn by studying nature and taking the time to tease out its secrets.
author: David Suzuki

quote: The body is ready to have babies. Nature wants it done then, when the body can handle it, not after 40, when the income can handle it.
author: Toni Morrison

quote: Nature isn't positive in that way. It doesn't aim itself at you. It's not being unkind to you.
author: David Attenborough

quote: I'm not a woman. I'm a force of nature.
author: Courtney Love

quote: All nature wears one universal grin.
author: Henry Fielding

quote: The laws of nature are but the mathematical thoughts of God.
author: Euclid

quote: It is a law of human nature that in victory even the coward may boast of his prowess, while defeat injures the reputation even of the brave.
author: Sallust

quote: Human nature is not black and white but black and grey.
author: Graham Greene

quote: There is an urgent need for a radical revision of our current concepts of the nature of consciousness and its relationship to matter and the brain.
author: Stanislav Grof

quote: If people think nature is their friend, then they sure don't need an enemy.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: I have never felt salvation in nature. I love cities above all.
author: Michelangelo

quote: The scientific observer of Nature is a kind of mystic seeker in the act of prayer.
author: Muhammad Iqbal

quote: Whatsoever is contrary to nature is contrary to reason, and whatsoever is contrary to reason is absurd.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: The stars, that nature hung in heaven, and filled their lamps with everlasting oil, give due light to the misled and lonely traveller.
author: John Milton

quote: The most solid piece of scientific truth I know of is that we are profoundly ignorant about nature.
author: Lewis Thomas

quote: Nature that framed us of four elements, warring within our breasts for regiment, doth teach us all to have aspiring minds.
author: Niccolo Machiavelli

quote: A vacuum is a hell of a lot better than some of the stuff that nature replaces it with.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: I don't worry. It's just not in my nature, really.
author: Jimmy Wales

quote: Race hate isn't human nature; race hate is the abandonment of human nature.
author: Orson Welles

quote: In the general course of human nature, A power over a man's subsistence amounts to a power over his will.
author: Alexander Hamilton

quote: A politician never forgets the precarious nature of elective life. We have never established a practice of tenure in public office.
author: Hubert H. Humphrey

quote: Truth makes on the ocean of nature no one track of light; every eye, looking on, finds its own.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: It is not human nature we should accuse but the despicable conventions that pervert it.
author: Denis Diderot

quote: Speech is human nature itself, with none of the artificiality of written language.
author: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: My job has always been to hold a mirror up to nature.
author: Tom Hanks

quote: But I think we need to remember that democracy everywhere is by its nature incomplete, a work in progress.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: Divorced from the cosmos, from nature, from society and from each other, we have become fractured and fragmented.
author: Daisaku Ikeda

quote: It's my nature to run from relationships, because I have never seen a good one.
author: Bethenny Frankel

quote: Pure drawing is an abstraction. Drawing and colour are not distinct, everything in nature is coloured.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: Doubtless there are things in nature which have not yet been seen. If an artist discovers them, he opens the way for his successors.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: We must not be content to memorize the beautiful formulas of our illustrious predecessors. Let us go out and study beautiful nature.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: I lack the magnificent richness of color that animates nature.
author: Paul Cezanne

quote: Only nature knows how to justly proportion to the fault the punishment it deserves.
author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

quote: A desire to resist oppression is implanted in the nature of man.
author: Tacitus

quote: An eye for an eye only ends up making the whole world blind.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If we have no peace, it is because we have forgotten that we belong to each other.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: I'm interested in the psychological exploration of human nature, and it just happens to come in the form of film-making.
author: Guy Pearce

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: If we can find God only as he is revealed in nature we have no moral God.
author: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Those who make peaceful revolution impossible will make violent revolution inevitable.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The most valuable possession you can own is an open heart. The most powerful weapon you can be is an instrument of peace.
author: Carlos Santana

quote: Your nature is the Buddha.
author: Bodhidharma

quote: Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Nobody can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Squeeze human nature into the straitjacket of criminal justice and crime will appear.
author: Karl Kraus

quote: I believe in the religion of Islam. I believe in Allah and peace.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: It's certainly a lot more difficult to get a project made if you're talking about something progressive. That's just the nature of the industry.
author: Tim Robbins

quote: It isn't enough to talk about peace. One must believe in it. And it isn't enough to believe in it. One must work at it.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Peace is a journey of a thousand miles and it must be taken one step at a time.
author: Lyndon B. Johnson

quote: Nature is our chapel.
author: Bjork

quote: He that would live in peace and at ease must not speak all he knows or all he sees.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Those who are at war with others are not at peace with themselves.
author: William Hazlitt

quote: A people free to choose will always choose peace.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: I can promise you that women working together - linked, informed and educated - can bring peace and prosperity to this forsaken planet.
author: Isabel Allende

quote: It's a great event to get outside and enjoy nature. I find it very exciting no matter how many times I see bald eagles.
author: Karen Armstrong

quote: Even peace may be purchased at too high a price.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Women, by their nature, are not exceptional chess players: they are not great fighters.
author: Garry Kasparov

quote: Let there be work, bread, water and salt for all.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: I dream of an Africa which is in peace with itself.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Nothing makes me so happy as to observe nature and to paint what I see.
author: Henri Rousseau

quote: Human nature is potentially aggressive and destructive and potentially orderly and constructive.
author: Margaret Mead

quote: The real and lasting victories are those of peace, and not of war.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: I've probably understood men too well. I realise they are predatory by nature, and I have a certain acceptance of the male animal.
author: Jacqueline Bisset

quote: Peace is not an absence of war, it is a virtue, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: It is madness for sheep to talk peace with a wolf.
author: Thomas Fuller

quote: It is an unfortunate fact that we can secure peace only by preparing for war.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: I found myself in a race with Mother Nature to play as much baseball as I could before she forced me to stop.
author: Willie Stargell

quote: You will find peace not by trying to escape your problems, but by confronting them courageously. You will find peace not in denial, but in victory.
author: J. Donald Walters

quote: Philosophy would render us entirely Pyrrhonian, were not nature too strong for it.
author: David Hume

quote: Human Nature is the only science of man; and yet has been hitherto the most neglected.
author: David Hume

quote: Peace is its own reward.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: If they want peace, nations should avoid the pin-pricks that precede cannon shots.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: We make war that we may live in peace.
author: Aristotle

quote: War will never cease until babies begin to come into the world with larger cerebrums and smaller adrenal glands.
author: H. L. Mencken

quote: Is there some principal of nature which states that we never know the quality of what we have until it is gone?
author: Herman Melville

quote: I think the darker aspect of my fiction-or anybody's fiction-is by its very nature somehow easier to talk about.
author: Richard Russo

quote: Complete peace equally reigns between two mental waves.
author: Swami Sivananda

quote: Purity and simplicity are the two wings with which man soars above the earth and all temporary nature.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: Peace and justice are two sides of the same coin.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: I think having nature be a part of people's lives helps all of us see ourselves as part of something larger.
author: Ethan Hawke

quote: For behind all imperialism is ultimately the imperialistic individual, just as behind all peace is ultimately the peaceful individual.
author: Irving Babbitt

quote: Peace is not only better than war, but infinitely more arduous.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: In nature, light creates the color. In the picture, color creates the light.
author: Hans Hofmann

quote: The nature of God is a circle of which the center is everywhere and the circumference is nowhere.
author: Empedocles

quote: Peace is liberty in tranquillity.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: An argument fatal to the communist theory, is suggested by the fact, that a desire for property is one of the elements of our nature.
author: Herbert Spencer

quote: I don't know whether war is an interlude during peace, or peace an interlude during war.
author: Georges Clemenceau

quote: Peace is rarely denied to the peaceful.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: The roots of racism lie deep in man's nature, wounded and bruised by original sin.
author: Sargent Shriver

quote: I happen to dig being able to use whatever mystique I have to further the idea of peace.
author: Garrett Morris

quote: I'm an advocate of human nature.
author: Jaron Lanier

quote: People always make war when they say they love peace.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: I'm an optimist by nature, myself, I think.
author: Emily Mortimer

quote: Peace is the first thing the angels sang.
author: John Keble

quote: When thugs by nature meet thugs by political conviction, 5-0 is not surprising.
author: John McCarthy

quote: The only important thing I have to say is that my father never fought against his country.
author: Zinedine Zidane

quote: Peace hath higher tests of manhood, than battle ever knew.
author: John Greenleaf Whittier

quote: You don't have to have fought in a war to love peace.
author: Geraldine Ferraro

quote: Much corporate giving is charitable in nature rather than philanthropic.
author: David Rockefeller

quote: Power to the peaceful!
author: Michael Franti

quote: Of one thing I am certain, the body is not the measure of healing, peace is the measure.
author: Phyllis McGinley

quote: One is called to live nonviolently, even if the change one works for seems impossible.
author: Daniel Berrigan

quote: Nature is not only all that is visible to the eye... it also includes the inner pictures of the soul.
author: Edvard Munch

quote: Yes, we love peace, but we are not willing to take wounds for it, as we are for war.
author: John Andrew Holmes

quote: Peace is when time doesn't matter as it passes by.
author: Maria Schell

quote: The Dove, on silver pinions, winged her peaceful way.
author: James Montgomery

quote: Many artists and scholars have pointed out that ultimately art depends on human nature.
author: Steven Pinker

quote: The duty of man is the same in respect to his own nature as in respect to the nature of all other things, namely not to follow it but to amend it.
author: John Stuart Mill

quote: We want to take good tidings home to our people, that they may sleep in peace.
author: Black Kettle

quote: One cannot subdue a man by holding back his hands. Lasting peace comes not from force.
author: David Borenstein

quote: Only that thing is free which exists by the necessities of its own nature, and is determined in its actions by itself alone.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Nothing exists from whose nature some effect does not follow.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Such is the miraculous nature of the future of exiles: what is first uttered in the impotence of an overheated apartment becomes the fate of nations.
author: Salman Rushdie

quote: If there must be trouble, let it be in my day, that my child may have peace.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Do not overrate what you have received, nor envy others. He who envies others does not obtain peace of mind.
author: Buddha

quote: Like water, we are truest to our nature in repose.
author: Cyril Connolly

quote: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Fighting for peace is like screwing for virginity.
author: George Carlin

quote: By nature, I keep moving, man. My theory is, be the shark. You've just got to keep moving. You can't stop.
author: Brad Pitt

quote: The scientist does not study nature because it is useful; he studies it because he delights in it, and he delights in it because it is beautiful.
author: Henri Poincare

quote: Better than a thousand hollow words, is one word that brings peace.
author: Buddha

quote: If nature were not beautiful, it would not be worth knowing, and if nature were not worth knowing, life would not be worth living.
author: Henri Poincare

quote: We can never obtain peace in the outer world until we make peace with ourselves.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Whatever you are by nature, keep to it; never desert your line of talent. Be what nature intended you for, and you will succeed.
author: Sydney Smith

quote: A mind at peace, a mind centered and not focused on harming others, is stronger than any physical force in the universe.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Whenever I get fed up with life I love to go wandering in nature.
author: Andrea Arnold

quote: Be at war with your vices, at peace with your neighbors, and let every new year find you a better man.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: If everyone demanded peace instead of another television set, then there'd be peace.
author: John Lennon

quote: Where ignorance is our master, there is no possibility of real peace.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Love of man for woman - love of woman for man. That's the nature, the meaning, the best of life itself.
author: Zane Grey

quote: In antiquity the sage kings recognized that men's nature is bad and that their tendencies were not being corrected and their lawlessness controlled.
author: Xun Zi

quote: The soldier above all others prays for peace, for it is the soldier who must suffer and bear the deepest wounds and scars of war.
author: Douglas MacArthur

quote: Our most intimate friend is not he to whom we show the worst, but the best of our nature.
author: Nathaniel Hawthorne

quote: Each one has to find his peace from within. And peace to be real must be unaffected by outside circumstances.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Love is a chain of love as nature is a chain of life.
author: Truman Capote

quote: I'm an incurable optimist and a go-getter - it's in my nature to focus much more on what makes me happy than what makes me nervous.
author: Demi Moore

quote: Poetry is emotion put into measure. The emotion must come by nature, but the measure can be acquired by art.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: No author ever drew a character consistent to human nature, but he was forced to ascribe to it many inconsistencies.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: Cruelty is the law pervading all nature and society; and we can't get out of it if we would.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Nature provides exceptions to every rule.
author: Margaret Fuller

quote: I prefer peace. But if trouble must come, let it come in my time, so that my children can live in peace.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: The game is my wife. It demands loyalty and responsibility, and it gives me back fulfillment and peace.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: Nature reserves the right to inflict upon her children the most terrifying jests.
author: Thornton Wilder

quote: Human judges can show mercy. But against the laws of nature, there is no appeal.
author: Arthur C. Clarke

quote: Those who are free of resentful thoughts surely find peace.
author: Buddha

quote: Avoid popularity if you would have peace.
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: If there is to be any peace it will come through being, not having.
author: Henry Miller

quote: In the state of nature profit is the measure of right.
author: Thomas Hobbes

quote: Envy is human nature.
author: Monica Bellucci

quote: All we are saying is give peace a chance.
author: John Lennon

quote: Save for the wild force of Nature, nothing moves in this world that is not Greek in its origin.
author: Lord Acton

quote: We must all make peace so that we can all live in peace.
author: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quote: Our true nature is free of any and all notions of gender, of any notions of difference whatsoever.
author: Andrew Cohen

quote: If we are to teach real peace in this world, and if we are to carry on a real war against war, we shall have to begin with the children.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Gratitude makes sense of our past, brings peace for today, and creates a vision for tomorrow.
author: Melody Beattie

quote: Nature is something outside our body, but the mind is within us.
author: Bhumibol Adulyadej

quote: In peace, sons bury their fathers. In war, fathers bury their sons.
author: Herodotus

quote: Nature makes woman to be won and men to win.
author: George William Curtis

quote: To be prepared for war is one of the most effective means of preserving peace.
author: George Washington

quote: I was born on a farm. My strength has nothing to do with political apparatus. I get my strength from nature, from flowers.
author: Ariel Sharon

quote: Peace is not merely a distant goal that we seek, but a means by which we arrive at that goal.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Never does nature say one thing and wisdom another.
author: Juvenal

quote: I took a speed-reading course and read War and Peace in twenty minutes. It involves Russia.
author: Woody Allen

quote: The meaning of peace is the absence of opposition to socialism.
author: Karl Marx

quote: Nature is a good name for an effect whose cause is God.
author: William Cowper

quote: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Parents are not interested in justice, they're interested in peace and quiet.
author: Bill Cosby

quote: Islam teaches tolerance, not hatred; universal brotherhood, not enmity; peace, and not violence.
author: Pervez Musharraf

quote: It belongs to human nature to hate those you have injured.
author: Tacitus

quote: Art is nature speeded up and God slowed down.
author: Malcolm De Chazal

quote: While you are proclaiming peace with your lips, be careful to have it even more fully in your heart.
author: Francis of Assisi

quote: People must help one another; it is nature's law.
author: Jean de La Fontaine

quote: The more you sweat in peace, the less you bleed in war.
author: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: I'm a neurotic New York Jew by birth. Creating characters is second nature to me.
author: Len Wein

quote: The being without an opinion is so painful to human nature that most people will leap to a hasty opinion rather than undergo it.
author: Walter Bagehot

quote: I do not want the peace which passeth understanding, I want the understanding which bringeth peace.
author: Helen Keller

quote: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: We must concentrate not merely on the negative expulsion of war but the postive affirmation of peace.
author: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: Ours is a world of nuclear giants and ethical infants. We know more about war that we know about peace, more about killing that we know about living.
author: Omar N. Bradley

quote: You either get tired fighting for peace, or you die.
author: John Lennon

quote: First keep peace with yourself, then you can also bring peace to others.
author: Thomas a Kempis

quote: If you cannot find peace within yourself, you will never find it anywhere else.
author: Marvin Gaye

quote: I just want you to know that, when we talk about war, we're really talking about peace.
author: George W. Bush

quote: You'll never find peace of mind until you listen to your heart.
author: George Michael

quote: Peace if possible, truth at all costs.
author: Martin Luther

quote: Our peace shall stand as firm as rocky mountains.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Fill you mind with the meaningless stimuli of a world preoccupied with meaningless things, and it will not be easy to feel peace in your heart.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: One can not reflect in streaming water. Only those who know internal peace can give it to others.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: To secure peace is to prepare for war.
author: Karl Von Clausewitz

quote: There are no absolute rules of conduct, either in peace or war. Everything depends on circumstances.
author: Leon Trotsky

quote: You can't make war in the Middle East without Egypt and you can't make peace without Syria.
author: Henry A. Kissinger

quote: Wars are, of course, as a rule to be avoided; but they are far better than certain kinds of peace.
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: You may either win your peace or buy it: win it, by resistance to evil; buy it, by compromise with evil.
author: John Ruskin

quote: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: An unjust peace is better than a just war.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: An election is coming. Universal peace is declared, and the foxes have a sincere interest in prolonging the lives of the poultry.
author: George Eliot

quote: If you want peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Although a soldier by profession, I have never felt any sort of fondness for war, and I have never advocated it, except as a means of peace.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: When you've seen beyond yourself, then you may find, peace of mind is waiting there.
author: George Harrison

quote: If we have not peace within ourselves, it is in vain to seek it from outward sources.
author: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: We will not learn how to live together in peace by killing each other's children.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Peace Train is a song I wrote, the message of which continues to breeze thunderously through the hearts of millions of human beings.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: I have never advocated war except as a means of peace.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: The life of inner peace, being harmonious and without stress, is the easiest type of existence.
author: Norman Vincent Peale

quote: Until he extends his circle of compassion to include all living things, man will not himself find peace.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: We are going to have peace even if we have to fight for it.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: I think that a strong Israel is the only Israel that will bring the Arabs to the peace table.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: When you make your peace with authority, you become authority.
author: Jim Morrison

quote: We shall find peace. We shall hear angels, we shall see the sky sparkling with diamonds.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: War is only a cowardly escape from the problems of peace.
author: Thomas Mann

quote: Nothing is wrong with peace and love. It is all the more regrettable that so many of Christ's followers seem to disagree.
author: Richard Dawkins

quote: The only peace is being out of earshot.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: I can have peace of mind only when I forgive rather than judge.
author: Gerald Jampolsky

quote: The need for peace in Northern Ireland goes well beyond political stability. It now speaks to regional Europe and even global stability.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: They may call me a sinner, but I am at peace with myself.
author: Brigitte Bardot

quote: To plunder, to slaughter, to steal, these things they misname empire; and where they make a wilderness, they call it peace.
author: Tacitus

quote: The only excuse for war is that we may live in peace unharmed.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: On all the peaks lies peace.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Piety is not a goal but a means to attain through the purest peace of mind the highest culture.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: For peace is not mere absence of war, but is a virtue that springs from, a state of mind, a disposition for benevolence, confidence, justice.
author: Baruch Spinoza

quote: Give a child love, laughter and peace, not AIDS.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: When you can whip any man in the world, you never know peace.
author: Muhammad Ali

quote: Peace is the virtue of civilization. War is its crime.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: If you want to make peace, you don't talk to your friends. You talk to your enemies.
author: Moshe Dayan

quote: Little things seem nothing, but they give peace, like those meadow flowers which individually seem odorless but all together perfume the air.
author: Georges Bernanos

quote: The hippies wanted peace and love. We wanted Ferraris, blondes and switchblades.
author: Alice Cooper

quote: The services in wartime are fit only for desperadoes, but in peace are only fit for fools.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Balance, peace, and joy are the fruit of a successful life. It starts with recognizing your talents and finding ways to serve others by using them.
author: Thomas Kinkade

quote: If you want peace work for justice.
author: Pope Paul VI

quote: Nothing is more conducive to peace of mind than not having any opinion at all.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: Revenge only engenders violence, not clarity and true peace. I think liberation must come from within.
author: Sandra Cisneros

quote: Peace of mind for five minutes, that's what I crave.
author: Alanis Morissette

quote: There is always a certain peace in being what one is, in being that completely.
author: Ugo Betti

quote: The purpose of all wars, is peace.
author: Saint Augustine

quote: Radiohead and Our Lady Peace are doing the seven layers of guitar, and I kind of jumped on that before anyone else did.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: Peace is more important than all justice; and peace was not made for the sake of justice, but justice for the sake of peace.
author: Martin Luther

quote: I'm at peace.
author: Christina Aguilera

quote: Democracy is necessary to peace and to undermining the forces of terrorism.
author: Benazir Bhutto

quote: Peace for us means the destruction of Israel. We are preparing for an all-out war, a war which will last for generations.
author: Yasser Arafat

quote: In the whole round of human affairs little is so fatal to peace as misunderstanding.
author: Margaret Elizabeth Sangster

quote: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
author: Zig Ziglar

quote: We've climbed the mighty mountain. I see the valley below, and it's a valley of peace.
author: George W. Bush

quote: Once you replace negative thoughts with positive ones, you'll start having positive results.
author: Willie Nelson

quote: I think that peace will require two states, a Palestinian state that recognizes the Jewish state.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: If you're not making mistakes, then you're not doing anything. I'm positive that a doer makes mistakes.
author: John Wooden

quote: Always turn a negative situation into a positive situation.
author: Michael Jordan

quote: We cannot be both the world's leading champion of peace and the world's leading supplier of the weapons of war.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: It takes but one positive thought when given a chance to survive and thrive to overpower an entire army of negative thoughts.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: As an artist I come to sing, but as a citizen, I will always speak for peace, and no one can silence me in this.
author: Paul Robeson

quote: Positive anything is better than negative nothing.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quote: Peace, of course, is different from divorce; indeed, in essential respects, divorce is the opposite of peace.
author: Douglas Feith

quote: A lot of times people look at the negative side of what they feel they can't do. I always look on the positive side of what I can do.
author: Chuck Norris

quote: Bob Marley stood for universal peace and love. He tried to break racial barriers.
author: Wyclef Jean

quote: In order to carry a positive action we must develop here a positive vision.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: Peace does not include a vendetta; there will be neither winners nor losers.
author: Ahmed Ben Bella

quote: People deal too much with the negative, with what is wrong. Why not try and see positive things, to just touch those things and make them bloom?
author: Nhat Hanh

quote: I believe in karma, and I believe if you put out positive vibes to everybody, that's all you're going to get back.
author: Kesha

quote: The gift of fantasy has meant more to me than my talent for absorbing positive knowledge.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: Winners make a habit of manufacturing their own positive expectations in advance of the event.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: You must not under any pretense allow your mind to dwell on any thought that is not positive, constructive, optimistic, kind.
author: Emmet Fox

quote: The people of the world genuinely want peace. Some day the leaders of the world are going to have to give in and give, it to them.
author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quote: Jesus Christ is a prince of peace. He told us to live in peace. He told us to love our enemies. He told us to do good to them that spitefully use us.
author: Pat Robertson

quote: Your smile will give you a positive countenance that will make people feel comfortable around you.
author: Les Brown

quote: We know that dictators are quick to choose aggression, while free nations strive to resolve differences in peace.
author: George W. Bush

quote: I'm looking forward to influencing others in a positive way. My message is you can do anything if you just put your mind to it.
author: Justin Bieber

quote: While conscience is our friend, all is at peace; however once it is offended, farewell to a tranquil mind.
author: Mary Wortley Montagu

quote: Loud peace propaganda makes war seem imminent.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: War is to man what maternity is to a woman. From a philosophical and doctrinal viewpoint, I do not believe in perpetual peace.
author: Benito Mussolini

quote: I've always believed that you can think positive just as well as you can think negative.
author: James A. Baldwin

quote: Talking is always positive. That's why I talk too much.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: I do know that some Buddhists are able to attain peace of mind.
author: Martin Scorsese

quote: Instead of hating, I have chosen to forgive and spend all of my positive energy on changing the world.
author: Camryn Manheim

quote: Political liberty, the peace of a nation, and science itself are gifts for which Fate demands a heavy tax in blood!
author: Honore de Balzac

quote: When you're young you think that you're going to sail into a lovely lake of quietude and peace. This is profoundly untrue.
author: Doris Lessing

quote: When you are enthusiastic about what you do, you feel this positive energy. It's very simple.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: The Nobel Peace Prize opened up a door in my heart.
author: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Look at people for an example, but then make sure to do things your way. Surround yourself with positive people.
author: Queen Latifah

quote: Work, look for peace and calm in work: you will find it nowhere else.
author: Dmitri Mendeleev

quote: Sometimes the most positive thing you can be in a boring society is absolutely negative.
author: Johnny Rotten

quote: Peace is the umpire for doing the will of God.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: The learner always begins by finding fault, but the scholar sees the positive merit in everything.
author: Georg Wilhelm Friedrich Hegel

quote: I was determined to share my positive approach and not let diabetes stand in the way of enjoying my life.
author: Paula Deen

quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
author: Pitbull

quote: Intervention only works when the people concerned seem to be keen for peace.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If it's great stuff, the people who consume it are nourished. It's a positive force.
author: Manuel Puig

quote: My constant prayer, my number one foreign goal, is to bring peace to Israel. And in the process to Israel's neighbours.
author: Jimmy Carter

quote: Where men of judgment creep and feel their way, The positive pronounce without dismay.
author: William Cowper

quote: I don't want to waste anyone's time or money. I want to give people some truth and positive heart lift.
author: Mos Def

quote: The way positive reinforcement is carried out is more important than the amount.
author: B. F. Skinner

quote: Let me just say: Peace to you, if you're willing to fight for it.
author: Fred Hampton

quote: Some people never contribute anything positive to society, they may even drain our resources, but most of us try to do something better, to give back.
author: Martin Yan

quote: I believe that you should gravitate to people who are doing productive and positive things with their lives.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: Diplomacy in general does not resolve conflicts. Wars end not due to peace processes, but due to one side giving up.
author: Daniel Pipes

quote: The people of Israel are entitled, as is any other nation, to live in peace and safety.
author: Jonathan Sacks

quote: First of all, I try to be a positive role model.
author: Bruce Jenner

quote: Delete the negative; accentuate the positive!
author: Donna Karan

quote: Fortune cookies are a good idea. If the message is positive, it can make your day a little better.
author: Yao Ming

quote: I think peace should be done not only among governments but among people. It was impossible before the Facebook.
author: Shimon Peres

quote: There is no advertisement as powerful as a positive reputation traveling fast.
author: Brian Koslow

quote: To insure peace of mind ignore the rules and regulations.
author: George Ade

quote: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success.
author: Bo Bennett

quote: Peace is much more precious than a piece of land... let there be no more wars.
author: Anwar Sadat

quote: A conqueror is always a lover of peace.
author: Karl Von Clausewitz

quote: Every human longs for peace and love.
author: Hiawatha

quote: Instead of a man of peace and love, I have become a man of violence and revenge.
author: Hiawatha

quote: Olympics for me is love, peace, united.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: The very first lesson that I learnt from the Qur'an was the message of unity and peace.
author: Cat Stevens

quote: That idea of peace and love toward humanity shouldn't be nationalistic or denominational. It should be a chief concern for all mankind.
author: Mos Def

quote: Every positive value has its price in negative terms... the genius of Einstein leads to Hiroshima.
author: Pablo Picasso

quote: In many ways, when you're a Nobel peace laureate, you have an obligation to humankind, to society.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: I would rather have peace in the world than be President.
author: Harry S. Truman

quote: When you know people are really at peace with who they are and what they do, they collaborate and want to help you to improve.
author: Javier Bardem

quote: None of the abstract concepts comes closer to fulfilled utopia than that of eternal peace.
author: Theodor Adorno

quote: Peace, above all things, is to be desired, but blood must sometimes be spilled to obtain it on equable and lasting terms.
author: Andrew Jackson

quote: Martin Luther King Jr. is remembered as our prince of peace, of civil rights. We owe him something major that will keep his memory alive.
author: Morgan Freeman

quote: Peace is produced by war.
author: Pierre Corneille

quote: I always thought of myself as a moderate liberal, a fighter for peace and justice. I never thought of myself as being all that far out.
author: George McGovern

quote: There is a sense that things, if you keep positive and optimistic about what can be done, do work out.
author: Hillary Clinton

quote: I value peace when it is not bought at the price of fundamental decencies.
author: Elia Kazan

quote: After four years at the United Nations I sometimes yearn for the peace and tranquility of a political convention.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: Making peace is harder than making war.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: The journey of a thousand leagues begins with a single step. So we must never neglect any work of peace within our reach, however small.
author: Adlai E. Stevenson

quote: I do not expect the white media to create positive black male images.
author: Huey Newton

quote: He who follows his lessons tastes a profound peace, and looks upon everybody as a bunch of manure.
author: Moliere

quote: The only solid and lasting peace between a man and his wife is, doubtless, a separation.
author: Lord Chesterfield

quote: I like to encourage people to realize that any action is a good action if it's proactive and there is positive intent behind it.
author: Michael J. Fox

quote: Nothing can contribute more to peace of soul than the lack of any opinion whatever.
author: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: If there are finer beings than German short hairs, I don't know what they are. In their eyes is peace.
author: Ben Stein

quote: It's easy to sit in relative luxury and peace and pontificate on the subject of the Third World debts.
author: Roger Moore

quote: To be positive is to be mistaken at the top of one's voice.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I don't think I've ever felt that same kind of peace, the kind of serenity that I felt after acknowledging that maybe I was going to die of this TB.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: Positive, adj.: Mistaken at the top of one's voice.
author: Ambrose Bierce

quote: I've had to deal with all different types of situations - positive and negative and extremes of both.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: When people ask me about my story, I just go through the positive stuff: the tent-pole moments, the big landmark checkpoints.
author: Shia LaBeouf

quote: There's a fine line between stubbornness and the positive side of that, which is dogged determination.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: Live life to the fullest, and focus on the positive.
author: Matt Cameron

quote: All of us deserve a greater peace of mind, knowing that our children are better protected wherever they are.
author: Bob Ney

quote: To delight in war is a merit in the soldier, a dangerous quality in the captain, and a positive crime in the statesman.
author: George Santayana

quote: Never for the sake of peace and quiet deny your convictions.
author: Dag Hammarskjold

quote: Were there peace and justice in the Middle East, the Arabs would no more need their tinhorn dictators than they would their corpulent princes.
author: James Buchan

quote: You should also appreciate the goodness around you, and surround yourself with positive people.
author: Nadia Comaneci

quote: Listening is a positive act: you have to put yourself out to do it.
author: David Hockney

quote: When Communist U.S.S.R. was a superpower, the world was better off. The right-wing media is trying to marginalize the peace movement.
author: Janeane Garofalo

quote: It is thus tolerance that is the source of peace, and intolerance that is the source of disorder and squabbling.
author: Pierre Bayle

quote: When I was a kid, no one would believe anything positive that you could say about black people. That's a terrible burden.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: We gave up some of our country to the white men, thinking that then we could have peace. We were mistaken. The white man would not let us alone.
author: Chief Joseph

quote: What I have is P.H. positive chronic myeloid leukemia, which is an aberration in your white blood cells.
author: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

quote: It's a positive thing to talk about terrible things and make people laugh about them.
author: Louis C. K.

quote: Making peace, I have found, is much harder than making war.
author: Gerry Adams

quote: But I do know focusing on the exterior doesn't make me happy. If I want peace and serenity, it won't be reached by getting thinner or fatter.
author: Elle Macpherson

quote: Everyone in L.A. is very positive and upbeat, whereas London can get quite miserable at times.
author: Sienna Miller

quote: Peace has its victories no less than war, but it doesn't have as many monuments to unveil.
author: Kin Hubbard

quote: The world must be made safe for democracy. Its peace must be planted upon the tested foundations of political liberty.
author: Woodrow Wilson

quote: You hear certain things, negative things, all the time that aren't true, but you never hear about the positive.
author: Floyd Mayweather, Jr.

quote: I think anytime you can affect people in general, in a positive way, then you're a lucky individual.
author: Sam Elliott

quote: I love acting like I'm in love. It's a very positive thing.
author: Amanda Seyfried

quote: War makes thieves and peace hangs them.
author: George Herbert

quote: Suffering is the positive element in this world, indeed it is the only link between this world and the positive.
author: Franz Kafka

quote: I'm a big cockeyed optimist. I try to accentuate the positive as opposed to the negative.
author: Betty White

quote: It is better we disintegrate in peace and not in pieces.
author: Nnamdi Azikiwe

quote: We receive His peace when we ask Him for it. We keep His peace by extending it to others. Those are the keys and there are no others.
author: Marianne Williamson

quote: Say and do something positive that will help the situation; it doesn't take any brains to complain.
author: Robert A. Cook

quote: I really am a woman at peace.
author: Laura Schlessinger

quote: Well, I think everybody is frustrated by the finances of the U.N. and the inability to solve problems of war and peace.
author: George H. W. Bush

quote: We can realise a lasting peace and transform the East-West relationship to one of enduring co-operation.
author: George H. W. Bush

quote: I could start a war in 30 seconds. But some countries spend 100 years trying to find peace. Just like good manners, peace has to be learned.
author: Sylvester Stallone

quote: But only art and music have the power to bring peace.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: I can't let time move on without fighting tooth and nail and hopefully being a part of a revolution that is positive.
author: Ian Somerhalder

quote: I don't like to read about myself, whether it be positive or negative.
author: Chloe Sevigny

quote: Peace with Israel is a strategic imperative for Jordan.
author: King Abdullah II

quote: The way of peace is the way of love. Love is the greatest power on earth. It conquers all things.
author: Peace Pilgrim

quote: No nation ever had an army large enough to guarantee it against attack in time of peace, or ensure it of victory in time of war.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: People look up to me as somebody who is able to switch the image of our country from negative to positive.
author: Novak Djokovic

quote: Right now people seem to be very tentative about the positive benefits of capitalism.
author: Jeb Bush

quote: You can only end a negotiation for peace if you begin it.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: I'm not happy not doing anything. When positive things are rolling in, you've got to take them when you can get them.
author: Tori Spelling

quote: I'm an un-healable positive optimist.
author: Andre Rieu

quote: Peace is purchased from strength. It's not purchased from weakness or unilateral retreats.
author: Benjamin Netanyahu

quote: The Nobel Peace Prize has become hopelessly politicized. I think it cheapens the prize itself.
