quote: I find my greatest pleasure, and so my reward, in the work that precedes what the world calls success.
author: Thomas A. Edison

quote: I planned my success. I knew it was going to happen.
author: Erykah Badu

quote: Success will always be measured by the extent to which we serve the buying public.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: I've had a lot of success over the years racing in New York, but the main point is that I feel the marathon is a different event, a lot more my event.
author: Paula Radcliffe

quote: For example, the equivalent of a woman being treated as a sex object is a man being treated as a success object.

quote: Do something you really like, and hopefully it pays the rent. As far as I'm concerned, that's success.
author: Tom Petty

quote: Success produces confidence; confidence relaxes industry, and negligence ruins the reputation which accuracy had raised.
author: Ben Jonson

quote: Think of yourself as on the threshold of unparalleled success. A whole, clear, glorious life lies before you. Achieve! Achieve!
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: The manic pursuit of success cost me everything I could love: my wife, my three children, some friends I would have liked to grow old with.

quote: The success of the Rat Pack or the Clan was due to the camaraderie, the three guys who work together and kid each other and love each other.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: Real success is not on the stage, but off the stage as a human being, and how you get along with your fellow man.
author: Sammy Davis, Jr.

quote: You should put time into learning your craft. It seems like people want success so quickly, way before they're ready.
author: Lucinda Williams

quote: The secret of success is sincerity.
author: Jean Giraudoux

quote: I've learned that success comes in a very prickly package. Whether you choose to accept it or not is up to you.
author: Sandra Bullock

quote: I'd rather have huge success and huge failures than travel in the middle of the road.
author: Kevyn Aucoin

quote: Success is more dangerous than failure, the ripples break over a wider coastline.
author: Graham Greene

quote: Evolution acts slowly. Our psychological characteristics today are those that promoted reproductive success in the ancestral environmen.
author: Keith Henson

quote: There's that unwritten schism that literary writers get all the awards and commericals writers get all the success.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: Excess is success.
author: Roberto Cavalli

quote: Independent films have a very different cachet than success films.
author: Diane Lane

quote: Singing is my dream and, while it may have not been a commercial success, critically I was thrilled with the reception my first album got.
author: Minnie Driver

quote: Success and failure are equally disastrous.
author: Tennessee Williams

quote: Temporary success can be achieved in spite of lack of other fundamental qualities, but no advancements can be maintained without hard work.
author: William Feather

quote: I'm sure not afraid of success and I've learned not to be afraid of failure. The only thing I'm afraid of now is of being someone I don't like much.
author: Anna Quindlen

quote: Once you achieve a certain level of success or fame, it becomes really difficult to go against type.
author: Famke Janssen

quote: My formula for success is rise early, work late, and strike oil.
author: Paul Getty

quote: Success follows those adept at preserving the substance of the past by clothing it in the forms of the future.
author: Dee Hock

quote: There is no correlation between a childhood success and a professional athlete.
author: Carl Lewis

quote: If greater openness is a key to economic success, I believe there is increasingly a need for openness in the political sphere as well.
author: Paul Wolfowitz

quote: You know, you want to be a success. You want people to know who you are.
author: Elizabeth Hurley

quote: Everyone has a warped vision of Hollywood and what success in Hollywood is like.
author: Zach Braff

quote: It's both rebellion and conformity that attack you with success.
author: Amy Tan

quote: The key to sitcom success is miserable people. If you see a happy couple, it's just gone, like when Sam and Diane got together on Cheers.
author: Matthew Perry

quote: Success isn't everything but it makes a man stand straight.
author: Lillian Hellman

quote: Failure is a part of success.
author: Hank Aaron

quote: Success is not in never failing, but rising everytime you fall!
author: Jonathan Taylor Thomas

quote: Success - keeping your mind awake and your desire asleep.
author: Walter Scott

quote: I think all those people I did stories about measured their own success by the joy their work was giving them.
author: Charles Kuralt

quote: I don't think success arrives and you're suddenly happy. It's not like that. If people think that they'll be very disappointed.
author: Michael Hutchence

quote: I've had great success being a total idiot.
author: Jerry Lewis

quote: If you want to have great success, you'd better give them what they want, but so be it.
author: Dirk Benedict

quote: Other people's success spurs me on to do well and gives me motivation.
author: Nicholas Hoult

quote: The success of any great moral enterprise does not depend upon numbers.
author: William Lloyd Garrison

quote: Success breeds success.
author: Mia Hamm

quote: I'm an eternal realist and the success rate for being an actor is pretty low.
author: Tom Hiddleston

quote: The success of Torn was a bit too much for me. I took a year off and was still scared to start the second album.
author: Natalie Imbruglia

quote: Success is the sweetest revenge.
author: Vanessa Williams

quote: I always say be humble but be firm. Humility and openness are the key to success without compromising your beliefs.
author: George Hickenlooper

quote: Singleness of purpose is one of the chief essentials for success in life, no matter what may be one's aim.
author: John D. Rockefeller

quote: All business success rests on something labeled a sale, which at least momentarily weds company and customer.
author: Tom Peters

quote: Whatever success I may have attained is due to the fact that since I was old enough to work at all, my ambition has never deserted me.
author: Anna Held

quote: I'm astonished by my success.
author: Danielle Steel

quote: In hindsight, I slid into arrogance based upon past success.
author: Reed Hastings

quote: I just want to continue the success and be an athlete that is shown in a good light in New York City.
author: Victor Cruz

quote: My overnight success was really 15 years in the making. I'd been writing songs since I was 6 and playing in bands and performing since I was 14.
author: Lisa Loeb

quote: I'm a mum, so my wardrobe consists of sweaters and jeans. As long as I don't leave the house forgetting my jeans, I count that as a fashion success.
author: Gail Porter

quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
author: Tommy Hilfiger

quote: I've learned it's always better to have a small percentage of a big success, than a hundred percent of nothing.
author: Art Linkletter

quote: But I think it's more normal for my team to have no success than it is to win two consecutive European cups.
author: Jose Mourinho

quote: I'm not a defender of old or new football managers. I believe in good ones and bad ones, those that achieve success and those that don't.
author: Jose Mourinho

quote: Success, in whatever form it takes, is a tricky thing - once you've achieved your goal, then what? Where do you aim?
author: Arabella Weir

quote: It's nice, being brought up with no money at all. It's just not how I measure success, so that makes it a bunch easier.
author: Bode Miller

quote: It's the price of success: people start to think you're omnipotent.
author: Ben Bernanke

quote: Immigrants provide skills that we simply cannot afford to do without. They have contributed hugely to Britain's success.
author: Charles Kennedy

quote: It's an awesome responsibility, not only to maintain the level of success the NFL has, but to build on that.
author: Roger Goodell

quote: My definition of success is control.
author: Kenneth Branagh

quote: The secret of my success is my hairspray.
author: Richard Gere

quote: Permanent success cannot be achieved except by incessant intellectual labour, always inspired by the ideal.
author: Sarah Bernhardt

quote: The most absurd and reckless aspirations have sometimes led to extraordinary success.
author: Luc de Clapiers

quote: Your chances of success in any undertaking can always be measured by your belief in yourself.
author: Robert Collier

quote: The first principle of success is desire - knowing what you want. Desire is the planting of your seed.
author: Robert Collier

quote: Success consists of getting up just one more time than you fall.
author: Oliver Goldsmith

quote: The delusions of self-love cannot be prevented, but intellectual misconceptions as to the means of achieving success may be corrected.
author: George Henry Lewes

quote: When I did have a little bit of commercial success, it really didn't suit my temperament at all. I'm a terrible public person.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: I feel true success comes from being able to work and the love for it.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Comedy can't be about continuous success.
author: Martin Freeman

quote: The making of friends who are real friends, is the best token we have of a man's success in life.
author: Edward Everett Hale

quote: I think people love to attach themselves to the idea of an overnight success. That may be true about me.
author: Darren Criss

quote: Success follows doing what you want to do. There is no other way to be successful.
author: Malcolm Forbes

quote: There's not an instruction manual on how to deal with success, so you just have to rely on having great friends and a good team.
author: Bryan Adams

quote: The success of most things depends upon knowing how long it will take to succeed.
author: Charles de Secondat

quote: There's no such thing as an overnight success. It took me a long to get there.
author: Cindy Margolis

quote: If success had come along when I was 17 it would either have killed me or sent me completely mad.
author: Alex Kapranos

quote: Keep in mind that neither success nor failure is ever final.
author: Roger Babson

quote: We're born with success. It is only others who point out our failures, and what they attribute to us as failure.
author: Whoopi Goldberg

quote: How does one measure the success of a museum?
author: Paul Getty

quote: When making music I sink myself into the process as deeply as I can and forget all of the success.
author: Enya

quote: The writing of a melody is an emotional moment; success doesn't make it easy.
author: Enya

quote: The success of Watermark surprised me. I never thought of music as something commercial; it was something very personal to me.
author: Enya

quote: Fame and success are very different things.
author: Enya

quote: My success is not due to any personal superiority over other people.
author: John Philip Sousa

quote: The negative side of the American Dream comes when people pursue success at any cost, which in turn destroys the vision and the dream.
author: Azar Nafisi

quote: Like everybody, I have invested in things that have gone bad, because there's never any guarantee of success or profit when it comes to money.
author: Murray Walker

quote: Like the British Constitution, she owes her success in practice to her inconsistencies in principle.
author: Thomas Hardy

quote: The secrets of success are a good wife and a steady job. My wife told me.
author: Howard Nemerov

quote: Success and money can really be quite blinding.
author: Jim Harrison

quote: And I don't think that success can be measured by how many TV shows you're on.
author: Clay Aiken

quote: To be ready to fail is to be prepared for success.
author: Jose Bergamin

quote: I am stable when my private life is a success.
author: Don Johnson

quote: If you can figure out my success on the screen, you're a better man than I.
author: Alan Ladd

quote: Nearly all of these Chinese girls that have had success have had coaching from foreign coaches.
author: Michael Chang

quote: The Clean Michigan Initiative has been and continues to be a success.
author: John Engler

quote: Once you can accept failure, you can have fun and success.
author: Rickey Henderson

quote: I don't think 'Cocktail' was a perfect critical success, but it touched a vein in our culture.
author: Elisabeth Shue

quote: Success is very ephemeral. You depend entirely on the desire of others, which makes it difficult to relax.
author: Eva Green

quote: There are so few women in general who aren't completely threatened and confused by other women's success. It's very disappointing.
author: Sandra Bernhard

quote: Success in the majority of circumstances depends on knowing how long it takes to succeed.
author: Charles de Montesquieu

quote: My success? Being born the son of Moses Annenberg.
author: Walter Annenberg

quote: Success is fickle, but creativity is a gift.
author: Tommy Shaw

quote: I come from a world where you get the film done, that's a success.
author: Abel Ferrara

quote: Elegance is not a dispensable luxury but a factor that decides between success and failure.
author: Edsger Dijkstra

quote: Some campaigns are not worth waging if you can't win; others have to be fought on grounds of principle regardless of the chances for success.
author: Patricia Ireland

quote: I came to America with a dream and I made it. The dream became reality. America is built for success.
author: Jean Claude Van Damme

quote: Success, and even life itself, wouldn't be worth anything if I didn't have my wife and children by my side. They mean everything to me.
author: Jude Law

quote: It's pretty hard to make out what's going to be a commercial success and what's not.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: I always wrote about things that were important to me. I think our past success showed that it was also important for a lot of others.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: We recorded our first CD, Sixteen Stone, with a small budget and never dreamed that we would enjoy such a high success. It was simply fantastic.
author: Gavin Rossdale

quote: Oprah is more than an institution. Oprah is a very special star in the firmament. I can't imagine a greater success than she's enjoyed.
author: Phil Donahue

quote: How one handles success or failure is determined by their early childhood.
author: Harold Ramis

quote: I don't see success as the goal. Obedience is the goal.
author: Jerry B. Jenkins

quote: And after four years, I thoroughly enjoy Hawaii and the success of the show.
author: James MacArthur

quote: You are incredibly fortunate whatever success falls on you, which is what happened with me.
author: James Van Der Beek

quote: When you're a plebeian you want success, and when you're successful you want to be a plebeian again.
author: Paula Cole

quote: I'm used to adversity and working really well in difficult situations. It was hard for me to accept the success.
author: Paula Cole

quote: Some of the best lessons we ever learn are learned from past mistakes. The error of the past is the wisdom and success of the future.
author: Dale Turner

quote: You can never be comfortable with your success, you've got to be paranoid you're going to lose it.
author: Lou Gerstner

quote: There is no such thing as a permanent advertising success.
author: Leo Burnett

quote: Sudden success in golf is like the sudden acquisition of wealth. It is apt to unsettle and deteriorate the character.
author: P. G. Wodehouse

quote: Success will ruin your life.
author: Tom Clancy

quote: I put £150,000 into the stage production of Grease and have got back £1.5 million so far. It has been a fantastic success.
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote: God didn't bless me with success so I could eat caviar every day.
author: Kathie Lee Gifford

quote: People think I should be a success, but I'm afraid of it.
author: Michael Reagan

quote: I'm very competitive, and my ego couldn't handle that lack of success.
author: Gavin DeGraw

quote: So I try not to have any actual expectations for myself for any level of success or failure.
author: Gavin DeGraw

quote: They thought I was a success as soon as I started paying the bills.
author: Mahalia Jackson

quote: Past performance speaks a tremendous amount about one's ability and likelihood for success.
author: Mark Spitz

quote: It was the success of 'Bend it Like Beckham' which got my name out there. 'A Mighty Heart' also helped.
author: Archie Panjabi

quote: I did everything I could to stay in college and pay my own way, so I think that if success hadn't come so quickly, I would still be pursuing it.
author: Moira Kelly

quote: Success is the person who year after year reaches the highest limits in his field.
author: Sparky Anderson

quote: I never had any real expectations about what sort of success I would have or all the publicity.
author: Joshua Bell

quote: I think that my biggest attribute to any success that I have had is hard work. There really is no substitute for working hard.
author: Maria Bartiromo

quote: At this point, I can't say what network would be picking it up, but I know that it would be a success.
author: Christy Romano

quote: The secret of our success is that we never, never give up.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: Four years of football are calculated to breed in the average man more of the ingredients of success in life than almost any academic course he takes.
author: Knute Rockne

quote: The only question to ask yourself is, how much are you willing to sacrifice to achieve this success?
author: Larry Flynt

quote: Success listens only to applause. To all else it is deaf.
author: Elias Canetti

quote: Outward failure may be a manifested variant of inward success.
author: Kenneth L. Pike

quote: The best revenge in the world is success.
author: Suge Knight

quote: I still need practice in enjoying the fruits of success.
author: Neil Diamond

quote: But all of this success came at the end of a long climb.
author: Michael N. Castle

quote: Sometimes people call me a success for all the reasons that make me think I'm a failure.
author: William Hurt

quote: I'm excited about it, thrilled with the success thus far.
author: Vince McMahon

quote: Success takes us to the top and away from those we love.
author: Wynonna Judd

quote: A lot of my success comes from black music. It's something I'm very proud of.
author: Michael Bolton

quote: I have no inflated ideas about success anyway.
author: Trevor Dunn

quote: Instead of this confusion, we need the unifying force of an official language, English, which is the language of success in America.
author: Ernest Istook

quote: But once you have some success in one style, the business wants to lock you in that vein forever.
author: Richard Marx

quote: The success of the film is down to the crew.
author: Dougray Scott

quote: This bikini made me a success.
author: Ursula Andress

quote: I'm content. I want to have better success in the tournaments than I've had, but I know I'm playing well, so I'm happy with that.
author: David Duval

quote: Our nation's security, economy, and place on the world stage depends on the success our educational system.
author: Ed Markey

quote: Failure is unfortunately as common as success.
author: Sanjay Kumar

quote: Success in business today requires real-time, mobile access to business opportunities.
author: Bob McDonnell

quote: I had done the sitcom thing to lesser and lesser degrees of success.
author: David Alan Grier

quote: There could be no honor in a sure success, but much might be wrested from a sure defeat.
author: Ann Landers

quote: And I don't think that success is going to destroy me at this point in my life, like I used to think.
author: Rosanne Cash

quote: The trust of the innocent is the liar's most useful tool.
author: Stephen King

quote: To be trusted is a greater compliment than being loved.
author: George MacDonald

quote: Someone who thinks the world is always cheating him is right. He is missing that wonderful feeling of trust in someone or something.
author: Eric Hoffer

quote: All I have seen teaches me to trust the creator for all I have not seen.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Never trust anyone who wants what you've got. Friend or no, envy is an overwhelming emotion.
author: Eubie Blake

quote: I would rather trust a woman's instinct than a man's reason.
author: Stanley Baldwin

quote: The more you trust your intuition, the more empowered you become, the stronger you become, and the happier you become.
author: Gisele Bundchen

quote: Trust your hunches. They're usually based on facts filed away just below the conscious level.
author: Joyce Brothers

quote: A man who trusts nobody is apt to be the kind of man nobody trusts.
author: Harold MacMillan

quote: Trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: I can trust my friends These people force me to examine myself, encourage me to grow.
author: Cher

quote: You can't trust water: Even a straight stick turns crooked in it.
author: W. C. Fields

quote: I always trust my gut reaction; it's always right.
author: Kiana Tom

quote: Just trust yourself, then you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: A half truth, like half a brick, is always more forcible as an argument than a whole one. It carries better.
author: Stephen Leacock

quote: When I get logical, and I don't trust my instincts - that's when I get in trouble.
author: Angelina Jolie

quote: Trust your own instinct. Your mistakes might as well be your own, instead of someone else's.
author: Billy Wilder

quote: Don't trust anyone over 30.
author: Pat Boone

quote: How can people trust the harvest, unless they see it sown?
author: Mary Renault

quote: If we really want to be full and generous in spirit, we have no choice but to trust at some level.
author: Rita Dove

quote: Trust in yourself. Your perceptions are often far more accurate than you are willing to believe.
author: Claudia Black

quote: Never trust a husband too far, nor a bachelor too near.
author: Helen Rowland

quote: I have to trust what I do and then do it.
author: Ednita Nazario

quote: Few delights can equal the presence of one whom we trust utterly.
author: George MacDonald

quote: Put your trust in the Lord and go ahead. Worry gets you no place.
author: Roy Acuff

quote: It's a delight to trust somebody so completely.
author: Jeff Goldblum

quote: Trust should be the basis for all our moral training.
author: Robert Baden-Powell

quote: Trust not too much to appearances.
author: Virgil

quote: Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers.
author: Hesiod

quote: You have got to discover you, what you do, and trust it.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: Trust yourself, you know more than you think you do.
author: Benjamin Spock

quote: Never trust sheep.
author: Ryan Stiles

quote: Trusting your individual uniqueness challenges you to lay yourself open.
author: James Broughton

quote: I never trusted good-looking boys.
author: Frances McDormand

quote: Do not trust your memory; it is a net full of holes; the most beautiful prizes slip through it.
author: Georges Duhamel

quote: Who would not rather trust and be deceived?
author: Eliza Cook

quote: Trust everybody, but cut the cards.
author: Finley Peter Dunne

quote: Trust is a great force multiplier.
author: Tom Ridge

quote: Trust your ability!
author: Itzhak Perlman

quote: We must trust our own thinking. Trust where we're going. And get the job done.
author: Wilma Mankiller

quote: Me, I'm dishonest, and you can always trust a dishonest man to be dishonest. Honestly, it's the honest ones you have to watch out for.
author: Johnny Depp

quote: You may be deceived if you trust too much, but you will live in torment if you don't trust enough.
author: Frank Crane

quote: Trust, but verify.
author: Ronald Reagan

quote: As soon as you trust yourself, you will know how to live.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: He who does not trust enough, Will not be trusted.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: When a train goes through a tunnel and it gets dark, you don't throw away the ticket and jump off. You sit still and trust the engineer.
author: Corrie Ten Boom

quote: Trust your instinct to the end, though you can render no reason.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The senses deceive from time to time, and it is prudent never to trust wholly those who have deceived us even once.
author: Rene Descartes

quote: The only white man you can trust is a dead white man.
author: Robert Mugabe

quote: When a man assumes a public trust he should consider himself a public property.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: I cannot trust a man to control others who cannot control himself.
author: Robert E. Lee

quote: It is better to suffer wrong than to do it, and happier to be sometimes cheated than not to trust.
author: Samuel Johnson

quote: Let every eye negotiate for itself and trust no agent.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Trust has to be earned, and should come only after the passage of time.
author: Arthur Ashe

quote: Never trust anything that can think for itself if you can't see where it keeps its brain.
author: J. K. Rowling

quote: I trust no one, not even myself.
author: Joseph Stalin

quote: People come into your life and people leave it... you just have to trust that life has a road mapped out for you.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: Trust dies but mistrust blossoms.
author: Sophocles

quote: Few things can help an individual more than to place responsibility on him, and to let him know that you trust him.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: What we talked about will have to remain a secret between him and me. I spoke to him as a brother whom I have pardoned and who has my complete trust.
author: Pope John Paul II

quote: Trust not yourself, but your defects to know, make use of every friend and every foe.
author: Alexander Pope

quote: Trust and belief are two prime considerations. You must not allow yourself to be opinionated.
author: James Dean

quote: The future which we hold in trust for our own children will be shaped by our fairness to other people's children.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: Surplus wealth is a sacred trust which its possessor is bound to administer in his lifetime for the good of the community.
author: Andrew Carnegie

quote: I've only ever trusted my gut on everything. I don't trust my head, I don't trust my heart, I trust my gut.
author: Bryan Adams

quote: Whatever happens in life is fine - just trust in that.
author: Orlando Bloom

quote: So near is falsehood to truth that a wise man would do well not to trust himself on the narrow edge.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: I don't trust liberals, I trust conservatives.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Only trust thyself, and another shall not betray thee.
author: William Penn

quote: Jesus teaches us to forgive and I've got to trust him on that one.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: You must trust and believe in people or life becomes impossible.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: I wish people would realize that animals are totally dependent on us, helpless, like children, a trust that is put upon us.
author: James Herriot

quote: Seize the day, and put the least possible trust in tomorrow.
author: Horace

quote: I do not trust those who make the vaccines, or the apparatus behind it all to push it on us through fear.
author: Billy Corgan

quote: Quakers almost as good as colored. They call themselves friends and you can trust them every time.
author: Harriet Tubman

quote: I don't trust what this life has given me.
author: Dennis Rodman

quote: Do not trust the cheering, for those persons would shout as much if you or I were going to be hanged.
author: Oliver Cromwell

quote: Never trust a man, who when left alone with a tea cosey... Doesn't try it on.
author: Billy Connolly

quote: In every tyrant's heart there springs in the end this poison, that he cannot trust a friend.
author: Aeschylus

quote: To some extent I happily don't know what I'm doing. I feel that it's an artist's responsibility to trust that.
author: David Byrne

quote: We are all selfish and I no more trust myself than others with a good motive.
author: Lord Byron

quote: Responsibilities are given to him on whom trust rests. Responsibility is always a sign of trust.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Never trust the artist. Trust the tale. The proper function of the critic is to save the tale from the artist who created it.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

quote: I read the NY Times but I don't trust all of it.
author: David Byrne

quote: When trust improves, the mood improves.
author: Fernando Flores

quote: For somehow this disease inheres in tyranny, never to trust one's friends.
author: Aeschylus

quote: If people believe you're on their side, they will trust your decisions.
author: Dee Dee Myers

quote: It doesn't make any sense... that's why I trust it!
author: Kate Winslet

quote: I'm very wary of trust, you see.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

quote: The only kind of seafood I trust is the fish stick, a totally featureless fish that doesn't have eyeballs or fins.
author: Dave Barry

quote: If you don't trust the pilot, don't go.
author: Denzel Washington

quote: The only way to make a man trustworthy is to trust him.
author: Henry L. Stimson

quote: Being on your own would be sad, sick and weird. I don't trust myself. I need that balance.
author: Daniel Craig

quote: Never trust any complicated cocktail that remainds perfectly clear until the last ingredient goes in, and then immediately clouds.
author: Terry Prachett

quote: Whether you're throwing up or breaking up, you want your girlfriend right there! I don't trust women who don't go to their girlfriends.
author: Drew Barrymore

quote: I trust the people.
author: William Hague

quote: I learned you can't trust the judgment of good friends.
author: Carl Sandburg

quote: Every time I make American film I just trust American directors and American writers.
author: Jackie Chan

quote: Trust is the first step to love.
author: Munshi Premchand

quote: It is important not to trust people too much.
author: V. S. Naipaul

quote: The vote is a trust more delicate than any other, for it involves not just the interests of the voter, but his life, honor and future as well.
author: Jose Marti

quote: Therefore trust to thy heart, and to what the world calls illusions.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Sometimes you don't know who you can and cannot trust. I still learn that over and over again.
author: Demi Lovato

quote: Those who trust to chance must abide by the results of chance.
author: Calvin Coolidge

quote: Trust one who has tried.
author: Virgil

quote: Trust funds can never be a substitute for a fund of trust.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

quote: I don't always trust my own instincts. It would be nice if someone else would tell me what I should do with my life!
author: Liz Phair

quote: Be willing to trust your instincts, especially if you cannot find answers elsewhere.
author: Brian Koslow

quote: Raising five boys is a handful, trust me.
author: Barbara Bush

quote: I always have issues with trust.
author: Vin Diesel

quote: I think there is a break down of trust generally, between people and politicians. I think that's come about for a whole variety of reasons.
author: Theresa May

quote: I never trust an executive who tends to pass the buck. Nor would I want to deal with him as a customer or a supplier.
author: James Cash Penney

quote: Life is a gift, given in trust - like a child.
author: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: It is impossible to go through life without trust: that is to be imprisoned in the worst cell of all, oneself.
author: Graham Greene

quote: I love that we can trust Barack to do what he says he's going to do, even when it's hard - especially when it's hard.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: I don't think you can question your instinct; you should always trust it.
author: Andrea Arnold

quote: Young people these days don't trust anything at all. They want to be free.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: Trust me, sunscreen is so, so, so important and so I always wear sunscreen, but I still get really tan.
author: Lea Michele

quote: When a man has no reason to trust himself, he trusts in luck.
author: E. W. Howe

quote: Trust me that as I ignore all law to help the slave, so will I ignore it all to protect an enslaved woman.
author: Susan B. Anthony

quote: They say I'm the Hottest MC in the Game. If you label me that, I will live up to it. Trust me.
author: Lil Wayne

quote: I have often said one of the reasons more blacks don't support Republicans is because they don't trust the GOP establishment.
author: J. C. Watts

quote: I have made it a rule of my life to trust a man long after other people gave him up, but I don't see how I can ever trust any human being again.
author: Ulysses S. Grant

quote: Trust me, I have never written a speech in my life, and if I have my way, I never will.
author: Curt Schilling

quote: Beware of anyone who says they know. Trust me, they don't, or they wouldn't have to say they did.
author: Harvey Fierstein

quote: I trust myself. You need that to survive.
author: Yoko Ono

quote: Something goes wrong, I yell at them -"Fix it"- whether it's their fault or not. You can only really yell at the players you trust.
author: Bill Parcells

quote: So if the players trust the coach, it's not a problem. If the players don't trust the coach, it is a problem, and vice versa.
author: Bill Parcells

quote: Trust your gut.
author: Sara Blakely

quote: I wouldn't trust any man as far as you can throw a piano.
author: Ethel Merman

quote: Today I trust my instinct, I trust myself. Finally.
author: Isabelle Adjani

quote: Not everyone can be trusted. I think we all have to be very selective about the people we trust.
author: Shelley Long

quote: I've considered having my nose fixed. But I didn't trust anyone enough. If I could do it myself with a mirror.
author: Barbra Streisand

quote: I don't listen to people's opinions. I have people around me who I can trust, but most of all I listen to myself.
author: Mary J. Blige

quote: Not everyone is lucky enough to be given space and trust.
author: Vanessa Paradis

quote: Part of filmmaking is always a guessing game, and part of it is always a game of trust.
author: Greg Kinnear

quote: I don't trust a lot of journalists.
author: Calvin Klein

quote: You cannot do everything at once, so find people you trust to help you. And don't be afraid to say no.
author: Jane Seymour

quote: There are only two sorts of people in life you can trust - good Christians and good Communists.
author: Joe Slovo

quote: I've learned to trust myself, to listen to truth, to not be afraid of it and to not try and hide it.
author: Sarah McLachlan

quote: In America few people will trust you unless you are irreverent.
author: Norman Mailer

quote: I'm a dirt person. I trust the dirt. I don't trust diamonds and gold.
author: Eartha Kitt

quote: Never trust the advice of a man in difficulties.
author: Aesop

quote: I could I trust starve like a gentleman. It's listed as part of the poetic training, you know.
author: Ezra Pound

quote: If the players don't trust the coach, it is a problem, and vice versa.
author: Bill Parcells

quote: The hardest thing is that you can't trust people now. You just can't.
author: Kevin Pietersen

quote: It's not fun facing a ball going 97 mph, trust me.
author: Kevin Pietersen

quote: Don't trust anyone who has been in school for the past 24 consecutive years.
author: Craig Bruce

quote: Trust is built with consistency.
author: Lincoln Chafee

quote: Every president has to live with the result of what Lyndon Johnson did with Vietnam, when he lost the trust of the American people in the presidency.
author: Robert Caro

quote: I don't like Bush. I don't trust him. I don't like his record. He's stupid. He's lazy.
author: Cher

quote: I buy about $1,500 worth of papers every month. Not that I trust them. I'm looking for the crack in the fabric.
author: Dick Gregory

quote: Trust me, if I were gay I'd be getting more action than I'm getting now.
author: Ryan Seacrest

quote: Some directors cast you because they trust you to do the performance - but then they forget to direct you.
author: Samantha Morton

quote: The maid that loves goes out to sea upon a shattered plank, and puts her trust in miracles for safety.
author: Edward Young

quote: Not one Republican president has balanced the budget in 34 years. You can not trust Republicans with your money.
author: Howard Dean

quote: Trust is the lubrication that makes it possible for organizations to work.
author: Warren G. Bennis

quote: I also don't trust Caribou anymore. They're out there, on the tundra, waiting... Something's going down. I'm right about this.
author: Joss Whedon

quote: I think there are certain folks in Missouri that don't trust government. And they haven't trusted government for a long time.
author: Claire McCaskill

quote: I don't trust doctors. It's not to say there ain't some good ones, but on a general level, no, I wouldn't trust 'em at all.
author: Keith Richards

quote: When there's writing that you really trust, it's very freeing as an artist.
author: Matt LeBlanc

quote: It's interesting, because I tend to trust a man with big ears.
author: Mo Rocca

quote: We have been given the trust and goodwill of New Zealanders. I do not take that trust for granted, and I never will.
author: John Key

quote: As time goes by, I realize that I do trust the wind. And I often write my songs for myself.
author: David Friedman

quote: The slogan was 'Don't trust anyone over thirty'. Sixty years later the slogan became, 'Don't trust anyone over ninety'.
author: John McCarthy

quote: Trust me, I play the game for the fans, my family and myself.
author: David Ortiz

quote: You can't trust code that you did not totally create yourself.
author: Ken Thompson

quote: Don't trust the heart, it wants your blood.
author: Stanislaw Lec

quote: It takes people a while to trust you.
author: Karl Malone

quote: I believe in singularity in relationships because you've got to have trust on both sides.
author: Thomas Haden Church

quote: Well, you can't trust most people in this game, period; it can be a very shady business.
author: Marvin Hagler

quote: None of us and none of the Arabs trust Israel.
author: Bashar al-Assad

quote: I also learned to be more confident, to trust my instincts more.
author: Lindsey Buckingham

quote: Never comment on a woman's rear end. Never use the words "large" or "size" with "rear end." Never. Avoid the area altogether. Trust me.
author: Tim Allen

quote: But trust me, if I lived in the '80s, I would definitely be the one going to the record stores.
author: Julianne Hough

quote: I really like my doctors. Some of them I love. I trust them.
author: Nancy Grace

quote: If you don't trust someone to look after your investments, then they shouldn't be doing the job for you.
author: Murray Walker

quote: Jim Bakker came along. He said, Jessica Hahn, listen. You're a virgin. As God as my witness. He said, We need a girl that we can trust.
author: Jessica Hahn

quote: It's not that I don't believe in miracles, but I never quite trust that they're real.
author: Mariel Hemingway

quote: Love and trust and justice, concern for the poor, that's being pushed to the margins, and you can see it.
author: Cornel West

quote: Like, you can find your dream, if you firmly believe. You have to have the innocence, and you have to have the daringness to trust.
author: Bai Ling

quote: I think it's a style of acting that you trust. You trust the instincts.
author: Jeff Daniels

quote: I don't think it's true that blondes have more fun... Trust me, it is not true!
author: Mila Kunis

quote: Here in the United States, our profession is much maligned, people simply don't trust or like journalists anymore and that's sad.
author: Christiane Amanpour

quote: It's not my job to try and alter the director's style - he's in charge, and I'll always give him my trust.
author: Ewan McGregor

quote: Where large sums of money are concerned, it is advisable to trust nobody.
author: Agatha Christie

quote: One of the things I had to learn as a writer was to trust the act of writing. To put myself in the position of writing to find out what I was writing.
author: E. L. Doctorow

quote: I have a good team around me. I have people I trust around me. If I go the wrong way, they will yell at me. Just as they have in the past.
author: Bubba Watson

quote: You can't just trust to luck; you have to really listen to what that character is telling you.
author: Estelle Parsons

quote: I built a series of supporters that had my back. I never abused that trust. You can't cry wolf. You have to solve most problems yourself.
author: Michael Arad

quote: The trust of the people in the leaders reflects the confidence of the leaders in the people.
author: Paulo Freire

quote: I trust the time is coming, when the occupation of an instructor to children will be deemed the most honorable of human employment.
author: Angelina Grimke

quote: As contagion of sickness makes sickness, contagion of trust can make trust.
author: Marianne Moore

quote: A global democracy works only when countries trust one another.
author: Armstrong Williams

quote: This thing is for the game of golf, yeah, but trust me, the Europeans don't have that mentality.
author: Payne Stewart

quote: The biggest lesson I learned from Vietnam is not to trust our own government statements. I had no idea until then that you could not rely on them.
author: J. William Fulbright

quote: I am lucky to have advisers whom I trust.
author: Monica Seles

quote: We realized that the only persons we can truly trust in this world is each other and our families.
author: Marion Jones

quote: If you have three people in your life that you can trust, you can consider yourself the luckiest person in the whole world.
author: Selena Gomez

quote: I love to be directed. They can trust me and go.
author: Jeff Goldblum

quote: There's a lot of trust being built up. I think we have a lot of work ahead of us.
author: Jacob Lew

quote: I trust Winsor and Newton and I paint directly upon it.
author: Edward Hopper

quote: Trust him not with your secrets, who, when left alone in your room, turns over your papers.
author: Johann Kaspar Lavater

quote: I tread in the footsteps of illustrious men... in receiving from the people the sacred trust confided to my illustrious predecessor.
author: Martin Van Buren

quote: I don't trust anybody who didn't inhale.
author: Peter Fonda

quote: When you're told to go brief a United States senator on a covert operation, you go do it. And you trust the information isn't going to leak.
author: Oliver North

quote: I don't trust the Bee Gee's because there's no way they could always be happy.
author: Jon Crosby

quote: The power to investigate is a great public trust.
author: Emanuel Celler

quote: There's only a handful of people I trust completely, and I know who they are. Other than that, I pretty much don't trust people.
author: Anton Yelchin

quote: Trust cannot be commanded; and yet it is also correct that the only one who earns trust is the one who is prepared to grant trust.
author: Gustav Heinemann

quote: I think that America will not trust a party to defend America that isn't willing to defend itself.
author: James Carville

quote: Trust the tale, not the teller.
author: David Knopfler

quote: I came all this way for a reason. Today is the day of salvation. Trust Jesus to save you. Then be sincere as God knows a pretender.
author: Kirk Cameron

quote: Nobody expects to trust his body overmuch after the age of fifty.
author: Alexander Hamilton

quote: Superman was never previewed because the producers didn't trust Warners with the film.
author: Richard Donner

quote: That's how you get a performance - they put trust in you.
author: Richard Donner

quote: I never found anyone who was good enough, who I could trust enough.
author: Christine Keeler

quote: It's probably a bit of a power trip when you befriend somebody enough that they trust you to tell you things.

quote: We've got to trust the politicians with these decisions.
author: George Carey

quote: Any agreement that you have isn't going to be based on North Korea's intentions or trust.

quote: We do not trust the goodwill of the U.S. They have cut the ties.

quote: I trust no one totally.
author: Gary Sheffield

quote: I don't trust that many people. Just my mother and my wife and a couple of friends. When I trust people, it doesn't end well.

quote: I just trust people and they sense everything's gonna be alright.

quote: I look for people who're passionate, dedicated to the text, and in whom I trust completely.

quote: And when I retired, trust me, not only did Nolan Ryan, but the entire Ryan family had withdrawals from baseball. And it was tough.

quote: You see that's what I think is such a terrible, terrible betrayal, the trust that people have in government.

quote: The Christian must trust in a withdrawing God.

quote: We need to discuss the basis of a new form of trust built on a meaningful form of citizenship appropriate for a republic.

quote: The best situation is where they cast you and then they trust you.

quote: I wouldn't trust Nixon from here to that phone.

quote: What I've learned in these 11 years is you just got to stay focused and believe in yourself and trust your own ability and judgment.

quote: I generally wade in blind and trust to fate and instinct to see me through.

quote: The American people want to have trust in their leaders.

quote: You can trust a Neil Simon script. Every dot. Every dash; that pause means something. He takes all the jokes out, practically.

quote: And I also trust that there's more than one way to do something.

quote: If you get too attached to how you want it to come out the other side, you freeze. I try to trust that it will work out in the end.

quote: You desire that which exceeds my humble powers, but I trust in the compassion and mercy of the All-powerful God.

quote: Even now I can't trust life. It did too many awful things to me as a kid.

quote: If we do what we think is right, not try to point-score, people will begin to trust us.

quote: The Centre is very important to me; it's about trust - about truth.

quote: Don't trust somebody that don't have a troubled period.
author: Benjamin Walker

quote: Put more trust in nobility of character than in an oath.
author: Solon

quote: We need, in effect, to make the phantom 'lock-boxes' around the trust fund real.

quote: I grew up in a neighborhood in Baltimore that was like a war zone, so I never learned to trust that there were people who could help me.

quote: We've got a long career ahead of us and it's going to be great. Trust me.

quote: Sci-fi nerds are respectful, honorable. You can trust them.

quote: Better to trust the man who is frequently in error than the one who is never in doubt.

quote: Reporters used to be blue-collar; at the Globe now, it's practically required that you have a trust fund.

quote: I became a Republican because I trust people more than I trust government.

quote: Put your trust in God; but be sure to keep your powder dry.

quote: One of our most noble political tasks is to open up trust.

quote: Disarmament requires trust.

quote: If its not done ethically, advertising won't be trusted. If consumers don't trust it, advertising is pointless.

quote: Whom am I going to trust if I have to back again.

quote: People don't place their trust in government or company pension plans; they have to be self-reliant.

quote: You can't trust very many people.
author: George Best

quote: Any journalist worth his or her salt wouldn't trust me.
author: Joey Skaggs

quote: You should trust any man in his own art provided he is skilled in it.
author: Edward Coke

quote: One of the mistakes I made was placing too much trust in Montesinos.

quote: The chief internal enemies of any state are those public officials who betray the trust imposed upon them by the people.

quote: We grow in time to trust the future for our answers.
author: Ruth Benedict

quote: You can trust Charlie Crist.
author: Charlie Crist

quote: I can count on one hand how many people I trust.
author: Frances Bean Cobain

quote: Having been given that public trust, we have a responsibility to share with the public.

quote: How I work is I work from of very character-driven place. And I trust the writers.

quote: You can never trust what you read.

quote: I have complete artistic control, and I just do my best album every time and trust it to fate.

quote: I trust my mum with anything. If I have a problem, my mum is always the first person I go to.

quote: People trust I know what I'm doing. I have lots of credibility. I've had years of learning. I know and understand my business.

quote: I trust my wife more than I trust myself.

quote: I've never made choices based on money - I always trust my gut.

quote: Don't trust anyone over thirty.
author: Jerry Rubin

quote: Trust in yourself.
author: Claudia Black

quote: I therefore beg that you would indulge me with the liberty of declining the arduous trust.
author: Christopher Gadsden

quote: It's mostly the financial chicanery that's going on. People are saying 'What kind of trust can we put in this market?'

quote: The decision is 'trust fund' versus 'no more Medicaid' - and that shouldn't be a tough decision.
author: Haley Barbour

quote: Do not trust to the cheering, for those persons would shout as much if you and I were going to be hanged.

quote: Never trust a man who speaks well of everybody.

quote: You can't trust a promise someone makes while they're drunk, in love, hungry, or running for office.

quote: I trust my instincts.
author: Billy Zane

quote: I've never read a screenplay in advance. You trust the artist.

quote: When you're playing the same dirty dozen night after night, the moments that keep it fresh are those when you just let go and trust everyone.

quote: Work hard, use your common sense and don't be afraid to trust your instincts.

quote: It's the same old story you've heard a thousand times. Somebody's trust gets broken. Somebody's left behind.

quote: I wanted to trust in my partners and the directors and producers and do the best I can to deliver what I could deliver.

quote: I have only one rule in acting - trust the director and give him heart and soul.

quote: Firemen can do almost everything. You already trust them in life-threatening situations; why not let them help you with your everyday problems, too?

quote: I trust the people who are working with me. I delegate.

quote: Based on 30 years of experience with the Iranians, they will give you 100 words. Trust only one of the 100.

quote: Positioning the brand and regaining trust are all smart things for us to do and those are the litmus tests for any decisions we make.

quote: I don't think I can answer questions about the trust fund.

quote: The moment for action has arrived, and I know that I can trust in you to save our country.

quote: I am not the kind of girl who can trust a theory based on one person.

quote: You have to trust your body to take care of you.

quote: Give me your trust and confidence, knowing that what I seek is for the good of Fiji, for the good of us all.

quote: Those who wish well to the State ought to choose to places of trust men of inward principle, justified by exemplary conversation.

quote: Selling drug secrets violates a trust that is fundamental to the integrity of both scientific research and our financial markets.

quote: All political power is a trust.
author: Charles James Fox

quote: Teachability and trust always leads to total obedience.
author: Ed Townsend

quote: I never trust a fighting man who doesnt smoke or drink.
author: William Halsey

quote: A man who does not trust himself will never really trust anybody.

quote: I don't vote for the guy I trust. I vote for the guy who trusts me the most.

quote: Deep Throat is a guy who could have your files and mine in his trust.

quote: I don't really trust a sane person.
author: Lyle Alzado

quote: Trust me, you have to fight. When people are wrong, you've got to let them know it.

quote: Experience has taught me never to trust a policeman. Just when you think one's all right, he turns legit.
author: Ben Maddow

quote: George W. Bush is a leader, and that's what we need in the White House. George Bush is someone you can believe and trust.

quote: If global cooling will come soon - scientists will lose trust.
author: Shigenori Maruyama

quote: We have only God on our side; they have 'In God We Trust' on their side.
author: Willie Green

quote: Deciding whether to trust or credit a person is always an uncertain task.
author: Aldrich Ames

quote: The betrayal of trust carries a heavy taboo.
author: Aldrich Ames

quote: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: A fool flatters himself, a wise man flatters the fool.
author: Edward G. Bulwer-Lytton

quote: I'd rather regret the things I've done than regret the things I haven't done.
author: Lucille Ball

quote: Wisdom begins in wonder.
author: Socrates

quote: If you talk to a man in a language he understands, that goes to his head. If you talk to him in his language, that goes to his heart.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Winners never quit and quitters never win.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
author: Jim Rohn

quote: It's not what you look at that matters, it's what you see.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Honesty is the first chapter in the book of wisdom.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: A mistake is simply another way of doing things.
author: Katharine Graham

quote: Always keep an open mind and a compassionate heart.
author: Phil Jackson

quote: If you only have a hammer, you tend to see every problem as a nail.

quote: When it is obvious that the goals cannot be reached, don't adjust the goals, adjust the action steps.

quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
author: Khalil Gibran

quote: Beware of false knowledge; it is more dangerous than ignorance.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: We should not judge people by their peak of excellence; but by the distance they have traveled from the point where they started.
author: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.

quote: We can't command our love, but we can our actions.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Give me a lever long enough and a fulcrum on which to place it, and I shall move the world.
author: Archimedes

quote: Every man is a damn fool for at least five minutes every day; wisdom consists in not exceeding the limit.

quote: Be happy. It's one way of being wise.
author: Sidonie Gabrielle Colette

quote: When written in Chinese, the word "crisis" is composed of two characters. One represents danger and the other represents opportunity.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Knowing others is wisdom, knowing yourself is Enlightenment.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: We are made wise not by the recollection of our past, but by the responsibility for our future.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Reality is merely an illusion, albeit a very persistent one.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: True knowledge exists in knowing that you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: Wisdom is the reward you get for a lifetime of listening when you'd have preferred to talk.
author: Doug Larson

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: There is a wisdom of the head, and a wisdom of the heart.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: The less you talk, the more you're listened to.
author: Abigail Van Buren

quote: Common sense in an uncommon degree is what the world calls wisdom.
author: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: Cleverness is not wisdom.
author: Euripides

quote: A poem begins in delight and ends in wisdom.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Never let a fool kiss you, or a kiss fool you.
author: Joey Adams

quote: Nobody can give you wiser advice than yourself.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Don't taunt the alligator until after you've crossed the creek.
author: Dan Rather

quote: From the errors of others, a wise man corrects his own.
author: Publilius Syrus

quote: Never tell people how to do things. Tell them what to do and they will surprise you with their ingenuity.
author: George S. Patton

quote: It is a characteristic of wisdom not to do desperate things.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: The greater our knowledge increases the more our ignorance unfolds.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: The young man knows the rules, but the old man knows the exceptions.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

quote: All this worldly wisdom was once the unamiable heresy of some wise man.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: Does wisdom perhaps appear on the earth as a raven which is inspired by the smell of carrion?

quote: People don't notice whether it's winter or summer when they're happy.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: The doorstep to the temple of wisdom is a knowledge of our own ignorance.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: A prudent question is one-half of wisdom.
author: Francis Bacon

quote: The road of excess leads to the palace of wisdom.
author: William Blake

quote: The greatest obstacle to discovery is not ignorance - it is the illusion of knowledge.
author: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: Wise sayings often fall on barren ground, but a kind word is never thrown away.
author: Arthur Helps

quote: Better mad with the rest of the world than wise alone.
author: Baltasar Gracian

quote: Better be wise by the misfortunes of others than by your own.
author: Aesop

quote: To conquer fear is the beginning of wisdom.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Winning is not everything, but wanting to win is.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: If you call failures experiments, you can put them in your resume and claim them as achievements.
author: Mason Cooley

quote: Wisdom is found only in truth.
author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quote: Wisdom is learning what to overlook.
author: William James

quote: No man was ever wise by chance.
author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: You have to find out what's right for you, so it's trial and error. You are going to be all right if you accept realistic goals for yourself.
author: Teri Garr

quote: Honesty is the rarest wealth anyone can possess, and yet all the honesty in the world ain't lawful tender for a loaf of bread.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Almost every wise saying has an opposite one, no less wise, to balance it.
author: George Santayana

quote: The doors of wisdom are never shut.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quote: Knowledge comes, but wisdom lingers.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: If I don't have wisdom, I can teach you only ignorance.
author: Leo Buscaglia

quote: It has long been an axiom of mine that the little things are infinitely the most important.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle

quote: Wisdom is not wisdom when it is derived from books alone.
author: Horace

quote: I didn't get where I am today by worryin' about how I'd feel tomorrow.
author: Ron White

quote: Memory is the mother of all wisdom.
author: Aeschylus

quote: The wheel that squeaks the loudest is the one that gets the grease.
author: Josh Billings

quote: Start wide, expand further, and never look back.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Knowledge is of no value unless you put it into practice.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: He dares to be a fool, and that is the first step in the direction of wisdom.
author: James Huneker

quote: Some folks are wise and some are otherwise.
author: Tobias Smollett

quote: Wisdom stands at the turn in the road and calls upon us publicly, but we consider it false and despise its adherents.

quote: He who lives by the crystal ball soon learns to eat ground glass.
author: Edgar R. Fiedler

quote: The truest wisdom is a resolute determination.
author: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: Repeat anything often enough and it will start to become you.
author: Tom Hopkins

quote: When I can look life in the eyes, grown calm and very coldly wise, life will have given me the truth, and taken in exchange - my youth.
author: Sara Teasdale

quote: He who devotes sixteen hours a day to hard study may become at sixty as wise as he thought himself at twenty.
author: Mary Wilson Little

quote: Who is wise in love, love most, say least.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

quote: Wisdom outweighs any wealth.
author: Sophocles

quote: If you want to be found stand where the seeker seeks.
author: Sidney Lanier

quote: You must accept responsibility for your actions, but not the credit for your achievements.
author: Denis Waitley

quote: Of prosperity mortals can never have enough.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Wisdom is the quality that keeps you from getting into situations where you need it.
